data.eng: The Israeli Air Force launches an attack against tunnels leading from Gaza into Israel in response to missile attacks and mortar fire.
data.aaf: Israail qaran Cayli Misaailit Maysataka kee Morter Girah Gaazak Illa Israail Culusa Gacooral Maysataka Qimbise.
data.amh: የእስራኤል አየር ሃይል የተቃጣበትን የሚሳኤል እና የሞርታር ጥቃት ማላሽ ነው ሲል በጋዛ ሰርጥ ላይ ጥቃት መፈፀም ጀመረ።
data.orm: Humni qilleensaa Isiraa'el haleellaa misaayelaa fi ibbiddaa ciccimaa irra ga'eef deebii kennuuf holqoota gara gaazaa geessan irratti haleellaa ni bana.
data.som: Ciidamada Cirka ee Israa’iil ayaa weerar ku qaaday marinnada dhulka hoostiisa ee Gaza, iyadoo ka jawaabaysa weerarrada gantaalaha iyo hoobiyayaasha lala beegsaday Israel.
data.tir: ኣብ ኣፍጋኒስታን ቀንዲ መራሒ ኣልቃይዳን ካብ ኦሳማ ቢን ላደን ቀፂሉ ሳልሳይ ላዕለዋይ ኣዛዚ ኣቡ ኣል ያዚድ ከምዝቐተለ ተሓቢሩ።

data.eng: Atheist Ireland purposefully publishes the words of Jesus Christ, Muhammad, Salman Rushdie, Mark Twain and Pope Benedict XVI on its website despite a new law banning them on grounds of blasphemy.
data.aaf: Yalla Alesini Ayerlandi qayto sababite kalallah yan qusba Gaanun Sugay Iyasusus kiristosuy፣ Macammaday፣ salamaan Rashiy፣ Marki Taywan kee saqalahyan Babas 16hyto Qangara websayit Guubul Yaysiriqe::
data.amh: አምላክ የለሽ አየርላንድ የኢየሱስ ክርስቶስን ፣ የመሐመድን ፣ የሰልማን ሩሽዲ ፣ የማርክ ትዌይን እና የርዕሰ ሊቃነ ጳጳሳት ቤኔዲክት 16 ኛን ቃልን መጠቀማቸው ስድብ በመሆኑ እንዳይጠቀሙ የሚከለክል ህግ ቢኖርም በድረ -ገፃቸው ላይ ሆን ብለው አትመዋል።
data.orm: Seera haaraa waa'ee maq-balleessii amantiilee dhorku bahe duubatti dhiisuun namoonni waaqa-dhabeessi Aayerland itti yaaduun jechoota akka yesuus kiristoos,Muhammad, Saalmaan Rushdee, Maark Tiween, fi phaaphaasii Benediktii 16ffa faa tooraa marsariitii irratti maxxansan
data.som: Waba macaabudada Ireland ayaa waxay si laablakac ah ugu daabacdaa bogooda ereyada Ciise Masiix, Muxammad, Salman Rushdie, Mark Twain iyo Pope Benedict 16aad inkasta oo uu jiro sharci cusub oo diidaya aflaggadada diimaha.
data.tir: ብህላወ እግዚኣብሄር ዘይትኣምን ኣየርላንድ፣ እየሱስ ክርስቶስ፣ መሓመድ፣ ሳልማን ሩሽዲ፣ ማርክ ትዌይንን ሊቀጳጳስ ቤኔዲክት ዓሰርተ ሽድሽተን ዝብሉ ኣስማት ምሕታም ዝኽልክል ሓድሽ ሕጊ እንተሃለወ’ኳ ኮነይ ኢላ ኣብ መርበብ ገፃ ከምዝጠቀዐት ተፈሊጡ።

data.eng: Egyptian archaeologists discover the largest tomb yet discovered in the ancient Saqqara necropolis.
data.aaf: Masri Akiologisti Dumaahih sakara nikerobolisih addal Taham fanah Geytimte nabah tan kabrite Geytimte.
data.amh: የግብፅ የቁፋሮ ተመራማሪዎች በቀደምት የሳቃራ መቃብር ስፍራ አዲስ የመዋብር ስፍራ አገኙ።
data.orm: Arkiyoolojistoonni Gibxii `bakka awaalchaa durii Saqqaaraa keessatti awwaalcha haga ammaatti argamee keessaa isa guddicha argatan.
data.som: Khabiirada raadadka qadiimiga ee Masar ayaa helay qabrigii ugu weynaa kaas oo laga helay deegaanka qadiimiga ah ee Saqqara, necropolis.
data.tir: ግብፃዊያን ተመራመርቲ ስነኳዕቲ ዛጊድ ካብ ዝተረኸቡ እቲ ዝዓበየ መቓብር ኣብ ሳኳራ ኔክሮፖሊስ ረኺቦም።

data.eng: A diesel fuel leak in Shaanxi, China reaches the Yellow River, a water source for millions of people.
data.aaf: Booliyatal Lowinta Marite Lee Raceena Tanih Tan Shaanx, Chayinah Adda Nafata Sukati Caxite.
data.amh: በሻንቺ ፣ ቻይና ውስጥ የተከሰተው የናፍጣ ነዳጅ መፍሰስ በሚሊዮኖች ለሚቆጠሩ ሰዎች የውሃ ምንጭ ወደሆነው የሎው ወንዝ ደረሰ።
data.orm: Dhangala'uun boba'aa naafxaa Shaanshii, Chaayinaa keessaa Laga Yellow, madda bishaanii namoota miliyinootaa bira qaqqabe.
data.som: Shiinaha ayaa gaadhay Wabiga Yellow, oo ah isha biyaha malaayiin qof iyo Shidaal naaftada ah oo ku soo qulqulaya Shaanxi.
data.tir: ኣብ ሻንሺ ቻይና ነዳዲ ዲዝል ምስ ላሓዀ ናብቲ ብሚልዮናት ንዝቝጸሩ ሰባት ምንጪ ማይ ዝዀነ ብጫ ፈለግ በጺሑ።

data.eng: Slovakia admits responsibility for a major bomb alert on Dorset Street in Dublin, Ireland, after planting explosives on a civilian as a test.
data.aaf: Solovakiya AYerlanxik Xublin Addal Xorset Gititel Bakaqteh Tan bombi Mabitinah Masuliyat Yemeneh, Bakaqih Ayyuntal Inki Gibatu Abehiiy Suge.
data.amh: ስሎቫኪያ በአየርላንዷ ዱብሊን ከተማ ዶርሴት መንገድ ላይ ንፁሃን ሰዎች ባሉበት አካባቢ ስለጠቃጣው የፈንጂ አደጋ ሀላፊነቱን እንደምትወስድ አስታወቀች።
data.orm: Siloovaakiyaan erga yaaliif waan dhuka'u nama nagaatti hiitee booda, akeekkachiisa boombii ijoo kan Doorset Istriit Duubiliin keessaaf itti gaafatamummaa akka fudhattu amante.
data.som: Slovakia ayaa qiratay mas'uuliyadda digniinta weyn ee bambaanada ee Dorset Street ee Dublin, Ireland, ka dib markii ay ku rakibtay walxaha qarxa qof rayid ah si tijaabo ah.
data.tir: ስሎቫክያ ድሕሪ እቲ ኣብ ልዕሊ ሓደ ሰቪላዊ ሰብ ከም መፈተኒ ኢላ ዝተኸለቶ ተተኳሲ፣ ኣብ ዳብለን ኣየርላንድ ጎደና ዶርሰት ቦምባ ተተኺሉ ምህላው ዝሕብር ዓቢ መጠንቀቕታ ሓላፍነት ከም እትወስደሉ ኣሚና።

data.eng: A weekend killing in Australia has prompted the Indian government to issue an advisory for its college students studying in that country.
data.aaf: Awustaraliy Acad kee sabtih qidem hindi doolat ta baaxlol baritah kolloji barttenit fayu abe kah yawqenah Uguuguse.
data.amh: በአውስትራሊያ በሳምንቱ መጨረሻ ላይ የተፈጸመው ግድያ የህንድ መንግስት በዚያ ሀገር ለሚማሩ የኮሌጅ ተማሪዎቿ ምክር እንድትሰጥ አነሳስቷል።
data.orm: Ajjeechaan dhuma torbanii Awustiraaliyaa keessaa mootummaan Hindii barattoota isaa biyya sana keessa jiraniif ibsa gorsaa akka dafee baasu godhe.
data.som: Dilka dabayaaqadii toddobaadkan ka dhacay Australia ayaa ku kalifay dowladda Hindiya inay soo saarto gu'aan ay talooyin ku siinayso ardaydeeda wax ka barta kuliyadaha dalkaas.
data.tir: መንግስቲ ህንዲ ኣብ ኦስትሬልያ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ቀዳም ሰናብቲ ብምኽንያት ዘጋጠመ ቅትለት ኣብታ ሃገር ንዝመሃሩ ህንዳውያን ተምሃሮ ዩኒቨረሲቲ ማዕዳ ኣተሓላሊፉ።

data.eng: Sékouba Konaté, the interim head of the junta in Guinea, is flown to Senegal after falling ill.
data.aaf: Giini Addal Junta Xayi Waktih Sebkoba Konte Lakmiseeklakal Illa Senegal Fanah Been/
data.amh: ሴኮባ ኮናቴ ጊኒ ውስጥ የሚገኝ ጁንታ ጊዜያዊ መሪ በመታመሙ ወደ ሴኔጋል ተወሰደ።
data.orm: Sekuubaa Konaatee, dursaan yeroo juntaa Giinii keessaa, erga dhukkubsatee booda gara Senegaal xiyyaaraan imale.
data.som: Sékouba Konaté, oo ah madaxa kumeel gaarka ee jabhada Guinea, ayaa loo duuliyay Senegal kadib markii uu xanuunsaday.
data.tir: መራሒ ወታደራዊ መንግስቲ ጊኒ ሴኩባ ኮናቴ ስለዝሓመመ ንሕክምና ናብ ሴኔጋል በሪሩ።

data.eng: South African President Jacob Zuma urges party unity and warns economic recovery will be slow at a gathering celebrating the 98th anniversary of the African National Congress.
data.aaf: Gabi Qaxi Afrikah Berezixanti Jabek zuuma 98 Hyto Afrikah Agatih Kongers Waynabol yasakaxeh yan Dafenal Isi Misoynah Inkino ka hangisam kee maduuruk Yawqoonuh Alifi Iya.
data.amh: የደቡብ አፍሪካው ፕሬዚደንት ጃኮብ ዙማ የፓርቲያቸው የአፍሪካ ህብረት ኮንግረስ የ98ኛ አመት ክብረ በዓል ላይ ከኢኪኖሚያዊው ጫና የሚያገግሙበት አካሄድ እየዘገየ እንደሆነ አስጠነቀቁ።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin Afrikaa Kibba Jaakob Zuumaa ayyaana waggaa 98ffaa jaarmiyaa Kongireessii Biyyaalessaa Afrikaa kabajuuf bakka namootni walitti qabamanitti tokkummaa jaarmiyaa akka jiraatu gorsuun deebi'ee fooyya'un diinagdee suuta jechuu akka malu akeekkachiisan.
data.som: Madaxweynaha Koonfurta Afrika Jacob Zuma ayaa ku boorriyay midnimada xisbiga, Xaflad laguxusayo sanad guuraha 98aad ee Golaha Qaranka Afrika ayuu kaga digay in kasoo kabashada dhaqaaluhu ayna noqonin mid ka gaabisa xawarihii larabay.
data.tir: ፕሬዚደንት ደቡብ ኣፍሪካ ጃኮብ ዙማ መበል 98 ዓመት ምስረታ ሃገራዊ ጉባኤ ኣፍሪካ ንምኽባር ኣብዝተፀወዐ ኣኼባ ኣብዝገበርዎ ዘረባ ፓርቲኦም ሓድነት ከርእይ ዝፀውዑ እንትኾን ቁጠባዊ ሕውየት ክድንጉይ እዩ ብምባል ኣጠንቂቖም።

data.eng: The Confederation of African Football announces that football matches will continue to be played in Cabinda Province where the attack took place.
data.aaf: Maysaak Ede takke Kabinxa Rakaakayal Ibikosqoso Didir Gexsiselonum Afrikak Ibikoqosohkonfixireeshion qadoose.
data.amh: የአፍሪካ እግር ኳስ ኮንፌዴሬሽን ጥቃቱ በተፈጸመበት በካቢንዳ ግዛት የእግር ኳስ ጨዋታዎች እንደሚቀጥሉ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Konfidereeshinnin kubbaa miilaa Afirikaa dorgommiin kubbaa miilaa Piroviinsii Kaabindaa kan haleellaan keessatti tahe keessatti itti fufee akka taphatamu beeksise.
data.som: Golaha Kubadda cagta Afrika ayaa ku dhawaaqaya in ciyaaraha kubbadda cagtu ay ka sii socon doonaan gobolka kabinda ee uu weerarka ka dhacay.
data.tir: ኮንፌደሬሽን ኩዕሶ እግሪ ኣፍሪካ እቲ ግጥም ኩዕሶ እግሪ ኣብ’ቲ መጥቃዕቲ ዝተፈፀመሉ ቦታ ኣብ ክፍለ ሃገር ካቢንዳ ከቕፅል ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: Wolfgang Wodarg, the Council of Europe's head of health affairs, claims that the 2009 flu pandemic was a "false pandemic" orchestrated by the pharmaceutical industry to sell vaccines.
data.aaf: Awrobak Qafiyat Caagidah Malah Buxa Wolfgang Wodarg 2009 Goson Dalkah Daylih Sanaqata Biciseh tan Aftabite Limowtuh Abeenih Yaninm kinim Yescese
data.amh: የአውሮፓ የጤንነት ካውንስል መሪ የሆነው ዎልፍጋንገ ዎዳርግ የ2009 የጉንፋን ወረርሽኝ በመዳኒት አቅራቢዎች ክትባቶችን ለመሸጥ ሲባል የተቀነባበረ የውሸት ወረርሽኝ እንደሆነ ተናገሩ።
data.orm: akka manni Maree Olaanaan Dhimmoota Fayyaa Awurooppaa Woolfgaang Woodarg jedhutti weerarri dhibee utaalloo bara 2009'ii 'weerara Holola sobaa' kan Indastriiwwan oomishalee qorichaatiin Vaksiinii gugurachuuf jecha qindaa'e ta'u dubbata.
data.som: Wolfgang Wodarg, oo ah madaxa arrimaha caafimaadka ee Golaha Yurub, ayaa ku andacoonaya in musiibadi hargabka ee 2009 ay ahayd “masiibo been ah” taas oo ay soo agaasimeen warshadaha dawooyinka si loo iibiyo tallaalada.
data.tir: ሓላፊ ጉዳያት ጥዕና ቤት ምኽሪ ኤውሮጳ፣ ቮልፍጋንግ ዎዳርግ፣ እቲ ብ2009 ዘጋጠመ ለብዒ ኢንፍሉወንዛ ክታበት ንምሻጥ ብኢንዱስትሪ መድሃኒት ዝተቃመመ "ናይ ሓሶት ለብዒ" ከም ዝኾነ ገሊጹ።

data.eng: Thousands of supporters of former Thai Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra gather outside the home of a royal adviser accused of involvement in the 2006 coup that ousted the Prime Minister.
data.aaf: Alafatal Lowinta Dumahi Taylanxik Naharsi Malaak Thaksin Shinawatra Qokola Naharsi Malaak Miraciinuk Diriyen 2006 Doolat Koro Axcuk Malkit Amoti Fayih Buxak Irol Ankatelon.
data.amh: በሺዎች የሚቆጠሩ የቀድሞ የታሒ ጠቅላይ ሚኒሰቴር ታህክሲን ሺንዋትራ ደጋፊዎች በ2006 በተደረገባቸው የመፈንቅለ መንግስት ምክንያት በንጉሳዊ አማካሪ ቤተመንግስት ደጃፍ በመገኘት ተቃውሞአቸውን አሰሙ።
data.orm: Deeggartoonni mummicha ministeeraa duraanii Taaksiin Sinawatraa kumaatamaan lakkawwaman namticha gorsaa mootii duraanii fi fonqolcha motummaa bara 2006 kan mummicha ministeericha irratti ari'ataman keessaa harka qabachuun kan himatame fuula dura mana jireenyaa isaatti walitti qabaman.
data.som: Kumanaan ka mid ah taageerayaasha Ra'iisul Wasaarihii hore ee Thailand Thaksin Shinawatra ayaa isugu soo baxay bannaanka guriga lataliye boqortooyada oo lagu eedeeyay inuu ku lug ku lahaa afgambigii 2006 ee xilka lagaga tuuray Ra'iisul Wasaaraha.
data.tir: ኣሽሓት ደገፍቲ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ታይላንድ ነበር ታክሲን ሺናዋትራ ኣብ መንበሪ ገዛ ናይቲ ኣብ 2006 ዓ.ም ኣብ ልዕሊ እቲ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ናይ ዕልዋ ፍጻሜ ኢድ ዝነበሮ ኣማኻሪ ንጉስ ኣብ ኣፍደገ ተኣኪቦም።

data.eng: Australia experiences its hottest night since 1902, as a heat wave grips the country.
data.aaf: Laqanah osetina Ta Baaaxo tatiribixuh 1902 qimbisak Awustaraliya Kaxxam Laqanat Geytimta.
data.amh: በአየር ሙቀት እየተፈተነች ያለችው አውስትራሊያ ከ1902 በ|ላ ሞቃታማ የተባለውን ምሽት አሳልፋለች።
data.orm: Awustiraaliyaan erga bara 1902 tii yeroo dambaliin ho'aa biyyattii miidhe halkan baay'ee ho'aa keessumeessite.,
data.som: Australia waxay la kulantay habeenkeedii ugu kululaa tan iyo 1902 -kii, iyadoo mawjad kuleyl ah uu dalka qabsaday.
data.tir: ብምኽንያት እቲ ንመላእ እታ ሃገር ዝዓትዐተ ማዕበል ሃሩር ፤ኣውስትራሊያ ድሕሪ 1902 ዓ.ም.ፈ ርእያቶ ዘይትፈልጥ ኣዝዩ ዝወዓየ ለይቲ ኣጋጢምዋ።

data.eng: Turkish police arrest at least 14 military officers, including four generals, accused of a 2003 coup plot.
data.aaf: Turkiyah Bolis I.L.L. 2003 Doolat koroh Umane Abteh kak Iyen Afara Jeneral ede anuk wali 14 Qaskariyoh saqolti Lowsis Gubat heen.
data.amh: የቱርክ ፖሊስ እ.ኤ.አ በ 2003 ዓ.ም የመፈንቅለ መንግስት ሴራ ፈጽመዋል ተብለው የተጠረጠሩ አራት ጄኔራሎችን ጨምሮ ቢያንስ አስራ አራት ወታደራዊ መኮንኖችን በቁጥጥር ስር አውሏል።
data.orm: Poolisiin turkii bara 2003tti namoota yaalii fonqolcha mootumma geggeessuun himatan Generaalota afur dabalatee, yoo xiqqaate miseensa humna waraana 14 to'annoo jala oolchee .
data.som: Booliiska Turkiga ayaa xidhay ugu yaraan 14 sarkaal oo milateri ah, oo ay ku jiraan afar jeneraal, oo lagu eedeeyay afgambigii 2003.
data.tir: ፖሊስ ቱርኪ ንኣርባዕተ ጀነራላት ሓዊሱ ኣብቲ ብ2003 ዓ.ም.ፈ. ዝተኻየደ ዕልዋ መንግስቲ ተሳቲፎም ንዝተብሃሉ ብውሕዱ 14 ወተሃደራዊ መኮንናት ኣብ ትሕቲ ቁፅፅር ኣውዒሉ።

data.eng: Al-Qaeda's top leader in Afghanistan, and Osama bin Laden's third in command, Mustafa Abu al-Yazid, is reported killed.
data.aaf: Afgaanistaanal Alkaaqidahk Fayale Saqal kee Usaama Bilaadin Sidicaytoh Amrise Mustafa Abu Al Yazid Qideenim Qabaqe.
data.amh: በአፍጋኒሳትን ከአልቃይዳ ዋና አመራሮች የነበረው እና የኦሳማ ቢላደን ሶሰተኛ አዛዥ የነበርው ሙሰጠፋ አቡ አል ያዚድ እንደተገደለ ተነገረ።
data.orm: Afgaanistaanitti gaggeessaa olaanaan Alqaayidaa fi ajaajaan sadarkaa sadaffaa Osaamaa Bin Laaden, Musxafaa Abuu Alyaazid akka ajjeefaman gabaafame.
data.som: Mustafa abu alyazid oo ah Hoggaamiyiha ugu sarreeyey Al-Qaacida, iyo hoggaamiyihii saddexaad ee Usaama Bin Laadin, ayaa la sheegay in lagu dhex dilay Afghanistan.
data.tir: ናይ ኣሜሪካ ከምዝኾነት ዝተጠርጠረት ድሮን ኣብ ሰሜን ምዕራብ ፓኪስታን ኣብ ጥቓ ሚር ዓሊ ኹሻሊ ኣብትበሃል ቁሸት ኣብ ልዕሊ ሓደ ገዛ ሚሳይላት ብምትኳስ ኣርባዕተ ሰባት ቀቲላ።

data.eng: Poland publishes the transcript of flight data recorders from the fatal 2010 Polish Air Force Tu-154 crash which killed 96 officials and intellectuals on 10 April.
data.aaf: Hindik Mumbai (Bombay) Addal moonshine Oqobinik Lakal Sagla taban kee Afara Num Edde Rabteeh, 45 kalah kaddu Hosbital Inaqat Yanin.
data.amh: ፖላንድ ኤፕሪል 10 ቀን 96 ባለሥልጣናትን እና ምሁራንን ከገደለው የ 2010 የፖላንድ አየር ኃይል ቱ -154 አደጋ የበረራ መረጃ መቅረጫዎችን ግልባጭ ለህትመት አበቃች።
data.orm: Poolaand barreeffama waraabduuwwan daataa balalii Humna Qilleensaa Poolaand Tu-154 isa bara 2010 kufee angawootaa fi beektota 96 gaafa Ebla 10 ajjeesee maxxansite.
data.som: Poland ayaa daabacday qoraalka xogta shilkii duullimaadks diyaaradda Tu-154 ee ciidanka cirka Polish ee 2010 ay ku dhinteen 96 sarkaal iyo waxgarad 10kii Abriil.
data.tir: ፖላንድ ናይታ ብሚያዝያ 10/2010 ዓ.ም.ፈ ሓደጋ ገጢምዋ ዝተሓምሸሸትን ዘሳፈረቶም 96 ሰበ ስልጣንንን ምሁራትን ሞት ዘስዓበትን TU-154 ዝዓይነታ ነፋሪት ሓይሊ ኣየር ፖላንድ ኣብ መቅረፂ በረራ ዝተረኸበ መረዳእትኣ ንህዝቢ ዘርጊሓቶ።

data.eng: America's Obama administration warns that BP's oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico could continue until August.

data.som: Maamulka Obama ee Mareykanka ayaa ka digay in shidaalka shirkada Bp ee ku qubanaya Gacanka Mexico uu sii socon karo ilaa iyo bisha Ogosto.

data.eng: Three Namibian women sue the state after they are sterilised without their informed consent after being diagnosed as HIV positive.

data.som: Saddex haween ah oo u dhashay Namibiya ayaa dacweeyey dawladda kadib markii madhalays laga dhigay iyaga oo aan oggolaansho ka lagaqaadan ka dib markii la ogaaday inay qabaan HIV.

data.eng: An estimated 52,000 people took part in anti-government protests in the former British colony of Hong Kong.
data.aaf: Dumahih Ingiliziuk Koamolayo Hongikongih aadal 52,000 Gaba bata marite Doolatal Saduh tan saditet Tengele.
data.amh: በቀድሞው የብሪታንያ ቅኝ ግዛት በሆንግ ኮንግ ከተማ በተደረገው ተቃውሞ 52,000 (ሃምሳ ሁለት ሺህ) የሚገመቱ ሰዎች ተሳትፈዋል።
data.orm: Hiriira mormii farra gita bittaa Biriteen duraaanii hong kong keessatti gaggeeffameen namoonnii 52000tti tilmaamaman hirmaataniiru.
data.som: Dad tiradoodu ay gaadhayso 52,000 oo qof ayaa ka qeyb qaatay banaan bax dowladda looga soo horjeedo oo ka dhacay Hong Kong oo kuhas jiri jirtay guumaysiga Ingiriiska.

data.eng: The Parliament of Finland approves the construction of two nuclear power stations.

data.eng: Fossils discovered at the Franceville site in Gabon are claimed to be evidence that multicellular life on Earth began at least 1.5 billion years earlier than currently reckoned.
data.aaf: Gaboon Addal faransayvil Fanteena Geytime Raqsenti exaxi ginol Mango selulare mano Ta wakti matartemik wali 1.5 bilyoonih Sanatitek Afal Qimbisem Oytia kini Iyen.
data.amh: በጋቦን ፍራንስቪሌ የተገኙ ቅሪተ አካላት በምድራችን ላይ ባለብዙ ህዋስ አካላት መኖር ጀመሩ ተብሎ ከሚታሰብበት 1.5 ቢሊዮን አመት በላይ ስለመኖራቸው ማሳያ እንደሆኑ ተመላከተ።
data.orm: Hambaan lafee fi biqiltoota bakka Firaansiviille Gaabon keessaatti argame ragaa jireenyi seel-hedduu Lafa irratti yoo xiqqaate waggoota biliyoona 1.5 dura kan ammatti herregame dursee akka jalqabe agarsiisa.
data.som: Qalfoof laga helay goobta Franceville ee wadanka Gabon ayaa la sheegay inay caddayn u tahay in nolosha unugyada badan ee Dunidu bilaabantay ugu yaraan 1.5 bilyan oo sano ka hor, taas oo ka badan inta hadda la xisaabiyay.
data.tir: ብመሰረት እቲ ኣብ ጋቦን ኣብ ነቑጣ ፍራንሲቫይል ዝተረኸበ መረዳእታ ቅሪተ ኣካል ብዝሃ ዋህዮ ዘለዎ ህይወት ኣብ መሬት ዝተጀመረ ከምቲ ሕዚ ዘሎ እምነት እንተይኮነስ ብውሑድ ቅድሚ 1.5 ቢልዮን ዓመታት ከምዝኾነ ተገሚቱ ኣሎ።

data.eng: Astronomers confirm the first-ever direct picture of an extrasolar planet orbiting its star.
data.aaf: Astoroonoomih qaalim qimmoh addah taswiir extrasolar pilaanetiy cutuktat maruh tanik yeyyeeqe
data.amh: የጠፈር ተመራማሪዎች የመጀመሪያ የሆነውን የኤክስትራሶላር ፕላኔት በኮከቦቹ ላይ ሲዘዋወር የሚያሳይ ምስል እንዳገኙ አስታወቁ።
data.orm: Qorattoonni hawaa Suuraa pilaaneetii sirna soolaariin alaa urjii isaatti naanna'u kan jalqaba ta'e mirkaneessan.
data.som: Cirbixiyeennada ayaa xaqiijiya sawirkii ugu horreeyey abid ee toos ah ee meeratada cadceeda ka baxsan oo ku wareegaya xiddiggeeda.
data.tir: ሊቃውንቲ ስነ-ክዋኽብቲ ሓደ ካብ ዙርያ ጸሓይ ወጻኢ ኣብ ገዛእ ኮኾቡ ዝዘውር ፕላነት ንዑኡ ዝገልጽ ከቶ ናይ ፈለማ ቀጥታዊ ስእሊ ኣረጋጊጾም።

data.eng: Politicians in Nepal fail to elect a new Prime Minister for the third time after no candidate secured a majority.
data.aaf: Nebal Addal Tan Siyaasa maxagite Inkin qalale Mango Xongolo Geenik lakal Sidicaytoh Adda Qusba Naharsi Malaak Dooranam Maxiqinon.
data.amh: በኔፓል ያሉ ፖለቲከኞች ለጠቅላይ ሚኒስቴርነት ከሚወዳደሩ እጩ ተወዳዳሪዎች ውስጥ ከፍተኛ ድምፅ ማግኘት ባለመቻሉ ለሶስተኛ ጊዜ አዲስ ጠቅላይ ሚኒስቴር መምረጥ ተሳናቸው።
data.orm: Hoggantoonni siyaasaa Nepaal keessaa erga kaadhimamaan tokkoyyuu sagalee wayyabaa argachuu dhabee yeroo sadaffaaf Muummicha Ministeeraa haaraa filachuu dadhaban.
data.som: Mar sadexaad ayay Siyasiyinta Nepal ku guuldaraystay in ay doortan Ra'iisul Wasaare cusub kadib markii laheli waayay musharax codka intiisa badan hela
data.tir: ኣብ ኔፓል ካብ ሞንጎ እቶም ንመረፃ ዝቐረቡ ሕፁያት ዋላ ሓደ ኣብዝሓ ድምፂ ዝረኸበ ስለዘየለ ፖለቲከኛታት እታ ሃገር ሓድሽ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ንምምራፅ ንሳልሳይ ግዜ ዝገበርዎ ፈተነ ፈሺሉ።

data.eng: A Greek truck drivers strike ends with the situation expected to get back to normal quickly.
data.aaf: GiriikQeebit Ereri Makina Kokobiseenit Taama solisanamih Dirab GabaleKalam Sisikuk Illa Madab fanahAdarelonu Axcuk Elle Qambalanamih Calota kini.
data.amh: በግሪክ የሚገኙ የከባድ መኪና አሽከርካሪዎች ሁኔታው ወደ ቀድሞው እንደሚመለስ በማሰብ ያደረጉትን አድማ አቆሙ።
data.orm: Lagannaan hojii konkolachistoota gosa konkolaataa 'Tiraakii' yeroo xumuramutti osoo hin turin haala barametti ni deebi'a jedhamee eegama.
data.som: Shaqo joojinta dirawalada baabuurta xamuulka ee Giriigga ayaa dhamaatay iyadoo xaaladda la filayo inay si dhakhso ah caadi ugu soo noqoto.
data.tir: ግሪኻውያን መራሕቲ ናይ ጽዕነት መካይን ዝጀመሩዎ ኣድማ ተዛዚሙ ኣብ ርእሲ ምህላዉ ኩነታት ብቅልጡፍ ናብ ንቡር ክምለስ ትጽቢት ይግበር።

data.eng: President of Mexico Felipe Calderón calls for a debate on the legalization of drugs.
data.aaf: Meksikoh Berexizanti Felipe Calderón Cashishite Ganunul Curi Abuh Agaarad kah Yekke inah Seeco Xayoose.
data.amh: የሜክሲኮው ፕሬዚደንት ፍሊፔ ካልዴሮን በእፆች ህጋዊነት ላይ ክርክር እንዲደረግ ጥሪ አቀረቡ።
data.orm: Pireezidaantiin Meeksiikoo Felippee Kaaldeeroon dhimma qoricha sammuu nama adoochu gara seera qabeessatti deebisu irratti gaaffiif deebiin taasisuuf waamicha godhan.
data.som: Madaxweynaha Mexico Felipe Calderón ayaa ku baaqay in laga doodo sharciyeynta maandooriyeyaasha.
data.tir: ፕሬዚዳንት ሜክሲኮ ፌሊፕ ካልዴሮን እፀፋሪስ ሕጋዊ ብዛዕባ ዝኾነሉ ጉዳይ ክትዕ ክካየድ ፀዊዑ ።

data.eng: Elena Kagan is sworn in as the fourth woman to sit on the Supreme Court of the United States.
data.aaf: Alina Kandan Usik Daga Raqa Garoyseh Kukteh buxal Afeyuh Fereyhato Bara Akuk xiiba abe.
data.amh: ኤሌና ካጋን በዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ጠቅላይ ፍርድ ቤት መቀመጫ በማግኘት አራተኛዋ ሴት ሆና ቃለ መሃላ ፈጽማለች።
data.orm: Ilenaa Kaagan dubartii dura teessuu mana murtii olaanaa Ameerikaa 4ffaa ta'uun sirna kakuu raawwaatte.
data.som: Elena Kagan ayaa loo dhaariyay Maxkamadda Sare ee Mareykanka taas oo ay kunoqotay haweeneydii afaraad ee soo fariisata.
data.tir: ኢሌና ካጋን ወንበር ጠቕላሊ ቤት ፍርዲ ኣሜሪካ ዝሓዛ ራብዐይቲ ኣንስተይቲ ብምዃን ቃለ ማሕላ ፈፂመን።

data.eng: Wendy Chapman, the doctor at the centre of the Bloodgate rugby union scandal, is summoned to a disciplinary hearing on 23 August.
data.aaf: Xemiget ragibi Inkiinol Umanel leh yan Dr wanxi Chabiman Ximolik 23 illa meqem kaban Chilot fanah secime.
data.amh: በብለድጌት ራግቢ ህብረት ቅሌት መሃል ያለው ዶክተር ዌንዲ ቻፕማን ነሐሴ 23 ላይ ወደ ዲሲፕሊን ችሎት ተጠርቷል።
data.orm: Wendii Chaapmaan, doktoorri giddugala waldaa hamii rabgii Bleedgeet, dhaddacha naamusaa gaafa Hagayya 23'tti waamame.
data.som: Wendy Chapman, oo ah dhakhtarka xarunta Bloodgate rugby midowga fadeexadda ayaa loogu yeeray dhageysiga edaabta 23ka Ogosto.
data.tir: ኣብ’ቲ ኣፉ ከምዝደመየ ኣምሲሉ ክቕየር ምጭብርባር ዝተፈፀመሉ ናይ ራግቢ ዩንየን ሸፈጥ ቀንዲ ተዋሳኢ ዝኾነ ዶክተር ዌንዲይ ሻፕማን 23 ነሓሰ ኣብ ዝስየም ዋዕላ ዲስፕሊን ክቐርብ ተፀዊዑ።

data.eng: Turkey sets up a commission of Turkish officials and bureaucrats to investigate May's Gaza flotilla raid.
data.aaf: US Kiblati Kuriyal Tumuxuyeh tan Tet Xaylok Inki Num kah Caban inah Esserte.
data.amh: ቱርክ በግንቦቱ የፍሎቲላ ጋዛ ወረራ ላይ ምርመራ ለማድረግ የባለስልጣኖች እና የቢሮክራቶች ኮሚሽን አkkች።
data.orm: Turkiin koomishinii aanga'oota fi hojjetoota biiroowwanii Turkii haleellaa tasaa bidiruu Meyi Gaazaa akka qorataniif qindeessite.
data.som: Turkiga ayaa dhisaya guddi ka kooban saraakiil Turki ah iyo xafiisyada si ay u baaraan duullaankii flotilla ee bishii May.
data.tir: ቱርኪ ኣብ ወርሒ ግንቦት ነቲ ኣብ ልዕሊ መራኽብ ቓዛ ዝወረደ ሃንደበታዊ መጥቃዕቲ ንምምርማር ብቱርካውያን ቢሮክራታውያን ሓለፍቲ ዝሓቖፈት ኮሚተ ቆይማ።

data.eng: President of the United States Barack Obama signs a bill increasing security along his country's border with Mexico.
data.aaf: Ameerikah saqal Barak Obama Kay Baaxo Meksookolih cuganeh kak Raqta Cuduudul Amnidacayri Osisa Senex Yifrimen.
data.amh: የአሜሪካው ፕሬዝዳንት ባራክ ኦባማ ሀገራቸው ከሜክሲኮ ጋር በምትዋሰንበት ድንበር ላይ ደህንነትን የሚያጠናክር ረቂቅ ሰነድ ተፈራረሙ።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin Yuunaayitid Isteetis Baaraak Obaamaan sarara daangaa biyyi isaa Meksiikoo wajjin qabdutti seera eegumsa dabalu mallatteesse.
data.som: Madaxweynaha Mareykanka Barack Obama ayaa saxiixay hindise sharciyeed oo lagu kordhinayo amniga xadka dalkiisa uu la wadaago Mexico.
data.tir: ፕሬዚደንት ኣሜሪካ ባራክ ኦባማ ኣብ ምሞንጎ ሃገሮምን ሜክሲኮን ናይዘሎ ዶብ ፀጥታ ንምጥንኻር ዘኽእል ሕጊ ኣፅዲቖም።

data.eng: The Independent Democrats and Democratic Alliance opposition parties in South Africa agree to merge against the ruling African National Congress.
data.aaf: Gabi Qaxih Afrikal Geytimta Curik Tanih Curik tan Ximokratwa kee Ximokratik Aliyance Sadi Misoynanilih Gabi Qaxih Afrika Miracisah tan Kongeresil Yangaloonuh Sitagen.
data.amh: በደቡብ አፍሪካ የገለልተኛ ዲሞክራቶች እና የዲሞክራቲ ህብረት ፓርቲዎች ለመዋሃድ እና የገዢውን የአፍሪካ ብሄራዊ ኮንግረስ ፓርቲን ለመቀናቀን ተስማሙ።
data.orm: Afriikaa kibbaa keessatti mormitoonni paartilee Dimookiraatota Bilisaa fi waliigaltewwan Dimokiratawoo kan ta'an kan amma bulchaa jiran kongirasii Biyyalessaa Afirikaa waliin walitti baquuf walii galan.
data.som: Xisbiyada mucaaridka ah ee Independent Democrats iyo Democratic Alliance ee Koonfur Afrika ayaaiskuraacay inay midoowan si ay udifacan xisbiga talada haya ee African National Congress.
data.tir: ኣብ ደቡብ ኣፍሪቃ ክልተ ናጻ ዲሞክራስያውያን ሰልፍታት ምስ ተቓዋሚ ዲሞክራስያዊ ኪዳን ኣንጻር ገዛኢ ሃገራዊ ጉባኤ ኣፍሪቃ ንምግጣም ክተሓዋወሳ ተሰማሚዐን።

data.eng: Mexico City legalises the fining of shops which give away free plastic bags in an environmental initiative.
data.aaf: Meksiikoh Magalah Dariifal Uguugus Curik tan Warkat Hasinitel kaltah tan Dukanite Digaalak Gaanun Aben.
data.amh: ሜክሲኮ ከተማ የተፈጥሮውን ዓለም ለመጠበቅ ሲባል ነፃ የፕላስቲክ ከረጢቶችን የሚሰጡ ሱቆች መቅጣትን ሕጋዊ አደረገች።
data.orm: Magaalaan Meeksiikoo qulqullina nannoo eeguuf jecha seera dhaabbilee daldalaa qalqalloo pliaastikaa bilisaan kennan adabu hojiirra oolchite .
data.som: Mexico sity ayaa sharciyeysat ganaaxida mehradaha bixiya bacaha lacag la’aanta taas oo ku salaysan hindisaha ilaalinta deegaanka.
data.tir: ሜክሲኮ ሲቲ ከባብያዊ ተፈጥሮ ንምሕላው ከረጢታት ፕላስቲክ ብነፃ ንዝዕድሉ ድኳናት ዝቐፅዕ ሕጊ ዕላዊ ገይራ።

data.eng: Former Australian swimmer Dawn Fraser is criticised for controversial remarks during which she called for the boycott of the 2010 Commonwealth Games in Delhi.
data.aaf: Dumah Awutaraliyah baxi Giirabe xawun farrezer xalhi addal 2010 komenwelz Digirite Ogolewayuh elle seerimte kaxa kirikir Mablooli wagisen.
data.amh: የቀድሞዋ የአውስትራሊያ ዋናተኛ ዳውን ፍሬሰር በ2010 የተደረገውን የዴልሂ ኮመንዌልዝ ውድድር ላይ ላለመሳተፍ በማሴሯ ወቀሳን እያስተናገደች ትገኛለች።
data.orm: doorgomtuun Daakkii bishaanii kan duraa Daawn Freezer waamicha laguu dorgommii koman Weelz bara 2010 Deelii kessattii geggeeffamu irratti taasisteen walqabatee yaada burjajeessaa kenniteen ceephoon hedduun irratti qaqqabe.
data.som: Dabaalatada Australia ee hore Dawn Fraser ayaa lagu eedeeyey hadalo muran kiciyay oo ay ku baaqday in la qaadaco ciyaarihii Barwaaqo sooranka ee 2010 ee ka dhacay Delhi.
data.tir: ኣውስትራልያዊት ሓምበሲት ነበር ዳውን ፍሬዠር ድሕሪ እቲ ኣብ ደልሂ ዝካየድ ጽወታታት ኮመንዌልዝ 2010 ኣድማ ክግበረሉ ኣለዎ ኢላ ዘቕረበቶ ኣካታዒ ጻውዒት ነቐፈታታት ከጋጥማ ጀሚሩ።

data.eng: Carworkers in South Africa end their eight-day strike with a 10% pay deal.
data.aaf: Gabi qaxih Afrikal Geytimta Makayin Tama abenit Bacra Ayroh Addat Taama solo 10% qasbi mekla selenih.
data.amh: በደቡብ አፍሪካ የሚገኙ የመኪና ሠራተኞች የስምንት ቀን የሥራ ማቆም አድማቸው በ 10% የክፍያ ስምምነት ተጠናቋል።
data.orm: Hojjetooonni makiinaa Afirikaa Kibbaa keessaa waliigaltee kanfaltii 10%'n tarkaanfii hojii dhaabuu isaanii guyyoota saddeetii dhaaban.
data.som: Shaqaalaha baabuurta ee Koonfur Afrika ayaa ku soo afjaray shaqo joojintoodii sideed maalmood ahayd heshiis 10% ah oo mushahar kordhin ah.
data.tir: ኣብ ደቡብ ኣፍሪቃ ዝርከቡ ሰራሕተኛታት ሰራተኛታት መካይን ነቲ ንሸሞንተ መዓልቲ ዝገበርዎ ኣድማ ብ10% ወሰኽ ናይ ደሞዝ ውዕል ዛዚሞም

data.eng: More than half of politicians in Benin call for impeachment proceedings against President Boni Yayi over his involvement in a Ponzi scheme.
data.aaf: Binin Addal Gudeek Daga takke Siyasa maxagite Biniz Ikraaroh Addal Yengelenimih Berezixanti Boni Yayal Rubsus kisi keenihkah xayowanah Essera.
data.amh: በቤኒን ያሉ ግማሽ ያህል ፖለቲከኞች ፕሬዚደንት ቦኒ ያዪ ከፖንዚ እቅድ ጋር ባላቸው ግንኙነትምክኒያት ከስልጣናቸው እንዲነሱ የሚያደርግ አካሄድ እንዲደረግ ጠየቁ።
data.orm: Hoggantoonni siyaasaa Beenin walakkaa ol tahan karoora dhoksaa Poontiitti hirmaachuu isaaf adeemsi aangoorraa buufamuu Pirasdaantii Boonii Yaayyaa akka eegalamu waamicha dhiyeessan.
data.som: In ka badan kala bar siyaasiyiinta Benin ayaa ku baaqay dacwad xayuubin oo ku wajahan Madaxweyne Boni Yayi oo ku saabsan ku gacan lahaanshaha qorshaha Ponzi.
data.tir: ልዕሊ ፍርቂ ዝኾኑ ፖለቲከኛታት ቤኒን ፕሬዚደንት እታ ሃገር ቦኒ ያዪ ኣብ ናይ ሕሶት ፕሮጀክት ኢዶም ኣለዎም’ዩ ብምባል ክኽሰሱ ፀዊዖም።

data.eng: Hurricane Danielle strengthens to Category 4, becoming the first major hurricane of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season.
data.aaf: Badi Silayti Xanuyel 2010 Atlantikik batidi Silayti Wakti Qimboh Naba batidi SilaytiIlla madabak 4 Maqarosa.
data.amh: ሃሪኬን ዳንኤሌ ወደ ደረጃ 4 ጠንክሮ፤ በ2010 የመጀመሪያው የአትላንቲክ ሃሪኬን ወቅት የተከሰተ ከፍተኛ ሃሪኬን አድርጎታል።
data.orm: Hobonboleettiin Daani'eelle, hobonboleettii ijoo isa jalqabaa waqtii hobonboleettii Atilaantikii 2010 ta'uun gara Sadarkaa 4'tt guddate.
data.som: Duufaanta Danielle ayaa ku sii xoogaysanaysa heerka 4, iyadoo noqonaysa duufaantii ugu horraysay ee ugu weynayd Atlantikada sanadka 2010.
data.tir: እቲ ናብ ደረጃ:4 ዝማዕበለ ሃሪሰን ዳንኤላ ኣብ 2010 ዓ.ም.ፈ ኣብ ናይ ኣትላንቲክ ወቕቲ ሃሪሰን ዝተኸሰተ ፈላማይ ብርቱዕ ሃሪሰን ኮይኑ ኣሎ።

data.eng: A trade agreement between Australia and the European Union comes into effect stopping Australian wine being marketed using terms such as champagne and port.
data.aaf: Awustraliya kee Awrobah Inkiino fanal Yanih yan Kabxah Fantaaxaw Shambing kee Fordal tanih tan Aroocat Antifiquk qadaagal Kah asanah Awusteraliya wayni Salisaanamih Taama Abtol asele.
data.amh: በአውስትራሊያ እና በአውሮፓ ህብረት መካከል የተደረጋው የንግድ ስምምነት አውስትራሊያ በሻምፓኝ እና ፖርት ስያሜ ለገበያ የምታቀርባቸውን የወይን መጠጥ ምርቶች ለገበያ እናዳታቀርብ ያግዳታል።
data.som: Waxaa ladhaqan galinaya heshiis kaladhex maray Australia iyo Midowga Yurub in lajoojiyo suuqaynta khamriga laga sameeyo canabka ee Australia in loo suuqgeeyo iyada oo la adeegsanayo ereyada sida champagne iyo port
data.tir: ኣብ ሞንጎ ኦስትሬልያን ሕብረት ኣውሮፓን ዝተበፅሐ ውዕል ንግዲ ኣብ ስራሕ ዝወዓለ እንትኾን ወይኒ ኦስትሬልያ ሻምፓኝን ፖርትን እናተብሃለ ከይሽየጥ ጠጠው ኣቢልዎ።

data.eng: Mozambique announces it will reverse a rise in the price of bread that led to riots last week.
data.aaf: Mozabik Waraye Ayam Illa Xakak way kee Sayway Fanah Baaheh Yan Maqidi Liimoh OsotinAa Aynukuselem Qadose.
data.amh: ሞዛምቢክ ለባለፈው ሳምንት ረብሻዎች የዳረጋትን የዳቦ ዋጋ መናር ወደነበረበት እንደሚመለስ አስታወቀች።
data.orm: Moozambiki dabala gatii daabboo isa torban darbe jeequmsa kaase akka jijjiirtu beeksifte.
data.som: Mozambique ayaa ku dhawaaqday inay ka laaban doonto sixir bararka ku yimid qiimaha furunka oo horseeday kacdoono jiray toddobaadkii hore.
data.tir: ሞዛምቢክ ንቲ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን ዓመፅ ዘስዓበ ወሰኽ ዋጋ ባኒ ናብ ዝነበሮ ከምትመልሶ ኣፍሊጣ።

data.eng: Japan detains a Chinese fishing boat found near the disputed Pinnacle Islands in the East China Sea.
data.aaf: Jaban ayro mawqa Chayinh badih Addal Anakare bininiok Fordadih Xaqul geytimta Chayinah kulunti tayaqo Cuuri Lowsis gubat Asise.
data.amh: ጃፓን በምስራቅ ቻይና ባህር በክርክር ላይ ያሉ የፒንኖክ ደሴቶች የድንበር መስመር አቅራቢያ የተገኘች አንድ የቻይና የዓሣ ማጥመጃ ጀልባን አሰረች።
data.orm: Jaappaan bidiruu qurxummii qabduu Chaayinaa isa bakka walfalmisiisaa Odola Pinaakilii kan Baha Galaana Chaayisaa keessaatti argame hiite.
data.som: Japan ayaa doon lagu kallumaysto oo laga leeyahay Shiinaha ku xirtay meel u dhow Jasiiradaha lagu muransanyahay ee Pinnacle ee ku taalla Badda Bariga Shiinaha.
data.tir: ጃፓን ኣብ ባሕሪ ምብራቕ ቻይና ኣብ ጥቓ እተን ምስ ቻይና እትዋጠጠለን ደሴታት ፒናክል ንዝነበረት ጃልባ ዘፋፊት ዓሳ ኣብ ትሕቲ ቁፅፅር ኣውዒላ።

data.eng: The United States and Australia issue travel warnings for India following the shooting of two Taiwanese tourists outside the Jama Masjid mosque in Delhi.
data.aaf: Galimaro Maqqidi Tadeera Tacce Baaxoxa Culeenih Yanin Xagana Yangeenim Xiqewenimih 1.7 milyoon Takke Suuriyah Dabo Maritek Maqqidi Tadeera Solteh.
data.amh: አሜሪካ እና አውስትራሊያ ሁለት የታይዋን ጎብኚዎች በህንድ ዴልሂ የጃማ መስጂድ አካባቢ መገደላቸውን ተከትሎ ወደ ህንድ ሚደረጉ ጉዞወች ላይ የደህንነት ማስጠንቀቂያ አስተላለፉ።
data.orm: Dhukaasaan ajjeefamuu tuuristoota lammii Taa'iwan lama kan bakkee Masjiida Jaamaa Deelii keessattii hordofuun Yunaayitid Isteetisii fi Awustiraaliyaan akeekachiisaa imalaa Hindii irratti baasan.
data.som: Mareykanka iyo Australia ayaa soo saaray digniino la xidhiidha dalxiiska Hindiya kadib markii lagu toogtay laba dalxiise oo u dhashay dalka Taiwan bannaanka masjidka Jama Masjid ee magaalada Delhi.
data.tir: ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካን ኣውስትራልያን ድሕሪ እቲ ኣብ ደልሂ ኣፍደገ ዓቢ መስጊድ ኣብ ልዕሊ ክልተ ታይዋናውያን በጻሕቲ ዝተፈጸመ ምኽፋት ተኹሲ በጻሕቲ ናብ ህንዲ ንኸይገሹ መጠንቀቕታ ኣዊጀን።

data.eng: Jupiter becomes the brightest object in the night sky after the Moon as it makes its closest approach to Earth since 1963.
data.aaf: Jubuter 1963 Qibisak Illa Ardi nagay Xayi xayos abamih tagah Alsak wadiril Bar qaranal Addat Meqe akkele.
data.amh: ከ1963 በ|ላ ወደ ምድር የቀረበችው ጁፒተር ሰማይ ላይ ካሉ አካለት ከጨረቃ ቀጥሎ በምሽት በጣም የምታንፀባርቀው አካል ሆናለች።
data.orm: Juppiiter bara 1963 irraa kaasee akka Lafatti baayyee dhiyaachuu jalqabeen Addeessatti aanuun wanta samii halkanii keessatti baayyee ifu taheera.
data.som: Meeraha Jupiter ayaa wuxuu noqday shayga ugu iftiinka badan habeenkii marka laga reebo dayaxa, ka dib marku soo gaadhay barta ugu dhow dhulka tan iyo 1963-dii
data.tir: ካብ’ቲ ብ1963 ዓ.ም.ፈ ወርሒ ናብ መሬት ኣዝያ ቀሪባን ዓብያን ዝተርኣየትሉ ወቕቲ ንዳሓር ጁፒተር ኣብ ሰማይ ዝተኸሰተ ድሙቕ ነገር ኮይኑ።

data.eng: Italian authorities seize 23 million euro (approximately US$30 million) from a Vatican bank account in a money laundering probe.
data.aaf: Taaliyan Miraacini Diitak Iroh Yan Maali Beytoh Fokaqoh Addat Vatikanak Banki Cisab 23 milyoonih uoro (wali 30Milyoonih Dolaar) Yabixeenih.
data.amh: የኢጣሊያ ባለሥልጣናት በሕገ-ወጥ የገንዘብ ምርመራ ውስጥ ከቫቲካን የባንክ ሂሳብ 23 ሚሊዮን ዩሮ፣ በግምት 30 ሚሊዮን የሚጠጋ የአሜሪካን ዶላር አግደዋል።
data.orm: Aangawoonni mootummaa xaaliyaanii qorannoo daddabarsa maallaqa seeraan alaa taasisaniin herrega baankii Vaatikaan keessaa birrii yuuroo moliyoona 23(tilmaamaan doolaara Ameerikaa miliyoona 30) akka hin sochoonee dhorkite.
data.som: Mas'uuliyiinta Talyaaniga ayaa la wareegay 23 milyan oo euro (kudhawaad US 30 milyan oo doolar) akoon bangi oo ku yaal Vatican marikii lasameeyey baaritaan lacagaha sharci daraada ah.
data.tir: ሰበ ስልጣን ጣልያን ዘይሕጋዊ ምዝውዋር ገንዘብ ንምፅራይ ኣብ ሒሳብ ባንኪ ቫቲካን ንዝኣተወ 23 ሚልዮን ዩሮ ሒዞም።

data.eng: The Commonwealth Games Federation demands that India improve conditions at the athletes' village in Delhi.
data.aaf: Afrikak Xiyasboora maritayim korboreshion Agatinol ragitak qalaylil Amerakak takalakay yakemih samai kak benih axcok taqabiteh IsiMaerikah kask yeyeqeh.
data.amh: የኮመንዌልዝ ውድድሮች ፌዴሬሽን ህንድ በዴልሂ ያለውን የአትሌቶቸ መንደር ደረጃ ጥራት እንድታስተካከል ሲል ጠየቀ።
data.orm: Federeeshiniin taphoota koman weelz Indiyaan haalota ganda Atileetiksii Deelhii keessa jiran akka fooyyeessituuf gaafate.
data.som: Xiriirka Ciyaaraha Barwaaqo sooranka ayaa kuxujeeynaya in Hindiya ay hagaajiso xaaladaha tuulada ciyaartooyda ee Delhi.
data.tir: ፌደረሽን ጸወታታት ኮመንዌልዝ ኣብ ደልሂ እትርከብ ቁሸት ስፖርተኛታት ኩነታታ ክመሓየሽ ንህንዲ ሓቲቱ።

data.eng: The Minnesota Twins win the American League Central in Major League Baseball and become the first team to qualify for postseason play in 2010.
data.aaf: Minisotal Ganga majri liig bezibo ameerikah lig Aysuk 2010 qalyali dgirik afal maqar bahonuh Qimbo Dokon Yekken.
data.amh: የሚኒሶታ መንትዮች በሜጀር ሊግ ቤዝቦል የአሜሪካ ሊግ ማእከሉን አሸንፈው በ 2010 ለድህረ -ውድድር ጨዋታ ብቁ ለመሆን የመጀመሪያው ቡድን ይሆናሉ።
data.orm: Tiwiinsiin Minesotaa Liigii Beezboolii Meejerii keessatti Liigii Giddugalaa Ameerikaa mo'atee garee jalqabaa tapha dorgommii boodaa 2010'f darbe isa jalqabaa ta'e.
data.som: kooxda Mataanaha Minnesota ayaa ku guuleysatay Leega dhexe Mareykanka ee Major League Baseball waxayna noqdeen kooxdii ugu horreysay ee u soobaxda cayaaraha sanadka intiisa dambe ee 2010.
data.tir: ጋንታ ሚኖሶታ ቲዊንስ ኣብ’ቲ ዋና ሊግ ቤዝቦል ዝኾነ ግጥም ሊግ ሴንትራል ኣሜሪካ ተዓዊቱ፤ በዚ ውፅኢቱ ድማ ኣብ 2010 ናብ ዝካየድ ቀፃሊ ግጥም ዝሓለፈ ፈላማይ ጋንታ ኮይኑ ኣሎ።

data.eng: The Beano is to feature a President of the United States for the first time in its history.
data.aaf: Beano Aydaadul Qimboh Addah US Berezixant Yablusewah Yan.
data.amh: ቢኤኖ በታሪክ ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ የአሜሪካ ፕሬዚደንትን ምስል ሊጠቀም ነው።
data.orm: Seenaa isaa keessatti yeroo jalqabaaf Biyaanoon Pirasdaantii Yuunayitid Isteetis dhiyeessuufi.
data.som: Saxaafada sawir gacmeedka ee Beano aya bogeeda ku sawiraysa Madaxweynaha Mareykanka markii ugu horreysay taariikhdeeda.
data.tir: ቢኖ ኣብ ቀረፃታቱ ንመጀመርታ ግዜ ገፀ - ባህርይ ፕሬዚደንት ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ክጥቀም እዩ ።

data.eng: Gun battle between security forces and Taliban fighters leave four militants including their commander dead in Wardak province 40 km west of Afghanistan capital Kabul.
data.aaf: Saay Caylite kee Taliban Gaduleh Fanal Utka Afganistanak Qasimah tan Kabuluk Ayromawqak 40. K.M WarxakiH Gandah Addat Cummanderite Edde Anuk Afara Aslicale qideenih.
data.amh: በፀጥታ ኃይሎች እና በታሊባን ተዋጊዎች መካከል በተደረገ የተኩስ ውጊያ ምክንያት ከአፍጋኒስታን ዋና ከተማ ካቡል በምዕራብ 40 ኪ.ሜ በዎርዳክ አውራጃ ውስጥ አዛዣቸውን ጨምሮ አራት ታጣቂዎች ተገድለዋል።
data.orm: Lolli dhukaasaa humnoota nageenyaa fi loltoota Taalibaan gidduu kutaa biyyaa Wardak kan magaalaa guddoo Afgaanistaan Kaabul irraa gara dhiyaatti 40 km fagaattu keessatti tahe hidhattoonni afur ajajaa isaanii dabalachuun akka ajjeefaman godhe.
data.som: Dagaal dhexmaray ciidamada ammaanka iyo dagaalyahannada Taliban ayaa sababay dhimashada afar dagaalyahan oo uu ku jiro taliyahoodii gobolka Wardak oo 40 km galbeed kaga beegan caasimadda Afghanistan ee Kabul.
data.tir: ካብ ርእሰ ከተማ ኣፍጋሃኒስታን ካብ ካቡል ንምዕራብ 40 ኪሎሜትሮ ኣብ ዝርከብ ክልል ዋርዳክ ኣብ መንጐ ሓይሊታት ፀጥታን ተዋጋእቲ ታሊባንን ብሰንኪ ዝተኻየደ ውግእ ንኣዛዚኦም ሓዊሱ ኣርባዕተ ተጋደልቲ ሞይቶም ።

data.eng: A suspected U.S. drone fired missiles at a house in northwestern Pakistan in Khushali, a village near Mir Ali, killing four people.
data.aaf: Malaak Qali Xaqul Geytimta Kushalil Tamixige Caafat Kiblati Ayromawqa bakistaanal Getima Inki Buxa Ameera Yaybuliye Tayaaroori Misailiteeta Aguuruk Afara Num Qiden.
data.amh: ከአሜሪካ ድሮን ነው በተባለ ጥቃት በሰሜናዊ ፓኪስታን ኩሻሊ ሚር አሊ በተባለ መንደር አቅራቢያ በመኖርያ ቤት ላይ በደረሰ በተተኮሰ ሚሳኤል የአራት ሰዎች ህይወት አለፈ።
data.orm: Diroonin kan Ameerika ta'uun ishee shakkame misaayela mana jireenyaa kaabaa-dhiha Paakistan kan dhiyeenya Miir Alii taate kushaaliitti argamu irratti dhukeestetti, namoonni afuris du'aniiru.
data.som: Diyaarad laga shakisan yahay in laga leeyahy Maraykanka ayaa gantaallo la beegsatay guri ku yaala waqooyi galbeed ee dalka Pakistan gaar ahaan tuulada Khushali oo u dhow Mir Ali, waxaana la sheegay inay ku dhinteen afar qof.
data.tir: ኣብ ዝሓለፈ 12 መስከረም በኣ.ፈ. ኮማንዶ ሓይሊ ባሕሪ ኣፍሪካ ካብ ገማግም ባሕሪ ካሜሮን ዝዓገቱዎም ሽድሽተ ባሕረኛታት ተለቒቖም።

data.eng: Los Angeles experiences all-time record high temperature day at 45°C or 113F.
data.aaf: Los anjelesil 45 xigrisentigirix aw 113 Efil Kuliwak Fayale Laqana Ayroora Baritele.
data.amh: ሎስ አንጀለስ ከየትኛውም ጊዜ በላይ የሆነ ከፍተኛ የሞቀት መጨመር እያስተናገደች ትገኛለች፤ በቀን ውስጥም ከፍተኛ የሙቀት መጠን እስከ 45 ዲግሪ ሴልሽየስ (45°C) ወይም 113 ዲግሪ ፋራናይት (113°F) እየተመዘገበ ይገኛል።
data.orm: Loos Anjiles tempireechara guyyaa isa seena qabeessa olaanaa yeroo hundumaa 45°C yookaan 113F keessumeessite.
data.som: Los Angeles waxay maanta la kulmaysaa heerkul sare oo gaadhaya 45 ° C ama 113F.
data.tir: ሎስኣንጄልስ መጠኑ 45oc ወይ ድማ 113F ኮይኑ ዝተመዝገበን ናይ ኩሉ ግዜ ዝለዓለ ዋዒ ዘለዎን መዓልቲ ኣጋጢምዋ።

data.eng: 6 sailors taken hostage off the coast of Cameroon on September 12 by the Africa Marine Commando are released.
data.aaf: Afrikak Badi Calih Komxo Kaxxa-Garaluk 12 Kameeronuk Badi Xaqul Xayoowak Beenih yanin 6 Doonikite Cabe.
data.amh: በካሜሮን ባህር ዳርቻ መስከረም 12 ላይ በአፍሪካ የባህር ኮማንዶ ተወስደው የነበሩ 6 መርከበኞች ተለቀቁ።
data.orm: Habuurtootni bishaanirraa 6 kan humna galaanarraa Afriikaatin fulbaana 12 booji'aman gad-lakkifaman.
data.som: 6 badmaaxayaal ah oo ay ciidamada badda ee Africa 12 -kii Sebtember ay ku qafaasheen xeebaha dalka Cameron aya la sii daayay.
data.tir: ካብ ባግዳድ ንሰሜን ገፅ ኣብትርከብ ከተማ በለድ ሩዝ ሓደ ሰብ ንዝተዓጠቖ ቅናት ነታጒ ብምፍንጃር ብዓርሰ ቕትለታዊ መጥቃዕቲ ዝበዝሑ ሙስሊማት ሺዓ ዝርከብዎ 21 ሰባት ቀቲሉ።

data.eng: Researchers identify a new, though threatened, language known as Koro.
data.aaf: Kusaqaba Koro Af Xiqsita Qusba Geyte.
data.amh: ተመራማሪዎች አዲስ እና ሊጠፋ የተቃረበ ኮሮ የሚባል kንk አገኙ።
data.orm: Qorattoonni afaan haaraa Kooroo jedhamu, kan baduu gahe yoo ta'ellee adda baasan.
data.som: Cilmi -baadhayaashu waxay ka war heleen luqad qarka u saran dabar go' taas oo loo yaqaano Koro.
data.tir: ተመራመርቲ አብ ምጥፉእ ዝርከብ ግን ድማ ሓዱሽ ኮሮ ተብሂሉ ዝፍለጥ ቋንቋ ረኺቦም ።

data.eng: Greenpeace sends Facebook a letter containing half a million signatures asking the company to cut its ties to coal based electricity.
data.aaf: Gerinibis Kubaniya Xaahi Diyil Gombodmalih Leh yan Angaaraw Kah solisanah Essera miliyoon Qaxi Farma Tabixe Ayuta fesbuukl rubule.
data.amh: ፌስቡክ ከድንጋይ ከሰል ኤሌክትሪክ ጋር ያለውን ግንኙነት እንዲያቋርጥ የሚጠይቅ ግማሽ ሚሊዮን የድጋፍ ፊርማ የያዘ ደብዳቤ ግሪንፒስ (አረንጓዴ ሰላም) ለፌስቡክ ኩባንያ ልኳል።
data.orm: Giriinpiis Feesbuukiif xalayaa mallattoowwan namoota walakkaa miliyoonaa qabu kan dhaabbatichi akka hidhata elektirika dhagaa cilee irratti hundaa'e waliin qabu adda kutu gaafatu erge.
data.som: Greenpeace ayaa u dirtaa Facebook warqad ay ku saxeexan yihiin nus milyan saxeex oo ay ku weydiisanayaan shirkadda inay xidhiika u jarto korontada ku salaysan dhuxusha.
data.tir: ግሪንፒስ ንፌስቡክ እቲ ኩባንያ ናይ ኤለክትሪክ ከሰል ዘለዎ ርክብ ከቋርጽ ዝሓትት ፍርቂ ሚልዮን ክታም ዝሓዘለ ደብዳበ ልኢኻ።

data.eng: A prolonged drought in the Amazon region forces Brazil to declare a state of emergency in 25 towns.
data.aaf: Amaxon Rakaakay Kafin Birazilil 25 magaalol Sisik Waktih Kukta Kah kuktusanah Dirkisa.
data.amh: በአማዞን አካባቢ የተከሰተውና ለረጅም ጊዜ የተከሰተው ድርቅ ብራዚልን በ25 ከተሞቿ ላይ የአስቸኳይ ጊዜ አዋጅ እንድታውጅ አስገድዷል።
data.orm: Hongeen naannoo Amaazoon keessatti dheerate, Biraazil akka magaalota 25 keessatti labsii yeroo atattamaa labsitu dirqamsiise.
data.som: Abaar daba dheeraatay oo ka dhacday gobolka Amazon ayaa ku qasbeysa Brazil inay 25 magaalo kaga dhawaaqdo xaalad degdeg ah.
data.tir: ኣብ ክልል ኣማዞን ብሰንኪ ዘጋጠመ ዝተናውሐ ድርቂ ብራዚል ኣብ 25 ከተማታት ኩነታት ህፁፅ ግዜ ክትእውጅ እያ።

data.eng: Canada declares BPA toxic, prompting curbs or bans on the widely used chemical.
data.aaf: Kanada Baarluk Nafqil Asuwayta Kemikalite Wasoosa Aw Wasoosa Ugusak Sumilem kinim Faticise.
data.amh: ካናዳ በሰፊው ጥቅም ላይ የሚውለው ኬሚካል ቢፒኤ መርዛማ እንደሆነ በማወጅ እገዳዎች እንዲደረጉ ታበረታታለች።
data.orm: Kanaadaan BPA summaa'aa jechuun labsuun, keemikaalichaa bal'inaan fayyadamuun akka hafu ykn dhowwamu akeekkachiifte.
data.som: Kanada ayaa cadaysay in BPA ay sun tahay, taasoo keentay in la joojiyo ama laga mamnuuco kiimikada aadka loo isticmaalo.
data.tir: ቢ.ፒ.ኤ. መርዛም ምዃኑ ካናዳ ስለ ዝኣወጀ፣ ነቲ ብሰፊሑ ዝዝውተር ከሚካል ክገትኦ ወይ ክእግዶ ይኽእል እዩ።

data.eng: The death toll from Typhoon Megi in the Philippines rises to three as heavy rain falls on the island of Luzon for a second consecutive day.
data.aaf: ,luzah Fordal Namma Ayro Sitalaklih Nabah yan Rob radeemih Sabatah Filibinisil Xage yan data Badi silaytu ila Sidoc fanah Faya iye.
data.amh: በሉዞን ደሴት ላይ ለሁለት ተከታታይ ቀናት ከባድ ዝናብ በመዝነቡ በፊሊፒንስ የታይፉን ሜጂ አውሎ ነፋስ የሟቾች ቁጥር ወደ ሶስት ከፍ ብሏል።
data.orm: Rooba hamaa Odola Luuzaaan irratti guyyoota lamaan darbaniif itti fufeen Filippiins, Taayfon Meegii kessaatti lakkoofsi Namoota lubbuun darbanii gara sadiiti guddate.
data.som: Tirada dadka ku dhintay duufaanta Megi ee dalka Filibiin ayaa gaartay saddex, sidoo kale roobab culus aya maalintii labaad oo xiriir ah ka da’aya jasiiradda Luzon.
data.tir: ኣብ ፊሊፒንስ ሜጊ ብዝተብሃለ ህቦብላ ዝሓወሰ ማዕበል ናይ ዝሞቱ ሰባት ቁፅሪ ናብ ሰለስተ ዝደየበ እንትኸውን ኣብ ደሴት ሉዞን ድማ ንተኸታተልቲ ክልተ መዓልታት ብርቱዕ ዝናብ ወቒዑ።

data.eng: Jewish settlers have started building more than 600 homes in the West Bank since a building freeze expired last month.
data.aaf: Ayhuuda Arooca Westi bankik 600 Daggah Qarwa Xisam Qimbise.
data.amh: የህንፃ እገዳ ባለፈው ወር መጨረስን አስመልክቶ የአይሁድ ሰፋሪዎች በዌስት ባንክ ከ 600 በላይ መኖሪያ ቤቶችን መገንባት ጀምረዋል።
data.orm: Qubattoonni Jewishii erga ijaarsi akka dhaabbatu ji'a darbe xumuramee as manneen 600 ol Weest Baankii keessatti ijaaruu eegalan.
data.som: Yuhuudda aya waxay billaabeen inay daanta galbeed ka dhisaan in ka badan 600 oo guri, kadib marki xayiraadda dhismaha laga qaaday bishi hore.
data.tir: ኣይሁዳውያን ሰፈርቲ ሰሌዳ ግዜ እገዳ ህንፀት ካብዝሓልፍ ንነዘ ኣብ ምዕራባዊ ገማግም ልዕሊ 600 ኣባይቲ ናይ ምህናፅ ስራሕ ጀሚሮም።

data.eng: A magnitude 7.5 earthquake strikes near the Mentawai Islands, but tsunami warnings for western Sumatra proved unwarranted. ,
data.aaf: Mantaway Fordah Xaqul 7.5 Abbaxoh Angoyi Yakeemih IYro kormah Sumatira Suunamih Mabitina Faximtaamak Masugina.
data.amh: በሜንታዋ ደሴቶች አቅራቢያ 7.5 መጠን ያለው የመሬት መንቀጥቀጥ ቢከሰትም ለምዕራባዊ ሱማትራ የሱናሚ ማስጠንቀቂያዎች እንዳልተደረጉ ተረጋግጧል።
data.orm: Naannawaa odola Meentaweetti kirkira lafaa hammeentaa 7.5 ta'uun rukutamte, haa ta'u malee akeekkachiisi lixa Sumaatiraa keessatti akkuma kana kirkirri lafa ni mudata jedhu qabatamaa akka hin taane mirkanaa'e.
data.som: Dhulgariir cabirkiisu yahay 7.5 ayaa ku dhuftay meel u dhow Jasiiradaha Mentawai, laakiin digniinta duufaanta galbeedka Sumatra ayaa noqotay mid aan la oggolayn.
data.tir: ኣብ ጥቓ መንታዋይ ብመዐቀኒ ሬክተር 7.5 ዝበፅሐ ምንቅጥቃጥ መሬት ኣጋጢሙ። ምዕራብ ሱማትራ ብማዕበል ክትጥቃዕ ከምትኽእል ዝተወሃበ መጠንቀቕታ ግና መሰረት የብሉን ተባሂሉ።

data.eng: The Emperor of Exmoor, a red deer believed to be Britain's largest wild animal, is shot and killed.
data.aaf: Biritaniyak Nabbah Yanih Garboh Aluwal Kinim kak Yaminen Qasa Garab Danan Imir Amoytit Amoytit Giraytut Qiden::
data.amh: የብሪታንያ ትልቁ የዱር እንስሳ እንደሆነ የሚታመነው የኤግዝሞሩ ንጉሰ ነገስት ቀይ አጋዘን በጥይት ተገደለ።
data.orm: Mootiin mootota Eksimoor,bineensa bosonaa guddicha Biriteen jedhamee kan amanamu bosonuun Diimaan rasaasaan rukutamuun ajjeefame.
data.som: Deero cas oo la rumeysan yahay inuu yahay duurjoogta ugu weyn dalka ingiriiska oo looyaqaano Boqorkii Exmoor ayaa la toogtay oo la dilay.
data.tir: ሃፀይ ኤክስሙር እናተብሃለ ዝፅዋዕን እቲ ዝገዘፈ እንስሳ ዘገዳም ብሪታንያ ዝኾነን ቀይሕ ዓጋዘን ብጥይት ተቐቲሉ።

data.eng: A suicide bomber wearing an explosives belt kills at least 21 people, mostly Shiites, in Balad Ruz, the town north of Baghdad.
data.aaf: Kanaadak Kiblatal Geytimta Baxulah Ruudih Addat Fenji Yitikiyeh suge Beyey Bayise takke Fenji Wali 21 takke Sinam qiden.
data.amh: ከባግዳድ በስተሰሜን በምትገኝ ባላድሩዝ በምትባል መንደር የአጥፍቶ ጠፊ መሳሪያ በታጠቀ ግለሰብ በትንሹ 21 ሰዎች ሞቱ፤ ከሟቾቹ ብዙዎቹ ሺያትስ ናቸው።
data.orm: Magaalaa kaabaa Baagidaditti argamtu Balaad Ruuzitti, bade-balleessaan qabattoo dhohinsa uuman uuffachun yoo xiqqaate namoota 21 ajjeeseera.
data.som: Qof isa soo miidaamiyay oo xirnaa walxaha qarxa ayaa magaalada Balad Ruz oo dhacda waqooyiga Baqdaad ku dilay ugu yaraan 21 qof oo u badan shiico.
data.tir: ፀብፃባት ዘረፋ ኣብ ዝስምዑሉ ኣብዚ ሕዚ እዋን፣ ፖለቲካውን ቁጠባውን ለውጢ ዝሓቱ ሰላማዊ ሰልፍታት ንሳልሳይ መዓልቲ ቀፂሎም ኣለው።

data.eng: A large oil field is discovered off the coast of Brazil that could contain between 8 and 15 billion barrels.

data.eng: Three time surfing world champion Andy Irons dies from suspected dengue fever, one of five people on the ASP World Tour to suffer from the illness in the past three weeks.

data.amh: የሶስት ጊዜው የአለም ሻምፒዮና አንዲ አየሮንስ በደንጌ በሽታ ምክንያት ከዚህ አለም በሞት ተለየ፤ በዚህ በሽታ በኤኤስፒ የአልምአቀፍ ውድድር ከተሳተፉ አምስት ሰዎች አንዱ እንደተጠቁ ተዘግቧል።

data.som: Andy Irons oo saddex jeer ku guulaystay horyaalnimada dulsabaynta biyaha adduunka ayaa la tuhunsan yahay in uu u dhintey xanuunka dengue oo, mid ka mid ah shan qof oo ku sugan ASP World Tour si uu u xanuunsado cudurka saddexdii toddobaad ee la soo dhaafay.

data.eng: US health insurers gave over $86.2million to the Chamber of Commerce last year for the purpose of opposing the health-care overhaul.
data.aaf: Qafiya Dacayrih maysasa Sadoonuh Amerikak Qafiyat Cabih taooca waraye Sanat 86.2 Milyoonih Dolaarak Dagga Kabxah Buxah Yece.
data.amh: ባለፈው አመት የአሜሪካ የጤና መድን ለጤን እንክብካቤ የወጣውን ማሻሻያው በመቃወሙ 86.2 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ለንግድ ምክር ቤት አስረከቧል።
data.orm: Dhiyeessitoonni inshuraansii fayyaa US dhimma kunuunsa-fayyaa bira darbuu mormuu waggaa darbeef miliyoona $86.2 ol waldaa daldaltootaaf kennan.
data.som: Ilaaliye yaasha cafimadka ee marakanka ayaa siiyay lacag kaban 86.2 Milyan oo doolar golaha ganacsiga si ay udiidan habka daryeelka caafimaadka.
data.tir: ትካላት መድሕን ኣሜሪካ ኣብዝሓለፈ ዓመት ሓለዋ እታ ሃገር ንምምሕያሽ ንዝተሓንፀፀ ረቒቕ ፖሊሲ ንምቅዋም 86.2 ሚልዮን ዶላር ንማሕበር (ቻምበር) ንግዲ ኣሜሪካ ሂቦም።

data.eng: A new species of ancient crocodile, Khoratosuchus jintasakuli, is identified from a fossil in Thailand.
data.aaf: Khoratosuchus jintasakuli deqsita qusubih geytimte xabaato durriyya taylandih addal aben kusaaqal geytimte.
data.amh: በታይላንድ አንድ ኮራቶሱቹስ ጂንታሳኩሊ የተባለ የጥንት የአዞ ዝርያ ቅሪተ አካል ተገኝ።
data.orm: Sanyii haaraa Naacha durii kan ta'e 'koratosukus jintasukali' jedhamu hamba lafee durii Taayilaand keessatti argameerraa adda baafame.
data.som: Nooc cusub oo yaxaaskii qadiimiga ahaa, Khoratosuchus jintasakuli, ayaa lafihiisii laga helay Thailand.
data.tir: Khoratosuchus jintasakuli ዝፍለጥ ሓድሽ ዓይነት ጥንታዊ ሓርገጽ ካብ ሓንቲ ኣብ ታይላንድ እትርከብ ኣሰር-ሂወት ክልለ ተኻኢሉ።

data.eng: A World Health Organization study estimates that 600,000 deaths a year are attributable to second hand smoking.

data.amh: እንደ አለም የጤና ድርጅት ጥናት መሰረት በሁለተኛ ደረጃ አጫሽነት የተነሳ በአመት የ600000 ሰዎች ህይወት ለህልፈት ይዳረጋል።

data.som: Daraasad ay samaysay Ururka Caafimaadka Adduunka ayaa lagu qiyaasay in 600,000 oo dhimasho ah sannadkii loo aanayn karo sigaarka gacanta labaad.

data.eng: Association football team FC Barcelona ends its 111-year history of refusing commercial shirt sponsorship as it signs a record £125 million deal with the Qatar Foundation.
data.aaf: Ta Egalak ibi koqosoh Dogon Barsalona kutar fawunxeshinilih 125 miloyoonih bawunxih sitingey tifrime Kabxah Shenzi isbonserli ogolewemih 111 Sanatih Aydaadi Gabakalele.
data.amh: የማኅበሩ እግር ኳስ ቡድን FC ባርሴሎና ከኳታር ፋውንዴሽን ጋር የ 125 ሚሊዮን ፓውንድ ስምምነት በመፈረሙ የማሊያ ስፖንሰርነትን ባለመቀበል የ 111 ዓመቱን ታሪክ ያበቃል።
data.orm: Waldaan garee kubbaa miilaa FC Baarceloonaa Faawundeeshinii Qaatar wajjin waliigaltee seenaa miliyoona £125 mallatteessuun seenaa diddaa ispoonsara qomee daldalaa waggaa 111 xumure.
data.som: Kooxda kubbadda cagta ee Barcelona ayaa soo dhamaysay taariikhdeedii 111 sano ee diidmada maalgashiga funaanadda ganacsiga iyagoo heshiis qiimihisu dhanyahay £ 125 milyan la saxiixatay Aasaasaka Qatar.
data.tir: ማሕበር ጋንታ ኩዕሶ እግሪ ባርሴሎና ምስ ኳታር ፋውንዴሽን እቲ ዝለዓለ ዝብሃል ናይ 125 ሚልዮን ፓውንድ ውዕሊ ብምፍርራሙ ነቲ ኣብ ማልያኡ ንግዳዊ ምልክታ ንዘይምግባር ን111 ዓመታት ዓቂብዎ ዝፀንሐ እምቢታኡ ኣፍሪስዎ።

data.eng: Oklahoma becomes the first U.S. state to carry out an execution with pentobarbital, a lethal injection drug used for euthanizing animals.
data.aaf: Oklahoma Saqa Catoonuh Ayfaf Acesini Qidah Irbah Diwaata Bentobabit /Rabi Irba/ Abinoosak Qoimbo meerikah Rakaakay Tekke.
data.amh: ኦክላሆማ እንስሳትን ለማስወገድ የሚያገለግውን ፔንቶባርቢት መርዛማ የመርፌ መድሃኒት የሞት ፍርድ የተፈረደባቸው እስረኞች ላይ በመጠቀም የመጀመሪያዋ የአሜሪካ ግዛት ትሆናለች።
data.orm: Ooklaahomaan gosaqoricha lilmo akka Bineensota dadhabsiisuuf itti gargaaramaa ture adabbii du'aa raawwachuuf itti fayyadamuun kutaalee biyya Ameerikaa keessaa kan jalqabaaa taaate.
data.som: Oklahoma ayaa noqotay gobolkii ugu horreeyay ee Mareykanka oo fuliya xukun dil ah oo loo yaqaan pentobarbital, oo ah daroogo duritaan ah oo loo isticmaalo dilitaanka xayawaanka.
data.tir: ኦክሎሃማ ኣብ ናይ ኣይ ሞት ወይ ሕውየት ስቓይ ንዝርቡ እንስሳ ንምቕታል ብዝጠቅም ፔንቶባርቢታል ዝተብሃለ መውጋእቲ ፈውሲ ዝተፈረዶም ሰባት ብምቕታል ፈላመይቲ ግዝኣት ኣሜሪካ ኮይና።

data.eng: The United Kingdom government announces plans to make prisoners serving less than four years eligible to vote.
data.aaf: Ingiliz Doolat Afara sanatak Guba Afaf tece Casbittano Dooronuh Duda Absiisonuh Ikraarisen.
data.amh: የእንግሊዝ መንግስት ከአራት አመት በታች የእስር ፍርድ የተፈረደበቸው እስረኞች ምርጫ እንዲመርጡ የሚያደርግ እቅድ እንዳለው አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Mootummaan Yunaayitid Kiingidem sirreeffamtoonni seeraa murtii waggaa afurii gadiif mana hidhaa jiran filachuu akka danda'an gochuuf karoora isaa beeksise.
data.som: Dawladda Boqortooyada Ingiriiska ayaa ku dhawaaqday qorshe ay kudoonayaan in maxaabiista laguxukamay mudada kaya afar sano ay xaq uyeeshaan codaynta doorashooyinka.
data.tir: መንግስቲ ዩናይትድ ኪንግደም ትሕቲ 4 ዓመት ዝተፈረዶም እሱራት ኣብ መረፃ ድምፂ ናይ ምሃብ መሰል ክህልዎም ዝገብር መደቡ ዕላዊ ገይሩ።

data.eng: 1,200 new species and varieties of sea creatures discovered during the first world survey of marine life are presented at a conference in Jerusalem, Israel.
data.aaf: Israil ursalemil tekke Konferesil Inkihytoh Baadak Badi wagitoh kusaq wakti geytimte 1,200 qusba Badi ginoona kee Zuriya Geytimte.
data.amh: በእየሩሳሌም እሳራኤል በቀረበው የመጀመረያው የአለም ዙሪያ የባህር ጥናት 1200 የዝርያ አይነት ያላቸው የባህር ፍጥረታት እንደተገኙ አሳየ።
data.orm: Sanyiiwwan haaraan 1,200 fi umamni galaanaa gosti garaagaraa yeroo qorannoo lubbu qabeeyyii bishaan keessaa addunyawaa jalqabaa argaman konfiraansii Yerussaalem, Isiraa'el irratti ibsaman.
data.som: 1,200 nooc oo noole cusub iyo kuwo kale oo noolaha badda ah oo la helay intii lagu guda jiray sahankii ugu horeeyay adduunka ee noolaha badda, ayaa lagu soo bandhigay shir ka dhacay qudus, Israel.
data.tir: ኣብ’ቲ ፈላማይ ዳህሳስ ህይወት ባሕሪ ዝተረኸቡ 1200 ሓደሽቲ ጨጌሬታትን ዓይነታትን ፍጥረታት ባሕሪ ኣብ እስራኤል ኣብ እየሩሳሌም ኣብ ዝተሳለጠ ደመር ቀሪቦም።

data.eng: Four people are killed and around 40 injured after a passenger plane explodes in Surgut in eastern Russia.
data.aaf: Ayro mawqah Asiyal geytimta surigit giti tayara Qanxixa Afara Num rabeh 40 num mudume.
data.amh: በምሥራቅ ሩሲያ በምትገኘው ሱርጉት ከተማ ውስጥ የመንገደኞች አውሮፕላን ፈንድቶ አራት ሰዎች ሲሞቱ አርባ ሰዎች ቆስለዋል።
data.orm: Baha Ruusiyaatti kan argamtu Saargat keessatti balaa dhoohinsa xiyyaaraa imaltootaa irratti mudateen lubbuun namoota 4 yoo darbu namoonni 40 dhiyaatan miidhamaniiru.
data.som: Afar qof ayaa ku naf waayey halka ay ku dhawaad 40 kalena ay ku dhaawacmeen kadib markii diyaarad rakaab ah ay ku qaraxday magalada Surgut ee bariga Ruushka.
data.tir: ኣብ ምብራቕ ሩስያ ሱርጉት ኣብ ዝተበሃለ ከባቢ ሓንቲ ነፋሪት ብምንታጓ 4 ሰባት ሞይቶም፣ ኣስታት 40 ዝኾኑ ድማ ቆሲሎም።

data.eng: In another event not far way from the bird dieoff, scientists are investigating a fish kill of nearly 100,000 drum in the Arkansas River.
data.aaf: Tekke ta Bakaqat Mangom Elle Xayowewan Aki tekooka, ፣ Saynisite Arkansis Weqaytih Xaqul Illa 100,000 Madda Baro Baoodol Qide kakiyan Kukuta kusaqiselon.
data.amh: ከአእዋፋት ሞት ወጣ ስንል፤ ተመራማሪዎች በአርካንሳስ ወንዝ ውስጥ የሞቱ 100000 የድረም አሳዎችን ጉዳይ እየመረመሩ ይገኛሉ።
data.orm: Ta'ii kan biraatin, osoo du'a sinbiraa irraa hin fagaatin, du'a qurxummii laga arkansaasitti mudate kan tilmaaman dibbee 100,000tti siqatuu saayintistootni qorachaa jiru.
data.som: Dhacdo kale oo aan aad uga fogeyn dhimasha shimbirta, saynisyahannada baadhaya kalluun lagu dilay webiga Arkansas ku dhawaad 100,000 oo durbaan.
data.tir: ካብ ሞት ይዕዋፍ ዘይርሕቕ ካልእ ፍጻሜ፣ ሊቃውንቲ ሞት ናይ ኣስታት 100000 ዑፍ ከበሮ ኣብ ሩባ ኣርካንሳስ ይምርምሩ ኣለዉ።

data.eng: A Tunisian protester who set himself alight in unrest that sparked further protests across the country dies of his injuries.
data.aaf: Inkih Tan Baaxol Osotihnah Saditeeta Uguuguseh Yan Tuniziyah Baxxi Soolo Abe Ka Madeh Yan Biyakak Rabasite.
data.amh: በቱኒዚያ ባለው ያለመረጋጋት እራን በእሳት ያቃጠለው የተቃውሞ ተሳታፊ በደረሰበት ጉዳት ምክንያት ህይወቱ አለፈ።
data.orm: lammiin Tuuniziyaa mormii eegaluun akka biyyattiitti mormii akka babal'atu taasise miidhama isa mudateen lubbuun isaa dabarte.
data.som: Banaanbxe reer Tunisia ah oo isku gubay qalalaase sababay mudaaharaadyo hor leh oo ka socda waddanka oo dhan ayaa u dhintay dhaawicii soo gaaray.
data.tir: ሓደ ቱኒዝያዊ ተቓዋሚ ናዕቢ ኣብ ዝነበረሉ እዋን ንነብሱ ብሓዊ ኣቃጺሉ ብዝወረዶ መቑሰልቲ ድማ ሂወቱ ከም ዝሰኣነ ኣብ ርእሲ ምህላዉ ተወሰኽቲ ኣድማታት ኣብ መላእ ሃገር ብሰንኩ ተኣጒዱ።

data.eng: Mohamed bin Hammam announce that Australia will host the 2015 AFC Asian Cup; this will be the first time Australia has hosted the competition.
data.aaf: Liyuziyanege Asiya Digirabeenit Dahab Mexaliyah yaysonuh 50 mitir iririk arduk baad rikarxi agiluk 26.98 sekonxite Dafeye.
data.amh: መሃመድ ቢን ሃማም አውስትራሊያ የ2015ን የኤኤፍሲ ኤዥያ ዋንጫን ታዘጋጃለች ሲሉ አሳወቁ፤ ይህም አውስትራሊያ ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ ውድድሩን እንደምታዘጋጅ ማረጋገጫ ይሆናል።
data.orm: Mohaammed Biin Hamaam Awustiraaliyaan Dorgomii AFC geepha Eeshiyaa bara 2015ii akka himuun kunis Awusitraaliyaaan yeroo qophicha qopheessitu biyyaattiif kan jalqabaa ta'uusaatii.
data.som: Mohamed bin Hammam ayaa ku dhawaaqay in Australia ay martigalin doonto Koobka Asia AFC 2015; waxayna noqon doontaa markii ugu horreysay ee Australia ay qabato tartanka.
data.tir: ኣውስትራልያ ንመጀመርያ ግዜ ውድደር ዋንጫ ኤስያ 2015 ክትእንግድ ምዃና መሓመድ ቢን ሃምማም ሓቢሩ።

data.eng: The Algerian government cuts food prices amid unrest, and vows to punish those responsible for rioting in recent days.
data.aaf: Algeeriyah doolatal takke Askeniwayiyak gexamah Maqiddi Liimo Tunkusemiy፣ Warayte Namma Ayro tekkeh tan celewayto digalintuh Xagana cule.
data.amh: በአልጄሪያ መንግሥት ላይ በተፈጠረው አለመረጋጋት ምክንያት የምግብ ዋጋዎችን ቀንሷል፤ እንዲሁም በቅርብ ቀናት ውስጥ ሁከት የፈጠሩትን ለመቅጣት ቃል ገብቷል።
data.orm: Mootummaan Aljeeriyaa jeequmsaan walqabatee gatii nyaataa ni hirrise, akkasumas warreen dhiyeenya kana jeequmsa kaasan akka adabu dhaadate.
data.som: Dowladda Aljeeriya ayaa qiimo dhimis kusamaysay cuntada wakhtigii ay qalalaasuhu jireen, waxayna balan ku qaaday inay ciqaabi doonto kuwa mas’uulka ka ah rabshadaha maalmihii la soo dhaafay.
data.tir: መንግስቲ ኣልጀርያ ብሰንኪ ህውከት ዋጋታት ሃለኽቲ ምግቢ ነኪዩ ነቶም ኣብ ቀረባ መዓልትታት ናዕቢ ዘለዓዓሉ ሰባት ከም ዝቀጽዖም ድማ ተመባጺዑ።

data.eng: Lionel Messi of Argentina wins the FIFA Ballon d'Or as world football player for the second successive year.
data.aaf: Arjentinah ubkale liyon messi Namma sanat sitalakleh Baadak Digirabak Aysuk balanxoorl acwa bee.
data.amh: አርጀንቲናዊው ሊዮኔል ሜሲ ለሁለተኛ ተከታታይ ዓመት የዓለም ምርጥ እግር ኳስ ተጫዋች በመሆን የፊፋ ባሎን ዶርን አሸነፈ።
data.orm: Liyoonel Mesiin Arjentiinaa, walitti aansuun waggaa lammaffaaf akka taphataa kubbaa miilaa addunyaatti badhaasa Baalan doorii FIFA injifate.
data.som: Ciyaartooyga kubada cagta ee Argentinayska ah ee Lionel Messi ayaa ku guuleystay abaalmarinta FIFA Ballon d’Or isago noqday mid kuguulaysta labasano oo iskuxiga.
data.tir: ኣርጄንቲናዊ ሊዮኔል ሜሲ እቲ ብሉፅ ተፃዋቲ ኩዕሶ እግሪ ብምኳን ንኽልተ ተኸታተልቲ ዓመታት ተዓዋቲ ባሎንዶር ፊፋ ኮይኑ።

data.eng: The Jamaican Coast Guard intercepts a Honduran vessel fishing near Pedro Cays, killing the captain and wounding two crewmen.
data.aaf: JamaykahBaddih Xaqi Dacrisa Pedro Cays Xayikel Inki Hoxarus Doonik Garaqak Kabten Qidak Namma Taama-Abenit Mudumteh.
data.amh: የጃማይካ የባህር ዳርቻ ጥበቃ በፔድሮ ካይስ አቅራቢያ አንድ የሆንዱራስ መርከብን በመጥለፍ ካፒቴኑን ገድሎ ሁለት ሠራተኞችን አቁስሏል።
data.orm: Eegdonni Galaanaa Jamaa'ikkaa naannoo Peediroo Keeyisitti dooniin Honduras utuu qurxummii qabuu akka darbee hin deemne danquun, ajajaa doonichaa ajjeesuun hojjetoota doonichaa lama madeesse.
data.som: Ciidanka Ilaalada Xeebaha ee Jamaica ayaa dhexda u galay doon Honduras laga leeyahay oo ka kalluumaysanaysay meel u dhow Pedro Cays, halkaas oo lagu dilay kabtanka, laguna dhaawacay labo kale.
data.tir: ሓለዋ ገምገም ባሕሪ ጃማይካ ኣብ ጥቓ ፔድሮ ካይስ ዓሳ ትዘፍፍ ንዝነበረት ናይ ሆንድራ መርከብ ብምጥቃዕ ነቲ ካፒቴን ቀቲሎምን ክልተ ባሕረኛታት ኣቑሲሎምን።

data.eng: The World Health Organization launches a plan to prevent the global spread of an artemisinin-resistant malaria.

data.eng: Delta Air Lines says that it expects sharp fuel cost increases in 2011, perhaps to $2.60 a gallon from $2.47 last year.

data.som: Delta Air Lines ayaa kafaalotay inay filayso inu kor ukaco qiimaha shidaalka ee 2011, lagana yaabaa inuu gaadho $ 2.60 gallonki xaguu sanadkii hore ka’ahaa $ 2.47.

data.amh: ተመራማሪዎች እንዳሳወቁት በአርክቲክ ላይ የሚደረጉ የአሳ ማስገር ስራዎች በዩኤን ከተገለፀው በ75 እጥፍ እንደሚበልጡ አስታወቁ አክለውም እስካሁን ካለው መማር ስላልተቻለ ለወደፊት የሚደረጉ ብዝበዛዎችም መጨመራቸው አይቀርም።

data.som: Cilmi baadhayaal ayaa soo wariyay in heerka kalluumeysiga ee Arctic uu 75 jeer ka sarreeyo kuwa ay soo sheegtey Qaramada Midoobey, taas oo soo jeedinaysa in kaluumaysiga mustaqbalka ee korortay aysan suurtogal ahayn sidii markii hore loo malaynayay.

data.tir: ኣብ ኢስተር ደሴት ነባራት ተወለድቲ ዝኾኑ ሰባት መሰል ሕቶ ዋንነት መሬት ቀዳሞት ወለዶም ንምርግጋፅ ከምኡ እውን ዝዓበየ ብፅሒት ካብቲ ካብ ዑደተኛታት ዝርከብ ኣታዊታት መሬት ዘመናዊ ሆቴል ብምሕታት ተቓውም ብምክያዶም ብፖሊስ ተባሪሮም ።

data.eng: Using Google Maps, an archaeologist finds nearly 2,000 potential archaeological sites in Saudi Arabia.

data.som: Khabiir ku takhasusay raadadka qadiimiga ayaa helay ku dhawaad 2,000 oo goobood oo raadad hore ah isagoo adeegsanaya khariirada google, kuwaas oo laga yaabo inay ku yaallaan Sacuudi Carabiya.
data.tir: ሓደ ተመራማሪ ስነኳዕቲ ንናይ ጎግል ካርታ ብምጥቃም ነቑጣታት ስነኳዕቲ ክኾኑ ዝኽእሉ ናብ 2000 ዝፅግዑ ቦታታት ኣብ ስዑዲ ዓረብ ረኺቡ።

data.eng: Two small planes (took off from Langley Regional Airport) collide mid-air near Mission, British Columbia, in western Canada, with at least one person dead.

data.som: Laba diyaaradood oo yaryar (oo ka duushay Gegida Diyaaradaha ee Langley) ayaa isku dhacay hawada sare meel ku dhow Mission, British Columbia, oo ku taal galbeedka Canada, iyadoo ugu yaraan hal qof u ku dhintay.

data.eng: Jared Lee Loughner has been indicted on 49 counts in relation to the 2011 Tucson shooting in the US state of Arizona.
data.aaf: USil Arizonah Rakaakayih Addal 2011 Tucson Utkal Jared Lee Loughner49 Melkisiteh Melkiseme.
data.amh: በ 2011 የአሪዞና ቱሶን ግድያ ወንጀል ጋር በተያያ ዘ ጃሬድ ሊ ሎግህነር በ49 ጉዳዮች ጋር ስሙ እንደተያያዘ ተገለፀ።
data.orm: Jared Lee Laafner himannaa dhukaasa bara 2011 Tuksaan,biyyaa US magaalaa Arizoonaa kessatti rawwatameen walqabatee himannaaleen 49 irratti dhiyaate.
data.som: Jared Lee Loughner ayaa lagu soo oogay 49 dacwadood oo la xidhiidha toogashadii Tucson ee 2011 kii ka dhacday gobolka Arizona ee Mareykanka.
data.tir: ኣብ ዩ.ኤስ ኣሪዞና ስቴት ኣብ ቱክሳን ብ 2011 ዓ.ም.ፈ ምስ ዝተኻየደ ተኵሲ ብዝትኣሳሰረ ጃሬድ ሊ ለውግነር ብ 49 ጉዳያት ተኸሲሱ ።

data.eng: The United States Department of State warns U.S. citizens of a high security threat level in Yemen due to what it describes as "terrorist activities and civil unrest". ,
data.aaf: USik Iroh Caagidah Buxa Algeria Baxok Aménasal Kudusiyi Taqabih Radi Yamcawuh Us Xayloh Gexo Mabitina Acele.
data.amh: የአሜሪካው የስቴት ዲፓርትምነት ወደ የመን ሚደረጉ ጉዞወች ላይ የሽብርተኝነት አደጋ እና የእርስ በእርስ ግጭትን በማመላከት ከፍተኛ የደህንነት ማስጠንቀቂያ አስተላለፈ።
data.orm: Ministeerri Haajaa Alaa Yunaayitid Isteetis lammiiwwan U.S yaaddoon nageenyaa sadarkaa olaanaan sababa "sochiilee shororkeessitootaa fi hookkara siivilii" jedhuun ibse Yemen keessaaf akeekkachiise.
data.som: Waaxda Arrimaha Dibedda ee Maraykanka ayaa uga digaysaa Muwaadiniinta Maraykanka Heerka sare ee ammaan ee Yemen sababo la xidhidha wax ay ku tilmaamtay inay yihiin “Hawlgalladda Argagixisadda iyo Kacdoonadda Dadweynaha”.
data.tir: ሚኒስትሪ ጉዳያት ወጻኢ ኣመሪካ ብዛዕባ እቲ ብሰንኪ "ግብረ-ሸበራዊ ንጥፈታትን ሲቪላዊ ቅልውሉዋትን" ኣብ የመን ኣስዒቡ ዘሎ ወሰኽ ጸጥታዊ ስግኣት ንኣመሪካውያን ዜጋታታ ኣጠንቂቓ።

data.eng: The United States Food and Drug Administration approves the use of the drug Belimumab (Benlysta) to treat lupus, the first drug to be approved for this purpose in 56 years.
data.aaf: Ameerikak Baaxoh Addah Caagidah Malaak Ayyunti Xoron Abomosiyal Amixigewa Wakti Soliseh tan Chaynah Doonik SZ DJI Teknolojih Kubaniya lekatuk Xaagu beya Hayteb Intamih Cuxot Getimta.
data.amh: የአሜሪካው የምግብ እና የመድሃኒት ቁጥጥር ድርጅት በቤሊሙማብ(ቤንሊስታ) የተሰኘውን እፅ ሉፐስ ለሚባል በሽታ መድሃኒትነት ይውል ዘንድ ፍቃድ ሰጠ፤ ይህ እፅም ለዚሁ ጥቅም እንዲውል ሲፈቀድ ከ 56 አመታት በ|ላ ነው።
data.orm: Bulchiinsi nyaataa fi qorichaa US fayyadama qoricha Belimumab(Beeniliistaa) yaala dhibee luuppas'tiif mirkaneessee jira, waggaa 56 keessatti dhimma kanaaf qoricha mirkanaa'ee jalqabaati.
data.som: Maamulka Cuntada iyo Dawooyinka ee Maraykanka ayaa oggolaaday isticmaalka dawada Belimumab (Benlysta) si loogu daweeyo lupus ka, oo ah dawadii ugu horraysay ee loo ansixiyo ujeeddadan in mudo 56 sano.
data.tir: ምምሕዳር መግብን መድሃኔታትን ኣመሪካ Belimumab (Benlysta) ዝተባህለ መድሃኔት ሕማም መላግቦ ዝሕክም፣ ድሕሪ 56 ዓመት ንምጥቃም ናይ መጀመርያ መድሃኔት ፍቓድ ዝተዋህቦ ኮይኑ ይርከብ።

data.eng: The Bank of Korea increases the main interest rate in South Korea by a quarter percentage point to 3% due to concerns over inflation.
data.aaf: Limo Galiik umma kinuk Gabikuriyah leh tan interst ih Caddo Rubqi sanatal booluk 3% Fayayay.
data.amh: በዋጋ ግሽበት ምክንያት የኮሪያ ባንክ በደቡብ ኮሪያ ያለውን ዋና የወለድ መጠን በሩብ መቶኛ ነጥብ ወደ 3% ከፍ አድርጓል።
data.orm: Baankiin Kooriyaa sababa yaaddoo qaala'iinsa jireenyaaf hamma dhalaa ijoo Kooriyaa Kibbaa keessatti qabxii dhibbantaa nuusaa irraa gara 3% 'tti guddise.
data.som: Bangiga Kuuriya ayaa kordhiyay qiimaha ribada ee ugu weyn ee Kuuriyada Koonfureed rubuc boqolkiiba dhibic ilaa 3% taas oo ay kaliftay walwal laga qabo sixir bararka.
data.tir: ባንክ ኮርያ ብሰንኪ ዝቕባበ ዝፈጠሮ ሻቕሎት ነቲ ኣብ ደቡብ ኮርያ ዘሎ ቀንዲ ዋጋ ወለድ ርብዒ ሚእታዊት ናብ 3% ክብ ኣቢላቶ።

data.eng: The New York Times newspaper announces it is to start charging people who access content on its website.
data.aaf: Niyorki tamis Majalat Web guubul Mabux Madisa Mariteh Makla qimbisem Qadose.
data.amh: የኒው ዮርክ ታይምስ ጋዜጣ በድረ -ገፁ መረጃን ፈልገው የሚጎበኙ ሰዎች ላይ ክፍያ መጀመሩን አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Gaazexaan Ze Niwu Yoork Taayims namoota marsariitii isaa irratti waan barreeffame dubbisan akka kanfalchiisuu jalqabu beeksise.
data.som: Wargayska New York Times ayaa ku sheegay inay bilaabi doonaan khidmada ageega taas oo ay bixin doonaan dadka istimaala boggooda internetka.
data.tir: ጋዜጣ ኒው ዮርክ ታይምስ ነቶም ናብ መርበብ ሓበሬታኣ ዝርከብ ትሕዝቶ ዝበጽሑ ሰባት ገንዘብ ከተኽፍሎም ከም ዝጀመረት ገሊጻ።

data.eng: Vitali Klitschko defeats Odlanier Solís via a controversial first-round technical knockout to retain the WBC Heavyweight Championship in Cologne, Germany.
data.aaf: uzebke amerika server dijborove Asiyal Ibinkoqso fexereshion buxa Tekkeh tan Meqem kabanite Nammeythto Addah Asiyah Ibi koqsoh Digira Axcuk Doorimen.
data.amh: ቪታሊ ክሊተሸኮ በመጀመሪያ ዙር አወዛጋቢ በሆነ ቴክኒካል ዝረራ ኦድላኔር ሶሊስን በመርታት የአለምአቀፍ ቦክስ ሻምፒዮንሺፕነቱን አስጠበቀ።
data.orm: Vitaali Kilichkoon dorgommii badhaasa bunyaa ulfaatina guddaa WPC Germanii Kiloony keessattii geggeeffamnerratti badhaasicha hambifachuuf Oodlaner Solisiiniin marsaa duraatiin rukuttaa haqummaan isaa falmisiisaa ta'een mo'ate.
data.som: Vitali Klitschko ayaa ka badiyay Odlanier Solís isaga oo u adeegsanaya ciyaar wanaag farsamo wareegga kobaad si uu u sii haysto WBC Heavyweight Championship ee Cologne, Germany.
data.tir: ኣብ ከለን፣ ጀርመን፣ ዝተኻየደ ውድድር ኣህጉራዊ ፌደረሽን መኸተ ጉስጢ WBC ናይ ከቢድ ሚዛን፣ ኣብ ቀዳማይ ዙርያ ቪታሊ ክሊችኮ ብኣካታዒት ዝተባህለት ቴክኒካል ቀታሊት ህራም ንኦድላኔር ሶሊስ ስዒሩ ደረጅኡ ክዕቅብ ክኢሉ።

data.eng: A US judge blocks an agreement between Google and publishers about efforts to digitize books online at Google Books.
data.aaf: Ameerikah Cakam Google Kutbebal Kutbeeba Ratotil Xijital Abonuh Macal Google kee Matabaqa Aba fanal tekke sitigey Soliseh.
data.amh: በአሜሪካ የሚገኝ አንድ ዳኛ በጉግል እና በአሳታሚዎች መካከል የተደረገ መፅሃፎችን በዲጂታል መልኩ ኦንላይን ላይ ለማውጣት የተደረገን ስምምነት አገደ።
data.orm: Abbaan seeraa US tokko waliigaltee Guugilii fi maxxansitoota gidduu kan kaka'umsa waa'ee kitaabota marsariitii Guugile Buuks irratti bifa digitaalaan dhiyeessuu danqe.
data.som: Xaakim Maraykan ah ayaa hor istaagay heshiis dhex maray Google iyo daabacayaasha bugaagta, kuwas oo ku heshiiyay in buugagta lagu qoro bogga internetka ah ee Google.
data.tir: ሓደ ኣሜሪካዊ ዳይና ነቲ ብመንገዲ ጉግል መፅሓፍቲ ብኢንቴርኔት ንመፅሓፍቲ ዲጂታል ንምግባር ኣብ መንጐ ጉጉልን ኣሓተምቲን ዝተገበረ ስምምዕነት ኣጊድዎ ።

data.eng: Tokyo Electric Power Co. resumes its policy of rolling electricity blackouts following ongoing problems caused by the 2011 Tōhoku earthquake and tsunami.
data.aaf: RAF Bournemouthih Qaran Festival Sabtih Tekke Qide QawalayllakUgutak Qasa qida Wadirih Haduh Sumaq Keenih Yecenih, Takkay Imay Ta Sanat Tabisle Bicitel Hadeloonumih Yasmitenim Maxiqimta.
data.amh: የቶኪዮ ኤሌክትሪክ ኃይል ድርጅት በ 2011 ቱሆኩ የመሬት መንቀጥቀጥ እና ሱናሚ ሳቢያ የተከሰቱትን ችግሮች ተከትሎ የመብራት ፈረቃ ፖሊሲውን ይቀጥላል።
data.orm: Dhaabbanni Humna Elektirikii Tookiyoo rakkoo walitti fufaa sochii lafaa fi sunaamii Tohokuu bara 2011'n mudate hordofuun, qajeelfama isaa adda cituu elektirikii akka itti fufu eegale.
data.som: Tokyo Electric Power Co. ayaa dib u bilawday sharciyadeedi ay ku damin jirtay korontada oo qaraxday kadib dhibaatooyin joogto ah oo ay sababeen dhulgariirkii Tōhoku iyo tsunami 2011kii.
data.tir: ኩባንያ ሓይሊ ኤሌክትሪክ ቶክዮ ብሰንኪ እቲ ብ2011 ዓ.ም.ፈ ኣብ ቶሆኩ ዘጋጠመ ፀገም ርእደ ምድሪን ሱናሚን ዘተኣታተዎ ፖሊሲ ምቁራፅ ኤሌክትሪክ ክቕፅለሉ እዩ።

data.eng: Mathematician John Milnor wins the 2011 Abel Prize for his contributions to topology, geometry and algebra.
data.aaf: Cisab Kusaq, Geometri kee Algebra Digirenih Yanin Dooril Cisah Tuyaxigi Jon Miler 201 abel Acwal Yeysse.
data.amh: የሂሳብ ሊቁ ጆን ሚልኖር በቶፖሎጂ፣ጂኦሜትሪ እና አልጄብራ ላደረገው አስተዋፅኦ የ2011ን አቤል ፕራይዝ ሽልማትን አሸነፈ።
data.orm: Hayyuun herregaa Joon Milnar badhaasaa Nobeelii bara 2011 gumaachaa inni tooppolooji, ji'oometirii fi aljeebiraaf taasiseef mo'ate
data.som: Xisaabiyaha John Milnor ayaa ku guulaystay Abaalmarinta Abel Abel ee 2011 kaalintii uu ka qaatay topology, joometri iyo aljebra.
data.tir: ናይ ስነ-ቁጽሪ ሊቅ ጆን ሚልነር ኣብ ቶፖሎጂ፣ ጆሜትርን ኣልጀብራን ብዘገበሮ ኣበርክቶ ናይ ዓመት 2011 ሽልማት ኣቤል ዕዉት ኮይኑ።

data.eng: Microsoft lodged an antitrust complaint against Google with the European Commission.
data.aaf: Maykirosofti googilil Asacoki Weeqa Awrobah kommision Xayoose.
data.amh: ማይክሮሶፍተ በጉግል ላይ ያለመተማመን ቅሬታ እንዳለው ለአውረፓ ኮሚሽን አስረዳ።
data.orm: Maakiroosooft Guugil irratti iyyannoo komii seera dorgommii madaalawaa Gamtaa Awurooppaaf dhiyeesse.
data.som: Microsoft ayaa Google ku dacwaysay Guddiga Yurub.
data.tir: ማይክሮሶፍት ኣብ ቅድሚ ኮሚሽን ኣውሮፓ ኣብ ልዕሊ ንጉግል ናይ እምነትጨምጉዳል ጥርዓን ኣቕሪቡ።

data.eng: The US National Highway Traffic Safety Administration reports that the number of traffic deaths has fallen to 32,788 in 2010, the lowest level since 1949.
data.aaf: Ameerikak qiytababur Tarafik Aytibuxah Xinise 2010 Tarafiik Ratemih Loowo illa 32,788 Madem Yiysexege, Ta 1949 wadirih Dagna kinim yiysixige.
data.amh: የአሜሪካ የፍጥነት መንገዶች ደህንነት ትራፊክ አመራር በትራፊክ አደጋ የሚከሰቱ የሞት አደጋዎች ከ1949 በ|ላ በ2010 ወደ 32788 እንደቀነሱ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Akka gabaasi bulchiinsi Nageenya Daandiwwanii Yunaaytid Isteetis ibsutti lubbuun namoota bala Tiraafikaan darbe bara 2010nii gara 32,788 tittii gadi irrachuu isaa, kunis erga bara 1949 as isa xiqqaa ta'uu agarsiisa.
data.som: Maamulka badbaadada gaadiidka waddooyinka qaranka ee Mareykanka ayaa sheegay in tirada dhimashada gaadiidka ay hoos u dhacday 32,788 sanadkii 2010, waana heerka ugu hooseeya tan iyo 1949 kii.
data.tir: ናይ ዩ ኤስ ምምሐዳር ድሕንነት ኣውራጐዳና ኣብ 2010 ዓ.ም ፈ ነቁፅሪ ሞት ሓደጋ መኪና ናብ 32,788 ከምዝወረደ ገሊፁ ፤ እዚ ቁፅሪ ድሕሪ 1949 ዓ.ምፈ. ኣብ ዘሎ ግዜ እቲ ዝታሓተ እዩ ።

data.eng: Almost half of China's dairies are to close after failing to obtain new licenses following a safety audit.

data.eng: The World Meteorological Organisation reports that the ozone layer is damaged to its worst extent ever in the Arctic.
data.aaf: Baad Metrolojih Eglali Areketekeh Addal Ozonih qelu faxe waktik lafetle calat biyakisem xayose.
data.amh: የአለማ የአየር ንብረት ድርጅት በአርክቲክ አካባቢ ያለው የኦዞን ምንጣፍ ከፍተኛ ጉዳት እንደደረሰበት አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Dhaabbanni Meetiroolojii Addunyaa baqqaanni oozonii Arkiitik keessatti gara sadarkaa isa hamaa haga ammaatti akka miidhame gabaase.
data.som: Ururka Saadaasha Hawada Adduunka ayaa ku warramaya in lakabka ozoneka ee Ka koreeya dhulka baraflayda uu waxyeelladii abid ugu darnaa soo gaadhay.

data.eng: Fourteen people claimed to be responsible for shooting 52 protestors in Sana’a in March are referred to the state prosecutor.
data.aaf: Qado-Dirih Alsat Sanqah Addal 52 Takke Sadi Marite Gira Aguruk kah esserimele kak iyyen 14 Mari Illa Doolat Garoseh fanah Ruuben.
data.amh: በመጋቢት ወር በሳና ውስጥ ሃምሳ ሁለት ተቃዋሚዎች ላይ በመተኮስ ተጠያቂ ናቸው የተባሉት አስራ አራት ሰዎች ወደ የመንግስት አቃቤ ህግ ተላኩ።
data.orm: Namoonni afurtamni ajjeechaa mormitoota 52 Sana'aa keessatti Bitootessa keessatti mudateef akka itti gaafataman amanan gara abbaa alangaa naannichaatti dabarsaman.
data.som: Afar iyo toban qof oo la sheegay inay ku lug lahaayeen toogashada 52 dibad -baxayaal ah oo ku suganaa Sanca bishii Maarso ayaa loo gudbiyay xeer -ilaaliyaha gobolka.
data.tir: ኣብ ሰንዓ ኣብ ወርሒ መጋቢት ኣብ ልዕሊ 52 ሰላማዊ ሰልፈኛታት ብምትኳስ ተሓቲ እየም ዝተቐሃሉ 14 ሰባት ጉዳዮም ናብ መንግስታዊ ዓቃቢ ሕጊ ቀሪቡ ።

data.eng: British prime minister David Cameron sets out to block his predecessor Gordon Brown's attempt to take the £270,000 per year role of head of the International Monetary Fund (IMF).
data.aaf: Biritaliyak Nahari Saqal Xevix Kameroni Duumah Gordn berawun Baadak Maliyah Egla (9IMF) Sanatat 270,000 Bawunxi Bayuh takkeh tan gibatite Ragimtuh Ikraariseh.
data.amh: የብሪታንያ ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር ዴቪድ ካሜሮን የቀድሞው ጆርደን ብራውን ከ የዓለም አቀፉ የገንዘብ ድርጅት (አይኤምኤፍ) በዓመት 270,000 ፓውንድ ለመውሰድ ያረጉትን ጥረት ለመግታት አቅደዋል።
data.orm: Mummeen ministeeraa Biriitish Daavid Kaameruun yaalii muummee ministeeraa aangoorra isa dura turee Goordon Biraawon waggaatti £270,000 akka dursaa Fandii Maallaqa Addunyaa (IMF) tti fudhachuuf ture danqe.
data.som: Raysal wasaaraha Ingiriiska David Cameron ayaa hor istaagay isku daygii madaxa hayada lacagta ee aduunka (IMF) Gordon Brown, inuu sanadkiiba qaato lacag dhan £270,000 oo pound.
data.tir: ቀዳመይ ሚኒስትር ብሪታኒያ ዴቪድ ካሜሮን ቅደሚኦም ዝነበሩ ጎርደን ብራውን ኣብ ዓመት 270 ሽሕ ፓውንድ ናይ ዝኽፈሎ ዓለምለኸ ትካል ገንዘብ ሓላፍነት ንምውሳድ ዝገብርዎ ዘለው ፃዕሪ ንምኹላፍ ተላዒሎም። ኢራን ናብ ህንዲ ይኸዳ ንዝነበራ መራሒት መንግስቲ ጀርመን ኣንጌላ መርከል ንዘሳፈረት ነፋሪት ንኽልተ ሰዓታት ዝኣክል ናብ ግዝኣት ኣየራ ከይትኣቱ ከልኪላ።

data.eng: New Jersey's Secretary of State rejects former Olympic medallist Carl Lewis's bid to run for the state Senate due to eligibility requirements.
data.aaf: New Jersey's Iro Caagidah Malaak Olombik Acwabe Carl Lewis's agatak Duddaluk Rakaakay seneteh Qalaluh Xayooseh Yan essero Kak Hinimteh.
data.amh: የኒው ጀርሲው ፀሃፊ ቀድሞ የኦሎምፒክ ሜዳሊያ ባለቤት የሆነውን የካርል ሌዊድን ለግዛቷ ሴኔት የመወዳደር ፍላጎት ከብቃት መስፈርቶች አለመሟላት ጋር በተያያዘ በውድቅ አደረጉ።
data.orm: Barreessaan Bulchiinsa Niiw Jeersiiy badhaafamaan Medaaliyaa Oloompikii duraanii kan ta'e Kaarl Liwiis fiigichaaf akka hirmaatuuf Seenetii biyyattiif gaffiin dhiyaate sababa ulaagaa ga'umsaa guutuu dhabuutiin jala kufffise.
data.som: Xoghayaha Arrimaha Dibedda ee New Jersey ayaa diidey Carl Lewis oo hore ugu guulaystay billaddii Olombikada si uu ugu tartamo Senetarka gobolka sababo la xiriira shuruudaha u qalmitaanka.
data.tir: ሓላፊ ወጻኢ ጉዳያት ንዩ ጀርሲ ንነበር ኦሎምፒካዊ ካርል ሉዊስ ኣብ ባይቶ እታ ኣውራጃ ንምርቋሕ ብምኽንያት ብቕዓት ዝገብሮ ፈተነታት ይነጽግ።

data.eng: The Vatican brings Pope John Paul II's coffin out from below St. Peter's Basilica in Rome in preparation for his beatification.
data.aaf: Vatikan togoreh Bica romak Babasak Addah Baabas Jone Bole Tabot Ayaqele.
data.amh: ቫቲካን የፖፕ ጆን ፓወለን ሬሳ ለቅድስና ለማዘጋጀት ከታችኛው ቅዱስ ጴጥሮስ ባሲልካ እንዲወጣ አዘዘ።
