data.som: Vatican -ka ayaa sanduuqii Pope John Paul II ka soo saaraya hoosta kaniisada St. Peter's Basilica ee Rome si loogu diyaariyo qurxintiisa.
data.tir: ቫቲካን ዓፅሚ ኣቡነ ጆን ፖል ዳግማዊ ንዝሐዘ ሳንዱቕ ካብ ትሕቲ ቅዱስ ጴጥሮስ ሮማ ካብ ዝርከብ መልግብ ብምውፃእ ብፃዲቕድነት ንምቕባእ ንዝግበር ቅድመ ምድላው ኣሰናዲኣቶ።

data.eng: Gaddafi has supplied Viagra to his forces to encourage them to commit mass rape, Susan Rice, United States Ambassador to the United Nations, has alleged.
data.aaf: Gadaafi Inkih Tan Caylisenta kah Yakkeinah Aydukumusa Viagra Qaskar Xayoosem Galimarok US Ambasaxer Suzan Rayiz Edde Yabbe.
data.amh: ጋዳፊ በጅምላ አስገድዶ መድፈር እንዲፈጽሙ ለማበረታታት ቪያግራን ለሠራዊቱ አቅርቧል የሚል ክስ በተባበሩት መንግስታት የአሜሪካ አምባሳደር ሱዛን ራይስ ቀርቧል።
data.orm: Mootummootta Gamtoomanitti Ambasaaddarri Yunaayitid Isteetis, Suuzaan Raayis, Gaadaafiin guddeeddii hedduminaan akka raawwataniif humnoota waraanaa isaaf viyaagiraa dhiyeessaa jedhan.
data.som: Susan Rice, oo ah danjiraha Mareykanka ee Qaramada Midoobay ayaa ku eedeysay, Qadaafi inuu siiyay ciidamadiisa Viagra si ay ugu dhiiranadaan gaysashada kufsi wadareed.
data.tir: ጋዳፊ ሓይልታቱ ምእንታን ጃምላዊ ፆታዊ ምግሃስ ክፍፅሙ ቪያግራ የቕርበሎም እዩ ክትብል ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣምበሳደር ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ሱዛን ራይስ ከሲሳ ።

data.eng: American basketball player Derrick Rose of the Chicago Bulls wins the NBA Most Valuable Player Award Award for the 2010-11 NBA season, the youngest player to do so.
data.aaf: Chikago boliisite Amerikah base bool Digir abe Xerik roze “2010-11 NBA “ Qalayli wakti Qunxa digirabe NBA Nagay Nafqile Digirabeh Acwah Acwal yeyseh.
data.amh: የአሜሪካው እና የቸሂካጎ ቡልስ ቅርጫት ኳስ ተጫዋች የሆነው ዴሪክ ሮስ በኤንቢኤ 2010-11 የውድድር አመት ምርጡ ተጫዋች በመበል ተሸለመ፤ በታሪክም በእድሜ ትንሹ ተጫዋች ያደርገዋል።
data.orm: Taphataan lammii Ameerikaa kubbaa saphanaa garee Chikaagoo Buuls ,Deerik Roos bara dorgommii NBA 2010-11 keessatti badhaasa taphataa hedduu fayyade jedhamuun mo'achuun taphata badhaasa kana mo'ate kan umuriin xiqqaa ta'uu danda'eera.
data.som: Ciyaartooyga kubbadda koleyga Mareykanka Derrick Rose oo ka tirsan Chicago Bulls ayaa noqday ciyaaryahanka ugu da’da yar ee ku guuleysta abaalmarinta lagu abaal mariyo Ciyaaryahanda ugu Qiimaha Badan NBA xilli ciyaareedkii 2010-11 NBA.
data.tir: ኣመሪካዊ ተጻወታይ ክዑሶ ሰኪዐት ኣባል ጋንታ ቺካጎ ቡልስ ደሪክ ሮዝ ኣብቲ ብ2010-11 እተገብረ ውድድር ኤን.ቢ.አይ ተዓዋቲ ሽልማት ኣዝዩ ብሉጽ ተጻወታይ ብምዃኑ፣ ዝነኣሰ ተጻወታይ ነዚ ዓወት ዝፍጽም ኮይኑ ኣሎ።

data.eng: Workers enter one of the buildings at Japan's Fukushima I Nuclear Power Plant for the first time since an explosion in the days following the 2011 Tōhoku earthquake and tsunami.
data.aaf: Gabi Kalifoniyal USA Addal Garbot gexa gira Ill Booliyatal Lowintah Daaboh Awqiya Katasele.
data.amh: በ 2011 ቱሆኩ የመሬት መንቀጥቀጥ እና ሱናሚ በተከሰተ ቀናት ውስጥ ፍንዳታ ከተከሰተ በኋላ በጃፓን ፉኩሺማ 1 የኑክሌር ኃይል ማመንጫ ጣቢያ ውስጥ ሠራተኞች ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ ወደ አንዱ ሕንፃ ገቡ።
data.orm: Ijaarsawwan Warshaa Humna Niwukileeraa Fuukushimaa I Jaappaan keessaa tokko keessa sochii lafaa fi sunaamii Tohokuu bara 2011 hordofuun guyyoota itti aananitti erga dhuka'iinsa mudatee as yeroo jalqabaaf hojjetoonni seenan.
data.som: Shaqaaluha ayaa galay mid ka mid ah dhismayaasha Warshadda Quwadda Nukliyeerka ee Fukushima I ee Japan markii ugu horreysay tan iyo markii qarax ka dhacay maalmo ka dib markuu kadhacay dhulgar iyo duufaan Tōhoku ee 2011.
data.tir: ብድሕሪ እቲ ብ2011 ዓ.ም.ፈ ኣብ ቶሆኩ ዘጋጠመ ርእደ ምድሪን ሱናሚን ዝስዓበ ምንቷግ ሰራሕተኛታት ንፈለማ ግዜ ናብ ሓደ ህንፃ ናይ ጃፓን ፉኩሺማ ማእኸል ሓይሊ ኑክሌር 1 ኣቲዎም።

data.eng: Scottish Liberal Democrat leader Tavish Scott resigns after a collapse of his party's support at the Scottish Parliament election.
data.aaf: Iskotlanxi liberal Ximokrasih Miracise TaviSh skote iskotlanxih barlamal dooroh Isini Misoynanih Cato rademiik lakal Miracinu cabeh.
data.amh: የስኮትላንዱ ሊበራል ዲሞክራቲክ ፓርቲ መሪ የነበረው ትራቪሽ ሰኮት ፓርቲው በፓርላማው የሚያገኘው ድጋፍ በመክሰሙ ምክንያት ከስራው በራሱ ፍቃድ መነሳቱን አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Geggeessaan Liberaal Dimokiraasii Iskootilaand Taavish Iskoot filannoo Paarlaamaa Iskootilaand keessatti deggersi jaarmiyaa isaa erga kufee booda aangoo gadhiisuufi.
data.som: Hoggaamiyihii xisbiga Liberal Democrat ee Scotland Tavish Scott ayaa iscasilay kadib markii ay taagerada xisbigiisa kaladhacday ee doorashadii baarlamaanka Scotland.
data.tir: መራሒ ሊበራል ዴሞክራሲ ስኮትላንድ ታቪሽ ስኮት ኣብ ወረፃ ፓርላማ ስኮትላንድ ደገፍ ፓርቴኦም ስለዘይረኸቡ ስልጣኖም ብፍቓዶም ለቒቖም።

data.eng: There is a near riot in the Beijing Apple Store as the Apple iPad 2 goes on sale in the People's Republic of China.
data.aaf: Abil Aybaax 2 Chayina kee Ayyunti Reboblikih Addal Qadaagah Xayoowewak Bejigil Abil Arooca Addak Xayi Aracal Taqabi Yan.
data.amh: በቻይና ቤጂንግ አፕል ሱቅ የአፕል አይፓድ 2 ሽያጭ መጀመርን ተከትሎ ለረብሻ የተጠጋ ሁኔታ ተፈጠረ።
data.orm: Akka Aappil iPad 2'n Reppaabilika Ummataa Chaayinaa keessatti gurguramuu eegaleen Kuusaa Aappil Beejingi keessatti jeequmsi ka'uu gahee ture.
data.som: Bakhaarka Apple ee Beijing iyadoo Apple iPad 2 lagu iibinayo Jamhuuriyadda Dadka Shiinaha.
data.tir: ኣፕል ኣይፓድ 2 ኣብ ህዝባዊት ሪፐብሊክ ቻይና ኣብ ዕዳጋ ዝወዓለ እንትኾን ኣብ ቤዢንግ ኣብዝርከብ ሓደ መደብር ኣፕል ዕግርግር ከይለዓል ተሰጊኡ።

data.eng: Floods in Mississippi worsen, with the Army Corps of Engineers saying an area between Simmesport, Louisiana and Baton Rouge may be inundated under 20-30 feet of water.
data.aaf: Fiji Cyclone Harold Badih Silayti BIyaakite Dariifah 30 Ayroorah Gino Qawalayllah Calotal Faticisen.
data.amh: የጦር ሰራዊቱ መሐንዲሶች በሲምስፖርት ፣ ሉዊዚያና እና ባቶን ሩዥ መካከል ያለው ቦታ ከ20-30 ጫማ በሆነ ውሃ ሊጥለቀለቅ ይችላል በማለታቸው በሚሲሲፒ ውስጥ የተከሰተው የጎርፍ መጥለቅለቅ እየተባባሰ ይሄዳል።
data.orm: Lolaan Misisiippii keessaa hammaachuun, Enjiineronni Army Koorps bakki Siimerport, Liwuziyaanaa fi Baaton Roog gidduu faanni 20-30 bishaan lolaan guutuu mala jedhan.
data.som: Daadadka Mississippi ayaa ka sii daraya, iyago ay Injineerada Ciidanka ay sheegeen in meel u dhaxaysa Simmesport, Louisiana iyo Baton Rouge laga yaabo inay ku fataho qoto dhan 20-30 cagood oo biyo ah.
data.tir: ኣብ ሚሲሲፒ ወሑጅ ብምብርትዑ ኣብ መንጎ ሲይሜ ስፖርት ሉዊዛንያን ባቶን ሩግን ዘለዉ ስፍራታት ካብ 20 ክሳብ 30 ጫማ ክዕልቕለቑ ከምዝኽእሉ ኮር ምህንድስና ሰራዊት ኣሜሪካ ገሊፁ።

data.eng: Former Football Association chairman David Triesman alleges that four members of FIFA sought "bribes" in return for backing England's failed bid to host the 2018 World Cup.
data.aaf: Dumah Ibikoqsoh Yakume saqal xevix teraysemane 2018 Baad kas xayosoonuh ingiliz ogole cinte catota Afar fifah Adoytitih “Guqul” Essere.
data.amh: የቀድሞ የእግርኳስ አሶሴሽን ሊቀመንበር የነበሩት ዴቪድ ትሬስማን አራት የፊፋ አባለት እንግሊዘን የ2018 አለም ዋንጫ እንድታዘጋጅ ድጋፍ እንዲሰጡ በሚል ጉቦ ለመስጠት ሙከራ እንደተረገ ደርሰንበታል አሉ።
data.orm: akka dura taa'aan gamtaa kubbaa Miilaa duraanii Deevid Triizman jedhuttii carraa qopheessummaa tapha waancaa addunyaa bara 2018 irratti caalbaasii Ingilaand kufte deeggaruuf miseensonni FIFA afur f matta'aa gaafachuu isaanii dubbate.
data.som: Guddoomiyihii hore ee Xidhiidhka Kubadda Cagta David Triesman ayaa ku cambaareeynaya in afar xubnood oo ka mid ah FIFA ay qateen “laaluush” si ay ugu taageeraan dalabkii martigelinta Koobka Adduunka 2018 Ingiriiska ee fashilmay.
data.tir: ኣቦ መንበር ማሕበር ኵዕሶ እግሪ ዝነበረ ዴቪድ ትሪስማን ኣርባዕተ ኣባላት ፊፋ ነቲ ብዓዲ እንግሊዝ ኣብ 2018 ዝተኻየደ ውድድር ዋንጫ ዓለም ንምእንጋድ ዝገበረቶ ፍሹል ፈተነ ስለ ዝደገፍዎ "ጉቦ" ከም ዝሓተቱ ገሊጹ።

data.eng: Police in South London launch a murder hunt after a 15-year-old schoolboy is stabbed to death in the street.
data.aaf: Lendon boliis 15 sanatih bartteni Gile mudimehrabk geera Qidiini Goran qimbise.
data.amh: የ 15 ዓመቱ ተማሪ በመንገድ ላይ በጩቤ ተወግቶ ከተገደለ በኋላ የደቡብ ለንደን ፖሊስ የገዳይ አሰሳ ጀመረ።
data.orm: Poolisoonnii kibba Landan sababa barataan umurii waggaa 15 daandii irratti cuubeen waraanamee ajjeeffamuu isaatiin walqabatee barbaacha yakkamaa ajjesee kanaa labsan.
data.som: Booliiska Koonfurta London ayaa bilaabay ugaarsiga dilaayaasha ka dib markii arday 15 jir ah toori lagu dilay waddada.
data.tir: ሓደ ወዲ 15 ዓመት መንእሰይ ኣብ ጎደና ብኻራ ተወጊኡ ድሕሪ ምሟቱ፣ ፖላዊስ ደቡብ ለንደን ንቲ ቐታሊ ንምሓዝ ሃደን ጀሚሮም።

data.eng: North Korean leader Kim Jong-il's youngest son Kim Jong-un reportedly lifts restrictions on women's fashion, while cosmetic surgery–though illegal–takes place in return for bribes.
data.aaf: Gabbi Qaxi Kuriyya Saqal Kemi Jongi-Il Qunxa baxxa Kemi Jong-un Sayyol Wadooda ugusanaah፣ Bilqisiyi Gadisiyi Bagi fakot Gitaak Iro Yakkemih Umadooba Cigilisa Akkele ።
data.amh: የሰሜን ኮሪያው መሪ ኪም ጆንግ-ኢል ትንሹ ልጅ ኪም ጆንግ-ኡን በሴቶች ፋሽን ላይ ገደቦችን የነሳ ቢሆንም ፣ የመዋቢያ ቀዶ ጥገና ግን ሕገ ወጥ ነው፤ ሆኖም ጉቦ በመስጠት አሁንም እየተከናወነ ይገኛል።
data.orm: Geggeessaan kooriyaa kaabaa ilmi Kimjoong xiqqichi Kim joong Uun dhorkaa faashinii shamarranii irra ture ni kaasa, osoo gosni baqaaqsanii yaaluu bareedinaaf godhamu yakka ta'us matta'aadhaan karaa seeraan alaa hojjetamaa jiruu.
data.som: hogaamiyaha Kuuriyada Waqooyi Kim Jong-il Kim Jong-un Wiilka ugu yar ayaa laga soo waramay innuu kaqaaday xadiditaanki labiska dumarka. Inkastoo qaliinka isqurxintu yahay sharcidaro hadana musqmasuq ayu ku qabsooma.
data.tir: ንመራሒ ሰሜን ኮርያ ኪም ጆንግ ኢል እቲ ብዕድመ ዝነኣስ ወዱ ኪም ጆንግ ኡን ኣብ ልዕሊ ደቀንስትዮ ተነቢሩ ዝፀንሐ እገዳ ፋሽን ከምዘልዓሎ እንትግለፅ ብሕጊ መጥባሕቲ ፕላስቲክ ጉቦ እናኸፈልካ ይካየድ ኣሎ ተባሂሉ።

data.eng: President of the United States Barack Obama uses his weekly address to vow to seek oil in Alaska and in the Gulf of Mexico.
data.aaf: Ameerika Inkiinoh Berezexenti Barak Obama Aymati Abite AlAksa kee Meksiikoh Badih Iraawoh Addal Sukuti Gorisuh Xaggana Cule.
data.amh: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ፕሬዝዳንት የሆኑት ባራክ ኦባማ በሳምንታዊ መግለጫቸው በአላስካ እና በሜክስኮ ባህረ ሰላጤ የነዳጅ ፍለጋ እንደሚደረግ ቃል ገቡ።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin Yunaayitid Isteetis Baaraak Obaamaan ibsa isaa torbanii fayyadamuun boba'aa Alaaskaa fi Galf of Meksiikoo keessa barbaaduuf akka kuatate ibse.
data.som: Madaxweynaha Mareykanka Barack Obama ayaa u adeegsaday fursadiisii khudbada toddobaadlaha ah inuu balanqaad kusameeyo inuu shidaal ka raadiyo Alaska iyo gacanka Mexico.
data.tir: ፕሬዚደንት ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ባራክ ኦባማ ኣብ ኣላስካን ኣብ ወሽመጥ ባሕሪ ሜክሲኮን ነዳዲ ንምትእልላሽ ቃል ኣቲዎም (ኣትዮም?)።

data.eng: The Morganza Spillway on the Mississippi River has been opened for the first time in 37 years, deliberately flooding 3,000 square miles of rural Louisiana to save most of Baton Rouge and New Orleans.
data.aaf: Misisi Weeqaytul Geytima Moriginza sebilweyi Mangom Baaton rudi kee niw orilinisin Catimuh 3,000 K.M Baril luwiziyannani Weqat Culak 37 Sanataih Addat qimboh Addah Fakime.
data.amh: በሚሲሲፒ ወንዝ ላይ የሚገኘዉ የሞርጋንዛ ማስተንፈሻ ከ37 አመት ብኋላ ለምጀምሪያ ጊዜ ተከፍቷል፤ በዚህም አብዛኛውን የባተን ራውጅ እና ኒው ኦርሊያንሰ ለማትረፍ ሲባል 3000 ካሬ የሚሆን የሉዪዚያና ገጠራማ ቦታ በጎረፍ እንዲጥለቀለቅ ተደርጓል።
data.orm: Hidhni finca'aa Laga Missisippii irratti argamu Baatan Rooj fi Niw Oorliins baraaruuf jecha erga waggaa 37ti as yeroo jalqabaaf gad-dhiifamuun gandi baadiyyaa Looziyaana iskuweer maayilii 3000 ta'u lolaan dhiqame.
data.som: Laagta Morganza ee Wabiga Mississippi ayaa la furay markii ugu horreysay kadib muddo 37 sanadod, iyadoo si ula kac ah loogu fasaxay wabiga dhul baxadiisu ay dhantahay 3,000 mayl iskuweer ee miyiga Louisiana si loo badbaadiyo inta u badan dhulka magaalooyinka Baton Rouge iyo New Orleans.
data.tir: ኣብ ሞርጋንዛ ዝርከብ መተንፈሲ ሩባ ሚሲሲፒ ኣብ 37 ዓመታት ንመጀመርታ ግዜ ተኸፊቱ ኣሎ። ብዚ ድማ ባተን ሩጅን ኒው ኦርሊንስን ንዝተብሃላ ከባብታት ንምድሓን 3000 ትርብዒት ማይል ዝኣክል መረት ገጠር ሉዊዚያና ኮነ ተባሂሉ ብውሕጅ ከዕለቕልቕ ተገይሩ።

data.eng: Protesting indigenous people take over half of the city of Puno in south-eastern Peru, demanding an end to a Canadian mining project.
data.aaf: Sadenah yan Agrow xaylolla Kanadal Dahab cugasoosi kah soltanah Atifiquk Gabik Ayro mawqal Berul Getimta buono Malaal Qaxaak Dagga takkem Antiribixele.
data.amh: በደቡብ ምስራቃዊ ፔሩ በፑኖ ከተማ በካናዳ ዜጎች ባለቤትነት የተያዘውን የማእድን ማውጫ ፕሮጀክት በመቃወሞ የአገሬው ተወላጆች ተቃውሞ አደረጉ።
data.orm: Mormitoonni jiraattota bakka sanaa durii magaalaa Puunoo kibba lixa Peeruu walakkaa tahu fudhachuun, pirojektiin albuuda baasuu Kanaadaa akka dhaabbatu gaafatan.

data.eng: The Dallas Mavericks beat the Miami Heat 95-93 in the second game of the 2011 NBA Finals to tie the series.

data.eng: Cheaper new meningitis vaccinations reduce cases in Africa, with Burkina Faso, Mali and Niger recording the lowest number of cases.

data.amh: አዲስ እና በዋጋቸው ርካሽ የሆነ የማጅራት ገትር በሽታ ክትባት በአፍሪካ ያለውን የበሽተኞች ቁጥር እንዲቀንስ እንደውም በ ቡርኪና ፋሶ፣ በማሊ እና በኒጀር በከፍተኛ መልኩ እንዲወርድ አደረገ።
data.orm: Talaallii haaraan dhibee morma qoorsaa gatiin salphaa ta'e biyyoota Afiriikaa keessatti baayyina namoota qabamanii yeroo hir'isu biyyoota akka Burkiinaa Faasoo, Maalii fi Niijeer keessatti ammo lakkofsa dhibamtoota dhukkuba kana isa gadi aanaa galmaa'eera.
data.som: Tallaallada meningitis ee cusub oo ka raqiisan ayaa yareey kiisaska Afrika, iyadoo Burkina Faso, Mali iyo Niger ay soo sheegeen tirada ugu yar ee bukaanka.

data.eng: Israeli Prime Minister Binyamin Netanyahu says that Israel is "fully entitled to work against" attempts by the Gaza-bound "provocation flotilla" to smuggle arms into the Hamas-controlled Gaza Strip.
data.aaf: Israilik Naharsi Malak Binyamin Tanyaho Israil Gaza tintiribixek “Uguusa flotilla” Qeebi Aslica Camas Lowsisih Gubat hak Gaza Lulusoonuh Gibatul “Inkih Taamitanih Gaarle Iyeh” Iyan.
data.amh: የእስራኤሉ ጠቅላይ ሚኒስቴር ቤንጃሚን ኔታንያሆ እስራኤል ሙሉ ለሙሉ በጋዛ አካባቢ ስላሉ እና ወደ ሃማስ ወደሚገኝባቸው የጋዛ ሰርጥ የሚደረጉ የህገወጥ የጦር መሳሪያ ዝውውሮች የመቆጣጠር ስልጣን እና ሃላፊነት አላት ሲሉ ተናገሩ።
data.orm: Muummichi Ministeeraa Isiraa'el Biniyaamin Naatinaahuu, Isiraa'el yaalii "bidiruu qocolloo" Gaazaa deemu kan meeshaa waraanaa gara Haamaas isa Istiriippii Gaazaa to'atee jiruutti dhoksaan geessuu "guutummaatti irratti hojjechuuf mirga qabdi" jedhe.
data.som: Ra’iisel wasaaraha Israa’iil Benjamin Netanyahu ayaa sheegay in Israa’iil “ay xaq buuxa u leedahay inay ka hor timaaddo” isku dayo ay wadaan falastiiniyiinta daandaansiga ku haya Gaza si ay hubka u geliyaan marinka Gaza ee ay maamusho Xamaas.
data.tir: ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር እስራኤል ቢንያሚን ናታንያሁ እስራኤል ነቲ ወሽመጥ ቓዛ እትእሰር "ናይ ናዕቢ ፍሎቲላ" ኣጽዋር ናብታ ሓማስ እትቆጻጸራ ሃገር ቓዛ ብኮንትሮባንድ ንምእታው ዝገበረቶ ፈተነ ንምቅዋም "ምሉእ ብምሉእ መሰል" ከም ዘለዋ ገለጸ።

data.eng: The Chosunilbo newspaper in South Korea reports that Kim Pyong-il, the half-brother of current North Korean leader Kim Jong-il, is under house arrest in Pyongyang.
data.aaf: To Wakti Kiblati Qaxih Kuriyah Saqal Kim Jong-il Qaxi Saqal Kim Pyong-il, Pyongyan Casbih Buxa Geytimam Gabi Qaxih Kuriyal Geytimta Chosunilbo Xaagi Waraak Tiysixige.
data.amh: የደቡብ ኮሪያው ቾሱኒለቦ ጋዜጣ እንዳስነበበው ኪም ፕዮንግ ኢል የተባለው የአሁኑ የ ሰሜን ኮርያ ወንድም በቤት ውስጥ እስራት እንደሚገኝ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: akka barruun Choosiilboo kan kooriyaa kibbaa keessatti argamu gabaasetti Kim Piyoong Iil obboleessa gartokkee geggeessaa Kooriyaa Kaabaa yeroo ammaa kim Juung Iil kan ta'e yeroo ammaa PiyoonYaangkeessatti hidhaa mana keessaa jala jira jedhame.
data.som: Wargeyska Chosunilbo ee ka soo baxa Kuuriyada Koonfureed ayaa qoray in Kim Pyong-il oo ay hal dhinac walaalo ka yihiin hoggaamiyaha hada ee Kuuriyada Waqooyi Kim Jong-il uu maxbuus guri ku yaha Pyongyang.
data.tir: ብሓደ ገፁ ሓዉ ንመራሒ ሰሜን ኮሪያ ኪም ጆነግ ኢል ዝኾነ ኪም ፕዮንግ ኢል ኣብ ፕዮንግያንግ ቅውም እሱር ኮይኑ ከምዘሎ ጋዜጣ ደቡብ ኮሪያ ቾሱኒይቦ ፀብፂቡ ።

data.eng: Northern Province of Sri Lanka, severely affected by the civil war, is opened to foreigners and journalists who hold passports.
data.aaf: Inkih Tan Ruusayak kibilati Kawkasal Qagaqagitak Fenji Qanxixiya kee Ugurat Fayale Miraacini Edde anuk Inki Fayale Amini Ahfafih Saqolti Edde anuk Afara Num qideenih.
data.amh: በእርሰ በእርስ ጦርነት የተጎዳው የስሪላንካ ሰሜናዊ ክፍል ለውጪ ዜጎች እና ለጋዜጠኞች ክፍት ተደረገ።

data.som: Gobolka Woqooyiga Sri Lanka, oo ay saamayn xooggan ku yeelatay dagaalladii sokeeye, ayaa loo fasaxay ajaanibta iyo suxufiyiinta haysta baasaboorada.

data.eng: Christine Lagarde officially starts as managing director of the International Monetary Fund (IMF).
data.aaf: Kirisitiyan lagaridi Baadak Maliyah Egla/BME/ Taamah Cobaahise Akuk Taama Qimbise.
data.amh: ክሪስቲን ላጋርዴ በይፋ የአለም አቀፍ የገንዘብ ድርጅትን(IMF) በስራ አስኪያጅነት መምራት ጀመሩ።
data.orm: Kiristiin Laagaard ifaan hojii geggeessituu olaantuu Fandii Dhaabbata Maallaqa Addunyaa (IMF) tahuun hojii eegalte.
data.som: Christine Lagarde ayaa si rasmi ah u bilawday shaqada maamulka guud ee Shirkada Lacagaha Adduunka (IMF).
data.tir: ክሪስቲን ለጋርድ ዋና ዳይሬክተር ትካል ገንዘብ ዓለም ብምዃን ስርሐን ብዕሊ ጀሚረን።

data.eng: The Space Shuttle Atlantis lifts off for the final mission of the US Space Shuttle program.
data.aaf: Esperanzak Ugutak Antartikah Addal Fayale Liqna 18.3 °C (64.9 Xigerr Faranayit ) Maddem Galimarok Baadak Mitrolojih Egla Qadose.
data.amh: የጠፈር ማመላለሻዋ አትላንቲስ የመጨረሻ ተልእኮዋን ለማድግ ከአሜሪካ የጠፈር ማመላለሻ ተkም እንቅስቃሴ ጀመረች።

data.som: Dayax gacmeedka Space Atlantis ayaa u kacay hawshii ugu dambaysay ee barnaamijka Shuttle Space ka Maraykanka.
data.tir: መንኰርኰር ጠፈር ኣትላንቴስ ናብ መደብ መንኰርኰር ጠፈር ኣመሪካ ናይ መወዳእታ ዕማም ንምፍጻም ተወንጪፋ ኣላ።

data.eng: Two studies show that antiretroviral drugs taken to treat AIDS can also be used to prevent infection with HIV.
data.aaf: Adis Daylisenuh beyan HIV ADIS V sadu tan dawatooti HIV ADIS V kah antiribixe wan inah kalalonuh Namma kusaq Yascase
data.amh: ሁለት ጥናቶች እንደሚያመለክቱት ለፀረ ኤችአይቪ(HIV) የሚወሰዱ መዳኒቶች ኤድስ( AIDS) በሽታን ለማከም እና ለቅድመ መከላከል እንደሚረዱ አሳዩ።
data.orm: Qorannoowwan lama qorichoonni antiiretirovaayiraal kan AIDS yaaluuf kennaman dhibee HIV'n dhufu ittisuuf fayyaduu akka danda'anis agarsiisan.
data.som: Laba daraasadood ayaa muujinaya in daawooyinka antiretroviral -ka ee loo qaato daaweynta AIDS -ka loo isticmaali karo ka hortagga caabuqa HIV.
data.tir: ንሕማም ኤይድስ ተባሂሎም ዝውሰዱ መድሓኒታት ፀረ-ቫይረስ ኣብኡ እንተለዉ ንረኽሲ ኤች ኣይ ቪ ንምክልኻል ከምዝጠቕሙ ክልተ መፅናዕቲታት ኣመልኪቶም።

data.eng: Former News International Chief Executive Rebekah Brooks is arrested by police investigating phone hacking and corruption at the organisation.
data.aaf: Duumahih Baad Caddoh Xaagih Saqal Rebekah Brooks Ta Eglah Addat Silki Garqinu kee Umadooba Kusaqisak Boliis Ka Tibixe.
data.amh: የቀድሞ የኒውስ ኢንተርናሽናል ዋና ስራ አስፈፃሚ የሆነችው ሬቤካህ ብሩክስ በድርጅቱ ላይ ባለ የሙስና እና የስልክ ጠለፋ በሚመረምር ፖሊስ በቁጥጥር ስር ዋለች።
data.orm: Hojii rawwachiistuun sagantaa Oduu idl addunyaa duraanii Riibqaan Buruk yakkoota bilbila hidhuu fi malaammaltummaa dhaabbaticha keessattti raawwatte jedhamee shakkamuun qoratamuuf Poolisiidhaan qabamte jirti.
data.som: Rebekah Brooks oo ahayd madaxii hore ee wargayska News International ayaa waxaa xidhay booliska oo baaraya jabsiga taleefanka iyo musuqmaasuqa shirkada.
data.tir: ፈጻሚት ኣካያዲት ስራሕ ኩባንያ ንዩዝ ኢንተርናሽናል ነበር ረቤካ ብሮክስ ኣብ ውሽጢ እታ ኩባንያ ዝተኸሰተ ብልሽውናን ናይ ቴሌፎን መጥቃዕትን ንምምርማር ብፖሊስ ኣብ ትሕቲ ቀይዲ ኣቲያ።

data.eng: The Japan women's national football team returns home to be greeted by thousands of fans after winning the 2011 FIFA Women's World Cup.
data.aaf: Xalasak mavreviche sitalakleh yaysibixonuh 2011 NBa Ilacabol Nammayhato digiril mayamiih liqanal 95-93 yeyse.
data.amh: የጃፓን የሴቶች የእግር ኳስ ብሄራዊ ቡድን የ2011 የፊፋ የሴቶች አለም አሸንፎ ወደ ጃፓን ሲመለስ በሺዎች በሚቆጠሩ ደጋፊዎች አቀባበል ተደረገለት።
data.orm: gareen taphattoota kubba miilaa biyyalessa Jaappaan dorgommii Geepha dubartoota addunyaa FIFA 2011 mo'atee biyyatti yeroo deebi'u dinkisiifattoota kumaatamaan simatame.
data.som: Xulka kubadda cagta dfumarka Japan ayaa ku soo laabtay dalka si ay u soo dhaweeyaan kumanaan taageerayaal ah kaddib markii ay ku guuleysteen Koobkii Adduunka ee dumarka ee 2011.
data.tir: ሃገራዊት ጋንታ ክዑሶ እግሪ ጃፓን ደቂ ኣንስትዮ ድሕሪ እቲ ኣብ 2011 ዝተኻየድ ውድድር ዋንጫ ዓለም ደቂ ኣንስትዮ ዝረኸበቶ ዓወት ብኣሽሓት ተቐበልቲ ደገፍቲ ናብ ሃገራ ተመሊሳ።

data.eng: A tropical storm watch is issued for Tropical Storm Don in the US state of Texas between Port Mansfield north to San Luis Pass. ,

data.amh: በዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ቴክሳስ ግዛት ከፖርት ማንስፊልድ ከሰሜን እስከ ሳን ሉዊስ ማለፊያ ድረስ ለሞቃታ አውሎ ነፋስ ዶን ተቆጣጣሪ ተመደበ።

data.som: digtoonaan duufaan kulul ayaa loogu talagalay Tropical Storm Don ee gobolka Texas ee Mareykanka inta u dhaxaysa Port Mansfield waqooyi ilaa San Luis Pass.
data.tir: ኣብ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ኣብ ግዝኣት ቴክሳስ ኣብ መንጐ ወደብ ማንስፊልድ ንሰሜን ክሳብ መታሓላለፊ ሳን ሉዊስ ንምምፃእ ዶን ዝተብሃለ ማዕበል ትሮፒካል ኣመልኪቱ መጠንቐቕታ ማዕበል ትሮፒካል ተዋሂቡ።

data.eng: At least 57 people are dead and 12 are confirmed missing in the Seoul and Siheung region of South Korea due to landslides caused by heavy rain.
data.aaf: Nabah yan robti Sababah baaxoh Qanxix Gabi kuuriyal seuyul kee sihengi rakaakayal 57 numrabem kee 12 num defumte.
data.amh: በከባድ ዝናብ ምክንያት በተፈጠረው የመሬት መንሸራተት አደጋ በደቡብ ኮሪያ ሶል እና ሲየንግ ክልል ውስጥ ቢያንስ ሃምሳ ሰባት ሰዎች መሞታቸው እንዲሁም አስራ ሁለት ሰዎች ያሉበት እንደማይታወቅ ተረጋግጧል።
data.orm: Kibba Kooriyaa naannawaa see'ol fi sihong keessatti sababa rooba hamaatiin sigiga lafaa mudateen yoo xiqqaate namoonni 57 yoo du'an namoonni 12 ammoo achibuuteen isaanii dhabamuun mirkana'e.
data.som: Ugu yaraan 57 qof ayaa ku dhintay halka 12 kalana lagu la'yahay gobolka Seoul iyo Siheung ee Kuuriyada Koonfureed sababo la xiriira dhul go' ka dhashay roobab xooggan.

data.eng: The United States Senate passes legislation to raise the debt ceiling in order to avert the 2011 US debt ceiling crisis and President Barack Obama signs it into law.

data.amh: የቺሊ አየር ኃይል አውሮፕላን በሮቢንሰን ክሩሶ ደሴት አቅራቢያ የተጋጨ ሲሆን አራት አስከሬኖችም ከውቅያኖሱ ውስጥ ተገኝተዋል።
data.orm: Xiyyaarri Humna Qilleensaa Chiilii naannoo Odola Roobinsan Kiruusoo tti gaafa Jimaataa erga kufee booda reeffi afur garba keessaa argame.
data.som: Afar mayd ayaa laga soo saaray badda kadib markii diyaarad ay leeyihiin ciidamada cirka ee Chile ay ku burburtay meel u dhow jasiiradda Robinson Crusoe Jimcihii.
data.tir: ኣብ ጥቓ ሮቢንስን ክሮሶ ደሴት ዝተላተመት ነፋሪት ሓይሊ ኣየር ቺሊ ስዒቡ ኣስክሬን ኣርባዕተ ሰባት ኣብ ውቕያኖስ ተረኺቡ።

data.eng: The Swiss National Bank introduces a minimum exchange rate of 1.20 CHF/EUR to prevent the overvaluation of the Swiss franc.
data.aaf: Siwis Firanki Caddok Muxutak Liimo kah Kalallanah SiwisikAggat Banki Adda 1.20 Chif/Iro/ KinimDafeesa.
data.amh: የስዊስ ፍራንክ ከመጠን በላይ ዋጋ እንዳይጨምር በሚል የስዊስ ባንክ 1.20 የሰዊስ ፍራንከ በ አንድ ዩሮ እንዲዘረዘር ሲል አዲስ የምንዛሬ ተመን አወጣ።
data.orm: Baankiin Biyyaalessaa Iswiis hamma malee tilmaamamuu firaankii Iswiis hambisuuf gatii sharafaa gadaanaa 1.20 CHF/EUR akka ta'u beeksise
data.som: Bangiga Qaranka Swiss wuxuu soo bandhigay heerka sarrifka ugu hooseysa ee 1.20 CHF/EUR si looga hortago in qiimayn lagu sameeyo franc Swiss ka.
data.tir: ሃገራዊ ባንኪ ስዊዝ ፈረንካ ስዊዝ ልዕሊ መጠን ነከይኸብር ሽርፊ ፈረንካ ንዩሮ ካብ 1.20 ከይወርድ መምርሒ ኣውፂኡ።

data.eng: Over 5,000 people have reportedly been infected by an outbreak of dengue fever in Pakistan.
data.aaf: Bakistaanal Garciik Ugute Dagar Laqanat Illa 5 Alfi Yakke Mari Edde Yintiribixe Iyan.
data.amh: የዴንጊ ትኩሳት ወረርሽኝ በተከሰተበት በፓኪስታን ከ 5 ሺህ በላይ ሰዎች ተይዘዋል ተብሏል።
data.orm: Namoonni 5,000 caalan weerara dhaqna gubaa denguu Paakistaan keessaan akka hubaman gabaasame.
data.som: Wadanka Pakistan, In ka badan 5,000 oo qof ayaa la sheegay in uu ku dhacay cudurka qandhada dengue.
data.tir: ኣብ ፓኪስታን ልዕሊ 5000 ሰባት ብለበዳ ዴንጊ ረስኒ ከምዝተለኸፉ ተፀብፂቡ።

data.eng: Robert Zoellick, the President of the World Bank, claims that the world economy has entered the "danger zone", with the United States, European Union and Japan having to make tough decisions.
data.aaf: Baad bankih berezixanti Roberti zolike፣ Baad Maduur Illa “ Qawalylla Gaysa” fanah culte Axcuk Amerika፣ Aworobah inkino kee Jaban Qisla maqatooti beyanam faximta.
data.amh: ሮበርት ዞሊክ፣ የዓለም ባንክ ፕሬዝዳንት የዓለም ኢኮኖሚ ወደ “አደጋ ቀጠና” በመግባቱ ምክንያት አሜሪካ ፣ የአውሮፓ ህብረት እና ጃፓን ከባድ ውሳኔዎችን ማድረግ እንዳለባቸው ገልፀዋል ።
data.orm: Roobert Zoolikk, Pirasdaantii Baankii Addunyaa, Yunaayitid Isteetis, Gamtaan Awurooppaa fi Jaappaan murtiilee jajjaboo dabarsuu isaaniitiin diinagdeen addunyaa "zoonii balaa" akka seene dubbate.
data.som: Robert Zoellick, oo ah Madaxweynaha Bangiga Adduunka, ayaa ku sheegaya in dhaqaalaha adduunku uu kujiro “meel halis ah”, iyadoo Maraykanka, Midowga Yurubta iyo Japan ay tahay inay qaataan go’aanno adadag.
data.tir: ፕረዚደንት ዓለማዊ ባንክ ሮበርት ዞሊክ ቍጠባ ዓለም ናብ "ሓደገኛ ኩነት" ከም ዝኣተወ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካን ኤውሮጳዊ ሕብረትን ጃፓንን ከኣ ከቢድ ውሳነታት ክገብራ ከም ዘለወን ገሊጹ።

data.eng: Tanzanian authorities charge four people with negligence in relation to the Zanzibar ferry sinking that cost at least 240 lives on September 10.
data.aaf: Tanzaanih Doolat Kaxa-Garabluk 10 wali 240 marite Mano kak baytemik Zanzibar Huuri Amunxuqiyalih Gabale Afra num ken Mekliselon.
data.amh: የታንዛኒያ ባለሥልጣናት በመስከረም 10 ቢያንስ የ 240 ሰዎችን ሕይወት ከቀጠፈው የዛንዚባር ጀልባ መስመጥ ጋር በተያያዘ አራት ሰዎች ላይ የቸልተኝነት ክስ መስርተዋል።
data.orm: Aangawoonnii Taanzaaniyaa balaa dhidhima doonii Zaanzibaar ji'a fulbaanaa gaafa guyyaa 10 mudatee,yoo xiqqaate lubbuu namootaa 240 galaafateen walqabatee miiraa maalnadhibdeen himatan afur adabe.
data.som: Mas'uuliyiinta Tansaaniya ayaa afar qof ku eedeynaya dayacaad la xidhiidha doonti dagtay Zanzibar ee ay 240 qof kugeeriyoodeen 10kii Sebtember.
data.tir: ሰበ ስልጣን ታንዛንያ ኣብ ዛንዚባር ኣብ ዝሓለፈ 10 መስከረም ብኣ.ፈ. ብውሕዱ ንሞት 240 ሰባት ምኽንያት ምስ ዝኾነ ሓደጋ ምጥሓል መርከብ ተኣሳሲሩ ንኣርባዕተ ሰባት ብሸለልትነት ከሲሶም።

data.eng: Voters in the German capital of Berlin go to the polls for a state election, with current mayor Klaus Wowereit and his Social Democrats doing well.
data.aaf: USAik setetik Ciggila Beezixanti Mike Pence Berezexentini Doorok 73 Ayrok Lakal Tamaateh Tan Ciggilta Berezixenti Kamal Haris Unkaq Rufateenim.
data.amh: የጀርመኗ ዋና ከተማ በርሊን መራጮች ያሁኑ ከንቲባ ክላውስ ዎወሬይትና ፓርቲአቸው ሶሻል ዲሞክራቶች ጥሩ ደረጃ ላይ በሚገኙበት ሁኔታ ወደ ምርጫ ጣቢያዎች እየሄዱ በመምረጥ ላይ ይገኛሉ።
data.orm: Filattoonni magaalaa guddoo Jermanii Berliin kessatti argaman filannoo motummaa geggessuuf gara buufatalee filannoo deemaa jiru,hanga ammaatti kantiibaan yeroo amma Kilaawus Waawureeyt fi Sooshaal Dimokiraatonni bu'aa gaarii argataniiru .
data.som: Codbixiyeyaasha caasimadda Jarmalka ee Berlin ayaa u dareeraya codbixinta doorashada gobolka, iyadoo duqa hadda ee Klaus Wowereit iyo xisbigiisa Socialdemokraterna ay meel wanaagsan marayaan.
data.tir: ኣብ ጀርመን ዋና ከተማ በርሊን ዝካየድ ምርጫታት ኣውራጃ ኣድመጽቲ ናብ መደበራት ምርጫ ይውሕዙ ኣብ ዘለዉሉ እዋን፣ ሕጂ ዘሎ ከንቲባ ክላውስ ፎይሬት ምስ ዲሞክራስያዊ ማሕበራዊ ሰልፊ ኮይኖም ጽቡቕ ይሰርሑ ኣለዉ።

data.eng: The Anniston Chemical Activity destroys its last mustard gas shells, becoming the fifth of nine US chemical weapons depots to close under terms of the Chemical Weapons Treaty.
data.aaf: Anisten kemikal Angagoya Ilacaboh Gaziiteh Bayisele፣ Kemikalak Qeebi Silacite Sitigey Laku Alfinte Sagla Ameerikak emikal Qeebih Salacooxih Magazin Konoyhaytu yekke.
data.amh: የአኒስተን ኬሚካል እንቅስቃሴ የመጨረሻውን የመስተርድ ጋዝ የጥይት ፈንጂዎችን ማስወገድ በኬሚካል የጦር መሣሪያ ስምምነት መሠረት ከተዘጉ ከዘጠኝ የአሜሪካ የኬሚካል የጦር መሣሪያ መጋዘኖች አምስተኛው ሆኗል።
data.orm: Sochiin Keemikaalaa Aanisten haguugduu gaazii mastardii isa dhumaa barbadeessuun, kuusaa meeshaalee waraanaa US sagal keessaa isa shanaffaa seera Waliigaltee Meeshaalee Waraanaa Keemikaalaa jalatti cufame ta'e.
data.som: shirkada Waxqabadka Kiimikada ee Anniston ayaa burburisay madaafiicdii ugu dambaysay ee gaaska mustard, taas oo ka dhigaysa goobta shanaad ee kamidka ah sagaalka goobod ee hubka kiimikada lagu kaydiyo Mareykanka dhexdiisa oo la xiray, iyado la raacayo Heshiiskii Hubka Kiimikada.,
data.tir: ሓዳሽ ፕሬዚደንት ኪይርግይዝስታን ኮይነን ዝተመረፃ ኣልማዝቤክ ኣታምባዬቭ እቲ ንኣሜሪካ ኣብ ማናስ መዋፈሪ ሓይሊ ኣየር ብኽራይ ዝሃበ ውዕል ብ2014 ዓ.ም.ፈ. ምሰብቀዐ ከምዘይሕደሽ ገሊፀን።

data.eng: Former television journalist Shelly Yachimovich is elected as the head of the Israeli Labor Party.
data.aaf: Dumah badal TaybuliXaagi Qawyati Sheley Yachimovich Israilik Taama-abenit Misoynah miracise Akukdoorime.
data.amh: የቀድሞ የቴሌቪዥን ጋዜጠኛ የነበረችው ሼሊ ያቺሞቪች የእስራኤል ሰራተኞች ፓርቲ መሪ በመሆን ተመረጠች።
data.orm: Gaazexeessaan televiijinii duraanii Sheelii Yaachimoovich akka dursaa Jaarmiyaa Labarii Isiraa'elitti filataman.
data.som: Weriyihii hore ee telefishanka Shelly Yachimovich ayaa loo doortay inay noqoto madaxa xisbiga shaqaalaha ee Israa’iil.
data.tir: ጋዜጠኛ ቴሌቪዥን ነበር ሼሊይ ያቺሞቪች መራሒ ሌበር ፓርቲ እስራኤል ክኾኑ ተመሪፆም።

data.eng: Oswald Grübel, chief executive of Swiss bank UBS, resigns in the wake of a rogue trading scandal.
data.aaf: Siwis Bankil Ubias Lewanak Taamasela Makaado Oswaldu Gerubil Makoh Kabxah Anewaynu Sababah Miraacinuk Cabe.
data.amh: የስዊስ ባንክ የስራ አስፈፃሚ የሆኑት ኦስዋል ግሩቤል ከተጭበረበረ ግብይት ጋር በተያያዘ በገቡበት ቅሌት ከስራቸው ለቀቁ።
data.orm: Oswald Grübel, hojii gegeessaa olaanaan baankii Iswiis UBS, sababa daldala seeraan alaa hojiisaa gadhiise.
data.som: Oswald Grübel, oo ah madaxa fulinta ee bangiga Switzerland ee UBS, ayaa iscasilay kadib markii lagu eedeyey fadeexad ganacsi xumo.
data.tir: ዋና ፈፃሚ ስራሕ ዩ ቢ ኤስ ዝተብሃለ ባንኪ ስዊዘርላንድ ኦስዋልድ ግሩበል ንቲ ኣጋጢሙ ዘሎ ገበን ንግዲ ስዒቡ ብፍቓዱ ስልጣኑ ለቒቑ።

data.eng: A US court sentences two more Somali pirates to life in prison for capturing a yacht off the coast of Africa in February.
data.aaf: Ameerikah Sangarah Cokmih buxa Caxah Alsat Afrikah badal Huuri Yibixenimih namma osotinah Somaliya shiftal Qumri Casbi keenil madaqen.
data.amh: በየካቲት ወር ከአፍሪካ የባሕር ዳርቻ ጀልባን በመጥለፋቸው ሁለት ተጨማሪ የሶማሊያ ወንበዴዎችን የአሜሪካ ፍርድ ቤት በእድሜ ልክ እስራት ቀጣ።
data.orm: Manni murtii Ameerikaa hattoota galaanarraa lammii soomaliyaa ta'an kan buufata galaanaa irraa doonii ugguruun himatan lamaan hidhaa umurii guutuun adabe.
data.som: Maxkamad ku taalla dalka Mareykanka ayaa xabsi daa’in ku xukuntay labo kale oo burcad badeed Soomaali ah oo lagu helay inay dooni ku qabsadeen xeebaha Afrika bishii February.
data.tir: ሓደ ቤት ፍርዲ ዩ ኤስ ኣብ ጥቓ ገማግም ኣፍሪካ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ጥቅምቲ ንሓንቲ ንእሽተይ መርከብ ጨውዮም ንዝበሎም ክልተ ተወሰኽቲ ሶማሊያውያን ጨወይቲ መርከብ ዕድመ ይፍታሕ ፈሪዱዎም።

data.eng: At least 25 people are killed and many more injured after protesters and security forces clash in the Egyptian capital of Cairo, during a protest in response to an attack on a Coptic church.
data.aaf: Masri Qasima Kayroh Addal Kobtik Kanisal Tekkeh tan Maysatak Raddi Yacenuh Tewqeh tan Sadi Soolo Widir Saduuaba kee say Caylite Boodenik Lakal Wali 25 Mari Rabeeh, Mongo Mari Mudumeh.
data.amh: በግብፅ ዋና ከተማ ካይሮ ውስጥ በኮፕቲክ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ላይ ለተፈጸመው ጥቃት ምላሽ ለመስጠት በተቃውሞ ሰልፍ ወቅት በተቃዋሚዎች እና የፀጥታ ኃይሎች መካከል በተፈጠረው ግጭት ምክንያት ቢያንስ ሀያ አምስት ሰዎች ተገድለዋል ብዙዎችም ቆስለዋል።
data.orm: Magaalaa guddoo Gibxii Kaayiroo keessatti haleellaa waldaa kiristaanaa Koptic mormuun deebii kenname irratti, walitti bu'iinsa namoota hiriira bahanii fi humnoota nageenyaa gidduutti uumameen, yoo xiqqaate namoonni 25 du'anii akkasumas kan baayyee caalan ammoo miidhaman.
data.som: Ugu yaraan 25 qof ayaa ku dhimatay tiro intaas ka badanna way ku dhaawacmeen kadib markii dibad -baxayaal iyo ciidamada ammaan sugida ay isku dhaceen caasimadda Masar ee Qaahira, intii uu socday mudaaharaad looga jawaabayay weerar lagu qaaday kaniisad.
data.tir: ነቲ ኣብ ኮፕቲክ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ዝበፅሐ መጥቃዕቲ ስዒቡ ኣብ ርእሰ ከተማ ግብፂ ኣብ ካይሮ ኣብዝት ኻየደ ዓመፅ ኣብመንጐ ተቓወምቲን ሓይሊታት ፀጥታን ግጭት ብምፍጣሩ ብውሑድ 25 ሰባት ተቐቲሎምን ተወሳኺ ብዙሓት ቖሲሎምን ።

data.eng: A measure to support expansion of the eurozone bailout fund is halted due to its failure to pass in the Parliament of Slovakia.
data.aaf: Silovakiyah Barlamah Addal Tabam Duduwemih Uroh Rasu Catiyi fenxi Barimuh Qokol Takke Maqtoti Soliseh.
data.amh: በስሎቫኪያ ፓርላማ መፅደቅ ባለመቻሉ የዩሮ ዞን የማገገሚያ ፈንድ መስፋፋትን የሚደግፍ እርምጃ ቆሟል።
data.orm: Tarkaanfiin babal'isuu deggersa maallaqaa daldaloota dadhabaniif kennuu iyuroozoonii Paarlaamaa Siloovakiyaa keessatti darbuu waan dadhabeef adda cite.
data.som: Waxaa lajoojiyay talaabo garab lagusiinayay balaadhinta misaniyada samafalka ee eurozone iyado baarlamaanka Slovakia in laiskula qaadan waayay.
data.tir: ዩሮዞን ማዕከን ረድኤት ገንዘብ ንምስፋሕ እተገብረ ስጕምቲ ኣብ ባይቶ ስሎቫክያ ብዘይምሕላፉ ደው በለ/ኢሉ።

data.eng: The Netherlands becomes the first European country to win a professional world baseball championship since 1938, after defeating Cuba 2-1 in the 2011 Baseball World Cup final in Panama City, Panama.
data.aaf: Namalanidu banama siti 2010 bezbool Baad kas ilacaboh kuubak 2 kee 1 Aysuk 1938 wadirih Mihratli Baadak bezbool Shambiyonah yayse Akuk Qimboh Awrobah baaxo tekke.
data.amh: ኔዘርላንድ በ ፓናማ ሲቲ ፓናማ በ 2011 የቤዝቦል የዓለም ዋንጫ ፍጻሜ ኩባን 2-1 በማሸነፍ ከ 1938 ጀምሮ በፕሮፌሽናል የዓለም ቤዝቦል ሻምፒዮና አሸናፊ የሆነች የመጀመሪያዋ የአውሮፓ አገር ሆናለች።
data.orm: Neezerlaand erga Geeba Beezboolii Addunyaa isa xumuraa Paanamaa siitii, Paanaamaatti Kiyuubaa 2-1'n injifattee booda shaampiyoonii ogummaa beezbolii addunyaa mo'achuun erga bara 1938 biyya Awurooppaa jalqabaa taate.
data.som: Netherlands ayaa noqotay dalkii ugu horreeyay Yurub ee ku guuleysta horyaalnimada kubbadda baseballka adduunka tan iyo 1938, ka dib markii ay 2-1 kaga badiyeen kuba ciyaarta gunaanadka Koobka Adduunka Baseballka 2011 ee Panama sity, Panama.
data.tir: ኔዘርላንድስ ኣብ’ቲ ብ2011 ዓ.ም.ፈ ኣብ ሃገረ ፓናማ ኣብ ፓናማ ሲቲ ዝተኻየደ ናይ መወዳእታ ግጥም ቤዝቦል ዓለም ንኩባ 2 ን1 ስዒራ ፅዋዕ ብምዕታራ ካብ 1938 ዓ.ም.ፈ ንነዘ ኣብ ፕሮፌሽናል ግጥም ቤዝቦል ዓለም ዝተዓወተት ፈላመይቲ ኣውሮፓዊት ሃገር ኮይና።

data.eng: Egypt's ruling Supreme Council of the Armed Forces announces a law banning all forms of discrimination, in the wake of recent violence between Coptic protesters and security forces.
data.aaf: Xayik kobtike Saditeta kee Amni Dagarite fanal uguteh yan Xakak way Masri miracisak qaskar saqal Naharis malaakih Buxal Iniki qaynatih qadliino kalata gaanun Qadose.
data.amh: የግብፅ ጦር ሃይሎች ከፍተኛ ጠቅላይ ምክር ቤት በቅርቡ በተከሰተው በፀጥታው ሃይሎች እና በኮፕቲክ ተቃዋሚዎች ቀውስ ምክንያት ማንኛውንም አድሎን የሚከለክል አዲስ ህግ እንዳወጣ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Hookkara dhiyeenyaa momitoota Kooptikii fi humnoota nageenyaa gidduutti tahe booda, Manni Maree Olaanaa Humna Waraanaa Gibxii seera qoodinsa gosa kamiiyyuu dhorku dabarse.
data.som: Golaha Sare ee talada haya ee Masar ayaa ku dhawaaqay sharci mamnuucaya nooc kasta oo takoor ah, ka dib rabshadihii dhawaan dhex maray mudaharaadayaasha Coptic iyo ciidamada amniga.
data.tir: ኣብ ግብፂ ኣብ ሞንጎ ንተቓውሞ ዝወፁ ሰልፈኛታት ኣመንቲ ኮፕቲክ ክርስትናን ሓይልታት ፀጥታን ጎንፂ ድሕሪ ምኽሳቱ ገዛኢ እታ ሃገር ላዕለዋይ ጉባኤ ሓይልታት ስራዊት ንዝኾነ ይኹን ኣድልዎ ዝኽልክል ሕጊ ብዕሊ ኣዊጁ።

data.eng: Year-over-year GDP growth in the People's Republic of China slows to 9.1% for the third quarter of 2011, following government efforts to curb inflation.
data.aaf: Washingiton saqisoonuh Doolat Abeh Yan Macal Ugutak Chayina kee Ayyunti Riboblikih Addal Inki Ligidaak Dagga Murti Daddal Illa 9.1% Addah Iye.
data.amh: የቻይና መንግስት እየወሰደ ባለው የዋጋ ግሽበትን የማስተካከል እርምጃ ከአመት ወደ አመት የሚታየው የምጣኔ ሀበት እድገት ተቀዛቅዞ በ2011 ሦስተኛው ሩበ አመት ላይ 9.1% ደረሰ።
data.orm: Guddinni waggaadhaa gara waggaattii GDP Rippaabilika Ummataa Chaayinaa, qaala'iinsa jireenyaa hirdhisuuf tarkaanfii mootummaa hordofuun kurmaana sadaffaa bara 2011 tti gara 9.1% tti gadi bu'e.
data.som: Dadaalkii dawladda shiinaha ee xaga xakamaynta sicir-bararka kobaca wax-soo-saarka sanadlaha ah ee Jamhuuriyadda Dadka ee Shiinaha ayaa hoos u dhacay 9.1% rubuc-saddexaadkii 2011.
data.tir: መንግስቲ ሪፐብሊክ ቻይና ዝቕባበ ዋጋ ንምቁፅፃር ስጉምቲ ምውሳዱ ስዒቡ ሓፈሻዊ ፍርያት እታ ሃገር ንሰለስተ ተኸታተልቲ ርብዒ ዓመታት 2011 ናብ 9.1 ሚኢታዊ ወሪዱ።

data.eng: North Korea agrees, for the first time in 6 years, to let the United States search for the remains of American soldiers killed during the Korean War.
data.aaf: Kiblati Kuriya Qeeb Wakti Qidenih Yanin Us Qandeh Qeso US kah Mekeltanah Amrisuh 6 Sanatak Lakal Qimboh Addah Ogolteh.
data.amh: ሰሜን ኮሪያ አሜሪካ በኮሪያ ጦርነት ወቅት የሞቱባትን ወታደሮች ለመፈለግ ያቀረበችውን ጥያቄ በ 6 አመታት ውስጥ ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ ፈቀደች።
data.orm: Kooriyaan Kaabaa waggoota 6 keessatti yeroo jalqabaaf, Yuunaayitid Isteetis haftee reeffa waraana Ameerikaa kan yeroo Waraana Kooriyaa ajjeefaman akka barbaaddu waliigalte.
data.som: Kuuriyada Waqooyi ayaa u oggolaatay Maraykanka, markii ugu horraysay muddo 6 sano ah, in loo fasaxo raadinta maydadkii askarta Maraykanka ee lagu laayay dagaalkii Kuuriya.
data.tir: ሰሜን ኮርያ ንመጀመርያ ግዜ፣ ኣብ ውሽጢ 6 ዓመት፣ ነቶም ኣብ ግዜ ኲናት ኮርያ ዝተቐትሉ ወተሃደራት ኣመሪካ ሬሳታቶም ብሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ክድለ ኣፍቂዳ።

data.eng: 24-year-old Italian motorcycle racer Marco Simoncelli dies after crashing and being hit by two other riders at the Malaysian MotoGP, leading to the cancellation of the race. ,
data.aaf: Taniyal baxa 24 sanatat yanomotor saykilil Yakumi marik simoniseli maliziyah baxak motobibilkalah tannamma kalih qalalat boodem kee rebeemih Qalaylik kah dukumanah Sabab Yekke.
data.amh: የ 24 ዓመቱ ጣሊያናዊ የሞተር ሳይክል ተወዳዳሪ ማርኮ ሲሞንሴሊ በማሌዥያው ሞቶጂፒ ላይ ወድቆ በሁለት ሌሎች ተወዳዳሪዎች በመገጨቱ የሞተ ሲሆን ውድድሩም በዚህ ምክንያት ተሰርዟል።
data.orm: Dorgomaan dokdokkee lammii Xaaliyaanii ganna 24, Maarkoo Simonsellii MootooJiiPii Maleejiyaatti erga kufee dokdokkee ooftota lamaan rukutamee booda du'e, kunis gara dorgommicha haquutti geesse.
data.som: Marco Simoncelli oo ahaa 24 jir Talyaani ah oo ku tartamayay mootada ayaa geeriyooday ka dib markii uu shil galay oo ay jiidheen laba kale oo moto kulatartamayaya MotoGP ga Malaysia tartankeda in la joojiyo.
data.tir: ወዲ 24 ዓመት ዝኾነ ጣሊያናዊ ተቐዳዳሚ ሞተር ሳይክል ማርኮ ሲሞንሴሊ ኣብ ማሌዥያ ኣብ ዝካየድ ዝነበረ ቅድድም ሞተር ግራንድ ፕሪክስ ተላቲሙን ብኽልተ ካልኦት ሞተረኛታት ተወቒዑን ሞይቱ፤ ብሰንኪ እዚ ድማ እቲ ቅድድም ተቋሪፁ።

data.eng: The corpses of 53 pro-Muammar Gaddafi fighters are found in Sirte, all having apparently been summarily executed by NTC troops.
data.aaf: Islam Qarkakisah Buta bukucaram Kiblati Ayro mawqa Naygerik XamaturuhMagaalah Addan Wali 63 num Qideh Sitalakleh Bombi kee Giraari Maysataka Abeh Axcuk Yabte.
data.amh: በ ኤንቲሲ (NTC) የተገደሉ 53 የሙአመር ጋዳፊ ተዋጊዎች ሬሳ በስርጥ ተገኘ።
data.orm: Reeffi loltoota Mu'aammar Gaadaafii deggeran 53 sirteetti argameera, gabaabumatti walitti qabaan hunduu loltoota NTC'tin ajjeefaman
data.som: 53 dagaalyahan oo Muammar Gaddafi taageersanaa ayaa maydadkooda laga helay magaalada Sirte, dhammaantoodna sida muuqata waxaa si wadar ah u dilay ciidamada NTC.
data.tir: ኣሸባሪ እስላማዊ ጉጅለ ቦኮሓራም ዳማትሩ ተባሂላ ኣብትፅዋዕ ሴሜናዊት ምብራቕ ከተማ ናይጀሪያ ንዝተፈፀሙን ንሞት 63 ሰባት ምኽንያት ዝኾኑን ተኸታታሊ መጥቃዕትታት ቡምባን ተኹስን ሓላፍነት ወሲዱ።

data.eng: Hurricane Rina strengthens to Category 2 strength as it advances towards Cancun and other resorts on the Mexican Riviera.
data.aaf: Meksikok raviyura kee kankun illa kalah yan wacasir Arooca gexewak badi silaytu rina illa madabak 2 Maqar maqarosa.
data.amh: አውሎ ነፋስ ሪና ወደ ካንኩን እና ሌሎች የሜክሲኮ ሪቪዬራ የመዝናኛ ሥፍራዎች እየተጠጋ ሲሄድ ወደ በጣም አደገኛ አውሎ ነፋስ ይጠነክራል።
data.orm: Obomboleettiin Riinaa gara kankana fi Rizoortiwwaan Meksiikaan Riveera irratti argamanitti yeroo babal'atu sadarkaa lammaffatti ni guddata.
data.som: Duufaanta Rina ayaa ku sii xoogaysanaysa awoodda heerka 2aad taaso ku sii socota magalada Cancun iyo meelaha kale ee loo dalxiis tago ee Riviera Mexico.
data.tir: ኣብ ምዕራባዊ ገማግም ሜክሲኮ ናብ ዝርከባ ካንኩንን ካልኦት ከባብታትን ሜክሲካን ሪቬይራ ዝህንደድ ዘሎ ህቦብላ ማዕበል ሪና መጠን ሓደጋኡ ናብ ደረጃ ክልተ ልዕል ክብል ተገይሩ።

data.eng: In California, Oakland police disperse Occupy Oakland protesters, using tear gas and rubber bullets and making numerous arrests.
data.aaf: Kaliforniyay Addal, Oaklandah Boliis Alfi-Aba Weeqisa Qerta kee Goma Giraarit Antifiquk Mango Maxenit Abixuk Saditeeta Sitak Baxiseh.።
data.amh: በካሊፎርንያ ኦክላንደ በኦክላንድ የነበሩ ተቃዋዎችን የኦክላንድ ፖሊስ በአስለቃሽ ጭስ እና በጎማ ጥይቶች ተጥቅሞ የበተነ ሲሆን የተወሰኑ ሰወችንም በቁጥጥር ስር እንዳዋለ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Kaalifforniyaa keessatti Poolisoonni Ookilaand mormitoota bakka qabatan turan tamsaasuuf Gaasii imiimmanessaa fi Rasaasa Pilaastikaa fayyadamuun bittinneessan dabalataanis namoonni hedduun to'anna jala oolaniiru
data.som: Kaliforniya, boliska Oakland aya kala caydhiyay banaan baxayaasha Occaky Oakland, iyagoo adeegsanaya sunta dadka ka ilmaysiisa iyo rasaasta cinjirka ah waxayna qabteen dad tiro badan.
data.tir: ኣብ ካሊፎርንያ፣ ፖሊስ ኦክላንድ ኦክዩፓይ ኦክላንድ ዝተባህሉ ኣድመኛታት፣ ብኣንባዒ ጋዝን ፕላስቲካዊ ጠያይትን በቲኑ ንብዙሓት'ውን ኣሲሩ።

data.eng: Iranian actress Marzieh Vafamehr is released from jail after her sentence for acting in the banned film My Tehran for Sale is reduced.
data.aaf: Iranah Yabuke fanan Marih Vafamaihr Wasimeh yan Iyi tahran Limoh Mugaqisen Filmil Abtemih Digaala Yuyunukusenik Wadiril Casbik Tewqeh::
data.amh: ኢራናዊቷ ተዋናይ ማርዚህ ቫፋሜር በታገደው የእኔ ቴህራን ለሽያጭ በተሰኘው ፊልም ላይ በመተወኗ የተጣለባት እስር ቅጣት ከተቀነሰ በኋላ ከእስር ተለቀቀች።

data.som: Xabsiga ayaa laga siidaayay atariishada reer Iran Marzieh Vafamehr kadib markii laga yareeyay xukunkii ay ku mutashay xadhiga ee ahaa filimkii la mamnuucay ee My Tehran for Sale

data.eng: Almazbek Atambayev, the newly elected President of Kyrgyzstan, states that a lease for a United States air base in Manas will not be renewed when it expires in 2014.
data.aaf: Quba Addah Dorime kiregistan Berezexenti Almazibeke Atameyuve USik Qaranal Geytima Ameerikah Tayraa Booxa Kira 2014 Gabakalwak Mayasqusuba Iye.
data.amh: አዲስ የተመረጡት የኪርጊስታን ፕሬዝዳንት አልማዝቤክ አታምዬቭ በማናስ ለሚገኘው የአሜሪካ አየር ማረፊያ ኪራይ እ.ኤ.አ በ 2014 ዓ.ም ሲያልቅ እንደማይታደስ ገልጸዋል ።
data.orm: Almaazbeek Atambaayev, Pirasdaantiin Kaazaakistaan inni haaraan filatame, waliigalteen kiraa buufata humna qilleensaa Yunaayitid Isteetis yeroo bara 2014 keessa xumuramu irra deebiin akka hin haaromfamne ibse..
data.som: Almazbek Atambayev, oo dhawaan loo doortay Madaxweynaha Kyrgyzstan, ayaa sheegaya in heshiiska kirada saldhigga cirka Mareykanka ee Manas aan la cusbooneysiin doonin, heshiiskaas oo uu wakhtigiisu ku eegyahay 2014.
data.tir: ህዝባዊት ሪፐብሊክ ቻይና ንዝሓለፉ ሓሙሽተ መዓልታት ኣብ ሱዳን ተኣሲሮም ንዘለው 29 ዜጋታታ ክፍትሑ ኣብ ምግባር ደቡብ ሱዳን ክትሕግዛ ሓቲታ።

data.eng: The Islamist terrorist group Boko Haram claims responsibility for a series of bomb and gun attacks in the north-eastern Nigerian town of Damaturu that have killed at least 63 people.
data.aaf: Kiblati kiniyalk Soomaliyah Cuduuduk Xayikel tanih tan buun Buxaaxil Tekkeh tan Maysatak wali Namma num edde Rabe፣ Umkin Islam lashabab Gaadule Esserimtam Takkeh.
data.amh: በሰሜን ምስራቃዊ ናይጄሪያ በምትገኘው ዳማቱሩ ከተማ ለተደረጉ እና በትንሹ ለ63 ሰዎች ሞት ምክንያት ለሆኑ የቦምብ እና የመሰራያ ጥቃቶች ሃላፊኑን እስላማዊው አሸባሪ ቦኮ ሃራም እንደሚወስድ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Gareen shororkeessaa Bookoo Haaraam dhohinsa bombii fi haleellaa dhukaasaa walitti fufaa magaalaa kaaba-baha Naayijeeriyaatti argamtu Damaaturuutti ta'e, kan yoo xiqqaate namoota 63 ajjeessef itti gaafatamummaa fudhate.
data.som: Kooxda argagixisada ah ee Boko Xaraam ayaa sheegatay mas’uuliyadda weerarro isugu jira bam iyo qoryo oo ka dhacay magaalada Damaturu ee waqooyi-bari Nigeria halkaas oo ay ku dhinteen ugu yaraan 63 qof.

data.eng: Flooding in Thailand reaches the residence of the Prime Minister Yingluck Shinawatra in Bangkok, forcing her to withdraw from the Hawaii APEC summit to deal with the crisis.
data.aaf: Taylanxl weeqi abe culmal elegeytima bankok dddak Naharsi maalak Yingilutu Shinawara Buxa madak biyak asituruk haway APEC Kobox kacyewqenah gidese.
data.amh: በታይላንድ የጎርፍ መጥለቅለቅ ባንኮክ ውስጥ ወደሚገኘው የጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር ይንግላክ ሺናዋራ መኖሪያ መድረሱን አስመልክቶ ቀውሱን ለመፍታት በሃዋይ በተካደው የእስያ-ፓሲፊክ ኢኮኖሚያዊ ትብብር (ኤፒኢሲ) ጉባኤ ላይ እንዳይሳተፉ አስገድዷል።
data.orm: Balaa lolaa Taayilaand keessatti mudateen Baankook ganda mummee ministeera yiingluuk Shinawata qaqqabuu isaatiin balaa kana irraa dandamachuuf jecha dhuma Hawaa'ii Apek keessaa baa'uuf dirqaaman.
data.som: Daadad ku fatahay Thailand ayaa gaaray guriga Ra'iisul Wasaaraha Yingluck Shinawatra oo ku yaala Bangkok, taas oo ku qasabtay inay ka baaqato shirka APEC ee Hawaii si wax looga qabto dhibaatada.

data.eng: Former South African rugby union player Solly Tyibilika is shot dead in a bar in Cape Town.

data.tir: ኣብ ኣደራሽ ፌደረሽን ክዑሶ እግሪ ኤስያ ዝተኻየደ ጽምብል፣ ናይ ማኣከላይ መሰመር ተጻወታይ ኡዝበካዊ ሴርቨር ድጂፓሮቭ፣ ንመበል ካልኣይ ግዜ፣ ዝበለጽ ኤስያዊ ተጻወታይ ክዑሶ እግሪ ኮይኑ ተመሪጹ።

data.eng: India's government decides to relax rules concerning the operation of foreign-owned retailers such as Wal-Mart and Tesco within India.
data.aaf: Hindi Doolat wal-Mart kee Tesko kenah yan Yan Iro Baaxoh Gaddaloolak Tiyatiyah Kala HindiAddal Taamitaanamih Gaanun Yagileemil Faticise.
data.amh: የህንድ መንግስት በውጪ ዜጎች ባለቤትነት የተያዙ እና በችርቻሮ ንግድ ዘርፍ ላይ ለተሰማሩ እንደ ዎል-ማርት እና ቴስኮ ላሉ በሃገሪቱ ውስጥ ለተሰማሩ ድርጅቶች ህግ እና ደንቦቹን ለማላላት ወሰነ።
data.orm: Mootummaan Hindii sochii daldaloota namoota lammii biyya alaan dhuunfatamanii Hindii keessa jiran kanneen akka Wal-Maartii fi Teeskoon walqabatee akka seera fooyyessu murteesse.
data.som: Dowladda Hindiya ayaa go'amisay inay dejiso xeerarka khuseeya hawlgalka shirkadaha tafaariiqleyaasha ajnabiga ah sida Wal-Mart iyo Tesco dalka Hindiya gudiihisa.
data.tir: መንግስቲ ህንዲ ምንቅስቓስ ከም ዎል ማርትን ቴስኮን ኣብልዕሊ ዝኣመሰላ ናይ ወፃኢ ኩባንያታት ሸቐጥ ዝምልከቱ ሕግታቱ ንምልሕላሐ ወሲኑ።

data.eng: NBA team owners and players reach an agreement to end the 149-day NBA lockout and to begin the current NBA season on Christmas Day.
data.aaf: NBA Dokol leela kee Digir abeenit 149 Ayroora NBA Alifya solisanam kee Tawakih NBA wakti genah ayrot qimbisoonuh sitingey madeenih.
data.amh: የ ኤንቢኤ ቡድን ባለቤቶች እና ተጫዋቾች የ149 ቀናት ኤንቢኤ መቋለጥን ለማቆም እና የአሁኑን የኤንቢኤ ወቅትን በገና ቀን ለመጀመር ስምምነት ላይ ደርሰዋል።
data.orm: Abbootiin qabeenyaa fi taphattoonni garee NBA hamma waliigalteen godhamutti hojjetoonni akka hojii hin seenne dhowwuu guyyaa 149 dhaabuudhaan NBA tibbanaa guyyaa Ayyaana Qileetti akka eegalamu waliigaltee irra gahan.
data.som: Mulkiilayaasha kooxaha iyo ciyaartooyada NBA da ayaa kuheshiiyay in la soo afjaro 149 ka maalmood ee xirnaayeen ciyaaruha NBA da oo labilaabo Maalinta Kirismaska.
data.tir: ሰብ ዋናን ተፃወቲን ጋንታ ኤን.ቢ.ኤ ነቲ ን149 መዓልታት ዝፀንሐ ምቁራፅ ፀዋታ ኤን.ቢ.ኤ ዝፈትሕን ኣብ’ቲ ኣብ ዕለት ክሪስማስ ዝጅምር ሓዱሽ ግጥም ክሳተፍ ዝገብርን ስምምዕነት ገይሮም።

data.eng: David Cameron, the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, refuses to join a European Union financial crisis accord after negotiations in Brussels.
data.aaf: IgilizikNaharsiMalaak Xevix Kameron Birasiles Agaaradak Lakal Aeurobah Inkiino Maali Taqabih Sitingeyih Addat Cultuh Fayxi Kah Mali.
data.amh: የእንግሊዙ ጠቅላይ ሚኒስቴር ዴቪድ ካሜሩን በብራሰልስ በተደረገው ድርድር በአውሮፓ ህብረት ስለተከሰተው የፋይናንስ ቀውስ እንዲወያዩ የቀረበላቸውን ጥያቄ ውድቅ አደረጉ።
data.orm: Deevid Kaameruun, Muummichi Ministeeraa Yuunaayitid Kiingidem, mariilee Biruuzels keessatti ta'e booda seera waliigaltee jeeqama faayinaansii Gamtaa Awurooppaatti akka hin makamne dide.
data.som: Ra’iisel wasaaraha Ingiriiska David Cameron, ayaa diiday inuu ku biiro heshiiska hoos udhaca dhaqaale ee Midowga Yurub kadib wadahadaladii Brussels.
data.tir: ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ዓዲ እንግሊዝ፣ ደቪድ ካሚሮን፣ ድሕሪ እቲ ብዛዕባ ፋይናንሳዊ ቅልውላው ኣብ ብሮክሰል ዝተገብረ ዝርርባት ናብ ስምምዕ ሕብረት ኤውሮጳ ክጽንበር ኣቢዩ።

data.eng: The United States Senate votes in favor of extending the payroll tax cut for two months.
data.aaf: US senet Qasbi Qiso Aynukusiya Namma Alsah Yayxeronuh Xongolo Yeccen.
data.amh: የአሜሪካ ሴኔት የደሞዝ ክፍያ ቁርጥ ግብርን ቀንን ለሁለት ወር ለማራዘም መረጠ።
data.orm: Seeneetiin Yunaaytid Isteetis hir'isa gibira miindaa godhamee ture hanga ji'a lamaatti dheeressuuf sagalee kennan.
data.som: Senate ka Mareykanka ayaa u codeeyay in la kordhiyo dhimista canshuurta mushaharadka in muddo laba bilood ah.
data.tir: ላዕለዋይ ባይቶ ኣሜሪካ ነቲ ኣብ ልዕሊ ማሃያታት ዝተነብረ ምጉዳል ቀረጽ ንክልተ ኣዋርሕ ከናወሕ ኣድሚጹ።

data.eng: The Arab League threatens to take Syria to the United Nations within two weeks if the country does not accept its proposals to end the crackdown on the uprising.
data.aaf: Qarab Liig Ta bAaxol takkah Tan Maqatooti Solisuh Xayoseh tan MablaOgolewaytek Suriya Illa Galimaro fanah Beele.
data.amh: የዓረብ ሊግ አገሪቱ በአመፁ ላይ የሚደረገውን ዕርምጃ ለማቆም ያቀረበችውን ሀሳብ ካልተቀበለች ሶሪያን ወደ የተባበሩት መንግሥታት ድርጅት በሁለት ሳምንታት ውስጥ እንደምታቀርብ አስፈራራች።
data.orm: Liigiin Arabaa siiriyaan tarkaanfii mormitoota irratti godhamu dhaabuuf karoora isaa torban lama keessatti hin fudhattu taanaan biyyattii gara Mootummoota Gamtoomaniitti akka dhiyeessu akeekkachiise.
data.som: Jaamacadda Carabta ayaa ku hanjabtay inay Suuriya u gudbin doonto Qaramada Midoobay muddo laba toddobaad gudahood, haddii dalku uusan aqbalin soo jeedinta jaamacada sii loo soo afjaro cadaadiska ka dhanka ah kacdoonka.
data.tir: እታ ሃገር ነቲ ህዝባዊ ዓመፅ ንምጭፍላቕ ትገበሮ ዘላ ምን ቅስቓስ ጠጠው ክተብል ዝቐረበላ እማመ እንተዘይተቐቢላቶ ሊግ ዓረብ ንሶሪያ ኣብ ውሽጢ ክልተ ሰሙናት ናብ ውድብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ከምዘቕርባ ኣጠንቂቑ ።

data.eng: The Buddha Memorial Center of Fo Guang Shan in Kaohsiung, Taiwan, housing a tooth relic of Gautama Buddha, is consecrated.
data.aaf: Tawanal Kaoshigih Addal Geytima Faguanege Buddha Kasitoh Fanteena፣ Gautama BuddhaBodina Suget Elle Yan፣ Yeynebenih.
data.amh: በታይወን ካሆሲውንግ የሚገኘው የጋውታማ ቡድሃ ጥርስ ቅርስ የሚገኝበት የፎጉንግ የቡድሃ መታሰቢያ ማእከል የተቀደሰ ስፍራ ነው።
data.orm: Giddugalli Yaadannoo Budiyaa Fo Guyaang Shaan kan Taa'iwaan Kaa'osiyuung keessaa, hambaa ilkaanii Guutamaa Budihaa of keessaa qabu, akka iddoo qulqullaatti lakkaa'ame.
data.som: Xarunta Xusuusta Buddha ee Fo Guang Shan oo ku taal Kaohsiung, Taiwan, aya la sheegayaa inay yaalan iliga la qadariyo ee Gautama Buddha.
data.tir: ኣብ ካዎህ ሲዮንግ ታይዋን ዝርከብን ናይ ጉተማ ቡድሃ ፅላት ዝቕመጠሉን ናይ ፎ ጉዋንግ ሻን ማእኸል መዘከር ቡድሃ ብቅዱስነት ተሰይሙ ።

data.eng: The Washington-based organisation Human Rights Watch accuses Syria of hiding hundreds of political detainees during a visit by Arab League monitors.
data.aaf: Xafeyna Washingitinil Leh Yan Adam Baxxai Caki Wagitta Qarab Liig Lowsisa Gufneh Wakti suriya Booliyatal Lowinta Sayaasa Maxenit Toqoreh Axcuk Melkitiseh.
data.amh: መቀመጫውን በዋሽንግተን ያደረገው የሰብዓዊ መብቶች ጠባቂ በአረብ ሊግ ተቆጣጣሪዎች ጉብኝት ወቅት ሶሪያን በመቶዎች የሚቆጠሩ የፖለቲካ እስረኞችን ደብቃለች በማለት ክስ አቅርቧል።
data.orm: Waashington keessa kan maadheffate dhaabbati Hiyumaan Raayit Wooch, Siiriyaan yeroo daawwannaan to'attoota Liigii Arabaan godhame keessa hidhamtoota siyaasaa dhibbootaan lakkaa'aman dhoksitee akka turte himate.
data.som: Ururka fadhigiisu yahay Washington ee ilaalada xuquuqda aadanaha ayaa ku eedeeyay Suuriya inay qarisay boqolaal maxaabiis siyaasadeed intii ay kormeerayaasha Jaamacadda Carabtu indha-indhaynta ku jireen.
data.tir: እቲ ማእኸሉ ኣብ ዋሺንግተን ዝገበረ ሂዩማን ራይትስ ዎች ተዓዘብቲ ሊግ ዓረብ ዑደት ኣብ ዝገበሩሉ እዋን ሶሪያ ንኣማ ኢት ፖለቲካዊ እሱራት ከምዝሓብአት ከሲሱ ።

data.eng: At least two people are killed in attacks on bars in northern Kenya near the border with Somalia, with Islamist al-Shabaab militants possibly responsible.
data.aaf: USik qasamal boliis kee Federal Fokaaqo biiro USik Qasimal Bayey Bayise Maysatak Baoonuh Yucsube Morookoh Baxi Eman Al Kalifan Wosis Gubat heen.
data.amh: እስላማዊው አልሸባብ ፈፅሞታል ተብሎ በተገመተው እና በሰሜናዊ ኬንያ በሚገኘው የሶማሌያ ድንበር አካባቢ በሚገኙ መጠጥ ቤቶች ላይ ባነጣጠረው ጥቃት በትንሹ ሁለት ሰዎች ተገደሉ።
data.orm: Yoo xiqqaate namoonnni lama haleellaa manneen dhugaatii kaaba keeniyaa naannoo daangaa somaaliyaatti ta'een ajjeefamaniiru, kanaafis hidhatootni garee Isilaamawaa alshabaab shakkamu danda'u.
data.som: Ugu yaraan laba qof ayaa lagu dilay weerarro lagu qaaday baarar ku yaala woqooyiga Kenya, meel u dhow soohdinta ay Soomaaliya la wadaagto, waxaana suuragal ah inay mas'uul ka yihiin mintidiinta al-Shabaab.
data.tir: ፖላዊስ ቤተ መንግስቲ አሜሪካን ቢሮ ፌዴራል ምርመራን ኣብ ልዕሊ ቤተ መንግስቲ አሜሪካ ዓርሰ ቕትለታዊ መጥቃዕቲ ተሊሙ ከምዝነበረ ንዝተጠርጠረ ኣሚን ኤል ኸሊፋ ዝተብሃለ ሞሮካዊ ኣብ ትሕቲ ቑፅፅር ኣውዒሎም።

data.eng: Up to 50,000 people flee their homes in a border area of South Sudan amid ethnic violence.
data.aaf: Gabi Qaxih Sudaanih Cuduud Illa 50,000 Maddah Tan Marite Kedakedoh qeebi Sababah Buxaaxi Cabbaen.
data.amh: በደቡብ ሱዳን ድንበር አካባቢ እስከ 50,000 ሺህ የሚደርሱ ሰዎች በጎሳ ግጭት ምክንያት ቤታቸውን ጥለው ተሰደዋል።
data.orm: Hokkaraa sabummaa naannoo daangaa Sudaan Kibbaatiin haga namoota 50,000 kan tahan qe'ee isaanii irraa buqqa'an.
data.som: Illaa 50,000 oo qof ayaa ka qaxay guryahooda aagga xadka ee Koonfurta Suudaan iyada oo ay socdaan rabshado qowmiyadeed.
data.tir: ዓሌታዊ ህውከት ዘስግኦም ናብ 50,000 ዝፅግዑ ኣብ ከባቢ ዶብ ደቡብ ሱዳን ዝነብሩ ሰባት መንበሪኦም ለቂቖም ሃዲሞም።

data.eng: Alabama defeats LSU 21-0 to win the 2012 BCS National Championship, their second championship in three years, in the first shutout in BCS bowl history.
data.aaf: Alabama bisiase Adadah Aydaadi Addal qimboh Addah Rageh yan 2012 BCS Gat shambiyona፣ Sidica sanatih Addat Namma shambiyoona Yaysoonuh LSUis 21-0 Yeyse.
data.amh: በ2012 በተደረገው በመጀመሪያው የ ቢኤስሲ ቦውል ታሪክ ቢሲኤስ ሻምፒዮና አላባማ ቡድን የኤል ኤስዩን ቡድን 21-0 በሆነ ውጤት አሸነፈ፤ ይህም በሁለት አመት ውስጥ ሁለት ያሸነፈ ቡድን ያደርገዋል።
data.orm: Alaabaamaan dorgommoo mo'attoota biyyoolessaa mo'uuf LSU 21-0'dhaan injifateera, waggaa sadii keessatti mo'icha mo'attootaa yeroo lammataa, seenaa keessatti injifannoo guddaa jalqabaa.
data.som: Alabaama aya kaga badisay LSU 21-0 si ay ugu guulaysato Horyaalka Qaranka EE BSC ee 2012, Taas of noqotay horyaalkoodi sadexaad wakhti dhan sadex sano gudahood, markii ugu horreysay ee la xiro taariikhda baaquli ee BCS.

data.eng: A Libyan starts court proceedings against 41 people accused of helping Muammar Gaddafi to attempt to suppress the opposition in the Libyan Civil War.
data.aaf: Libiya Muqabaral Gadaafi libiyal sini kee isini qeebeh Addat Sadu Abba Beyaanam Gibatu Abteh Axcuk Wagisah tan 41 numl gaaros gexsit qimbise.

data.orm: Liibiyaan mormii walwaraansa biyya keessaa irratti godhame ukkaamsuu kessatti Muammer Gaadaffi gargaruudhaan shakkaman 41 irratti himatama bane.
data.som: Liibiya ayaa bilawday dacwad maxkamadeed oo ka kooban 41 qof oo lagu eedeeyay inay gacan ka geysteen Muammar Gaddafi si uu isku dayo inuu cabudhiyo mucaardiinta dagaalka sokeeye ee Liibiya.

data.eng: The President of Honduras Porfirio Lobo pledges a "full and transparent inquiry" into the events and suspends local and national prison officials.

data.eng: United States Capitol Police and the Federal Bureau of Investigation arrested Amine El Khalifi, a man from Morocco who allegedly planned a suicide attack on the United States Capitol.
data.aaf: Baxsale Uma Malaleela Imosin Moya Siminto bulokoch Xambaqeenim Kak Samitewan Xayos Qiraak qarkakise.
data.amh: በአሜሪካ መንገስት መቀመጫ ላይ የአጥፍቶ ጥፋት ሊፈፅም የነበረ የተባለ እና ሞረኮዋዊ ዜግነት ያለው አሚን ኤል ካሊፊ በካፒቶል ፖሊስ እና የፌደራል የምርመራ ቢሮ(FBI) ቁጥጥር ስር ዋለ።
data.orm: Polisiin kaapitoolii yuunayitid isteetis fi biiroon qorannoo federaalaa dhalataa morookoo kan ta'e shakkii yakkaa balleessanii baduutin Amiin El Kaliifaa to'annoo jala oolcheera.
data.som: Booliska Capitol -ka Mareykanka iyo Xafiiska Baarista Federaalka ayaa xiray Amine El Khalifi, kaas oo ah nin u dhashay Moroko iyadoo la sheegay inuu qorsheenayay weerar ismiidaamin ah inu ku qaado Xarunta Capitol-ka maraykanaka.

data.eng: A fight amongst inmates leads to a prison riot in the Mexican city of Apodaca, Nuevo León, with 44 people dead.

data.som: 44 qof ayaa ku dhintay dagaal ka dex dhacay maxaabis ku xidhnaa magaalada Apodaca ee Nuevo León ee dalka Mexico oo iskubadalay qalaalase jeel.

data.eng: Treasure from the Spanish Navy frigate Nuestra Señora de las Mercedes returns to Spain after being recovered by Odyssey Marine Exploration in 2007.
data.aaf: I.L.L. 2007 Oxisi Badi Caylih Goran Yudurek Isbenik Badi Cayli Doonik Nusetesetra sesora Xo lase mresxise Gada Illa isben Gacisele.
data.amh: በ2007 በተደረገ የኦዲሴ የመርከብ አሰሳ በ|ላ በተገኘው የስፔን የጦር መርከብ ኑሰትራ ሲኖራ ዴ ላስ መርሰደስ ውስጥ ይገኝ የነበረ ማእድን እና ውድ ሃብት ወደ ስፔን እንዲመለስ ተደረገ።
data.orm: Qabeenyi Doonii Humna Galaanaa Ispeen Niwustiraa Seenooraa de las Mersedes irraa Barbaacha Galaana keessaa Odiiseey'n bara 2007 keessa erga argamanii booda gara Ispeenitti deebifaman.
data.som: Khasnad ka luntay markab dagaal oo ay leeyihiin ciidamada badda Spain Nuestra Señora de las Mercedes ayaa ku soo laabanaya Spain ka dib markii la soo helay 2007.
data.tir: እቲ ብ2007 ዓምፈ ብናይ ኦዴሳ ባሕረኛታት ኣለሻ ካብ ናይ ስፔይን ሓይሊ ባሕሪ መርከብ ውግእ ኖስትራ ሲኞራ ዴ ላሶ ሜርሴድስ ዝተረኸበ ሃብቲ ንስፔይን ተዋሂቡ።

data.eng: Meta-analysis of 42 previous studies concludes chocolate may be good for the heart.

data.amh: ባለፉት በተደረጉት 42 ጥናቶች ቸኮሌት ለልብ ጤና ጠቃሚ እንደሆነ ማሳየት ችለዋል።
data.orm: akka qorannoon(xiinxaalli) Meettaa 42n darban ibsutti Chookkoleettiin fayyaa namaaf gaarii ta'uu danda'a jedhame.
data.som: Falanqaynta Meta oo samaysay 42 daraasadood ayaa waxay ku soo gabagabaysay in shukulaatadu ay u fiicantahy wadnaha.

data.eng: The United States files an application in New Zealand to extradite Kim Dotcom and three of his associates in MegaUpload to face charges of breaching copyright.
data.aaf: USik Kim Dotcom kee Sidiica Katasis MegaUpload Tabisak Acayuk Newzerlanxil Tascasi Culusak Quliyi Gaar Cineh.
data.amh: አሜሪካ ኪም ዶትኮምን እና ሶስት ግብረ አበሮቹን በሜጋ አፕሎድ እና የቅጂ መብቶችን ጥሰዋል በሚል አሳልፋ እንድትሰጣት ኒው ዘላንድን ጠየቀች።

data.som: Mareykanka ayaa New Zealand u gudbiyay codsi ah in loo soo gacan geliyo Kim Dotcom iyo saddex ka mid ah saaxiibadiisa MegaUpload si ay u wajahaan eedeymo ah xadgudub xuquuqda daabacaadda.
data.tir: ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ኪም ዶት ኮምን ኣብ ኩባንያ ሜጋ ኣፖሎድ ተሓባባርቱ ዝኾኑ ሰለስተ ሰባትን ንሕጊ መሰል ቅዳሕ ብምጥሓሶም ብዝቐረቦም ክሲ ክሕተቱ ተሓላሊፎም ክዋሃብዋ ኣብ ኒውዚላንድ ጥርዓን ኣመዚጊባ ።

data.eng: Turkish Airlines begins a service to Somalia, the first regular service to the capital Mogadishu except regional East African flights to operate in twenty years.
data.aaf: Turkiyah Qaran merayti Labatani Sanatih Addat Rakaakayak Ayromawqah Afarikah Haditetak Sarah Ta maggalak Mokaxisho Qimbo Madab Ayfaf somaliyah Qaibisele.
data.amh: የቱርክ አየር መንገድ ወደ ክልላዊ የምስራቅ አፍሪካ ብቻ ሲያደርግ ከነበረው በረራዎች ከሃያ ዓመታት በኋላ ለሶማሊያ ዋና ከተማ ሞቃዲሾ የመጀመሪያውን መደበኛ የበረራ አገልግሎት መስጠት ጀመረ።
data.orm: Daandiin Qilleensaa Turkii gara Somaaliyaatti waggoota digdama keessatti balaliiwwan naannoo Baha Afrikaatti utuu hin taane gara magaalaa guddoo Moqaadishuutti tajaajila idiliee isa jalqabaa eegale.
data.som: Shirkada diyaaradda Turkish Airline ayaa adeeg u bilawday Soomaaliya, waana adeeggii ugu horreeyey oo joogto ah oo ay ka fuliso caasimadda Muqdisho marka laga reebo duulimaadyada gobolka ee Bariga Afrika oo shaqeynayey muddo labaatan sano ah.
data.tir: መንገዲ ኣየር ቱርኪ ንሶማልያ ኣገልግሎት ክትህብ ጀሚራ፣ እዚ ኣገልግሎት እዚ ብዘይካ እቲ ናብ ከባቢ ምብራቕ ኣፍሪቃ ዝግበር በረራታት ኣብ ዒስራ ዓመት ንመጀመርያ ግዜ ናብታ ርእሲ ከተማ ዝዀነት ሞጋዲሾ ዝቐርብ ስሩዕ ኣገልግሎት እዩ።

data.eng: A gunman kills one person and injures seven others before himself being shot dead at the University of Pittsburgh Medical Center's Western Psychiatric Institute & Clinic in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

data.amh: በፒትስበርግ ፣ ፔንሲልቬንያ በሚገኘው የፒትስበርግ የህክምና ማዕከል የምዕራባዊ የአዕምሮ ህክምና ተቋም እና ክሊኒክ ጠመንጃ የታጠቀ ሰው በፖሊሶች ከመገደሉ በፊት የአንድ ሰው ህይወትን ሲያጠፋ ሰባት ሰዎችን አቁስሏል።
data.orm: Yunivarsitii inistitiyuuti giddu gala yaala sammuu lixaa fi kilinika piitisbarg kan kaalifoorniyaa pitisbarg kessatti argamu keessatti hidhataan tokko nama tokko ajjeesuun namoota sagal erga madeesseen booda rasaasaan rukutamuun ajjeefame.
data.som: Nin hubeysan ayaa dilay hal qof todobo kalena dhaawacay kadibna isaga lagudiliay Jaamacadda Pittsburgh, macadkeeda qaybta Machadka Cilmi -nafsiga Galbeedka & Rugta Caafimaadka ee Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

data.eng: Chinese politician Bo Xilai speaks out for the first time since his aide attempted to defect at the American consulate.
data.aaf: Chayinah Sayaasa Tu yaxigi Bo Silai qokola Ameerikah lkonsulat gexekalit gibatek lakal Qimboh addah Yabele.

data.som: Siyaasiga Shiinaha Bo Xilai ayaa markii ugu horeysay ka hadlay tan iyo markii ay cawisadiisu isku dayaday inuu ka goosto qunsuliyadda Mareykanka.

data.eng: India's Kingfisher Airlines cancels at least 40 flights due to pilots not turning up for work due to unpaid salaries.
data.aaf: Hindik kirinigfesher Qaran Giti Meklesimewaah yan Qasbi Sababah Hadisa Taama Geytimeweenimih Taagah Wuli 40 takke Hadisa Dookenih.
data.amh: የህንዱ ኪንግፊሸር አየርመንገድ አብራሪዎቹ ያልተከፈለን ክፍያ አለ በማለት ከስራ በመቅረታቸው ምክንያት ወደ 40 የሚጠጉ በረራዎቹን ሰረዘ።
data.orm: Daandiin qilleensaa Hindii Kiingifiisher sababa balaliistonni xiyyaaraa sababa miindaa hin kanfalamneef hojii seenuu didaniif yoo xiqqaate balaliiwwan 40 haqe.
data.som: Shirkadda diyaaradaha ee India ee Kingfisher Airlines ayaa baajisay ugu yaraan 40 duullimaad taas oo ay sabab u ahay duuliyeyaashii oo aan soo shaqo galin taas oo ay mushaar la’aani kukaliftay.
data.tir: ኪንግ ፊሸር ተባሂሉ ዝፅዋዕ መገዲ ኣየር ህንዲ መሃያ ዘይተኸፈሎም ብዙሓት ፓይለታት ካብ ስራሕ ብምትራፎም ብውሑድ 40 በረራታት ሰሪዙ።

data.eng: Pakistani villagers find 13 bodies with bullet wounds in the Federally Administered Tribal Areas near Afghanistan as security forces step up an offensive.
data.aaf: Boliis kaxxam Nabah yan Ardah Ta Qasmah Makamak Iroh Salaam Soolol weqisa Qer.
data.amh: በፓኪስታን የአንድ መንደር ነዋሪዎች 13 በጥይት የቆሰሉ ሬሳዎችን በፌደራሉ ይተዳደራሉ በተባሉ የጎሳ አካባቢዎች ከ አፍጋኒስታን አቅራቢያ አገኙ።
data.orm: Jiraattonni ganda baadiyyaa taalibaan dhiyeenya Afgaanistaanitti kan argamtu, naannawaa uummata gosaa kan federaalaan bultutti reeffa 13 kan madaa rasaasaa qabu oggaa humnoonni nageenyaa humnaan dhiiban arganiiru.
data.som: Dadka dagan Tuulada Pakistan ayaa 13 mayd oo ay ka muuqato dhaawacyo rasaas ah ka helay Goobaha Qabaa’ilka ee ay maamusho Dowladda Federaalka, iyado ay ciidamada ammaanku xoojinayaan weerarka.

data.eng: Rebelling government troops in Mali storm the state broadcaster in the capital Bamako.

data.amh: በማሊ ውስጥ የመንግሥት ወታደሮች ማመፅ በዋና ከተማዋ ባማኮ ውስጥ ያለውን የመንግሥት ብሮድካስት ወረዋል።

data.eng: Iraq is terrorised by unconfirmed reports of extremists crushing the skulls of emos with blocks of cement.
data.aaf: Afganistaanak Xaqu federal Xiinisay Gedoora Dariifa Amni Dagar Maysataka Gabakaltawak bakistan Caafatal tano 13 Raysite Dirat Dalete.
data.amh: ኢራቅ ባልተረጋገጥ እና አክራሪዎች ኢሞ የተባሉትን እና የሰውን አፅም በብሎኬት ይሰብራሉ ብለው ሚያስቡትን ሰዎች ግድያ በሚመለከት ተሸብራለች።

data.som: Ciraaq waxaa argagax galiyay warar aan la xaqiijin oo sheegaya in xagjiriintu ay burburiyeen qalfoofka emos iyago adeegsanaya labanka sibidhka.
data.tir: ኣብ ፓኪስታን ኣብ ጥቓ ኣፍጋኒስታን ኣብዝርከባ ብፌዴራላዊ መንግስቲ ኣብ ዝመሓደራ ቀቢላዊ ከባብታት ሓይልታት ፀጥታ መጥቃዕቶም ኣብ ዘጠናኸሩሉ ኣብዚ ሕዚ እዋን ነበርቲ እቲ ኸባቢ መጉዳእቲ ጥይት ዝረኣየሎም 13 ኣስከሬናት ረኺቦም።

data.eng: The Los Angeles County Coroner's Office says that Whitney Houston's official cause of death was drowning as a result of cocaine use.
data.aaf: Losi Angeles Kawunit Cuduudul Dacayri Maktab wetin Hiwistn ofisylawi Rabi Sabab kokyen Aytifiqiya Sababah Yacemit Yaaban::

data.eng: Viswanathan Anand defeats Boris Gelfand to win the World Chess Championship for the fourth consecutive time, and the fifth time overall.
data.aaf: Vaswananitani Anani Booris gelfinidun Aysuk Baadal sitalakleh Cheezi shambiyoona Fereyhaytoh Adda kee Amoladih Konoyhaytoh Addah Yeyse.

data.som: Viswanathan Anand ayaa ka badiyay Boris Gelfand si uu ugu guuleysto Horyaalka Chess ka Adduunka afar jeer oo iskuxigta, iyo markii shanaad guud ahaan.
