data.eng: 64 Ethiopian illegal immigrants are found dead and 14 alive inside a cargo container on a lorry in Tete Province, Mozambique, apparently having died of asphyxiation.
data.aaf: Talisi sisili barsaloona bixizo xi gotoh magaalal richit fabrikah addal bakaqat koona num rabte kelah namma nummudumteh.
data.amh: በሞዛምቢክ ቴቴ አውራጃ ላይ በጭነት ማጓጓዣ ኮንቴይነር ውስጥ 64 ሕገ -ወጥ ኢትዮጵያውያን ስደተኞች በአየር እጥረት መታፈን ሳቢያ ሲሞቱ፣ 14 በሕይወት ተገኝተዋል።
data.orm: Moozaambik kutaa bulchiinsa Teente keessatti baqattota seeraan alaa lammii Itiyoopiyaa ta'an konteeynarii fe'umsaatiin konkolaataa kessatti fe'amuun imalaa turan sababa qilleensa ga'aa dhabuun ukkaamamanii namoonni 14 lubbuun yoo bararaman namoonni 64 ammoo lubbuun darbaniiru.
data.som: 64 tahriibayaal sharci -darro ah oo Itoobiyaana oo ay qaar mayd yihiin iyo 14 naftu ku jirto aya laga dhex helay konteenar gaadhi xamuula saaran, Gobolka Tete, ee dalka Mozambique, sida muuqata waxa la sheegay inay u dhinteen cabudh.
data.tir: ኣብ ውሽጢ ኮንቴይነር ተዓሺጎም ብማኪና ፅዕነት ይጎዓዙ ዝነበሩ 64 ኢትዮጵያውያን ቴቴ ኣብ ዝተብሃለ ክፋል ሞዛምቢክ እንትበፅሑ ብሰንኪ ክቱር ምስኣን ኣየር ተዓፊኖም ሞይቶም፣ 14 ድማ ብህይወት ተረኺቦም።

data.eng: Fiji declares a 30-day state of natural disaster in areas affected by Cyclone Harold.
data.aaf: Hindik Kaxxa Badih Réunionih Xaqul Geytimte Tidigigile Boeingik 777 Uwaytulih Bicah yanim kinim Malaysia QaranGitih Hada 370 kinim Aysmitoonuh Fikqo Abak Geytiman.
data.amh: ፊጂ በዐውሎ ነፋስ ሃሮልድ በተጎዱ አካባቢዎች የ 30 ቀናት የአስቸኳይ ግዜ የተፈጥሮ አደጋ አዋጅ አወጀች።
data.orm: Fiijiin yeroo balaa uumamaa guyyaa 30 naannoo Saayikloonii Haaroldiin miidhameetti labsite.
data.som: Fiji ayaa ku dhawaaqday xaalad dabiici oo 30 maalmood oo masiibo dabiici ah oo ka jirta degaannada ay saameysay Duufaanta Harold.
data.tir: ፊጂ ብሳይክሎን ሃሮልድ ኣብ ዝተጠቕዑ ከባቢታት 30 መዓልታት ዝፀንሕ ህፁፅ ኩነታት ተፈጥሮኣዊ ሓደጋ ኣዊጃ።

data.eng: Swedish auto manufacturer Volvo Cars resumes full production at its plant in Torslanda, Sweden, which had been shut down due to the COVID-19 pandemic since March 26, 2020.
data.aaf: Siwidinik Awtomotiv tamrute Volevoh makayin Qado-dirik 26 Ayro 2020 qimbisak Kovix-19 Dalka Sababah alfimeh sugeh yan Torelanda፣ siwidin Adatl fabrikah Addal inkih murti uxih Qibisele.
data.amh: የስዊድን አውቶሞቢል አምራች የሆነው ቮልቮ መኪናዎች እ.ኤ.አ ከመጋቢት 26 ቀን 2020 ዓ.ም ጀምሮ በ ኮሮናቫይረስ ወረርሽኝ ምክንያት ተዘግቶ በነበረው በቶርላንዳ ፣ ስዊድን ባለው ፋብሪካ ውስጥ ሙሉ ምርቱን እንደገና ጀምሯል።
data.orm: Oomishaan konkolaataa Iswiidin Konkolaataan Voolvoo warshaa isaa Torsilaand, Iswiidin keessaa kan Bitootessa 26, 2020 irraa kaasee sababa weerara COVID-19'n cufamee turetti humna guutuun oomisha jalqabe.
data.som: Shirkada Volvo Cars soo saarta gawaadhida iswiidhishka ayaa si buuxda u bilaawday wax soo saarka warshaddeeda ku taal Torslanda, Sweden, oo loo xidhay masiibada COVID-19 tan iyo 26 kii Maarso, 2020.
data.tir: ሽወደናዊት ኣፍራዪት ማካይን ቮልቮ ማካይን ኣብቲ ካብ 26 መጋቢት 2020 ኣትሒዙ ብሰንኪ ለበዳ ኮቪድ-19 ተዓጽዩ ዝነበረ፣ ኣብ ቶርስላንዳ ሽወደን ዝርከብ ፋብሪካኣ ምሉእ ናይ ምፍራይ መስርሕ ከም ብሓድሽ ትቕጽል ኣላ።

data.eng: The Indian Council of Medical Research advises all states to suspend using COVID-19 rapid test kits for two days, after some kits were found to be faulty.
data.aaf: Islam xaagiqawa wakfa elle qadesenal Al-Aksa xaqi kee xeet fanal covix 19 elle yumbuluye Iyen..
data.amh: የህንድ የህክምና ምርምር ምክር ቤት አንዳንድ የኮቪድ-19 ፈጣን መመርመሪያ መሳሪያዎች ባሳዩት የተሳሳተ ውጤት በሁሉም ክልሎች ውስጥ ለሁለት ቀናት በፈጣን መመርመሪያዎቹ ምርመራ እንዳይካሄድ ሲል ሃሳብ ሰጠ።
data.orm: Manni maree Qorannoo Fayyaa Hindii erga meeshaaleen muraasi kan rakkoo qaban tahuu hubatee booda, naannoowwan hundi guyyaa lamaaf meeshaa harkaa qorannoo COVID-19 battalaa akka adda kutan gorse.
data.som: Golaha Hindida ee Cilmi-baarista Caafimaadka waxay kula talinayaan dhammaan gobollada inay joojiyaan adeegsiga xirmooyinka tijaabada degdegga ah ee COVID-19 muddo laba maalmood ah, ka dib markii xirmooyinka qaarkood la ogaaday inay khaldan yihiin.
data.tir: ገለ መሳርሕታት ምርመራ ጉድለት ከምዘለዎም ስለዝተፈለጠ ኣብ ኩሎም ክልላት እታ ሃገር ኣብ ኣገልግሎት ቅልጡፍ ምርመራ ኮቪድ:19 ዘለዉ መሳርሒታት ንኽልተ መዓልቲ ጠጠው ክብሉ ቤት ምኽሪ ሕክምናዊ መፅናዕቲ ህንዲ መኺሩ።

data.eng: Microsoft announces a $1.5 billion investment in Italy, as part of its expansion of cloud computing services around the world.
data.aaf: Mayrikosofti Baada Caddol Xamaaca Yaqikineenimih Ayfafite Baarisiyi Exxah tanih tan Taliyaanal 1.5 Bilyoonih Dolaar Investimenti Qadoose.
data.amh: ማይክሮሶፍት በዓለም ዙሪያ ለሚያርጋቸው የኮምፒውተር አገልግሎቶች መከታተያ ስራ እንደ አንድ አካል ይሆን ዘንድ በጣሊያን ውስጥ 1.5 ቢሊዮን ዶላር ወጪ ኢንቨስትመንት እንደሚያደርግ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Maakiroosooft sababa babal'ina tajaajila kilaawod Kompiwuutingii adddunyaa irraaf Xaaliyaanii keessatti inveestimentii biliyoona $1.5 akka godhu beeksise.
data.som: Microsoft ayaa ku dhawaaqday maalgashi dhan $ 1.5 bilyan kumaalgalinayo Talyaaniga, taas oo qayb ka ah ballaarinta adeegyada cloud computing adduunka oo dhan.
data.tir: ማይክሮሶፍት ኣካል እቲ ኣብ ሙሉእ ዓለም ዘስፋሕፍሖ ዘሎ ኣገልግሎት ክላውድ ዝኾነ ናይ 1.5 ቢልዮን ዶላር ኢንቨስትመንት ኣብ ጣልያን ከምዘካይድ ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: COVID-19 pandemic in Madagascar Madagascar reports its first death from COVID-19; that of a 57-year-old medical worker who suffered from diabetes and high blood pressure.

data.amh: ኮቪድ-19 በማዳጋስካር- በማዳጋስካር ከኮቪድ-19 በተያያዘ የመጀመሪያው ሞት ተመዝግቧል፤ ሟቹም የ57 እድሜ የህክምና ባለሙያ ሲሆን በስኳር እና ከፍተኛ የደም ግፊት እንደነበረበት ታውkል።

data.eng: In a Europe-wide operation, police penetrate EncroChat, a top-secret communications system used by criminals to sell drugs and plan attacks.
data.aaf: Awrobal Baarle Angagoyih Addal Boliis galtiteaba Cashishite kaloonu kee maysatakoki Ikraarimtuh Edde yantifiqen yanin kaki yan fayale Cuumil Angaarawih Siiratih Addal Kaqitak Cule.
data.amh: በአውሮፓ ሰፊ እንቅስቃሴ አማካኝነት አደንዛዥ እጾችን ለመሸጥ እና ጥቃቶችን ለማቀድ ወንጀለኞች የሚጠቀሙበት ከፍተኛ ምስጢራዊ የግንኙነት ስርዓት ኤንክሮቻትን ፖሊስ ይጥሳል።

data.som: Kuguulaystay inay jabiyaan EncroChat, oo ah nidaam isgaarsiineed oo qarsoodi ah oo ay dembiilayaashu u adeegsadaan iibka daroogooyinka iyo qorshaynta weerarrada.

data.eng: Indian Minister of Power R. K. Singh announces that India will halt the importation of US$2.8 billion worth of Chinese power equipment due to heightened tensions between the two nations.
data.aaf: Namma Baaxoh Fanat Tekke tan Fayale Sitin way Sababah Hindil 2.8 Milyoonih Dolaarih Liimo Leh yan Chyinah Caylih Silaah illa Baaxo Addal Culusiya soolisuwaytam Hidik Cayli Malaak R. K. Sing Qadoose.
data.amh: የህንዱ የሃይል አቅርቦት ሚኒስቴር የሆኑት አር ኬ ሲንግ ህንድ እና ቻይና በገቡበት እየከፋ በመጣው ውጥረት ምክንያት ህንድ በ2.8 ቢሊዮን የአሜሪካ ዶላር ወጪ በማድረግ ከቻይና ልታስገባ የወሰነችውን የሃይል አቅርቦት መሳሪያዎች ግዢ ታስቆማለች ሲሉ አስታወቁ።
data.orm: Ministeerri Annisaa Hindii, R. K. Sing, Hindiin meeshaalee annisaa Chaayinaa biliyoona US$2.8 baasu sababa olka'uu waldhabdee biyyoota lamaan gidduu jiruu biyya isheetti galchuu akka dhaabdu beeksise.
data.som: Wasiirka Korontada Hindiya R. K. Singh ayaa ku dhawaaqay in Hindiya ay joojin doonto soo dejinta qalab koronto ee Shiinaha uuga yimaada oo ay qiimihiisu yahay US $ 2.8 bilyan taas oo ay sababtay tkhuurada labada dal ay isku khuurinayaan oo sii kordhaysa.
data.tir: ሚኒስትር ሓይሊ ኤሌትሪክ ህንዲ ኣር ኬ ሲንግ ኣብ ሞንጎ ህንድን ቻይናን ውጥረት እናበርተዐ ብምምፅኡ ሃገሮም ክተእተዎ ተሊማ ዝነበረት 2.8 ቢልዮን ዝዋግኡ መሳርሒ ኤሌትሪክ ቻይና ጠጠው ኣቢላቶ።

data.eng: Military medics are deployed to hospitals in Texas and California as cases surge.
data.aaf: Vatikan kutbeh buxa elle qadosenal Ilacaboh raqtehtanim Lakmise Urem kee foya yekkem kini.
data.amh: የበሽተኞች ቁጥር እየጨመረ በመምጣቱ በቴክሳስ ካሊፎርኔያ በሚገኙ ሆስፒታሎች የወታደራዊ የጤና መኮንኖች እንዲሰማሩ ተደረገ።
data.orm: Akkuma lakkoofsi namoota dhukkubaan qabamanii ol ka'een ogeessonni fayyaa waraanaa hospitaalota Teeksasii fi Kaalifoorniyaa keessaatti raabsaman
data.som: Dhakhaatiirta milatariga ayaa la geeyay isbitaallada gobolada Texas iyo California iyadoo kiisaska cusub ay sii kordhayaan.
data.tir: ብምኽንያት ደግሲ እቲ ለበዳ ኣብ ሆስፒታላት ቴክሳስን ካሊፎርኒያን ወታሃደራዊ ሓካይም ክዋፈሩ ተገይሩ።

data.eng: Several Beirut port officials are placed under house arrest as an investigation starts into how 2,750 tons of ammonium nitrate was left unsecured at a warehouse at the port for six years.
data.aaf: Catiyi Taama GabiAyro mawqa Birazilik Xer rikel tan Dariifal Raqteh Tan Marite Geyonu Gibatonu kini.
data.amh: በርካታ የቤሩት ወደብ ባለሥልጣናት 2,750 ቶን የአሞኒየም ናይትሬት ወደብ ላይ በሚገኝ መጋዘን ውስጥ ለስድስት ዓመታት እንዴት ደህንነቱ ሳይጠበቅ ሊገኝ እንደቻለ ምርመራ በመጀመሩ በቤት እስራት ላይ ናቸው።
data.orm: Aangawoonni buufata doonii Beeruut muraasi akkamiin amooniyeem naayitireetiin tooniin 2,750 mankuusaa bakka buufata doonichaa keessatti waggaa ja'aaf utuu hin eegamin akka ture adda baasuuf akkuma qorannoon eegaleen hidhaa mana keessaa jala galan.
data.som: Dhowr sarkaal oo ka tirsan dekedda Beirut ayaa xabsi guri lagu haya iyagoo baaritaan lagu bilaabay iyagoo 2,750 tan oo amooniyam ah lagu cidleeyey bakhaar ku yaal dekedda muddo lix sano ah.
data.tir: 2,750 ቶን ኣሞንየም ናይትሬት ኣብ መኽዝን ወደብ ብዘይጥንቓቐ ንሽዱሽተ ዓመት ናይ ዝተኸዘነሉ ኩነታት ምርመራ ንምጅማር ብርክት ዝበሉ ሰበ ስልጣን ወደብ ቤይሩት ቅውም እሱር ኮይኖም።

data.eng: The MSC Grandiosa disembarks from Genoa, Italy, on a seven-day cruise in the Mediterranean Sea, the first major cruise ship to sail in the Sea in almost five months because of the COVID-19 pandemic.
data.aaf: Coovid-19 Dalka Sababah Amises giraduyus Jenwal፣ Taliyaanal፣ Qasabadi Addal Malcina Ayro Doonik Gexo፣ Badak Addal DoonikikAddal Koona Alsahih Addat Qimboh Addah Doonikil Gexe.
data.amh: ከኮቪድ 19 ወረርሺኝ ከተከሰተ በ|ላ ለአምስት ወረት ጉዞ ሳይደረግ የነበረ ቢሆንም የኤምኤስሲ ግራንዲዮሳ መርከብ ከጄኖዋ ጣልያን በመነሳት ለሰባት ቀን ጉዞ በማድረግ ሜድትራኒያን ባህር ደርሳለች።
data.orm: MSC Giraandiyosaan Jenoyaa, Xaaliyaanii irraa Galaana Medetireeniyaanii keessa guyyaa torbaaf imala jalqabe, sababa weerara COVID-19 gara ji'oota shanii keessatti doonii geejjiba namaa isa jalqabaa guddicha galaanicha keessa imale.
data.som: Markabka MSC Grandiosa wuxuu ka soo baxay Genoa, Talyaaniga, isagoo badda Mediterraneanka ku safri jiray mudo toddobaad ah ayaa masiibada COVID-19 ayaa kukalifay inuu noqdo markabkii ugu weynaa badda ay kudhaaftay muddo ku dhow shan bilood ah.
data.tir: ኤም ኤስ ሲ ግራንዷሳ ተባሂላ እትፅዋዕ መርከብ ኣብ ባሕሪ ሜዲትራኒያን ጉዕዞ ሸውዓተ መዓልቲ ንምክያድ ካብ ጀኖዋ ዝነቐለት ኰይኑ ብምኽንያት ለበዳ ኮቪድ 19 ኣብቲ ባሕሪ ዳርጋ ኣብ ሓሙሽተ ኣዋርሕ ትጓዓዝ ዘላ ፈላመይቲ መርከብ ኰይና ኣላ።

data.eng: The daily number of new COVID-19 cases in France tops 3,000 for the first time since lockdown eased.
data.aaf: Faransah Addal Waaso Heenik Lakal KOVIX-19 AyrookAyro Ixximak 3,000 Dagga yekkem kini.
data.amh: የእንቅስቃሴውን ገደብ ከላላ በ|ላ በፈረንሳይ በየቀኑ አዲስ በኮቪድ-19 የሚጠቁ ሰዎች ቁጥር 3000 መድረሱ ተነገረ።
data.orm: Erga labsiin mana turuu kaafamee booda Faransaayi keessatti lakkoofis namoota haaraa COVID-19 qabamanii guyyuu gara 3,000'tti ol guddate.
data.som: Tirada maalinlaha ah ee kiisaska cusub ee COVID-19 ee Faransiiska ayaa kor u dhaafaya 3,000 markii ugu horreysay tan iyo fududayntii xayiraadda.
data.tir: ኣብ ፈረንሳይ ተነቢሩ ዝነበረ ዕፅዋ ክልሕልሕ ካብ ዝግበር ንነዘ መዓልታዊ ቁፅሪ ምትሓዝ ኮቪድ-19 ናብ 3,000 ከምዝደየበ ተፈሊጡ።

data.eng: Antifa militants, far-right groups, and pro-Confederacy groups clash at Stone Mountain, near the city of Stone Mountain, Georgia.
data.aaf: Afantih Culekala፣ Migdi Buttati kee Konfixireshion qokola Buttati Gorjiyal Xeet Qalel Bodisan.
data.amh: የአንቲፋ ታጣቂዎች ፣ ከፍተኛ የቀኝ ክፍል ቡድን አባላት እና የኮንፌዴሬሽን ደጋፊ ቡድኖች በጆርጂያ ስቶን ማውንቴን ከተማ አቅራቢያ በሚገኘው በስቶን ማውንቴን ውስጥ ግጭት ፍጥረዋል።
data.orm: Joorjiyaa naannoo magaalaa 'Istoon Maawunteen' kessatti hidhattoonni Antifaa,gareen mirga fagoo fi gareen deeggartoota Confedereeshinii walitti bu'an.
data.som: Kooxaha Antifa, kooxaha midigta fog, iyo kooxaha kale ee taageersan Confederacy ayaa dagaal ku dhemaray Buurta Stone, oo u dhow magaalada Stone Mountain, Georgia.
data.tir: ኣብ ጆርጅያ ስቶን ማውንቴን ኣብዝተብሃለ ቦታ ኣንቲፋ ዝተብሃሉን የማናውያንን ፅንፈኛ ጉጅለታት ከምኡ እውን ደገፍቲ ኮንፌዴራሲዮን ዝኾኑ ጉጅለታት ሰሳቶም ተጋጪዎም።

data.eng: The UK's national debt exceeds £2 trillion ($2.61tn) for the first time, according to data from the Office for National Statistics.
data.aaf: Biritaaniyak Agat Abuud Qimboh Addah 2 Tiriliyoon Baawuxi (2.61Ba) Faya Axcelem Agatak Istatistikis KUtbeh Buxak Geutime Oyti Yascase.
data.amh: ከዩኬ የብሔራዊ ስታቲስቲክስ ቢሮ በተገኘ መረጃ የዩኬ ብሄራዊ የብድር እዳ ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ ከ 2 ትሪሊዮን ፓውንድ ወይም ከ 2.61 ትሪሊዮን ዶላር አለፈ።
data.orm: Akka daataa Waajjira Istaatistiksii Biyyaalessaa irraa argameetti, liqaan biyyaalessaa UK yeroo jalqabaaf tiriiliyoona £2 ($2.61tn) caale.
data.som: Sida xafiiska tirakoobka qaranka ingiriisku uu sheegay deynta qaranka ayaa markii ugu horaysay kor u dhaaftay £ 2 tiriliyan ($ 2.61tn).
data.tir: ሃገራዊ ዕዳ ዩኬ ካብ 2 ትሪልዮን ፓውንድ (2.61 ትሪልዮን ዶላር) ከምዝዛየደ ቤት ፅሕፈት ሃገራዊ ስታቲስቲክስ ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: 2020 NFL season The National Football League will require all coaches and staff in bench areas to wear masks.
data.aaf: 2020NFL Dahab Agatak Ibi koqsoh Liig Inkih tan Aydakanakisa kee Taama abenit dafeytnah Arooca Addal santi saro kah saritan inah Essere.
data.amh: በ2020 ኤንኤፍኤል የውድድር አመት የብሄራዊ ፉትቦል ሊጉ አሰልጣኞች እና ሌሎች የቡድን ሰራተኞች በተቀያሪ ወንበር አካባቢ በማስክ እንዲንቀሳቁ ጠየቀ።
data.orm: yeroo NFL'ii 2020 Liigiin kubbaa miilaa biiyyalessaa leenjistoonni fi hijjeettoonni nannoo barcumaa hundi akka haguugduu funyanii uffataniif ni ajaja.
data.som: Horyaalka Kubadda Cagta Qaranka ee NFL aya faraya in ay dhamaan ciyaartooyhada iyo tababarayaashu ay xidhaan hagooga afka iyo sanka marka ay fadhiyan goobta ciyaartooyada badalaka xiliga ciyaara 2020 ka.
data.tir: ሃገራዊ ውድድር ክዑሶ እግሪ NFL ናይ 2020 ዓመተ ስፖርት ንኩሎም ኣብ ናይ ተጸበይቲ ቦታ ዝርከቡ ኣሰልጠንትን ኣባላትን ማስኬራታት ክወድዩ ከም ዘለዎም ክሕብሮም እዩ።

data.eng: Tropical Storm Nana is expected to strengthen into a strong tropical storm before it makes landfall in Belize tomorrow.
data.aaf: Bangaledesh qasama daakah xaqul beriganigah weqaytih addal hurite akikek dinikitelih boodak wuli 32 namma num rabeh.
data.amh: ሞቃታማ አውሎ ነፋስ ናና ነገ ቤሊዝ ውስጥ ከመድረሱ በፊት ወደ ኃይለኛ ሞቃታማ አውሎ ነፋስ ይጠነክራል ተብሎ ይጠበቃል።
data.orm: Obomboleettiin naannoo bantii lafaa Naanaan bor osoo daka Beeliiz hin qaqqabiin dura gara obomboleettii bantii lafaa hamaattii ni guddata.
data.som: Duufaanta Nana ayaa la filayaa inay isku badasho duufaan xoog leh ka hor inta aysan berri ku dhicin dalka Belize.
data.tir: ናና ተባሂሉ ዝተፀወዐ ማዕበል ትሮፒክ ፅባሕ ኣብ በሊዝ ቅድሚ ምዕራፉ ናህሩ ወሲኹ ክጓዓዝ ትፅቢት ተገይሩሉ ኣሎ።

data.eng: COVID-19 pandemic in Slovenia Slovenia registers its highest number of new cases since April 1, with 55 new cases reported in the last 24 hours.
data.aaf: Solviniyal KOVIX-19 Dalka Qasadirik 1 Wadiril Fayale Ixximaleh Tan Qusba Marite Tunkutube, warayte 24 Saqatih Addat 55 takke Qusba Caagidak Gabaaqi Xayoowe.
data.amh: ኮቪድ-19 በስሎቬንያ- በስሎቬንያ ባለፉት 24 ሰአታት ውስጥ ከሚያዚያ ወር መጀመሪያ አንስቶ ከፍተኛ የተባለውን በበኮቪድ-19 የተጠቁ ሰዎችን ቁጥር 55 በመሆን መዝግባለች።
data.orm: Weerara COVID-19 Silooveniyaa: Silooveeniyaan lakkoofsa namoota haaraa dhukkubichaa qaban erga Ebla 1 as isa guddicha, sa'atii 24 darban keessatti lakkoofsa namoota haaraa dhukkubichaan qaban 55 gabaase.
data.som: Faafida COVID-19 ee Slovenia, Slovenia waxay diiwaangelisay tiradii ugu badneyd ee kiisas cusub ah tan iyo 1-dii Abriil, iyadoo 55 xaaladood oo cusub la soo sheegay 24-kii saac ee la soo dhaafay.
data.tir: ለበዳ ኮቪድ:19 ኣብ ስሎቬኒያ ብዝምልከት ካብ ሚያዝያ ንነዘ ስሎቬኒያ ዝለዓለ ቁፅሪ ሓደሽቲ ዝተትሓዙ ዝመዝገበት እንትኾን ኣብ ውሽጢ 24 ሰዓታት ጥራሕ ሓደሽቲ 55 ሰባት ከምዝተለኸፉ ፀብፂባ።

data.eng: Turkish Volkan Bozkır becomes the new President of the United Nations General Assembly.
data.aaf: Turkiya Qas-Dirih Gazak flotilla Gadulel Fokaqo Abtuh Turkiyah Miraciinu kee bureaucratite Kommishoinite Xisimte.
data.amh: የቱርኩ ቮልካን ቦዝኪር አዲሱ የተባበሩት መንግስታት ጠቅላላ ጉባኤ ፕሬዚደንት ተደርጎ ተሸመ።
data.orm: Lammiin Turkii Voolkaan Boozkir Pirasdaantii haaraa Walitti-qabama Waliigalaa Mootummoota Gamtoomanii ta'e.
data.som: Volkan Bozkır oo Turki ah ayaa noqday Madaxweynaha cusub ee Golaha Guud ee Qaramada Midoobay.
data.tir: ቱርካዊ ቮልካን ቦዝኪር ሓድሽ ፕረዚደንት ጠቕላሊ ባይቶ ውዱብ ሕቡራት ሃገራት ኮይኑ ኣሎ።

data.eng: 2020 Stanley Cup Finals The Tampa Bay Lightning win the Stanley Cup for the first time since 2004 following their game 6 victory against the Dallas Stars.
data.aaf: Ximokratik sunami Boykot gibatu yakemih El Kilasiko kamibinu barsalonalih baxasale Amni maqatootil Digirele.
data.amh: የ 2020 በስታንሊ ዋንጫ ፍፃሜ ታምፓ ቤይ ላይቲንግ ከዳላስ ስታርስ ጋር ያደረገውን 6 ጨዋታ ተከትሎ ከ 2004 ወዲህ ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ የስታንሊ ዋንጫን አሸነፈ።
data.orm: Goolabdoonni Geeba Istaanlii bara 2020, Ze Taampaa Beey Laayitiniing tapha isaanii Daalas Istaars wajjin morkatan si'a 6 mo'ichuu hordofuun erga bara 2004 tii yeroo jalqabaaf Geeba Istaanlii injifatan
data.som: Ciyaarta gunaanadka ee Koobka Stanley 2020, The Tampa Bay Lightning ayaa ku guuleysatay koobka Stanley markii ugu horeysay tan iyo 2004 kadib ciyaartii 6aad ay ka badiyeen Dallas Stars.
data.tir: ንፅዋዕ ስታንሌይ ናይ መወዳእታ ግጥም ዘካየደ ጋንታ ታምፓ ላይቲንይንግ ኣብ ፀዋታ 6 ንጋንታ ስታርስ ስለዝስዓረ ድሕሪ 2004 ዓ.ም.ፈ ንፈለማ ግዜ ፅዋዕ ስታንሌይ ወሲዱ።

data.eng: The U.S. Department of Justice announces the seizure of 92 domain names believed to be used by the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps to "spread pro-Iranian disinformation".
data.aaf: ISrail Awra ill Baaxoh Addah elle cutamal falastin Adatinok ugut abak israil falastinik mawyanan Buqre kee murti Tabixek Ayro korma banki wasisa.
data.amh: “የኢራን ደጋፊ መረጃን ለማሰራጨት” በእስላማዊ አብዮታዊ ጥበቃ ሃይሎች ጥቅም ላይ እንደዋሉ የሚታመኑ ዘጠና ሁለት የጎራ ስሞችን መወገድ የአሜሪካ የፍትህ መምሪያ አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Dippaartmentiin Haqaa U.S maqaa doomenii 92 kan Garee Eegduu Warraaqsa Isilaamummaa Iraaniin fayyadamamu jedhamee amanamu kan "oduu doggogoraa Iraaniin deggeru facaasu" f oolan qabachuu isaa beeksise.
data.som: Waaxda Caddaaladda ee Mareykanka ayaa ku dhawaaqday qabashada 92 cinwaan oo la rumeysan yahay inay adeegsadeen Ilaalada Kacaanka Islaamku si ay u faafiyaan wararka been-abuurka ah .
data.tir: ኮር ዋርድያ እስላማዊ ወያነ ዝተበሃለ ጉጅለ ንኢራን ዝወገነ ግጉይ ሓበሬታ ንምንዛሕ ከምዝጥቀመሎም ዝተኣመነሎም 92 ኣስማት ድረ ገፅ ከምዝሓዘ ሚኒስቴር ፍትሒ ኣሜሪካ ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: Multiple skeletons of Oksoko avarsan are discovered in the Gobi Desert in Mongolia.
data.aaf: NASA marisil Qusba Manoh Oytih Yabbite Bayisah, Takkay Iammay Yaxxigenimih Fayxi Rover Mango Qunxah tan Geyentit Abbak Gettima.
data.amh: በሞንጎሊያ ጎቢ በረሃ ውስጥ ብዛት ያላቸው የኦክሶኮ ኣቫርሳን አፅሞች ተገኙ።
data.orm: Lafe hedduun Oksookoo Avaarsan gammoojjii Mongooliyaa keessatti argameera.
data.som: Qalfoofyo badan oo Oksoko avarsan ayaa laga helay lamadegaanka Gobi ee Mongolia.
data.tir: ኣብ ሞንጎልያ ኣብ ምድረበዳ ጎቢ ብዙሕ ክፋላት ኣስከሬን ናይ Oksoko avarsan ተረኺቡ።

data.eng: Rwanda legalizes the production of medical cannabis for export, but the Health Ministry states that cannabis consumption of any kind in the country will remain illegal.
data.aaf: Ruwanaxa Dayli kanabise Illa iro ruubak Ganun Abte፣ Takakay imay Ta abaxoh Addal waliqaynatih kanabise bayisiyi ganuun akuk sugelemQafiyat Dacarih Malaak qadose.
data.amh: ሩዋንዳ የካናቢስ የህክምና ምርትን ወደ ውጭ ለመላክ ሕጋዊ አደረገች ፤ ነገር ግን በአገሪቱ ውስጥ ማንኛውንም ዓይነት የካናቢስ አደንዛዥ እፅ ፍጆታ ሕገ-ወጥ ሆኖ እንደሚቆይ የጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስትሩ ገልፀዋል።
data.orm: Ruwaandaan kanaabisii fayyaa alergeef oomishuu heyyamte, garuu Ministeerri Fayyaa, biyyattii keessatti kanaabisii gosa kamiiyyuu fudhachuun seeraan ala akka tahe eere.
data.som: Rwanda waxay sharciyeysay soosaarka xashiishadda caafimaadka ee loo dhoofiyo dalka dibadiisa, laakiin Wasaaradda Caafimaadka ayaa sheegeysa in isticmaalka xashiishadda dalka gudeheeda ay sii ahaan doonto sharci darro.
data.tir: ሩዋንዳ ንወጻኢ ሰደድ ዝኸውን ሕክምናዊ ካናቢስ/ሓሺሽ ምፍራይ ሕጋዊ እኳ እንተ ገበረቶ ሚኒስትሪ ጥዕና ከም ዝገለጸቶ ግን ኣብታ ሃገር ዝኾነ ይኹን ዓይነት ምግቢ ካናቢስ ዘይሕጋዊ ክኸውን እዩ።

data.eng: The Gambia announces that they have submitted a lawsuit against Myanmar for their role in the Rohingya genocide at the International Court of Justice in The Hague.
data.aaf: Gambiya Hedil Geytima Baad Caadoh Sangarah Buxa Hohiniyah kititifih Addat Abeenih Yannin Doori Meynamaral Meklis Xayosem Qadose
data.amh: ጋምቢያ ከሮሂነግያ የዘር ጥፋት ጋር በተያያዘ ማይናማር ላይ በሄግ ለሚገኘው የአለም አቀፉ የፍትህ ጉዳዮች ፍርድ ቤት ክስ እንዳቀረበች አስታወቀች።
data.orm: Gaambiyaan himannaa Mayaanmaar duguuggaa sanyii Rohingyaa keessaa ga'ee qabdi jedhu Mana Murtii Haqaa Addunyaa kan Haguwe kessatti argamutti galfachuu beeksiste.
data.som: Gambia ayaa sheegtay inay Myanmar ku dacweeyeen Maxkamadda Caalamiga ah ee Hague gacantii ay ka gaysteen xasuuqii Rohingya.
data.tir: ማይናማር ኣብ ምፅናት ዓሌት ሮሂንጋ ዝነበራ ተራ ብዝምልከት ክትሕተተሉ ኣብ ሄግ ኣብ ዝርከብ ዓለም ለኸ ቤት ፍርዲ ክሲ ከምዝመስረተት ጋምቢያ ኣፍሊጣ ።

data.eng: The Greek Navy's mine countermeasures vessel HS Kallisto is cut in two in a collision with a container ship.
data.aaf: 100 mayilik/saqatak dagga silaytite lehtan caylale xireko fanti macak Usik afara bool 11 milyoon dolaarih taqabi madise.
data.amh: ኤች ኤስ ካሊስቶ የግሪክ ባሕር ኃይል የማዕድን ማውጫ መርከብ ከሌላ የእቃ መጫኛ መርከብ ጋር በመጋጨቱ ለሁለት ተከፍሏል።
data.orm: Dooniin albuuda humna ittisa bishaanirraa Giriik, Kaallistoo HS doonii fe'umsaa waliin walitti bu'uu isaatiin bakka lamatti adda bahe.
data.som: Markabka miinooyinka ee milateriga ee Giriigga HS Kallisto ayaa laba u kala jabay kadib markay isku dhaceen markab konteenar ah.
data.tir: ኤች ኤስ ካሊስቶ ዝተብሃለት ነታጒ እተፅሪ መርከብ ግሪስ ምስ ሓንቲ ኣቑሑት እትፅዕን መርከብ ተላቲማ ኣብ ክልተ ተገሚዓ።

data.eng: FIFA announces that the President Gianni Infantino tests positive for COVID-19.
data.aaf: Fifa berezixanti Jiyaneni Enefanetino kovix-19 yintiribixem Qadose.
data.amh: ፊፋ ፕሬዚዳንቱ ጂያኒ ኢንፋንቲኖ ኮቪድ-19 እንደተገኘባቸው አስታወቀ።
data.orm: FIFAn pireezidaanti Jiyaanii Infaantiinoon dhibee Covid-19 qabamuu isaanii ifoomse.
data.som: FIFA ayaa ku cadaysay in Madaxweynaha Gianni Infantino laga helay COVID-19.
data.tir: ፕረዚደንት ፊፋ ጅያኒ ኢንፋንቲኖ ዘካየዶ መርመራ ኮቪድ-19 ኣዎንታዊ ኮይኑ ከም ዝተረኽበ ፊፋ ሓቢሩ።

data.eng: The Czech Police Forces announce that they will carry out random border checks with Austria as a preventive measure against terrorism.
data.aaf: Czech Boliis Cayliteta Qarkakisa Kalaloonuh Inki Kalali Qandeh Maqata Ostiriyalih Isinifaxenik Cuduud Taftish BaeloonumQadose.
data.amh: የቼክ ፖሊስ ኃይሎች ሽብርተኝነትን ለመከላከል የሚስችል እርምጃን ከኦስትሪያ ጋር ድንገተኛ የድንበር ፍተሻ እንደሚያካሂዱ አስታውቀዋል።
data.orm: Humnoonni Poolisii Cheek tarkaanfii ittisa shororkeessummaaf darbee darbee to'annoo daangaa Ostiriyaa irratti akka geggeessu beeksise.
data.som: Ciidamada Booliiska Czech waxay ku dhawaaqayaan inay si aan kala sooc lahayn u baari doonaan xuduudaha Austria si ay uga hortagaan argagixisada.
data.tir: ሓይሊታት ፖሊስ ቼክ ግብረ ሽበራ ንምክልኻል ዝዓለመ ሃንደበታዊ ተፍትሽ ኣብ ዶብ ኦስትሪያ ከምዘካይዱ ዕላዊ ገይሮም ።

data.eng: The Egyptian Football Association announces that Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah has tested positive for COVID-19 shortly before Egypt's 2021 Africa Cup of Nations qualifier match against Togo.
data.aaf: NFL Okilanidu Rado aba Ambuluyuk Illa Las Vegas fanah taturen፣ kee Tawak Las Vegas Radoaba Iyanamal Tamixige.
data.amh: የግብፅ እግር ኳስ ማህበር በ 2021 ግብፅ ከቶጎ ጋር የአፍሪካ ዋንጫ ማጣሪያ ጨዋታ ከማድረጓ በፊት የሊቨርፑል የፊት መስመር ተጫዋች ሞሃመድ ሳላህ በቅርቡ ኮቪድ -19 ተመርምሮ እንደተገኘበት አስታውቋል
data.orm: Waldaan Kubbaa Miilaa Gibxii dorgommii gulaallii Geeba Biyyoota Afirikaa bara 2021 kan Gibxi Toogoo waliin taphattu xiqqoo dursee taphataan sarara duraa Liiverpuul Mohaammed Saalaan qorannoo COVID-19'f posatiivii akka tahe beeksise.
data.som: Xidhiidhka Kubadda Cagta Masar ayaa ku dhawaaqay in weeraryahanka Liverpool Maxamed Saalax laga helay COVID-19 waxyar ka hor kulanka isreeb-reebka Koobka Qaramada Afrika ee 2021 ay Masar la yeelan lahaayd Togo.
data.tir: ግብፂ ኣብ 2021 ዓ.ም.ፈ ኣብ ዝካየድ ግጥም ፅዋዕ ሃገራት ኣፍሪካ ንምስታፍ ዘኽእል ፀዋታ ምስ ቶጐ ንምግባር ኣብ ዝተዳለወትሉ ቅድሚ ውሱን ግዚያት እቲ ናይ ሊቨርፑል ኣጥቓዓይ መሓመድ ሳሊሕ ብኮቪድ:19 ከምዝተትሓዘ ማሕበር ኩዕሶ እግሪ ግብፂ ዕላዊ ገይሩ።

data.eng: Kosovo's parliament unanimously approves deploying the Kosovo Security Force on international peacekeeping missions, following a formal request by the United States Central Command.
data.aaf: Kosovoh Barlama USi Fanti Izik Madab Essero Kosovo Say Caylih Baadal Salaam Dacayril Madamal kah gacanah Xongolo Faticisen.
data.amh: የኮሶቮ ፓርላማ ከአሜሪካ መአከላዊ ትእዛዝ የመጣለትን ጥያቄ በመቀበል የሃገሪቱን የድህንነተ እና የፀጥታ ሃይል በአለም አቀፍ የሰላም ማከበር ተልእኮ ላይ እንዲሳተፍ ሲል በአንድ ድምፅ አፀደቀ።
data.orm: Paarlaamaan Kosoovoo gaaffii karaa seera qabeessa Ajaji Giddugaleessaa Yuunaayitid Isteetis dhiyeesse hordofuun Humna Nageenyaa Kosoovoo ergama naga eegdummaa addunyaaf akka bobba'an mirkaneessan.
data.som: Codsi rasmi ah oo ka yimid taliska dhexe ee Maraykanka kadib baarlamaanka Kosovo ayaa si aqlabiyad leh u ansixiyay in ciidanka ammaanka Kosovo la geeyo hawlgallada nabad ilaalinta ee caalamiga ah.
data.tir: ባይቶ ኮሶቮ ካብ ማእከላይ እዚ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ወግዓዊ ሕቶ ምስ ቀረበሉ ሓይሊ ጸጥታ ኮሶቮ ኣብ ተልእኮ ኣህጉራዊ ምዕቃብ ሰላም ክሳተፍ ብሓደ ድምጺ ኣጽዲቑ።

data.eng: Twitter says that they have suspended over 70,000 accounts linked to the QAnon conspiracy since the Capitol storming.
data.aaf: I.L.L. 1986 Awustaraliyah Baddih Qaxal Geytimteh Tan Namma dendrogramma DuruyaFaxeaynatih Sgte Filmiteh Addal Madabah Gacewanam Akkuk Geytime.
data.amh: ትዊተር ከካፒተል ቀውስ በ|ላ 70000 የሚጠጉ አካውንቶችን ከቃኖን ቅሌት ጋር በተያያዘ እንዳገደ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Tiwiteer akkaawuntii 70,000 oduu Qanon waliin hidhata qaban obonboleetti guddicha Kaappitol booda akka ugguran ifoomse.
data.som: Twitter ka ayaa sheegay inay joojiyeen in ka badan 70,000 oo cinwaano ah oo lala xidhidhiyay shirqoolkii QAnon tan iyo markii Capitol ay duufaanta gashay.
data.tir: ትዊተር ኣብ ልዕሊ ህንጻ ካፒቶል ድሕሪ እቲ ዝተፈጸመ መጥቃዕቲ ልዕሊ 70,000 ምስ ውዲት QAnon ርክብ ዝነበሮም ሕሳባት ደው ከም ዘበለ ጠቒሱ።

data.eng: United States Vice President Mike Pence congratulates incoming Vice President Kamala Harris, 73 days after the presidential election.
data.aaf: Ameerikak Cigiila Berezixenti Mayik bensi Tamaateh Tan Cigiilta Berezixanti Kamala Carisih Gadda Gacise. Berezixantiini Dooro 73 Ayrook Lakal.
data.amh: የአሜሪካው ምክትል ፕሬዚደንት ማይክ ፔንስ የፕሬዚደንታዊው ምርጫው ከተጠናቀቀ 73 ቀናት በ|ላ ለሚመጡት ምክትል ጠቅላይ ሚኒስቴር ካማላ ሃሪስ የእንኳን ደስ አለሽ መልእክተ አስተላለፉ።
data.orm: Itti Aanaan Pirezidaantii Yunaaytid Isteetis Maayik Peens erga filannoon xumuramee guyyoota 73 booda itti aantuu haaraa dhufaa jirtu Kamaalaa Haarisiif erga baga gammadde dabarsan.
data.som: Madaxweyne ku xigeenka Mareykanka Mike Pence ayaa u hambalyo u diray madaxweyne ku xigeenka imanaysa ee Kamala Harris, 73 maalmood kadib doorashadii madaxwane nimada.
data.tir: ኣሜሪካዊ ምክትል ፕረዚደንት ማይክ ፐንስ፣ ድሕሪ ዝተኻየደ 73 መዓልታት ፕረዚደንታዊ ምርጫታት ንእትመጽእ ምክትል ፕረዚደንት ዝኾነት ካማላ ሃሪስ ደስታኡ ገሊጹ።

data.eng: Polish biotechnology company Mabion S.A. signs an agreement with Novavax to begin commercial-scale production trials for Novavax's future vaccine.
data.aaf: Bolanxih Bio-Technologih Kubaniya Mabion S.A Novavax's Sari Diwata Kabxah Aqikiniyih Kibatite Qimbisoonuh Novavaxlih Sitingey Yifrimen.
data.amh: የፖላንድ የባዮቴክኖሎጂ ኩባንያ ማቢዮን ኤስ.ኤ ለኖቫቫክስ የወደፊት ክትባት ለንግድ የሚሆን የምርት ሙከራ ለመጀመር ከኖቫቫክስ ጋር ስምምነት ተፈራረመ።
data.orm: Dhaabbanni baayootekinoolojii Poolaand, Maabiyoon S.A'n Noovaavaaks wajjin talaallii Novaavaaks fuulduraa oomisha yaalii iskeelii daldalaatiin akka eegalan waliigaltee mallatteessan.
data.som: Shirkadda teknolojiyadda cilmiga bayoolajiga ee Mabion S.A. waxay heshiis la saxiixatay Novavax si loo bilaabo tijaabooyinka wax soo saarka baaxadda leh ee tallaalka mustaqbalka Novavax.
data.tir: ፖላንዳዊት ኩባንያ ባዮተክኖሎጂ ማብዮን ኤስ.አይ ኣብ መጻኢ ንኖቫቫክስ ዝኸውን ክታበት ናይ ንግዲ ፈተናታት ንምጅማር ምስ ኖቫቫክስ ስምምዕ ፈሪማ።

data.eng: YouTube suspends channels run by Myanmar's military and removes junta propaganda videos for "violating its community guidelines and terms of service".
data.aaf: Yuttiyub Xinqista Mangaafa Maynamar Qandeh Gubat Raqta Chanalite gexegak kee Ta Juntah Boroboganxooxih Vixiyooya "Ayyuntiteetah Edde Xinteeta kee Ayfaafite Ganasaqo Cinak Bayisah".
data.amh: ዩትዩብ በማይናማር ወታደራዊ ድርጅት ባለቤትነት የሚዘወረውን እና የጁንታ ፕሮፓጋንዳ ቪድዮወችን በመልቀቅ የማህበረሰብ ህግ እና ደንቦቸን የጣሰውን ቻናል ዘጋ።
data.orm: Yuutiyuubin chaanaalii humna waraanaa maayanmaarin hoogganamu uggure, akkasumas suur-sagalee piroopagaandaa abbaa hirree 'walii galtee tajaajila hawaasaa isaatii cabsuu' kan jedhuun haqeera.
data.som: YouTube ayaa joojiyay kanaallada ay maamulaan milatariga Myanmar waxayna ka saareen muuqaalada dacaayadda junta “ku xadgudubka tilmaamaha bulshada iyo shuruudaha adeegga”.
data.tir: ዩትዩፕ ብሰንኪ "ጥሕሰት ማሕበራዊ መምርሒታትን ኩነታት ኣጠቓቕማን" ነተን ብሰራዊት ሚያንማር ዝመሓደራ ቻነላት ኣወንዚፉ ብወተሃደራዊ ባይቶ ጁንታ ዝተዘርገሑ ናይ ፕሮፖጋንዳ ቪድዮታት ኣሊዩ።

data.eng: Gujarat reports a record 12,553 new cases of COVID-19 in the past 24 hours.
data.aaf: Gujrat Waraye 24 Saqatih Addat 12,553 Qusba Kovix-19Caagida Tunkutube.
data.amh: ጉጃራት ባለፉት 24 ሰዓታት ውስጥ ሪከርድ የሆነ 12,553 አዲስ የ COVID-19 ታማሚዎችን ሪፖርት አደረገች።
data.orm: Gujaraat sa'atiiwwan 24 darban keessatti namoota COVID-19'n qabaman haaraa 12,553 galmeessite.
data.som: Gujarat ayaa sheegay in 12,553 xaaladood oo cusub oo ah COVID-19 lahelay 24 tii saacadood ee la soo dhaafay.
data.tir: ጉጃራት ኣብ ዝሓለፈ 24 ሰዓታት 12,553 ሓደስቲ መልኸፍቲ ኮቪድ-19 ከም ዘጋጠመ ጸብጻብ ሂባ/ኣላ።

data.eng: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky invites his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin to a face-to-face meeting on the front line in the war-torn Donbas to negotiate an end to the conflict.
data.aaf: Fayale Kiblati Kuriyah Yabukeh yan Hwang Jang-yobut Rabi Gibatu Abnisak Namma KiblatiKuriyah Xaylo Casbih Digalimeh.
data.amh: የዩክሬኑ ፕሬዚደንት ቮሎዲመር ዜልንስኪ ለሩሲያ አቻቸው ቭላድሚር ፑቲን በጦርነት እጅጉን በተጎዳቸው በዶንባስ ተገናኝተን ስለ ግጭቱ ማብቂያ ፊት ለፊት እንወያይ ሲሉ ግብዣ አቀረቡ።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin Yukiriyeen Voloodimir Zeleniskii gita isaa Raashiyaa Vilaadmir Puutiniin bakka waraanaan diigamte Doonbas keessatti fuuldura waraanaatti mareen akka rakkoo xumuraniif marii fuulaa fuulattiif afeere.
data.som: Madaxweynaha Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky ayaa ku casuumay dhiggiisa Ruushka Vladimir Putin kulan Waji iyo waji ah oo ka socda jiidda hore ee dagaalka Donbas si looga xaajoodo joojinta colaadda.
data.tir: ፕረዚደንት ዩክረይን ቮሎዲሚር ዘለንስኪ ነቲ ሩስያዊ ብጻዩ ቭላድሚር ፑቲን ኣብቲ ብውግእ ዝዓነወት ግንባር ዶንባስ ውግእ ደው ንምባል ገጽ ንገጽ ክራኸብ ዓዲሙዎ ኣሎ።

data.eng: The United States Navy announces that it has seized a shipment of thousands of weapons in a stateless dhow on the Arabian Sea believed to be en-route to Yemen.
data.aaf: USik Navy Baddi Qande Illa Yaman Gexelon Axcuk Minuk Qarab Baddal Alafaatal Lowinta Qeebi Aslacooci Tibixem Qadose.
data.amh: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ባሕር ኃይል ወደ የመን ይጓዛል ተብሎ በሚታመን በአረብ ባህር ላይ ሀገር አልባ በሆነ ጀልባ ውስጥ በሺዎች የሚቆጠሩ የጦር መሣሪያዎችን በቁጥጥር ስር መዋሉን አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Humni Galaanaa Yunaayitid Isteetis meeshaaleen waraanaa kumootaan lakkaa'amu doonii abbaa hin qabnetti fe'amee gara Yemen deemaa jiru galaana Arabiyaa irratti akka too'ate beeksise.
data.som: Ciidamada badda ee Mareykanka ayaa ku dhawaaqay inay qabteen shixnad siday kumanaan hub ah oo saaran doon aan dawli ahayn oo la rumeysan yahay inay ku sii jeeday Yemen.
data.tir: ሓይሊ ባሕሪ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ናብ የመን ተፃዒኑ ዝጓዓዝ ከምዝኾነ ዝግመት ኣሽሓት ኣፅዋራት ኣብ ባሕሪ ዓረብ ኣብʼታ መንግስቲ ኣልቦ ዝኾነት ዳው መርከብ ከምዝሓዘ ኣፍሊጡ ።

data.eng: Eid al-Fitr, the "Feast of Breaking the Fast" that marks the end of the month-long dawn-to-sunset fasting of Ramadan, is celebrated in Istanbul's Hagia Sophia for the first time in 87 years.
data.aaf: Ramadan Som Ilacabol Som Gabakalem Elle yaxigen “Qidi Ayroh Waynabo” Istanbuuluk Hgiya Sofiya 87 sanootahAddal Qimbo Adah Yeskexen.
data.amh: ወሩን ሙሉ ፀሃይ እስክትገባ የሚፆምበት የረመዳን ፆምን መጨረስ ተከትሎ የሚመጣውና "ፆምን በድግስ ማፍረስ" የሚባለው የኢድ አል ፈጥር በአል በኢስታንቡል ሀጌ ሶፊያ ከ87 አመት በ|ላ ተከበረ።
data.orm: Id al-Fitir, "Dhangaan Sooma Ittiin Hiikan" kan xumura soomana Ramadaanaa baatii guutuu kan bariiirraa kaasee hanga aduun lixxuuttii agarsiisu, waggoota 87 keessatti yeroo jalqabaaf Hagi'aa Soofiyaa kan Istaanbul keessaatti kabajame.
data.som: Ciidul Fidriga, oo astaan u ah dhammaadka soonka bisha Ramadaan, ayaa markii ugu horreysay muddo 87 sanadood lagu xusay masjidka taarikhiga ah ee Hagia Sophia ee magaalada Istanbul.
data.tir: እቲ በዓል መፍትሒ እታ ፆም ዝኾነን ሓደ ወርሒ ምስተፆመ አብ ዝሕሉ ወጋአታ ብራቕ ፀሓይ ፆመ ሮመዳን ዝውዕልን ኢድ አልፈጥር ድሕሪ 87 ዓመታት ንመጀመርታ ግዜ ኣብ ኢስታንቡል ሃጊያ ሶፍያ ተኾቢሩ ።

data.eng: Pro-Palestinian protesters storm the Queensway tunnel in the United Kingdom, disrupting traffic.
data.aaf: Falastin Qokolah Sadimarite UKek Queensway Galbah Addat Culah Tarafik Agaguluseenih.
data.amh: በእንግሊዝ ክዊንስዌይ ድልድይ ላይ የፍልስጤም ደጋፊዎች ባደረጉት ሰልፍ የትራፊክ መጨናነቅ ተፈጠረ።
data.orm: Hirmaattonni hiriira deeggartoota Palastaayinii ujummoo daandii Kuwwiins wey Yunaaytid Kiingidam keessatti argamu weeraruun sochii konkolaattotaa daangessan.
data.som: Banaan baxayaasha taageersan Falastiin ayaa xoog ku galay hoga Queensway ee Boqortooyada Ingiriiska, iyagoo hakad geliyay isu socodkii gaadiidka.
data.tir: ደገፍቲ ፍልስጤም ዝኾኑ ሰልፈኛታት ኣብ ዩናይትድ ኪንግደም ንበዓቲ ኩዊንስ ወይ ብምዕፃዎም ምትሕልለፍ ተሸከርከርቲ ተኣጓጕሉ ።

data.eng: President Jovenel Moïse postpones the constitutional referendum, originally scheduled for June 27, to an unknown date citing rising COVID-19 cases in the country.
data.aaf: Berexizanti Jovenel Moïse Ta Baaxoh Adda Kovix-19 Osimak Yemetimik Qimbol kay Baxal 22 Ikraarimte Doolat Ganunih Ayyuntih Margaqa Aki Wakti Fanah Yayxereh.
data.amh: ፕሬዚደንት ጆቭኔል ሞይዝ ቀድሞ ሰኔ 27 ላይ እንዲደረግ የታቀደውን የህገመንግስታዊው ህዝበ ውሳኔ በሃገሪቱ እየጨመረ የመጣውን የኮቪድ-19 ወረርሽኝ ምክንያት በማድረግ ላልታወቀ ቀን እንዲተላለፍ አደረጉ።
data.orm: Pirezidaant Jooveel Mooseen biyattii keessatti dhimmoonni Koovid 19 walqabatan guddachaa dhufuu isaatiin Murtoo-ummataa Heeraa kan Gurraandhala 27 tti karoorfame ture gara yeroo hin beekamniitti dheerachuu isaa ibsan.
data.som: Madaxweyne Jovenel Moïse ayaa dib u dhigay aftida dastuurka, oo markii hore loo qorsheeyay 27ka Juun, ilaamaalin aan la cadaynin isagoo tixraacaya kiisaska COVID-19 ee dalka ku sii kordhaya.
data.tir: ብሰንኪ ኣብቲ ሃገር ተኸሲቱ ዝርከብ ልዕሉ መልከፍቲ ኮሮና ቫይረስ፣ እቲ ብቀንዱ ኣብ 27 ሰነ ተወጢኑ ዝተሓስበ ረፈረንደም ቅዋም፣ ናብ ዘይተወሰነ ዕለት ክፍጸም ፕረዚደንት ጆቪኔል ሞየስ ኣመሓላሊፉ።

data.eng: U.S. President Joe Biden signs a law that would make Juneteenth a federal holiday, thereby making it the first federal holiday since the 1983 establishment of Martin Luther King Jr. Day.
data.aaf: USik Berezexaniti Jo baden federal Waynabobi Abah yan Mdaqh Yiyfirime፣ thak 1983 Martin luterkingi Juner Ayro Ximemik lakal Qimboh federl Waynabo Abe.
data.amh: የአሜሪካው ፕሬዚደንት ጆ ባይደን ጁንቲንዝን አገር አቀፋዊ በአል ለማድረግ የሚያስችል ህግ በፊርማቸው አፀደቁ፤ ይህም በአል ከ1983 የማርቲን ሉተር ኪንግ ቀን በአል በ|ላ የተሰየመ የመጀመሪያው ሀገር አቀፍ በአል ነው።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin U.S. Joo Baayiden erga hundeeffama Guyyaa Maartin Luuter Kiing Jr. isa 1983 tii guyyaa ayyaana federaalaa isa jalqabaa kan isa godhu seera Juuntiinth guyyaa ayyaana federaalaa godhu mallatteesse.
data.som: Madaxweynaha Mareykanka Joe Biden ayaa saxiixay sharci ka dhigaya in munasabada Juneteenth -ka laga dhigo fasax federaal ah, taaso ka dhigaysa fasaxii ugu horreeyay ee federaal ah tan iyo markii la aasaasay Martin Luther King Jr. 1983 dii.
data.tir: ፕሬዚዳንት ዩ ኤስ ኣሜሪካ ጁንቲንዝ ብፌዴራል ደረጃ ዝኽበር በዓል ክኸውን ዝገብር ሕጊ ፈሪሞም።እዚ ክብረ በዓል ድሕሪ እቲ ብ1983 ዓ ምፈ ዝተሐገገ መዓልቲ ማርቲን ሉተር ኪንግ ጄ ኣር ዝኽበር ፈላማይ ፌዴራላዊ ክብረ በዓል ኮይኑ ኣሎ።

data.eng: Germany bans the flag of Hamas after it was used during protests over the 2021 Israel–Palestine crisis.
data.aaf: 2021 Israil Kee Falastin Taqbil Uguteh Sadite Garman Camas Simbilwaaseh.
data.amh: ጀርመን በ2021 የእስራኤል እና ፍልስጤም ቀውስ ውስጥ የሃማስ ባንዲራ በተቃውሞወች ላይ ታይቷል በሚል የሃማስ ባንዲራ እንዲከለከል አደረገች።
data.orm: Jarmaniin bara 2021 jeequmsa Isiraa'el fi Filisxeemiin walqabatee hiriira mormii ka'e irratti qabatanii ba'uu isaaniitiin alaabaa Hamaas dhorkite.
data.som: Jarmalka ayaa mamnuucay calanka Xamaas ka dib markii loo adeegsaday banaanbaxi 2021 ee dhibatooyinka Israel iyo Falastiin.
data.tir: ጀርመን ነቲ ኣብ 2021 ዓ.ምፈ ኣብ ግዜ ግርጭት እስራኤልን ፍልስጤምን ዝተምበልበለ ባንዴራ ሃማስ ኣጊዳቶ ።

data.eng: The United States, Canada, and the United Kingdom impose sanctions against Belarus for last month's diverting of Ryanair Flight 4978, which led to the arrest of journalist Roman Protasevich.
data.aaf: Xelhil Geytima Jamah Masgidik Irol Namma Taywan Wacasir Aba Gira Yogorenimik Gexamah US kee Awutaraliya Hindi Gexo Mabitina Yecen.
data.amh: አሜሪካ፣ ካናዳ እና እንግሊዝ ቤላሩስ የራይንኤር በረራ ቁጥር 4978 አቀጣጫ ማስቀየር ተከትሎ ጋዜጠኛ ሮማን ፕሮታሴቪች በቁጥጥር ስር እንዲውል በመርዳቷ ቤላሩስ ላይ ማእቀብ ላይ ጣሉ።
data.orm: Yunaayitid Isteetis, Kanaadaa, fi Yunaayitid Kiingidem karaa irraa jal'isuu Balalii Riyaanee'ir 4978 kan hidhamuu gaazexeessaa Roomaan Pirootaasevichiitti geesse hordofuun Belaarus irra qoqqobbii kaa'an.
data.som: Mareykanka, kanada, iyo Boqortooyada Ingiriiska ayaa cunaqabateyn ku soo rogay Belarus markii loo sheegay duulimaadkii Ryanair ee 4978, taasoo keentay in la xidho wariye Roman Protasevich.
data.tir: ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ፣ ካናዳ፣ ከምኡ'ውን ዓዲ እንግሊዝ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ወርሒ ራያንየር በረራ 4978 ጉዕዞኣ ናብ ካልእ ቦታ ድሕሪ ምቕያራ ኣንጻር ቤላሩስ እገዳ ኣንቢረናላ፣ እዚ ድማ ሮማን ፕሮታሰቪች ዝበሃል ጋዜጠኛ ኣብ ትሕቲ ቀይዲ ከም ዝኸውን ተገይሩ።

data.eng: The United Nations' World Meteorological Organization confirms that a record high temperature of 18.3 °C (64.9 °F) has been recorded in Antarctica at the Esperanza Base.
data.aaf: USik Maqqida kee Dawaata Xiinisoh Jenetikil Yiysiisen Xinich kee Babyo Faticise.
data.amh: የተባበሩት መንግስታት ድረጅት የአየር ንብረት ጉዳዮች ድርጅት በእንታርክቲካ ኤስፕራንዛ 18.3 ዲግሪ ሴንቲግሬድ ወይም 64.9 ዲግሪ ፋራናይት የሆነ ከዚህ በፊት ተመዝግቦ የማያውቅ ከፍተኛ የሙቀት መጠን እንደተመዘገበ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Dhaabbatni meetirooloojii mootummoota gamtoomanii ho'i ol ka'aan 18.3 °C (64.9 °F) Antarkitikaaa jala Espeeraanzaatti galmaa'uu isaa mirkaaneessee jira.
data.som: Ururka Saadaasha Hawada ee Qaramada Midoobey ayaa xaqiijiyay in heer kulayl aad u sarreeya oo ah 18.3 ° C (64.9 ° F) laga helay Antarctica ee Saldhigga Esperanza.
data.tir: ኣህጉራዊ ትካል ሜትሮሎጂ ውዱብ ሕቡራት ሃገራት ኣስታት 18.3 ዲግሪ ሰንቲግሬድ (64.9 ዲግሪ ፋህረንሃይት) ዝለዓለ ምቖት ኣብ ኣንታርክቲካ መዓስከር ኤስፐራንዛ ከም ዝተመዝገበ ኣረጋጊጹ።

data.eng: Two prison riots in Ecuador leave at least 18 people dead and dozens more injured.
data.aaf: Akuaxor Namma Casbih Buxaaxi weeqa Wali 18 num rabeh xarzaniyatal lowima mari Kaddu Muduumeh.
data.amh: በኢክዋዶር በሁለት እስር ቤቶች ውስጥ በተፈጠረ ረብሻ 18 ሰዎች ሲሞቱ ሌሎች ብዙዎች ለጉዳት ተዳረጉ።
data.orm: Manneen amala sirreessaa Ekuwaadoor keessatti argaman lama keessatti jeequmsa ka'een yoo xiqqaate namoonni 18 yoo du'an namoonni hedduun ammoo mada'aniiru.
data.som: Laba qalalaaso xabsi oo ka dhacay dalka Ecuador ayaa sababay dhimashada ugu yaraan 18 qof iyo dhaawacay tobonaan kale.
data.tir: አብ ኤኳዶር ኣብ ክልተ ቤት ማእሰርቲ ብዝትወልዐ ዓመፅ ብውሑድ 18 ሰባት እንትሞቱ ብደርዘን ዝቑፀሩ ቖሲሎም ።

data.eng: Cuba recognizes cryptocurrency as legal tender, becoming the second nation to do so after El Salvador.
data.aaf: Kuuba eli Salevadrre lakal tah abeh yan Namehaytoh Baaxo Akuk cryptocurrency Ganun inah Anakar hangit Ayte.
data.amh: ኩባ ክሪፕቶ ከረንሲን (ምስጢራዊ መረጃን የያዘ ዲጂታል ምንዛሬን) ለህጋዊ ጨረታ መገበያያነት ለመጠቀም እውቅና በመስጠት ከኤል ሳልቫዶር ቀጥሎ ይህንን ለማድረግ ሁለተኛዋ ሀገር ሆናለች።
data.orm: Kiyuubaan kiriptookaarensii akka karaa kanfaltii seera qabeessaatti fudhachuun, El Salvaadoritti aanuun biyya kana goote lammaffaa taate.
data.som: Cuba ayaa u aqoonsatay cryptocurrency inay tahay hindise sharci, waxayna noqotay dalkii labaad ee sidaas samaysa El Salvador ka dib.
data.tir: ኩባ ንክሪፕቶካረንሲ ከም ሕጋዊ ባጤራ ስለ እትቕበለቶ በዚ ድማ ድሕሪ ኤል ሳልቫዶር መበል ካልአይቲ ሃገር ኰይና/ኣላ።

data.eng: India's economy rebounded at a record rate of 20.1% in the three months to the end of June even as a devastating second wave of COVID-19 hits the country.
data.aaf: Umah yan Nammeyhayto Covix-19 qawalyalla Ta Baaxol tamutukewak Hindi Maduur Sidica Alsat illa Waysi Alsih illacabo fanah 20.1% xayowte.
data.amh: ምንም እንኳን አስከፊው የኮቪድ -19 ሁለተኛ ዙር መነሳት አገሪቱን ቢጎዳትም የሕንድ ኢኮኖሚ ላይ በሦስት ወራት እስከ ሰኔ መጨረሻ ድረስ የ 20.1% ማሻሻያ ተመዝግቧል።
data.orm: Diinagdeen Hindii yeroodhuma dambalii COVID-19 lamataa hamaan biyyattii rukutetti ji'oota sadii keessatti hanga dhuma Waxabajjitti hamma seena qabeessa 20.1% tiin fooyya'e
data.som: Dhaqaalaha Hindiya ayaa dib ugu soo noqday 20.1% sedexdii bilood ilaa dhammaadkii Juun xitaa iyadoo mowjad labaad oo COVID-19 ah ay ku dhufatay waddanka.
data.tir: ቊጠባ ህንዲ ወላ'ኳ ነታ ሃገር ብካልኣይ ማዕበል ኮቪድ-19 ዓኒያ ትኹን ደኣ ምበር፣ ኣብተን ክሳዕ መወዳእታ ወርሒ ሰነ ዘለዋ ሰለስተ ኣዋርሕ ብ20.1% ዕብየት ኣመዝጊባ።

data.eng: Loza, who has joined the Malta based Football Club, Birkirkara on a one year contract a couple of months ago, is making history once again pushing her dream and international football career a step further.
data.aaf: Loza, Miyay Yengele Melta Ibi koqsoh Dokonu, Birkirkara Inki Sanatih Ellesuge Alsiteh Qabna kee qarusuh, Aydaadu aboonuh Qagitak dufuqan Tet soono kee Baad Koqosoh Caagida caddoh sarah.
data.amh: ማልታ ላይ የተመሠረተውን የእግርኳስ ክለብን Birkirkara ከጥቂት ወራት በፊት በአንድ ዓመት ውል የተቀላቀለችው ሎዛ ህልሟን እና ዓለም አቀፍ የእግር ኳስ ህይወቷን አንድ እርምጃ ወደፊት እየገፋች እንደገና ታሪክ እየሰራች ነው።
data.orm: Loozaa, Garee Kubbaa Miilaa Maltan hundaa'e Birkirkaratti kontiraataa waggaa tokkootin ji'oota lama dura kan makamte, ammas abjuu ishee dhugoomsuu fi ogummaa kubbaa miilaa internaashinaalii gara fulduraatti butuun seenaa dalagaa jirti.
data.som: Loza, oo ku biirtay Naadiga Kubadda Cagta Malta ee fadhigeedu yahay, Birkirkara heshiis hal sano ah dhowr bilood ka hor, ayaa mar kale samaynaysa taariikh cusub oo sii riixaysa riyadeeda iyo xirfadeeda kubbadda cagta caalamiga ah.

data.eng: Africa’s first black woman to receive an Olympic gold medal, Derartu Tulu, has been elected to lead the Ethiopian athletics Federation on Thursday November 15, 2018.
data.aaf: Afrikak Data Bara Qimboh Addah olobikik Dahal Lakqo Hirigte, Xerartu Tulu, Itiyyobiyak Ardi Fexeresion/IAF/EAF/ miracisuh kamesiy Naharsi Gudok 15, 2018 Dooromteh.
data.amh: በአፍሪካ የመጀመሪያው ጥቁር ሴት የኦሎምፒክ የወርቅ ሜዳሊያ ያገኘችው ደራርቱ ቱሉ ሐሙስ ኅዳር 15 ቀን 2018 የኢትዮጵያ አትሌቲክስ ፌዴሬሽንን እንድትመራ ተመረጠች።
data.orm: Meedaliyaa warqee Olompikii fudhachuun dubartiin-gurraattin jalqabaa Afiriikaa, Daraartuun Tulluu federeeshinii Atileetiksii Itoophiyaa hogganuuf Kamisa Sadaasa 15, 2018 filatamte.
data.som: Haweeney da madow ugu horreysay Afrika inay bilada dahab oo Olombikada hesha, Derartu Tulu, ayaa loo doortay inay hogaamiso xiriirka ciyaaraha fudud ee Itoobiya Khamiista November 15, 2018.

data.eng: In an emergency meeting, the Ethiopian Athletics Federation (EAF) elected Derartu to replace Haile Gebreselassie after he announced his resignation on Monday.

data.som: Kulan deg deg ah oo ay yeesheen fadareeshinka xidhiidhka ciyaaraha fudud ee Itoobiya (EAF) ayaa Derartu u doortay inay beddesho Haile Gebreselassie ka dib markii uu Isniintii ku dhawaaqay inuu iska casilayo xilka.

data.eng: The government of Ethiopia awarded and honored the national athletics team that participated in the Tokyo 2020 Olympics in a grand ceremony held at the National Palace on Thursday in the presence of President Sahilework Zewde.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyah Doolat Acwa geytem kee tesekexime Agat Ardih Butta Agat malakih Buxal Addal kamesih kulikatuk berezixanti edde anuk.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ መንግሥት ፕሬዚዳንት ሳህለወርቅ ዘውዴ በተገኙበት ሐሙስ በብሔራዊ ቤተ መንግሥት በተካሄደው ታላቅ ሥነ ሥርዓት በቶኪዮ 2020 ኦሎምፒክ የተሳተፈውን ብሔራዊ የአትሌቲክስ ቡድን ሸልሟል።
data.orm: Mootummaan Itoophiyaa garee atileetiksii biyyoolessaa Olompikii Tokiyoo 2020 irratti hirmaate sagantaa guddaadhaan Kamisa bakka Pirezidaantii Sahilewarw Zawudee argamanittu badhaaseera akkasumas kabaja kenneera.
data.som: Dawladda Itoobiya ayaa kusharaftay abaal marina ku guddoonsiisay xulka qaranka ciyaaraha fudud ee ka qayb galay ciyaaraha Olombikada Adduunka ee Tokyo 2020, kaddib xaflad ballaadhan oo Khamiistii lagu qabtay Qasriga Qaranka oo ay goob joog ka ahaayd Madaxweyne Sahilework Zewde.
data.tir: መንግስቲ ኢትዮጵያ ፕሬዝዳንት ሳህለ ወርቅ ዘውዴ ኣብ ዝተረኸባሉን ኣብ ሃገራዊ ቤተ መንግስቲ ብሓሙስ ኣብ ዝተኻየደን ድሙቕ ስነስርዓት ነቶም ኣብ ኦሎምፒክ 2020 ቶክዮ ዝተሳተፉ ኣባላት ሃገራዊ ጋንታ ኣትሌቲክስ ሽልማትን ምስጋና ክብሪን ኣቕሪቡ።

data.eng: It is to be recalled that Ethiopian Tokyo 2020 Olympics team had finished the competition with 4 medals including one gold medal.

data.amh: እንደሚታወሰው የኢትዮጵያ ቶኪዮ 2020 ኦሊምፒክ ቡድን ውድድሩን ያጠናቀቀው አንድ የወርቅ ሜዳሊያ ጨምሮ 4 ሜዳሊያዎችን በማግኘት ነው።

data.som: Waxaana lagu xusay in kooxda Itoobiya ee Tokyo 2020 ay tartanka ku dhameysteen 4 billadood oo uu ku jiro hal billad oo dahab ah.

data.eng: This year’s edition of the Great Ethiopian Run has seen participation of more than 44,000 runners; and the event has grown to become a major street festival attracting more and more locals and tourists, every year.
data.aaf: Ta Sanatih Matbaqal Itiyyobiyak Nabbah Yan Ardat 44,00 Dagga Takke Ardaba edde tengele Tubuluye; Ta Gudgud Kaxaam tawali Qidasoorah Baaxo kee Irok wacasirih tamato Handi Hirigitam kini kulisanat.
data.amh: በዚህ ዓመት የታላቁ የኢትዮጵያ ሩጫ እትም ከ 44,000 በላይ ሯጮች ተሳትፈዋል። እና ክስተቱ በየዓመቱ እና ብዙ የአከባቢ ነዋሪዎችን እና ጎብኝዎችን የሚስብ ዋና የጎዳና ፌስቲቫል ሆኗል።
data.orm: Figichi guddaan Itoophiyaa marsaa bara kanaa hirmaattota 44,000 ol argateera; dabalees sagantichi agarsiisa karaa irraa guddaa jiraattota naannoo fi tuuristoota dabalee dabalee harkisaa jiru wagga gara waggaatti ta'aa jira.
data.som: Tartanka Orodka Itoobiya ee sanadkan ayaa waxaa ka qeyb galay in ka badan 44,000 oo orodyahan ah; waxaana munaasabadani ay noqotay mid si wayn u soo jiidata dadka deegaanka iyo dalxiisayaasha, sanad walba.
data.tir: ኣብ ናይ ሎሚ ዘበን መሰናድኦ ዓብዪ ጉያ ኢትዮጵያ ልዕሊ 44,000 ጐየይቲ ዝተሳተፉ እንትኾን እቲ ኩነት ናብ ዝለዓለ ፌስቲቫል ፅርግያ ኣብ ርእሲ ምምዕባሉ በብዓመቱ ተወሰኽቲ ብዙሓት ደቂ ዓዲን ዑደተኛታት ወፃኢን ዝሳተፉሉ ኮይኑ ኣሎ።

data.eng: The Great Ethiopian Run was launched in 2001 by the initiative of the athletics icon Haile Gebreselassie and so far it has held 17 streets runs in Addis Ababa and other towns.
data.aaf: Nabah yan Itiyyobiya Ardi Yesexexegeenim Qimbimtem 2001 Addat ardabe Haile gebresilasse uguugusiya kee 17 Adda elle Yerden Addiss Ababa kee Kalah tan Magaalolil.
data.amh: ታላቁ ሩጫ በኢትዮጵያ በ2001 የአትሌቲክስ ምልክት በሆነው ኃይሌ ገብረስላሴ አነሳሽነት የተጀመረ ሲሆን እስካሁን በአዲስ አበባ እና በሌሎች ከተሞች 17 የጎዳና ላይ ሩጫዎችን አድርጓል።
data.orm: Figichi Guddaan Itoophiyaa kaka'umsa fakkeenya atileetiksii Hayilee Gabrasillaaseetin bara 2001 eegale akkasumas hanga ammaatti figichi daandii irraa 17 Finfinnaa fi magaalota biraatti geggeefameera.
data.som: Orodyahanka weyn ee Itoobiya ayaa la bilaabay sanadkii 2001 dii waxaana hindisihiisa lahaa halyeygii oradka ee Haile Gebreselassie, waxaana ilaa hadda lagu qabtay 17 waddo oo ku yaalla Addis Ababa iyo magaalooyin kale.
data.tir: ዓብዪ ጉያ ኢትዮጵያ ብተበግሶ እቲ ትእምርቲ ኣትሌቲክስ ዝኾነ ሃይሌ ገብረ ስላሴ ብ2001 ዓምፈ ዝተጀመረ እንትኾን ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባን ካልኦት ከተማታትን ዛጊድ 17 ጉያ ጽርጊያ ትኻይዱ እዩ።

data.eng: AACF president, Rezene Beyene, said that the annual tournament will be called the Coca-Cola Addis Ababa Cycling Tournament.
data.aaf: AACF Berezixanti, Rezene Beyene, Iyemih Ligidi Qalayli Koka-Kola Addiss Ababak Saykil qalayli Xiqsitak.
data.amh: የአአክኤፍ ፕሬዝዳንት ረዘነ በየነ አመታዊው ውድድር የኮካኮላ አዲስ አበባ የብስክሌት ውድድር ተብሎ እንደሚጠራ ተናግረዋል።
data.orm: Pireezidaantii AACF, Rezeenee Bayyanaa dorgaa dorgeen waggaa dorgaa dorgee biskileetti Kokaa-Kollaa Addis Ababa jedhamee waamama jedhaniiru.
data.som: Guddoomiyaha AACF, Rezene Beyene, ayaa sheegay in tartankan sannadlaha ah loogumagac dari doono tartanka baaskiillada ee koka-kola Addis Ababa.
data.tir: ፕሬዝዳንት ፌዴሬሽን ብሽክሌታ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ኣይተ ረዘነ በየነ እቲ ዓመታዊ ግጥም "ኮካኮላ ግጥም ብሽክሌታ ኣዲስ ኣበባ" ብዝብል ከምዝተሰየመ ገሊጹ።

data.eng: “This is a great inspiration for the cyclists of Addis who are in desperate need of materials and other tools to enhance their capacity,” Rezene said.
data.aaf: "Ta Nabbah Yan Sahale Addiss ababah Saykil Niya Argiqekalah duyeya kee kalah Tan Uwaytih Fayxi Key Dudda Taysiiseh, " Rezene Iyem.
data.amh: አቶ ሬዘነ “ይህ ለአዲስ አበባ ብስክሌተኞች የቁሳቁስ እና ሌሎች መሣሪያዎች ፍላጎታቸውን አቅማቸውን ለማሳደግ ትልቅ መነሳሳት ነው” ብለዋል።
data.orm: "Kun konkolaachistoota biskileetti Finfinnee kanneen meeshaalee biskileetti fi meeshaalee biroo dandeetti isaanii foyyessuuf dheebotaniif onnachiistu guddaadha" Rezeenee jedhaniiru.
data.som: "Tani waxay dhiirigelin weyn u noqoneysa wadayaasha baaskiillada ee Addis kuwaas oo si aad ah ugu baahan alaabyo iyo qalab kale si ay kor ugu qaadaan awoodooda," ayuu yidhi Rezene.
data.tir: ብተወሳኺ" እዚ ንፀገም ዕጥቂን ካልኦት ንዋታትን ብምፍታሕ ንወነ ብሽክሌተኛታት ኣዲስ ኣበባ ዘላዓዕልን ዓቕሞም ዘዕቢን እዩ"ክብል ረዘነ ተዛሪቡ።

data.eng: Three-time Olympic champion Kenenisa Bekele, who finished third at this year’s London Marathon, has been named as a reserve, along with world silver medallist Adhane Yemane and 2013 world silver medalist Lelisa Desisa.
data.aaf: Sidiica Adda Olombik Shambiyon Kenenisa Bekele, londan maratonul Sidicaytuh awquk gabakale, Migaq yunkutubeh, Baadak Mali mexalitih yanih Axhane Yamane and 2013 Baadak Mali mexalitih yan Lelisa Desisa.
data.amh: በዘንድሮው የለንደን ማራቶን ሶስተኛ ሆኖ ያጠናቀቀው የሶስት ጊዜ የኦሎምፒክ ሻምፒዮን ቀነኒሳ በቀለ ከዓለም የብር ሜዳሊያ አሸናፊው አድኃኔ የማነ እና የ 2013 የዓለም የብር ሜዳሊያ ባለቤት ሌሊሳ ዴሲሳ ጋር በመጠባበቂያነት ተሰይሟል።
data.orm: Shaampiyoonii Olompikii yeroo sadii Qananiisa Baqqalaa kan Maaraatoonii Landan bara kana sadaffaa ta'ee xumure, mo'ataa meedaliyaa birrii Adaanee Yimaanee fi mo'ataa medaaliyaa birrii 2013 Leellisaa Dessisaa waliin eeggattoota ta'uun moggaafamaniiru.
data.som: Kenenisa Bekele oo saddex jeer ku guuleystay Olombikada Adduunka, oo ku dhameystay kaalinta saddexaad ee oradka dheer ee London ee sanadkan, ayaa loo magacaabay kayd, isago uu wehelinayo billad qalin laha adduunka ee Adhane Yemane iyo billad qalinlaha adduunka 2013 Lelisa Desisa.
data.tir: እቲ ንሰለስተ ግዜ ሻምፕዮና ኦሎምፒክ ዝኾነን ኣብ ናይ ሎሚ ዘበን ማራቶን ለንደን ሳልሳይ ኮይኑ ዝፈፀመን ቀነኒሳ በቀለ ምስቲ ናይ ዓለም ተዓዋቲ ሜዳሊያ ብሩር ዝኾነ ኣድሃነ የማነን ኣብ 2013 ናይ ዓለም ተዓዋቲ ሜዳሊያ ብሩር ዝኾነ ሌሊሳ ዴሲሳን ስሙ ኣብ ተተካእቲ ተመዝጊቡ።

data.eng: Mare, who equaled her lifetime best of 2:19:52 when winning last year’s Xiamen Marathon, is joined on the women’s team by two-time Berlin Marathon champion Aberu Kebede and three-time Dubai Marathon winner Aselefech Mergia.
data.aaf: Mare, Ikigide kak raqte Saqat tayse 2:19:52 Toowaqdi Waraye Sanal Jiamen Maratonul, Sayyo buttay Namma Adda Berlin Maratonih shambiyon aberu Kebexe kee sidica addah Xubay Maratonu tayse Aselefech Mergiat angauk kini.
data.amh: ባለፈው አመት የተካሄደውን የዢያመን ማራቶን በ2፡19፡52 የህይወት ዘመኗን ምርጥ የሆነ ውጤት የሸነፈችው ማሬ በሴቶች ቡድን የሁለት ጊዜ የበርሊን ማራቶን ሻምፒዮን አበሩ ከበደ እና የሶስት ጊዜ የዱባይ ማራቶን አሸናፊ አሰለፈች መርጊያን ተቀላቅላለች።
data.orm: Rikoordii dhuunfaashee 2:19:52 yeroo Maaraatoonii Ziyaamen injifatte kan galmeessite, shampiyoonii Berliin yeroo lamaa Abarruu Kabbadee fi mo'attuu Maaraatoonii Dubaay yeroo sadii Asalefech Margaa waliin garee dubartootatti makamteetti.
data.som: Mare, oo nolosheeda ku barbaraysay 2:19:52 markii ay ku guulaysatay oradka dheer ee Xiamen sannadkii hore, ayaa waxa kooxda haweenka kula biiray laba jeer oo ku guulaystay orodka dheer ee Berlin Aberu Kebede iyo saddex jeer oo Dubai Marathon ku guulaysatay Aselefech Mergia.
data.tir: እታ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ዓመት ኣብ ዚያሜን ማራቶን 2፡19፡52 ብምእታው ናይ ህይወታ ብሉጽ ሰዓት ኣመዝጊባ ዝተዓወተት ማሬ፣ ኣብታ ተዓዋቲት ክልተ ግዜ ማራቶን በርሊን ዝኾነት ኣበሩ ከበደን ሰለስተ ግዜ ተዓዋቲት ማራቶን ዱባይ ዝኾነት ኣሰለፈች መርጊያን ኣበላት ዝኾናላ ጋንታ ደቂ ኣነስትዮ ተሓዊሳ።

data.eng: Gianni Infantino, the newly-elected president of the world football's governing body, FIFA, visited Ethiopia this week.
data.aaf: Gianni Infantno, Qusubih Baadak Ibikoqsoh Saqalah doorime Dagar,FIFa ta Ayam Itiyyobiyat Gufne Abe.
data.amh: አዲስ የተመረጡት የዓለም እግርኳስ የበላይ አካል ፊፋ ፕሬዝዳንት ጂያንኒ ኢንፋንቲኖ በዚህ ሳምንት ኢትዮጵያን ጎብኝተዋል።
data.orm: Giyaanoo Infaatiinoo, pireezidaantii qaama bulchaa kubbaa miilaa adunyaa ta'ee, FIFA, torbee kana Itoophiaa daawwataniiru.
data.som: Gianni Infantino, oo dhawaan loo doortay guddoomiyaha xidhiidhka kubbadda cagta adduunka ee FIFA, ayaa booqday Itoobiya toddobaadkan.
data.tir: እቲ ሓዱሽ ፕሬዚዳንት ገዛኢ ኣካል ኩዕሶ እግሪ ዓለም (ፊፋ)ዝኾነ ጂያኒ ኢንፋንቲኖኣብዚ ሰሙን ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ዑደት ኣካይዱ።

data.eng: During his visit, Infantino met with a delegation of the Ethiopian Football Federation led by Juneydi Basha, its president.
data.aaf: Ta Kay Gufnet, Infantno Itiyyobiyak ibikoqsph fexeresioniy Junedi Basha miracisa Buttat Yongoorowe, Ta berexizanti.
data.amh: በጉብኝቱ ወቅት ኢንፋንቲኖ በፕሬዚዳንቱ በጁኔዲ ባሻ ከሚመራው የኢትዮጵያ እግር ኳስ ፌዴሬሽን ልዑካን ጋር ተገናኝቷል።
data.orm: Yeroo daawwannaa isaatti, Infaantiinoon jila Federeeshinii Kubbaa miilaa Itoophiyaa pireezidaantii isaa Junaddiin Baashaan durfamu waliin mari'ateera.
data.som: Infantino intii uu ku guda jiray booqashadiisa ayuu la kulmay wafdi ka socday Xidhiidhka Kubadda Cagta Itoobiya oo uu hoggaaminayay Juneydi Basha, oo ah madaxwaynohooda.
data.tir: ኣብ እዋን ዑደቱ ንሱ ብፕሬዝዳንት ፌዴሬሽን ኩዕሶ እግሪ ኢትዮጵያ ብጁነዲ ባሻ ምስ ዝምራሕ ልኡኽ ተራኺቡ።

data.eng: The movie is about a young man and his childhood sweetheart who is married.

data.eng: Explaining about this Moges said: "There is this young man who is in love with his childhood sweetheart; the two young lovers decide to run away together but soon they were caught by her husband.
data.aaf: Mogos Isih Elle Baxaqisenal ta Qunxa num yikcinem urino wadaya; Ta Namma Qunxa Sita tikcine Focafana Sitanah Yangayeenim Faxeenih Takkay imay waktiik Gera Isi bara Cabeh.
data.amh: ስለ ሞገስ ሲያስረዳ እንዲህ አለ - “ይህ የልጅነት ፍቅረኛውን የሚወድ ወጣት አለ ፣ ሁለቱ ወጣት ፍቅረኞች አብረው ለመሸሽ ይወስናሉ ፣ ግን ብዙም ሳይቆይ በባለቤቷ ተያዙ።
data.orm: Waa'ee kanaa gaafa ibsu Moges: "Dargaggeessicha kana kan jaalallee ijoollummaa isaa wajjin jaalala keessa jirutu jira; jaalalleewwan ijoollee kun lamaan walii wajjin baduuf murteessan garuu dafanii abbaa manaa isheen qabaman, jedhe.
data.som: Isagoo arrintaa sharraxaya ayuu Moges dhahay: “Waxaa jiray inan yar oo jacaylkii yaraantiisii caruurnimada ilaa hada jecel, labadii dhallinyaro ee is jeclaa ayaa go’aansaday inay isla baxsadaan, laakiin wax yar ka dib waxaa qabtay ninkeedii.

data.eng: So neighbors stall the ensuing fight and an elder bind together the two men’s cloths, symbolically chaining them together and tells them they must travel to the capital to stand trial in the queen’s court.”

data.eng: Simet film tells a historical story set in the momentous Zemene Mesafint period.

data.amh: የስሜት ፊልም በአስደናቂው የዘመነ መሳፍንት ዘመን ውስጥ የተቀመጠ ታሪካዊ ታሪክን ይናገራል።

data.som: Filimka Simet wuxuu ka sheekeynayaa sheeko taariikhi ah oo lagu saleeyay xilligii Zemene Mesafint ee muhiimka ahaa.

data.eng: Brothers Mesfin and Endalk compete for their father’s throne in Gondar.

data.eng: While the king of Gondar decides who will succeed him and make peace within the divided country, the son, Endalk, is rightly suspicious that his younger brother Mesfin is the favorite and likely successor.

data.eng: Fanuel Leul, 22, a graphic designer and illustrator who has been a big fan of comic books, says Jember is a great start and looks forward to other Ethiopia-inspired comics making their way to bookshelves.
data.aaf: Fanuel Leul, 22, girafik Xizayin Abe Forkucat Kotooba yacayi qokole, Iyeh Jember Nabah Yan khnonum kee Wagitana Foocafanah Kalahtan Itiyobiya fanah Isi Gital Kitooba bicisuh.
data.amh: የ 22 ዓመቱ ግራኝ ዲዛይነር እና የአስቂኝ መጽሐፍት ትልቅ አድናቂ የነበረው የ 22 ዓመቱ ፋኑኤል ልዑል ጀምበር ጥሩ ጅምር ነው እና ሌሎች በኢትዮጵያ አነሳሽነት የተጻፉ ቀልዶችን ወደ መጽሐፍት መደርደሪያዎች የሚወስዱትን በጉጉት ይጠብቃል።
data.orm: Fanu'eel Lihuul, 22, dizaayineriin giraafiksii fi agarsiisaan kitaabota qoosaa kan hedduu jaallatu, Jember jalqabbii gaariidha akkasumas qoosaa kaka'umsa Itoopiyaan qophaa'e kan biraa shelfii kitaabaa irratti akka eegu dubbate.
data.som: Fanuel Leul, oo 22 jir ah, naqshadeeye garaaf ahaan iyo sawir-qaade si weyn u xiiseeya buugaagta majaajilada ah, ayaa sheegay in Jember ay tahay bilow wanaagsan oo ay rajaynayso majaajilada kale ee Itoobiya ay dhiirigelisay inay u gudbaan shelfyada buugaagta.

data.eng: Fanuel, who graduated from Alle School of Addis Fine Art and Design, is himself working on his own comic called Qedamawi, studying Ethiopian history and showcasing the country as the ‘land of the brave’.
data.aaf: Fanuel, dooqasimeh Allek Addiss fine Fani kee Xizayin bariittoh buxak,usukish dibuk forkacatle kexemawit taamita, Itiyyobiyah Aydaadu barittanam kee 'intiqasin Ardi' kini Ta baaxoi yabluseenimi.
data.amh: ከአዲስ ጥሩ ስነጥበብ እና ዲዛይን ከአሌ ት / ቤት የተመረቀው ፋኑኤል ራሱ ቄዳማዊ በሚባል በራሱ አስቂኝ ሥራ የኢትዮጵያን ታሪክ በማጥናት አገሪቱን ‹የጀግኖች ምድር› አድርጎ በማሳየት ላይ ይገኛል።
data.orm: Fanu'eel , Iskuulii Alle Addis Faayin Aartii fi Dizaa'inii irraa eebbifame, ofii isaatiis qoosaa ofii isaatii Qedaamaawii jedhamu, kan seenaa Itoopiyaa barachaa biyyattii akka 'dachee warra gamnootaa' tti agariisu irratti hojjetaa jira.
data.som: Fanuel, oo ka soo baxay Alle School of Addis Fine Art and Design, ayaa laftiisu ka shaqaynaya majaajile u gaar ah oo loogu magac daray Qedamawi, isaga oo baranaya taariikhda Itoobiya, dalkana ku soo bandhigaya ‘Dhulkii geesiyaasha’.

data.eng: The social media pages of Qedamawi feature Ethiopian patriots such as Emperor Menelik, Ras Alula and those that fought the Adwa war reimagined as superheroes.
data.aaf: Mangaafarateemah bejik Kedemawi/tokkome/ Itiyyobiyah xaylok baxo kacanuk amixuguk sugtem minilikiy, Ras alula kee Qaxwah qeebih yingicileenih tamixige Agiira kinon.
data.amh: የቄዳማዊው የማህበራዊ ሚዲያ ገጾች እንደ አ Emperor ምኒልክ ፣ ራስ አሉላ እና የአድዋን ጦርነት የተዋጉትን እንደ ልዕለ ኃያልነት ዳግም ያስመሰሉ ኢትዮጵያውያን አርበኞችን ያሳያሉ።
data.orm: Fuulli miidiyaa hawaasaa Qedaamaawwii gootota Itoopiyaa kanneen akka Mooticha Minilik, Raas Aluulaa fi warreen lola Aduwaa lolan akka gootota cimootti irraa deebiin yaadachiisuun dhiyeessa.
data.som: Bogagga Baraha Bulshada ee Qedamawi waxaa ka muuqda waddaniyiin Itoobiyaan ah sida boqorka Menelik, Ras Aluula, iyo kuwii dagaalkii Adwa la galay waxay dib u soo noqdeen geesiyaal sare.

data.eng: He continued to refine his instrumental shellela style, recording an entire album in 1970, Negus of Ethiopian Sax, which was later released as part of the Ethiopiques CD collection.
data.aaf: Usuk Shellelah Bilqa Uwaytu Yabulusem Bisoheele, 1970 Albem Qulak, Saksi Malik Ittiyobiya, qagitak Itiyyobiyak CD Asgaluk yeyeqe.
data.amh: እ.ኤ.አ. በ 1970 ሙሉውን አልበም በመቅረጽ የመሣሪያውን የlleሌላ ዘይቤን ማጣራት ቀጠለ ፣ በኋላም እንደ ኢትዮፒኮች ሲዲ ስብስብ አካል ሆኖ ተለቀቀ።
data.orm: Bara 1970 keessa albama guutuu waraabuudhaan gosa sagalee muuziqaa shillelaa fooyyessuu itti fufe, Mootii Saaksii Itoopiyaa, kan booda qaama walitti qabama Itoopikas CD tahuun gadhiifame.
data.som: Wuxuu sii waday inuu sii wanaajiyo qaabkiisa qalabka shelela, isagoo duubay album dhan 1970 dii, Negus of Ethiopian Sax, kaas oo markii dambe la sii daayay isagoo qayb ka ah ururinta CD ga Ethiopiques.
data.tir: እቲ ብመሳርሒ ሙዚቃ ቅዲ ፈኸራ ዝቐፀለን ብ1970ዓ.ም ምሉእ ኣልበም ዘቕረፀን ንጉስ ሳክስፎን ዘስመየ ስነጥበባዊ ስራሕቱ ከም ኣካል ናይ እቲ ውሩይ ኢትዮጵያዊ ሲዲ ኮይኖም ፀኒሖም ከምዝተዘርግሑ ይፍለጥ።

data.eng: Hermon Haily’s Price of Love will be featured at the Lincoln Center this week at the New York African Film Festival as well as Director Yared Zeleke’s award winning drama Lamb: Red Leaves by Bazi Gere starring Debebe Eshetu; Afripedia X New York by Ethiopian and Eritrean filmmakers Teddy Goitom and Senay Berhe of Sweden; and the Dance of King David by Axel Baumann exploring the Ark of covenant.
data.aaf: Hemon Haily's kacni Baxxa fooca Asakotelon Lincoln Fanteenal Ta Ayaamat Niworkik Afrika Aflamih Qiidisorat Aracal Saqal Yared Zeleke's LambXiramal Acwal Yeyseh: Qasa Ewqa Bazi Grer Debebe Eshetu Edde hayisak; Afribixia x niyork Itiyyobaaaaaaaa
data.amh: የሄርሞን ሀይሊ የፍቅር ዋጋ በዚህ ሳምንት በሊንኮን ማእከል በኒው ዮርክ የአፍሪካ ፊልም ፌስቲቫል እንዲሁም ዳይሬክተር ያሬድ ዘለቀ ተሸላሚ ድራማ ላም - ቀይ ቅጠሎች በባዚ ገሬ በደበበ እሸቱ በተወነጨፈበት ፤ አፍሪፒዲያ X ኒውዮርክ በኢትዮ Ethiopianያ እና በኤርትራ ፊልም ሰሪዎች ቴዲ ጎይቶም እና በስዊድን ሰናይ በርሄ ፤ እና የንጉስ ዳዊት ዳንስ በአክሰል ባውማን የቃል ኪዳኑን ታቦት ሲቃኝ።
data.orm: Gatii'n Jaalalaa Heermon Haalii, akkasumas diraamaan Yaared Zalaqee badhaasa mo'ate Laamb: Reed Liivs Baazii Gereen Debebbe Isheetuun taphatamuun; Afiripeediyaa X Niwu Yoork qopheessitoota fiilmii lammii Itoopiyaa fi Ertiriyaa Teedy Gooyitom fi Sennaay Berihee Siwiidin, akkasumas Sirbi Mooticha Daawit Aksel Bawumaniin taabota ibsu torban kana Giddugala Linkoolin, Festivaala Fiilmii Afirikaa Niwu Yoorkii irratti ni dhiyeeffama.
data.som: Qiimaha Jaceylka ee Hermon Haily ayaa lagu soo bandhigi doonaa Xarunta Lincoln todobaadkan xaflada New York African Film Festival iyo sidoo kale isudabaride Yared Zeleke ee abaal marinta ku guuleystey riwaayad Lamb: Red Leaves ee Bazi Gere oo uu jilayay Debebe Eshetu; Afripedia X New York oo ay sameeyeen filin sameeyayaasha Itoobiya iyo Eritrea Teddy Goitom iyo Senay Berhe ee Sweden; iyo Ciyaartii Boqor Daa'uud ee Axel Baumann oo sahaminayay sanduuqii axdiga.
data.tir: ኣብዚ ሰሙን ኣብ ማእኸል ሊንኮን ኣብ ኒወዮርክ ኣብ ዝኽበር ፌስቲቫል ፊልም ኣፍሪካ ስራሕ ሄርሞን ሃይላይ ዝኾነ ፕራይስ ኦፍ ላቭ ዝቐርብ እንትኾን ብተወሳኺ ተዓዋቲ ሽልማት ዝኾነ ብኣላዪ ያሬድ ዘለቀ ዝተሰናድአ ድራማ ላምብ፣ደበበ እሸቱ ዝዋስአሉን ስራሕ ቤዚ ገሬ ዝኾነን ሬድ ሊቭስ፣ ብኢትዮጵያዊን ብኤርትራዊን ሰራሕቲ ፊልም ቴዲ ጎይትኦምን ሰናይ በርሀን በዓል ስዊድን ዝተሰናድአ ኣፍሪ ፔድያ: x ኒውዮርክ: ከምኡ እውን እቲ ኣብ ዙሪያ ዳህሳስ ፅላተ ፅዮን ማእኸል ገይሩ ብኣክሴል ቦውማን ዝተሰርሐ ፊልም ዳንስ ኦፍ ኪንግ ዴቪድ ክቐርቡ እዮም።

data.eng: The Dance of King David is a documentary film about the history and the contemporary worship of the Ark.
data.aaf: Amoyti Xevid Rigda Xocmenterih Aflamay Aydaadu kee Wakti Qibadah Ark.
data.amh: የንጉሥ ዳዊት ውዝዋዜ ስለ ታቦቱ ታሪክ እና ስለ ወቅታዊው አምልኮ የሚያሳይ ዘጋቢ ፊልም ነው።

data.som: Qoob ka ciyaarka Boqor Daa'uud waa filin dokumentari ah oo ku saabsan taariikhda iyo cibaadada casriga ah ee alwaaxa.
data.tir: ዳንስ ኦፍ ኪንግ ዴቪድ ዘርእስቱ ሰነዳዊ ፊልም ብዛዕባ ታሪኽ እቲ ሕዚ እውን ዝምለኸሉ ጽላት ዝዝንቱ እዩ።

data.eng: The legendary Ethiopian singer Alemayehu Eshete has been laid to rest at St. Trinity Cathedral, Addis Ababa with a massive funeral ceremony attended by many.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyak Hayeyeni Gad abe Alemayu Eshete Magaq Katederak, Addiss Ababal cunxoluk Mangomari ta waynabot Yengelen.
data.amh: ‹‹ ታዋቂው ዘፋኝ ኢትዮጵያዊው ዘፋኝ አለማየሁ እሸቴ በአዲስ አበባ ቅድስት ሥላሴ ካቴድራል በብዙዎች በተገኘ ታላቅ የቀብር ሥነ ሥርዓት ተቀበረ።
data.orm: Weellisaan beekamaan lammii Itoopiyaa Alemaayyehu Isheetee Qulqulluu Kaatediraala Sillaasee, Addis Ababaatti sagantaa awwaalchaa guddaa namooti baayyeen irratti hirmaataniin awwaalame.
data.som: Fannaankii caanka ahaa ee Alemayehu Eshete ayaa maanta aas qaran loogu sameeyay kaniisada St.Trinity Cathedral ee magaalada Addis Ababa iyadoo aas ballaaran loo sameeyay.
data.tir: ናይቲ ዉሩይ ድምፃዊ ኣለማዮህ እሸቴ ኣስክሬን ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ኣብ ቅድስት ስላሴ ካቴድራል ብዙሓት ኣብ ዝተረኸቡሉ ስነስርዓት ቀብሪ ብኽብሪ ዓሪፉ።

data.eng: Families and fans of the artist, government officials, religious leaders and thousands of Ethiopians from the capital and several places of the country have attended the funeral service at the historical cathedral.
data.aaf: Buxamaray kee kacnotit Fananeniy, Doolatay Dagortiy Diini Abobti kee Alafaatal Lowinta Itiyyobiyah Xaylo Qasima kee Taabaxoh Arac Geytimeenih Kabri Ayfafat Aydaadi Katederalal.
data.amh: የአርቲስቱ ቤተሰቦች እና አድናቂዎች ፣ የመንግሥት ባለሥልጣናት ፣ የሃይማኖት መሪዎች እና ከሺዎች የሚቆጠሩ ኢትዮጵያውያን ከመዲናዋ እና ከተለያዩ የአገሪቱ ቦታዎች በቀብር ሥነ ሥርዓቱ ላይ በታሪካዊው ካቴድራል ተገኝተዋል።
data.orm: Maatiiwwanii fi jaallattoonnin artistichaa, aangawoonni mootummaa, geggeessitoonni amantaa, fi lammiilee Itoopiyaa kumaan lakka'aman sagantaa awwaalchichaa kaateediraalicha seena qabeessatti hirmaataniiru.
data.som: Qoysaska iyo taageerayaasha fannaanka, mas’uuliyiin ka tirsan dowladda, culumaa’udiin iyo kumanaan ka tirsan shacabka Itoobiya oo ka kala yimid caasimadda iyo meelo badan oo dalka ka tirsan ayaa ka soo qeyb galay aaska oo ka dhacay xarunta cathedral ka taariikhiga ah.
data.tir: ኣብቲ ታሪኻዊ ካቴድራል ኣብ ዝተኻየደ ስነ-ስርዓት ቀብሪ ስድርኡ፣ኣድነቕቱ፣ ሰበስልጣን መንግስቲ፣መራሕቲ ሃይማኖት ከምኡ እውን ካብታ ዋና ከተማን ካብ ብዙሓት ቦታታት እታ ሃገርን ዝመፁ ኢትዮጵያዊያን ተረኺቦም።

data.eng: Betty G also performed Yamlu Mola’s “Sin Jaalada” and ‘Hagere’ at the 2019 Nobel Peace Prize Ceremony in Oslo.
data.aaf: Betty G Abinoseh Yamlu Molas " ko Kiciyo/ Sin Jaalada" kee Yi Baaxo/Hagere/ 2019 Nobil salaam Acwah waynaboh Addal Oslol.
data.amh: ቤቲ ጂ በ2019 በኦስሎ በተካሄደው የኖቤል የሰላም ሽልማት ስነስርአት ላይ የያምሉ ሞላን “ሲን ጃላዳ” እና ‘ሀገሬ’ አሳይታለች።
data.orm: Beetii G's "Sin Jaalladhaa" fi "Haageree" Yaamlu Mollaa Qophii Badhaasa Nagaa Noobeli 2019 Osiloo keessaa irratti taphatte.
data.som: Betty G waxa ay sidoo kale ku soo bandhigtay Yamlu Mola's "Sin Jaallada" iyo 'Hagere' xafladdii abaalmarinta Nobel Peace Prize ee Oslo 2019.
data.tir: ቤቲ ጂ ብወገና ኣብቲ ኣብ ኦስሎ ዝተኻየደ ስነስርዓት ሽልማት ኖቤል ናይ ያምሉ ሞላ "ሲን ጃላዳ"ከምኡ እውን "ሃገሬ"ደርፍታት ኣቕሪባ።

data.eng: Prior to becoming a Goodwill Ambassador, Betty G served as UNHCR’s High Profile Supporter and visited a number of refugee camps in Ethiopia hosting South Sudanese, Eritrean and Somali refugees, according to a statement issued by UNHCR.
data.aaf: Goodwell Ambasaxerih Tamatuh, Beety G Ayfaf Tece UNHCRah fayale giribil Cato kee Lowole Dabomara Guftem Itiyobiya Edde Anuk Gabi Sodanay, Eretriya kee Somali Dabo maritet , UNHCR elle Teyeqenal.
data.amh: ቤቲ ጂ የመልካም ምኞት አምባሳደር ከመሆኗ በፊት UNHCR የተባበሩት መንግስታት የስደተኞች ከፍተኛ መገለጫ ደጋፊ በመሆን ያገለገሉ ሲሆን በኢትዮጵያ በርካታ የስደተኞች መጠለያዎችን ጎብኝተው ደቡብ ሱዳናውያን ፣ ኤርትራዊያን እና ሶማሊያ ስደተኞችን አስተናግደዋል።
data.orm: Akka dubbii UNHCR'n gadhiifameetti, Guudwiil Ambassadar ta'uun dura, Beetii G Deggertuu UNHCR Maqaa Guddaa Qabdu tahuun tajaajiluun mooraa baqattootaa Itoopiyaa keessatti lammiilee Sudaan Kibbaa, Eritiriyaa fi baqattoota Sumaalee qabatanii jiran heedduu daawatte.
data.som: Kahor inta ayna noqon safiir Wanaag, Betty G waxa ay soo noqotay taageere sare oo UNHCR ah, waxayna booqatay tiro ka mid ah xeryo qaxooti oo ku yaalla Itoobiya oo ay ku jiraan qaxootiga Koonfurta Suudaan, Eriteriyaanka iyo Soomaalida, sida lagu sheegay bayaan ay soo saartay UNHCR.
data.tir: ላዕለዋይ ኮሚሽነር ስደተኛታት ውድብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት (ዩ.ኤን.ኤች.ሲ.ኣር) ኣብ ዘውፅኦ መግለፂ ከምዝሓበሮ ቤቲ.ጂ ቅድሚ ኣምባሳደር ሰናይ ፍቓድ ምኳና ናይ ዩ.ኤን.ኤች.ሲ.ኣር ዝላዓለት ሓጋዚት ብምኳን ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ዝርከቡ ብዙሓት መዕቖቢ ስደተኛታት ዑደት ብምግባር ንስደተኛታት ደቡብ ሱዳን፣ ኤርትራን ሶማሊያን ኣታኣናጊዳ እያ።

data.eng: The actress has performed in stages and played in numerous Amharic movies over the last 42 years especially representing unforgettable mothers’ characters.
data.aaf: Ta Akter Abnisoh Aracal Yublusem kee 42 ligidah MangoAmcari Aflamitel Digirak Suge Baxsaluk Habalimesini Isi qasina karakterite.
data.amh: ተዋናይዋ ባለፉት 42 ዓመታት ውስጥ በበርካታ የአማርኛ ፊልሞች በመድረክ ተጫውታለች እና በተለይም የማይረሱ የእናቶችን ገጸ -ባህሪዎች ይወክላል።
data.orm: Artistittiin waggoota 42 darbe keessatti waltajjiilee irratti weellisuunii fi fiilmiiwwan Amaariffaa hedduu keessatti taphachuun keessumaa taatee haadhaa hin dagatamne bakka buuteetti.
data.som: Atirshada ayaa ku soo bandhigtay mashrixii waxayna jishayna filimaan badan oo Amxaari ah 42 dii sano ee la soo dhaafay gaar ahaan iyada oo matalaysay hooyooyinka lama ilaawaan ah.
data.tir: እታ ተዋሳኢት ኣብ መድረኽን ኣብ ብርክት ዝበሉ ፊልምታት ኣምሓርኛን ንልዕሊ 42 ዓመታት ዝተዋስአት እንትኾን ብፍላይ ንገፀ ባህርይ ኣዴታት ወኪላ ብምውሳእ ዝያዳ ትዝከር።

data.eng: “This year’s Gondar Epiphany is colorful with increasing number of foreign tourists and Ethiopian-born citizens shown an increase appetite for coming,” said Sertsefire Sibhat, Tourism Ethiopia Deputy Director.

data.amh: የቱሪዝም ኢትዮጵያ ምክትል ዳይሬክተር የሆኑት ሰርፀፊፋ ስብሃት “የዘንድሮው የጎንደር ጥምቀት በአል ቁጥራቸው እየጨመረ በመጡት የውጭ ቱሪስቶች የሚጎበኝ ሲሆን ትውልደ ኢትዮጵያዊያንም የመምጣት ፍላጎት እጅግ ጨምሯል” ሲሉ ተናገሩ።

data.aaf: Itiyyobiyak Katolik Kanisah Karxinal Berhaneyesus C.M., Isi Gudgudul Iyem Asmatle Manatina Massakaxxa kee Qafayda Asakoxa Sitak Catiyal, sitah biyakitiyal sita Akciniyal Keninah yan Maralih Kah Yeqesen Inah.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ካቶሊካዊት ቤተ ክርስቲያን ካርዲናል ብርሃነእየሱስ ምእመናን በአሉን በሚያከብሩበት ወቅት የሌሎችን ሕይወት ደህንነት በመርዳት፣በመንከባከብ እና በመውደድ መሆን እንዳለበት ተናገሩ።
data.orm: Kaardinaalli Waldaa Kaatolikii Itoopiyaa Birhaaneyesuus C.M., gama isaatiin warri amanan guyyaa ayyaanaa fayyummaa waliigalaa jireenya nama biraaf gargaaruuf, kunuunsuu fi jaallachuun yaadachuu fi kabajuu qabu jedhe.
data.som: Baadariga Kaniisadda Katooliga ee Itoobiya Berhaneyesus C.M., ayaa dhankiisa sheegay in mu’miniintu ay xusaan oo ay u dabbaal degaan ciidda nuxurka kaalmaynta, daryeelka, iyo jacaylka nolosha dadka kale.
data.tir: ካርዲናል ካቶሊካዊት ቤተክርስትያን ኢትዮጵያ ኣቡነ ብርሃነ እየሱስ ሊቀ ጳጳስ ብወገኖም ኣመንቲ ነቲ በዓል እንተኽብሩ ንካልኦት ሰባት ብምሕጋዝ፣ ብምሕብሓብን ፍቕሪ ብምሃብን ክኸውን ይግባእ ኢሎም።

data.eng: The Cardinal also noted that authorities of the government should exercise their leadership in satisfying public interests and ensure good governance in their deep reform journey.

data.eng: The efforts being made to inscribe the Gada system on UNESCO’s world heritage list are yielding positive results, said the Oromia Regional State Culture and Tourism Bureau.
data.aaf: Abaanah Yanin Giclo Gaaxa Madqa UNESCOk Baad Sugeetih Loowot Gactuh Yayse Xali yani, Iye Oromiyah Rakaakayih Doolatak Qadda kee Wacasir Biiro.
data.amh: የገዳ ስርዓትን በዩኔስኮ የዓለም ቅርስ ዝርዝር ውስጥ ለማስገባት እየተደረገ ያለው ጥረት አዎንታዊ ውጤት እያመጣ መሆኑን የኦሮሚያ ክልል ባህልና ቱሪዝም ቢሮ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Yaaliin Sirna Gadaa hambaa addunyaa UNESCO'tti galmeessisuuf godhamaa jiru bu'aa gaarii agarsiisaa jira jedhe Biiroon Aadaa fi Tuurizimii Mootummaa Naannoo Oromiyaa.
data.som: "Dadaalka loo samaynayo in nidaamka Gada ga lagu qoro liiska dhaxalka adduunka ee UNESCO ayaa keenaya natiijooyin wanaagsan ayuu yidhi Xafiiska Dhaqanka iyo Dalxiiska ee Deegaanka Oromia."
data.tir: ስርዓት ገዳ ከም ቅርሲ ዓለም ኮይኑ ኣብ ውድብ ትምህርቲ ሳይንስን ባህሊን ሕቡራት መንግስታት (ዩ.ኔ.ስ.ኮ) ክምዝገብ ዝግበር ዘሎ ፃዕሪ ኣወንታዊ ውፅኢት የፍሪ ከምዘሎ ቢሮ ባህሊን ቱሪዝምን ክልላዊ መንግስቲ ኦሮሚያ ገሊፁ።
