data.eng: The European Parliament adopted a resolution that demands an “immediate cessation of hostilities by all parties” and calls for an Ethiopian-led inclusive national dialogue including representatives from Tigray, Amhara, Benishangul-Gumuz, Afar, Oromia, Sidama, Somali, Southern Nations, Nationalities and Peoples’ Region (SNNPR), and Gambella to find a lasting solution to the ongoing crisis in the country, The Reporter learnt.
data.aaf: Awrobah Barlama Ogolteh Qagitak Cali Fayxi: sisikuk Inkih tan Misoyna Bodite Solisam" kee Itiyyobiyah seecenih Agatwalal kah Aban Inah Tigrayay, Amcaray Benishangul Gumuzuy, Afaray, oromiyay sixaamay, Somaliy, Gabi Qaxih Agat kee Agatniinay Ayyunti Rakaakay kee gambela Ilacaboh Cali Gorisanam Tabaaxol Yan Xakakwayah,Xayosem Baritte numu.
data.amh: አውሮፓ ፓርላማ “ሁሉም ፓርቲዎች ግጭትን በአስቸኳይ እንዲያቆሙ” የሚጠይቅ ውሳኔ አፀደቀ እና የትግራይ ፣ የአማራ ፣ የቤንሻንጉል ጉሙዝ ፣ የአፋር ፣ የኦሮሚያ ፣ የሲዳማ ፣ የሶማሌ ፣ የደቡብ ብሔሮች ብሔረሰቦችና ሕዝቦች ክልል ፣ እና የጋምቤላ ተወካዮችን ጨምሮ በኢትዮጵያ የሚመራ ሁሉን አቀፍ ብሔራዊ ውይይት በአገሪቱ እየታየ ላለው ቀውስ መፍትሄ ለመፈለግ እንዲደረግ ጥሪ ያቀርባል፤ ሪፖርተር እንደተረዳው።
data.orm: Paarlaamaan Awurooppaa murtee "hatattamaan dhaabbachuu jeequmsa qaamolee hundaan uumamanii" gaafatu , dabalees marii keessoo biyyooleessaa Itoophiyaan durfamu bakka bu'oota Tigiraay, Amaaraa, Benishaangul-Gumuz, Affaar, Somaaliyaa, Oromiyaa, Sumaalee, Sabaa fi sablaammootaa fi ummatoota kibbaa( SSUK), fi Gaambeellaa dabalachuun furmaataa xumuraa jeequmsa biyyatti keessatti jiru furuf dabarsee, Rippoorterrichi akka hubatetti.
data.som: "Baarlamaanka Yurub ayaa ansixiyay go’aan dalbaya" in sida uugu dhakhsaha badan loo joojiyo colaadda dhammaan dhinacyada" wuxuuna ku baaqay wada hadal qaran oo loo dhan yahay oo ay hoggaaminayso Itoobiya oo ay ku jiraan wakiillo ka socda Tigray, Amxaarada, Benishangul-Gumuz, Canfar, Oromia, Sidama, Somali, Shucuubta Koonfureed. , Qowmiyadaha iyo Shucuubta (SNNPR), iyo Gambella si xal waara loogu helo dhibaatooyinka ka jira dalka, ayuu dhigay wargayska Reporter.
data.tir: ፓርላማ ኣውሮፓ “ኩሎም ወገናት ብቕልጡፍ ተፃብኦታት ጠጠው ከብሉ” ኣብ ርእሲ ምሕታቱ ብተበግሶ ኢትዮጵያ ዝምራሕ ንኹሉ ማለት እውን እንኮላይ ተወከልቲ ትግራይ፣ ኣምሓራ፣ ቤንሻንጉል-ጉሙዝ፣ ዓፋር፣ ኦሮሚያ፣ ሲዳማ፣ ሶማሊ፣ብሄራት፣ ብሄረሰባትን ህዝብታትን ደቡብን ጋምቤላን ዘሳተፈ ዘተ ክካየድን ኣብታ ሃገር ዝቕፅል ዘሎ ቅልውላው ዘተኣማምን ፍታሕ ክረክብን ዝገብር ውሳኔ ከምዘፅደቐ ሪፖርተር ጋዜጣ ፀብፂቡ።

data.eng: The Parliament also called on its Member States “to halt exports of arms and surveillance technology to Ethiopia that are being used to facilitate attacks on civilians and perpetrate human rights violations,” the resolution reads.
data.aaf: barlamenti Kaddu Intem Adoytitih Tabn Baxooxa Aslaca Culsa solisaanam kee Lowsistekniloji Itiyyobiya Fanah Ayyunta edde Biyakoonuh yantifiqenim kee Adam baxxi Caki Ganaysaqta Bilibaqoolit," Caligoran Yekriye.
data.amh: ፓርላማው አባል ሀገራቱ “ወደ ኢትዮጵያ የሚልኩትን በሰላማዊ ዜጎች ላይ ጥቃት ለማድረስ እና የሰብአዊ መብት ጥሰቶችን ለመፈጸም በማገልገል ላይ ያሉ የጦር መሳሪያ እና የክትትል ቴክኖሎጂ መላክ እንዲያቆሙ “ ጥሪ አቅርቧል፣ ሪዞሉሽን እንዳስነበበው።
data.orm: Akkasumas Paarlaamichi biyyoota miseensotaaf " haleellaa fi cabuu mirga namoomaa sirrii hin taanee mijeessuf fee'umsa meeshaalee waraanaa fi tekinooloojii hordoffii gara Itoophiyaa akka dhaabbatuuf" waamicha dabarse.
data.som: Baarlamaanka ayaa sidoo kale ugu baaqay Dawladaha xubnaha ka ah "inay joojiyaan dhoofinta hubka iyo tignoolajiyada dubagalka ee Itoobiya ee loo adeegsanayo fududaynta weerarada ka dadka rayidka ah iyo xadgudubyada xuquuqda aadamaha," sida uu heshisku uu dhigayo.
data.tir: እቲ ፓርላማ ብተወሳኺ ኣባል ሃገራት "ኣብ ልዕሊ ሰላማዊያን ሰባት መጥቃዕቲ ኣብ ዘብጽሑን ግህሰት ሰብኣዊ መሰል ዘውርዱን ኣጽዋርን ናይ ክትትል ቴክኖሎጂን ናብ ኢትዮጵያ ከይላኣኹ"ብምባል ወሲኑ።

data.eng: The Ethiopian national elections scheduled for August, 2020 were postponed due to the threat posed by the Coronavirus pandemic.
data.aaf: koronavayris dalkak Gexaamah Itiyyobiyak Agat Dooro Waktiy Ximoliy, 2020 suge yexeereenih.
data.amh: ነሐሴ 2020 የታቀደው የኢትዮጵያ ብሔራዊ ምርጫ በኮሮና ቫይረስ ወረርሽኝ ምክንያት ለሌላ ጊዜ ተላለፈ።
data.orm: Filannoon biyyooleessaa Itoophiyaa Hagayya, 2020'f karoorfame daafii rakkoo weerara Vaayiresii Koronaatif darbeera.
data.som: "Doorashooyinka qaranka Itoobiya ee loo qorsheeyay inay dhacdo Ogosto, 2020 ayaa dib loo dhigay khatarta uu leeyahay cudurka Coronavirus ka awgeed."
data.tir: እቲ ኣብ ነሓሰ 2020 ዓ.ም.ፈ ክካየድ ተተሊሙ ዝነበረ ሃገራዊ መረፃ ኢትዮጵያ ብምኽንያት ስግኣት ለበዳ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ተናዊሑ ምንባሩ ይፍለጥ።

data.eng: The postponement was a controversial move for Ethiopian political parties, especially the Tigray People’s Liberation Front (TPLF) which held regional elections unilaterally in defiance of the federal government’s decision to postpone the election.
data.aaf: Tabtabisaanamah sugte taqabitek Angayuk Itiyyobiyak Siyaasah Misonaani, Baxsaluk Tigray Amobaxaqah foca TAF/TPLF/ Ragaakay dooro abeeh dibuk Cinak federal Doolatih Margaqa Dooro Teyxeereh.
data.amh: ለሌላ ጊዜ ማስተላለፉ ለኢትዮጵያ የፖለቲካ ፓርቲዎች አወዛጋቢ እርምጃ ነበር ፣ በተለይም የትግራይ ሕዝብ ነፃ አውጪ ግንባር (ህወሓት) የፌዴራል መንግሥት ምርጫውን ለሌላ ጊዜ ያስተላለፈውን ውሳኔ በመቃወም ክልላዊ ምርጫዎችን በብቸኝነት አካሂዷል።
data.orm: Darbuun guyyichaa paartilee siyaasaa Itoophiyaatif kan hin fudhatamne ture, keessumaa Addi Bilisummaa Ummata Tigiraay(ABUT) murtee darbuu filannoo mootummaa federaalaa mormuun dhuunfaan filannoo naannawaa kan geggeessedha.
data.som: Dib u dhigistab ayaa ahayd tillaabo muran badan ka keentay dhinaca xisbiyada siyaasadda Itoobiya, gaar ahaan xisbiga Tigray People’s Liberation Front (TPLF) oo qabtay doorasho hal dhinac ah oo ka soo horjeedda go’aankii dowladda dhexe ee ahaa in doorashada dib loo dhigo.
data.tir: እዚ ውሳነ ኣብ መንጐ ፖለቲካዊ ፓርቲታት ኢትዮጵያ ክትዕ ኣብ ርእሲ ምፍጣሩ ብፍላይ ህዝባዊ ወያነ ሓርነት ትግራይ ፌደራላዊ መንግስቲ ነቲ መረፃ ከናውሖ ምውሳኑ ብዘይምቕባል በይናዊ ክልላዊ መረፃ ኣካይዱ ኣሎ።

data.eng: According to a report from Fana Broadcasting Corporation, Gedu on his part briefed Pompeo stating “Ethiopia’s rationale behind building GERD which stood on the principles of fair and reasonable utilization of its water resources.”
data.aaf: Fanah boroxkastingi korboresionih Gabaaqi Inal, Gexu Isi gudgudul Baxaqiseh Bombeo asta haak"Itiyyobiya GREX/GRED/ kah Xisam Asababite daretle Koran kee sababa alesini isi Lee gaddi intifaqa."
data.amh: ፋና ብሮድካስቲንግ ኮርፖሬት ባወጣው ዘገባ ገዱ በበኩሉ ለፖምፔዮ እንደገለፀው “ገርድን ከመገንባት በስተጀርባ ያለው የኢትዮጵያ ምክንያት የውሃ ሀብቷን ፍትሃዊ እና ምክንያታዊ በሆነ አጠቃቀም መርሆዎች ላይ የቆመ ነው” ።
data.orm: Akka Korporeeshiniin Biroodkaasii Faanaa gabaasetti, gama isaatiin Gedduun "yaadi Itoophiyaa ijaarsa GERD duuba jiru yaadrimeewwan haqaa fi sababawaa qabeenya bishaanii isaa fayyadamuu irra kan ka'eedha" jechuun Poompeef ibsaniiru.
data.som: Sida laga soo xigteeyey wariye ka socda Fana Broadcasting Corporation, Gedu ayaa dhiniciisa warbixin ka siiyay Pompeo isagoo sheegay "Mabda'a Itoobiya ee ka dambeeya dhismaha GERD ee ku qotoma mabaadi'da caddaalad iyo macquul ah oo looga faa'iidaysan karo kheyraadkeeda biyaha."
data.tir: ርትዓዊ መበገሲ ህንፀት ዓብዪ ግድብ ህዳሴ ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ መትከላት ፍትሓዊን ምኽንያታዊን ኣጠቓቕማ ሃፍቲ ማይ ዝተመስረተ ከምዝኾነ ኣይተ ገዱ ንሚስተር ፓምፕዮ ከምዘብርሀ ፋና ብሮድካስቲንግ ኮርፖሬሽን ፀብፂቡ።

data.eng: In related news, speaker of the House of Peoples’ Representatives of Ethiopia, Tagesse Chafo slammed the recent resolution by the Arab league over the GERD.
data.aaf: Tabisle Xaaguh, Ityyibiyak Umatah Awlaytitih Malah buxah Yaabe, Tagesse/Tadese/ Chafo Ogoreh Xayi maqaralay Qarab liig DREXil/GRED/.
data.amh: በተያያዘ ዜና የኢትዮጵያ ህዝብ ተወካዮች ምክር ቤት አፈ-ጉባኤ አቶ ታገሰ ጫፎ የዓረብ ሊግ በቅርቡ በህዳሴ ግድብ ላይ ያሳለፈውን የውሳኔ ሀሳብ ነቅፈውታል።
data.orm: Oduu walqabateen, Dubbi himaan mana maree bakka bu'oota ummata Itoophiyaa, Taggeseee Caafoo wal dhabdee furuu dhiyeenya Liigii Arabaatin GERD irratti dhiyaate mormaniiru.
data.som: Sidoo kale, Afhayeenka Golaha shacabka Itoobiya, Tagesse Chafo, ayaa si kulul u weeraray go’aankii dhawaan ka soo baxay ururka Carabta ee GERD.
data.tir: ብተዛማዲ ዜና ኣፈ ጉባኤ ቤት ምኽሪ ተወከልቲ ህዝቢ ታገሰ ጫፎ ነቲ ኣብ ቀረባ ዓብዪ ህዳሰ ግድብ ኢትዮጵያ ኣመልኪቱ ብሊግ ዓረብ ዝጸደቐ ውሳኔ ነጺጎምዎ።

data.eng: Five months after Ethiopia and Eritrea officially ended a two-decade old stalemate and somewhat restored normalcy in relations, President Sahle-work Zewde received a credentials letter of the newly appointed Eritrean head of mission, Semere Russom at the National Palace on Thursday.
data.aaf: Koona Alsak Lakal Itiyyibiya kee Retriya Baxaqaluk selimeh Namma Tabna sanat Dmaahi XisneenaDumahi qalal Aydaaruk, berezixanti Sahle-work zewde Hirigteh Migiriteetah Ayyunta qusubih heenih yanin Eretriyak Daga Mission, Semer Russon doolat Buxal/qaril/ Kameesih.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ እና ኤርትራ ለሁለት አስርት ዓመታት የቆየውን አለመግባባት ካቆሙ እና በተወሰነ መልኩ ወደ መደበኛ ግንኙነት ከተመለሱ ከአምስት ወራት በኋላ ፕሬዝዳንት ሳህለወርቅ ዘውዴ አዲስ የተሾሙት የኤርትራው ልኡክ ኃላፊ አቶ ሰመረ ሩሶምን ሐሙስ በብሔራዊ ቤተመንግሥት ተቀብለዋል።
data.orm: Itoophiyaa fi Eritiraan ifatti wal dhabdee cufamaa waggoota kurnan lamaa dhabanii fi hamma ta'een walitti dhufeenya isaanii deebisanii ji'oota shan booda, Pirezidaantiin Sahile-Warq Zawudee xalayaa muudamaa Dura-ta'aa ergamaa Eritiraa haaraa Semmeree Rusoom masaraa biyyoolessaatti kamisa fudhataniiru.
data.som: Shan bilood ka dib markii ay Itoobiya iyo Ereteriya ay si rasmi ah u soo afjareen khilaaf labaatan sannadood soo socday, isla markaana uu caadi soo noqday xidhiidhkoodii, Madaxweyne Sahle-work Zewde ayaa warqad aqoonsiga safiirnimo ka guddoontay madaxa cusub ee Ertirea, Semere Russom Khamiistii shalay ahayd qasriga qaranka.
data.tir: ኣብ መንጐ ኢትዮጵያን ኤርትራን ንኽልተ ዓሰርተታት ዝፀንሐ ምትፍናን ምስኣብቀዐን እቲ ርክብ ናብ ንቡር ኩነታት ምስተመለሰን ድሕሪ ሓሙሽተ ወርሒ ፕሬዚዳንት ሳህለ ወርቅ ዘውዴ ናይ ኤርትራ ኣምባሳደር ኮይኑ ናይ ዝተሸመ ሰመረ ርእሶም ደብዳቤ ሹመት ኣብ ሃገራዊ ቤተመንግስቲ ብሓሙስ ተቐቢለን።

data.eng: Semere came to Ethiopia four months ago following the restored relations with the signing of a joint declaration of Peace and Friendship agreement in Asmara last July.
data.aaf: Semere Itiyyobiya Fanah Yemeetem Afara alsih Gidde katayak firmatay Sitalihh salaam kee wadayini kuktih Sitigey Asmarah addal waraye Waysuh Qala qagisanama.
data.amh: ሰመረ ከአራት ወራት በፊት ወደ ኢትዮጵያ የመጣው ባለፈው ሀምሌ ወር አስመራ ላይ የሰላምና የወዳጅነት የጋራ ስምምነት መፈራረሙን ተከትሎ ግንኙነቱ ወደ ቀድሞ ሁኔታው በመመለሱ ነው።
data.orm: Semmereen ji'a afur dura walitti dhufeenya ibsa walii galtee Nagaa fi Hiriyummaa Adoolessa darbe Asmaraatti mallattaa'een deebi'een booda Itoophiyaa dhufaniiru.
data.som: Semere ayaa yimid Itoobiya afar bilood ka hor, ka dib markii dib loo soo celiyay xidhiidh ka iyada oo heshiis wadajir ah oo nabadda iyo saaxiibtinimada lagu saxiixay Asmara bishii july ee la soo dhaafay.
data.tir: ሰመረ ነቲ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ሓምለ ኣብ ኣስመራ ዝተፈረመ ሓበራዊ ስምምዕነት ሰላምን ምሕዝነትን ስዒቡ እዩ ቅድሚ ኣርባዕተ ወርሒ ናብ ኢትዮጵያ ዝመጸ።

data.eng: It is to be recalled that, in October 2017, Prime Minister Hailemariam Dessalegn, in his address to the House of Peoples’ Representatives (HPR), said that his administration has accepted the resignation of Bereket.
data.aaf: Qagitak seecak, Qunxa Garabluy 2017 Naharsi Malaak Haylemayram Xessalegn, kay madiyi Umatah Awlatitih Malah Buxah UAMB/HPR/, Iyeh Kay Xinniso bereketik Taama Cabti Ogolteh.
data.amh: እንደሚታወሰው፣ በጥቅምት ወር 2017 ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር ኃይለ ማርያም ደሳለኝ ለሕዝብ ተወካዮች ምክር ቤት ባቀረቡት ንግግር እንዳሉት አስተዳደራቸው የአቶ በረከትን የሥራ መልቀቂያ ተቀብሏል።
data.orm: Akkuma yaadatamu, Onkoleelessa 2017, Ministeerri Muummee Hayilemaariyaam Dessaaleny, mana maree bakka bu'oota ummataa(MBU) bakka bu'uun, bulchiinsi isaanii fedhaan aangoo gadlakkisuu Barakat fudhateera.
data.som: Waxaa la xusuustaa in bishii Oktoobar 2017, Ra’iisal Wasaare Hailemariam Dessalegn, oo khudbad u jeediyay Golaha Shacabka (HPR), uu sheegay in maamulkiisu uu aqbalay iscasilaadda Bereket.
data.tir: ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ሃይለማርያም ደሳለኝ ብጥቅምቲ 2017 ዓ.ም.ፈ ንቤት ምኽሪ ተወከልቲ ህዝቢ መብርሂ እንትህቡ መንግስቶም ንሕቶ ብፍቓድ ስራሕ ምልቓቕ በረከት ስምኦን ዝተቐበሎ ምኳኑ ምግላፆም ዝዝከር እዩ።

data.eng: Bereket was serving as deputy head of Policy Studies and Research Centre, an institution set up to aid the PM in high-level policy issues.
data.aaf: Bereket sugewak bolisi Fokaqo kee Kusaq Fanteenak CigiilaSaqalah suge, Ta institutionih Dafeeseh Cato NM Fayale bolisih Caagidal.
data.amh: በረከት ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትሩን በከፍተኛ የፖሊሲ ጉዳዮች ላይ ለመርዳት በተቋቋመው የፖሊሲ ጥናትና ምርምር ማዕከል ምክትል ኃላፊ ሆነው ሲያገለግሉ ነበር።
data.orm: Barakat akka itti-aanaa dura-ta'aa Qo'annoowwan Immaammataa fi Giddugala Qorannoo ta'uun tajaajila turaniiru, giddugalichi Ministeera Muummee dhimmoota imaammataa sadarkaa olaanaa irratti gargaaruuf dhaabbate.
data.som: Bereket ayaa ushaqaynayay xigeen ahaan oo dhanka madaxa Daraasaadka Siyaasadda iyo Xarunta Cilmi baarista, oo ah hay'ad loo sameeyay in ay ka caawiso Ra'iisul Wasaaraha arrimaha siyaasadda heerka sare ah.
data.tir: በረከት ኣብቲ ንቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ኣብ ዝላዓሉ ጉዳያት ፖሊሲ ከማኽር ዝተጣየሸ ማእኸል ምርምርን መጽናዕቲን ፖሊሲ ምኽትል ሓላፊ ኮይኑ ክሰርሕ ዝጸንሐ እዩ።

data.eng: Yeshiwas Assefa, the newly elected president of Semayawi (Blue) Party, who assumed the leadership at the general assembly held at the headquarters of the All Ethiopian Union Party (AEUP) a few weeks ago, has announced the establishment of a new executive committee during the National Council meeting that was held last Saturday.
data.aaf: Yeshiwas Asefa, Qusba addah Doorime Qaranceela/blue/ Misoyna Berezixant, Miya Axcuk Miracisiyi Kaxxa Dafeynay Inkih Tan Itiyyibiyah Inkiinoh Misoyana/IEIM/ namma Ayaamah, Yeysixigeenih dagga Raqta Makaadoh Xisol Agatak Malabuxah Dafeynay Warayte Sabtih tekke.
data.amh: የሺዋስ አሰፋ፣ አዲሱ የተመረጡት የሰማያዊ ፓርቲ ፕሬዚዳንት፣ ከጥቂት ሳምንታት በፊት የመላው ኢትዮጵያ ሕብረት ፓርቲ (መኢአድ) ዋና ጽሕፈት ቤት በተካሄደው ጠቅላላ ጉባዔ ላይ የአመራርነቱን ሥልጣን የወሰዱት፣ ባለፈው ቅዳሜ የተካሄደው የብሔራዊ ምክር ቤት ስብሰባ አዲስ የሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ ማቋቋሙን አስታውቀዋል።
data.orm: Yeshiwaas Asaffaa, pirezidaantii paartii Samaayaawwii(cuquliisaa) haaraa, itti gaafatamummaa walga'ii walii galaa teessoo Paartii Tokkummaa Guutummaa Itoophiyaa (PTGI)tti torbe muraasa dura geggefame irratti kan fudhatte, hundeeffama koree haaraa hojii-raawwachistotaa marii mana maree biyyooleessaa Sanbata-duraa darbe ta'e irratti beeksisaniiru.
data.som: Yeshiwas Assefa, oo loo doortay madaxweynaha cusub ee xisbiga Semayawi (Bluug) , oo la wareegay hoggaanka shirweynaha guud ee xisbiga Midowga Itoobiya ee AEUP oo toddobaadyo ka hor ka dhacay, ayaa ku dhawaaqay in la dhisay guddi cusub oo fulineed intii lagu jiray shirkii golaha qaranka ee qabsoomay Sabtidii ina dhaaftay.
data.tir: እቲ ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ኣብ ዋና ቤት ፅሕፈት ናይ መላእ ኢትዮጵያ ሓድነት ፓርቲ (ኤ.ኢ.ዩ.ፒ) ቅድሚ ቁሩብ ሰሙናት ኣብ ዝተኻየደ ሓፈሻዊ ጉባኤ ሓዱሽ ፕሬዝዳንት ሰማያዊ ፓርቲ ኮይኑ ዝተመረፀ የሽዋስ ኣሰፋ ብቐዳም ኣኼባ ብሄራዊ ቤት ምኽሪ ኣብ ዝተኻየደሉ እዋን ሓዱሽ ኣፈፃሚ ኮሚቴ ከምዝተሰየመ ዕላዊ ገይሩ።

data.eng: The National Council endorsed the nomination of the executive committee the president presented at the same meeting
data.aaf: Agat malahbuxa Qokolintem Dagga raqta makaadoh Qalaylih berezixanti Geytimem Tabisle Dafeyna.
data.amh: ብሄራዊ ምክር ቤቱ ፕሬዝዳንቱ በዚሁ ስብሰባ ያቀረቡትን የስራ አስፈፃሚ ኮሚቴ ሹመት አፅድቋል
data.orm: Manni maree biyyoollessaas kaadhima koree hojii-raawwachistootaa pireezidantiin dhiyeessaniif walga'ii wal fakkaataa irratti fudhatamummaa keenanniru.

data.eng: The 100km-long road, stretching from Ethiopia’s Asosa town to Sudan’s Kumruk (Kormuk), will enhance trade relations as well as social ties between the two countries.
data.aaf: 100km- Nabah yan Giti ,Itiyyobiyak Asosak Ugutak illa Sudan Kumruk(Kormuk), Namma baaxoh Fanat yan Ayyunti Fantaaxaway tohilih Badaqt Qali edde Aysele.
data.amh: 100 ኪሎ ሜትር ርዝመት ያለው ከኢትዮጵያ አሶሳ ከተማ እስከ ሱዳን ኩምሩክ (ኮርሙክ) የሚዘረጋው መንገድ የሁለቱን ሀገራት የንግድ ግንኙነት እና ማህበራዊ ግንኙነት ያሳድጋል።
data.orm: Daandii 100-km dheeratu, Asoosaaa Itoophiyaatii ka'ee Kumuruk(kormuuk) sudaan kan ga'u, walitti dhufeenya daldalaa akkasumas hidhaa hawaasa biyya lameenii ni foyyeessa.
data.som: Waddadan oo dhererkeedu dhan yahay 100km, oo ka bilaabmaysa magaalada Asosa ee dalka Itoobiya ilaa Suudaanta Kumruk (Kormuk), ayaa kor u qaadi doonta xidhiidhka ganacsi iyo sidoo kale xidhiidhka bulsho ee labada dal.

data.eng: President Girma said in particular the Grand Ethiopian Renaissance Dam, road, railway, telecommunication, electric power, potable water and irrigation development are the projects given priority in this fiscal year.

data.amh: ፕሬዚዳንት ግርማ አንዳሉት በተለይ ታላቁ የኢትዮጵያ ህዳሴ ግድብ ፣ የመንገድ ፣ የባቡር መስመር ፣ የቴሌኮሙኒኬሽን ፣ የኤሌክትሪክ ኃይል ፣ የመጠጥ ውሃና የመስኖ ልማት በዚህ በጀት ዓመት ቅድሚያ የተሰጣቸው ፕሮጀክቶች ናቸው።
data.orm: Pireezidantii Girmaan Hidha Haaromsaa Guddicha Itoophiyaa, daandii, daandii baaburaa, telekoominikeeshinii, humna elektirikii, bishaan dhugaatii fi guddinni jallisii pirojetiiwwan bara baajataa kanatti xiyyeeffannoon keennameefiidha jedhaniiru.
data.som: Madaxweyne Girma ayaa si gaar ah u sheegay Biyo xidheenka Grand Ethiopian Renaissance Dam, Wadooyinka, Jidka Tareenka, Isgaarsiinta, Korontada, Biyaha la cabo, Horumarinta Waraabka ay yihiin mashaariicda mudnaanta la siinayo sanad miisaaniyadeed kan.

data.orm: Akka Saamu'eel jedhetti, hidhichi kuusaa guddaa qabu yaa'insa bishaan lagaa walfakkaataa tahee ni to'ata akkasumas lolaawwan balaa qaban kanneen darbee darbee namoota ajjeesu, qe'eerraa buqqa'iinsa garmalee fiduu fi manca'ina qabeenyaa Sudaan keessatti fidu nii hir'isa.
data.som: Sida uu sheegay Samuel, biyo xireenka oo leh kayd weyn ayaa nidaamin doona qulqulka biyaha wabiga, wuxuuna yareyn doona fataha halista ah ee mararka qaar ay dadku ay dhintaan, kuwaas oo sababa barakacyo ballaaran, iyo khasaare hantiyeed oo ka dhaca Suudaan.

data.eng: In Sudan, heavy rains and flooding during August and September 2021 have, for instance, affected more than 314,000 people.
data.aaf: Sudanal, Kaxxa Rob kee weeqi Ximoli kee Gaxa Garabluk 2021, Ceelaloh, 314,000 Dagga yakke mari edde Biyakite.
data.amh: በሱዳን፣ በነሀሴ እና መስከረም 2021 የጣለው ከባድ ዝናብ እና የጎርፍ አደጋ ከ314,000 በላይ ሰዎችን ጎድቷል።
data.orm: Sudaan keessatti, roobni cimaanii fi lolaan yeroo Hagayyaa fi Fulbaana 2021 fakkeenyaaf, namoota 314,000 ol midhe.
data.som: Suudaan, roobab mahiigaan ah iyo daadad bilihii Agoosto iyo Sebtembar 2021, tusaale ahaan, waxay saameeyeen in ka badan 314,000 oo qof.

data.eng: According to the press release sent to ENA, heavy to very heavy rainfall (top 10 to 5 percent on record) is expected in regions of Al Qadarif and Sennar in Sudan, Gash-Barka and Debu in Eritrea, and parts of Tigray, western Amhara, and southern Afar.
data.aaf: Dagga raqta 10 illa 5 gabba fanah Rikarxil/Asijiliyal/ Qambalinta Inkih tan Rakaakayitek Al Qadrif kee Sennar Sudan Addal, Gash Barka kee Debu Retriyah Addal Tigrayak gudey, Ayroculmah Amacara kee Kiblatiqaxih Qafara.
data.amh: ለኢዜአ በተላከው ጋዜጣዊ መግለጫ መሰረት ፣ በከባድ እስከ በጣም ከባድ ዝናብ (በሪከርድ ከ 10 እስከ 5 በመቶ) በሱዳን አል ቃዳሪፍ እና ሰናር ክልሎች ፣ በኤርትራ ጋሽ ባርካ እና ደቡ ፣ እንዲሁም የትግራይ ክፍሎች ፣ ምዕራብ አማራ ፣ እና ደቡብ አፋር ይጠበቃል።
data.orm: Akka ibsa gabaasa ENA'tti ergameetti, roobni cimaa hanga baayyee cimaa (olaanaa galmaa'ee jiru dhibbeentaa 10 hanga 5) naannolee Sudaan Al Qadariif fi Sennaar, Gash-Barkaa fi Deebuu Eritiraa, akkasumas kutaalee Tigraay, Lixa Amhaaraa, fi Kibba Affaar keessatti nii eegama.
data.som: Sida lagu sheegay war saxaafadeedka loo diray ENA, roobab culus iyo kuwo aad u culus (ugu sarreeya 10 ilaa 5 boqolkiiba) ayaa la filayaa inay ka da'aan gobollada Al Qadarif iyo Sennar ee Suudaan, Gash-Barka iyo Debu ee Eritrea, iyo qaybo ka mid ah Tigray, galbeedka Axmaarada, iyo koonfurta Canfarta.
data.tir: ንግልጋሎት ዜና ኢትዮጵያ (ግ.ዜ.ኢ) ዝተልኣኸ ጋዜጣዊ መግለፂ ከምዝሓበሮ ኣብ ኣልገዳሪፍን:ሴናርን ሱዳን፣ ኣብ ጋሽ ባርካን ዴቡን ኤርትራ ከምኡ እውን ኣብ ክፋል ትግራይ፣ ምዕራብ ኣምሓራን ደቡባዊ ዓፋርን ብርቱዕን ኣዝዩ ብርቱዕን (ዝለዓለ:10 ክሳብ 5 ሚእታዊ ዝምዝገብ) ዝናብ ክወቅዕ ትፅቢት ይግበር።

data.eng: In delivering opening remarks, State Minister H.E. Ambassador Redwan Hussien said the workshop demonstrates Ethiopia’s unwavering determination to be at the forefront of climate change issues in the international arena.

data.amh: ሚኒስትር ዴኤታው የተከበሩ አምባሳደር ሬድዋን ሁሴን እንደተናገሩት አውደ ጥናቱ ኢትዮጵያ በአየር ንብረት ለውጥ ጉዳዮች በዓለም አቀፍ መድረክ ግንባር ቀደም ለመሆን ያላትን የማይናወጥ ቁርጠኝነት ያሳያል።

data.som: Furitaanka shirka ayaa waxaa khudbad ka jeediyay Wasiiru Dowlaha Safiir Redwan Hussien oo sheegay in aqoon is weydaarsigani uu muujinayo sida ay Itoobiya uga go’an tahay in ay safka hore kaga jirto arrimaha isbeddelka cimilada ee fagaarayaasha caalamiga ah.

data.eng: Noting the recurrent drought, flooding, and locust invasions in the Horn of Africa, Ambassador Redwan said, it is vital that we give due attention to climate diplomacy to enhance support to mitigation and adaptation interventions at the grassroots level.
data.aaf: Tu matan Qabaray, Weeqa kee qanatu Afrikah Gaysah Addal, Ambasaxer Ridwan Iyem, Nanu Baxsale Hangi kah necenim Hawa Xiblomasi Gubbi Caddo Kalalanam kee Yabixenimih Catota Aysiisuk Geytimna.
data.amh: በአፍሪካ ቀንድ ተደጋጋሚ ድርቅ፣ ጎርፍና አንበጣ ወረራዎችን የጠቀሱት አምባሳደር ሬድዋን፣ በታችኛው ደረጃ ላይ የሚደረጉ ርምጃዎችን የመከላከልና የማላመድ ድጋፍን ለማጎልበት ለአየር ንብረት ዲፕሎማሲ ተገቢውን ትኩረት መስጠቱ አስፈላጊ ነው።
data.orm: Hongee, lolaa, fi weerara hawaannisaa Gaanfa Afrikaa keessaa deddeebiin mudataa jiru yaadachiisuun, Ambaasaaddarri Reedwaan, giddu seentumaa sadarkaa gadii itti madaquufi hambisuu deggeruuf dippiloomaasii jijjiirama qilleensaaf xiyyeeffannoo barbaachisu kennuun keenya murteessaadha jedhe
data.som: Isagoo xusaya abaaraha, fatahaadaha, iyo duulaanka Ayaxa ee Geeska Afrika ee soo noqnoqda, ayuu yidhi danjire Redwan, waa lagama maarmaan in aan fiiro gaar ah siino dublamaasiyadda cimilada si kor loogu qaado taageerada lagu yareynayo waxqabadyada la qabsiga ee heerka hoose.

data.eng: In 1997 MIDROC Gold acquired the Legadembi open pit gold mine for 172 million USD through privatization process.
data.aaf: 1997 Addat MIDROC Dahab geyteh Legadembi fakeh Boodok Dahabak 172 milyoonih USD Cankah Bicisiyal.
data.amh: በ 1997 ሚድሮክ ጎልድ የለገዳምቢ ክፍት ጉድጓድ የወርቅ ማዕድን ማውጫን በ 172 ሚሊዮን ዶላር በፕራይቬታይዜሽን ሂደት አግኝቷል።
data.orm: Bara 1997 keessa Warqeen MIDROC karaa adeemsa qabeenya gara dhuunfaatti dabarsuu bakka albuuda warqee baasuu lafa banaa Lagadambii USD miliyoona 172'n fudhate.
data.som: Sanadkii 1997dii MIDROC Gold ayaa heshay Legadembi dhan 172 milyan oo doolar maalida macdanta dahabka ah iyada oo loo marayo habka gaarka loo leeyahay.
data.tir: ሚድሮክ ወርቂ ብ1997ዓ.ም.ፈ ብመስርሕ ምቕያር ናብ ውልቀ ሃፍቲ ኣብ ለገ ደምቢ ማዕድን ወርቂ ክኹዕት ብ172 ሚልዮን ዩ.ኤስ ዶላር ፍቓድ ረኺቡ።

data.eng: Since 1998 MIDROC has been mining gold and silver from the gold mine and export the bulk of its product to Switzerland.
data.aaf: 1998 MIDROC dahab mayaqa kee biri dahab mayaqa kee Iroh Rubiya mangom Ta Duye Swzerlanxi fanah Rubte.
data.amh: ከ 1998 ጀምሮ ሚድሮክ ወርቅ እና ብር ከወርቅ ማዕድን ማውጫ በማምረት ምርቱን በብዛት ወደ ስዊዘርላንድ በመላክ ላይ ይገኛል።
data.orm: Erga bar 1998 MIDROC warqee fi meetii bakka warqeen baafamuu baasaa akkasumas oomisha isaa gara caalaa gara Iwiizerlaanditti ala ergaa ture.
data.som: Tan iyo 1998 kii MIDROC ayaa dahab iyo qalin ka qodaysay macdanta dahabka ah oo ay u dhoofinaysay inta badan wax soo saarkeeda Switzerland.
data.tir: ካብ 1998 ዓ.ም.ፈ ክሳብ ሕዚ ድማ ወርቂን ብሩርን እናውፀአ ፍሪያቱ ብጅምላ ናብ ስዊዘርላንድ እናሰደደ እዩ።

data.eng: Manufactured by Tomizawa & Co. Ltd, a small Japanese company, AdPower is a unique technology developed twenty years ago, Toru Tomizawa, President, told The Reporter on Thursday, while briefing reporters about the product.
data.aaf: Menifakcheringi bicisem Tomizawa kee Co.Ltd, Qunxa Jabaan Kambaniy, Adcayla kini 20 ligidah bicte teknolojiy Teet misowtam Alesini, Toru Tomizawa, Berezixanti Reborti Kamesih elle Abenal, towaqadi Ta gabaqi Ta Uwaytu Baxaqiseh.
data.amh: በቶሚዛዋ እና ኩባንያ ሊሚትድ በተባለ አነስተኛ የጃፓን ኩባንያ የተመረተ ፣ ኤዲፓወር ከሃያ ዓመታት በፊት የተገነባ ልዩ ቴክኖሎጂ ነው ፣ ፕሬዝዳንት ቶሩ ቶሚዛዋ ሐሙስ ለሪፖርተሮች እንደገለፁት ስለ ምርቱ ለጋዜጠኞች መግለጫ ሰጥተዋል።
data.orm: Korporeeshinii Tomizaawaa & kan oomishame, kaampaanii xiqqaa Japan kan ta'e, AdPowerin tekinooloojii addaa waggaa digdama dura kalaqameedha, Toru Tamizawa, Pireezidaantii, Kamisa Ripporterichatti osoo waa omishichi ripporterootaaf ibsanii himaniiru.
data.som: Waxaa soo saaray Tomizawa & Co. Ltd, oo ah shirkad yar oo Japan ah, AdPower waa tignoolajiyada gaarka ah ee la saameeyay labaatan sano ka hor, Toru Tomizawa, Madaxweynaha, ayaa u sheegay The Reporter Khamiista, isagoo saxafiyiinta warbixin ku saabsan badeecada u sheegay.
data.tir: እቲ ናይ ጃፓን ንእሽተይ ኩባንያ ቶሚዛዋ ሓላፊነቱ ዝተወሰነ ኩባንያ ምህርቲ ዝኾነ ኣድፓወር ቅድሚ ዒስራ ዓመት ዝተምሃዘ ፍሉይ ቴክኖሎጂ ምኳኑ ፕሬዝዳንት እቲ ኩባንያ ቶሩ ቶሚዛዋ ብሓሙስ ብዛዕባ እቲ ፍርያት ንጋዜጠኛታት እንተብርህ ንጋዜጣ ሪፖርተር ኣረዲኡ።

data.eng: According to Tomizawa, ADPower is made of special pigments, special alloy (that mainly is composed of copper) and fiber glass which help vehicles’ engines neutralize and contain CO2 emissions and in turn supplies purified oxygen via discharging electrons.
data.aaf: Tomizawa elle iyenal, Adcayli Baxsaluk Bodaadiy Dafeyna bicisa( tohyanam Mangom Kober askaliya) kee fayber meraya Tagagayooya kee CO2 imission edde yanim kee lektirokin Xischarjit Burified Oksojin Asgayuk Xayoosa.
data.amh: እንደ ቶሚዛዋ ገለፃ ፣ ኤዲፓወር የተሠራው በልዩ ቀለሞች ፣ ልዩ ቅይጥ (በዋናነት ከመዳብ የተዋቀረ ነው) እና ፋይበር ግላስ ይህም የተሽከርካሪዎች ሞተሮች የ ካርቦን ልቀትን እንዲያጠሩ እና እንዲይዙ የሚረዳቸው እና በተራው ደግሞ የተጣራ ኦክስጅንን በኤሌክትሮኖችን ዲስቻርጅ በማድረግ ለቃሉ።
data.orm: Akka Tomizaawaatti, ADPower'n ruqoolee addaa, makaa addaa(caalaatti Kopperii irraa ta'ee) fi fuullee faayiberii kan motora konkolaattota qabbaneessuu fi CO2 fudhatuu fi oksijiinii qulqullaa'ee karaa elektiroonota gadlakkisuutin kennu irraa uumame.
data.som: Sida laga soo xigtayay Tomizawa, ADPower ayaa ka samaysan midabyo gaar ah, daawaha khaaska ah (oo inta badan ka kooban naxaas) iyo muraayado fiber ah kuwaas oo ka caawiya matoorada baabuurta inay dhexdhexaadiyaan oo ay ka kooban yihiin CO2 qiiqa ka dibna sahayda ogsijiinta sifaysan iyada oo la sii daayo electrons.
data.tir: ከም መብርሂ ቶሚዛዋ ኣድፓወር ብፍሉይ ቀለም፣ ብፍሉይ ሓፂንን (ብበዝሒ ካብ መዳብ ዝተዋሃሃደ) ብብርጭቆ ወረቐትን ዝተሰርሐ ኮይኑ ሞተር ተሽከርከርቲ ክሃድእን ካርቦን ዳይ ኦክሳይድ ምውፃእ ሓዲጉ ብኤሌክትሮኒክስ ኣቢሉ ዝተፃረየ ኦክሲጂን ዘቕርብን ከምዝኾነ እዩ።

data.eng: In a bid to boost employment opportunities for Ethiopian nationals, the Ministry of Health as well as the Job Creation Commission (JCC) of Ethiopia has signed a trilateral MoU with the UAE-based Response Plus Holdings PJSC.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyah Xayloh Taama saamih Anakarih Maysaasa, Qafiyat Malaak Tonah kaddu Itiyyobiyak Taama Ginoh Kommission /TGK/JCC/ kee Qarab Inkiino /UAE/ Raddi Gasa Bilas Tabixi PJSC Sidica Kati sitigey /MUO/ Aben.
data.amh: ለኢትዮጵያ ዜጎች የሥራ ዕድልን ለማሳደግ በጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስቴር እንዲሁም በኢትዮጵያ የሥራ ዕድል ፈጠራ ኮሚሽን (ኢ.ሲ.ሲ.) በተባበሩት አረብ ኤምሬቶች ከሚገኘው የምላሽ ፕላስ ሆልዲንግስ PJSC ጋር የሦስትዮሽ ስምምነት ተፈራርሟል።
data.orm: Qophii carraa hojii lammiiwwan Itoophiyaa guddisuuf qophaa'e irratti, Ministeerri Fayyaa akkasumas Koomishiniin Hojii Uumuu(KHU) Itoophiyaa walii galtee sadeenii deebii keennitoota PJSC kan UAE'n degeggaramuu waliin mallatteessan.
data.som: "Si kor loogu qaado fursadaha shaqada ee muwaadiniinta Itoobiya, Wasaaradda Caafimaadka, iyo sidoo kale Guddiga Shaqo Abuurka (JCC) ee Itoobiya, ayaa heshiis saddex geesood ah la saxiixdeen hay'adda Response Plus Holdings PJSC ee fadhigeedu yahay Imaaraadka."
data.tir: ዕድል ስራሕ ኢትዮጵያዊያን ዜጋታት ዘዕቢ ውጥን ሚኒስቴር ጥዕና፣ ኮሚሽን ምህዞ ስራሕ ኢትዮጵያን ኣብ ሕቡራት ኢሚሬት ዓረብ ማእኸሉ ዝገበረ ሪስፖንስ ፕላስ ሆልዲንግስ ፒ ጄይ ኤስ ሲ ስሉስ መባእታዊ ሓበራዊ ስምምዕነት ተፈራሪሞም።

data.eng: The signing ceremony took place during the Ethiopian Minister of Health Dr. Lia Tadesse’s visit to Abu Dhabi last week.
data.aaf: Waraye Ayamah Itiyyobiyak Qafiyat Malakah tan Dr Liya Taxese Abu Adabi guftewak sirawaga/fermat/ Waynabo Abte.
data.amh: የፊርማ ስነ ስርዓቱ የተካሄደው የኢትዮጵያ ጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስትር ዶ/ር ሊያ ታደሰ ባለፈው ሳምንት አቡ ዳቢን በጎበኙበት ወቅት ነው።
data.orm: Sirni mallattoo yeroo Ministeerri Fayyaa Itoophiyaa DR. Liyaa Taddesee torbee darbe Abu Daabii daawwanitti ta'e.
data.som: Xafladda heshiiskan ayaa dhacday intii lagu guda jiray booqashadii Wasiirada Caafimaadka Itoobiya Dr. Lia Tadesse oo tagtay Abu Dhabi todobaadkii hore.
data.tir: እቲ ስምምዕነት ዝተፈረመ ሚኒስትር ጥዕና ዶክተር ሊያ ታደሰ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን ኣብ ኣቡዳቢ ኣብ ዘካየደቶ ምብጻሕ እ ዩ።

data.eng: Coronavirus cases in Ethiopia have reached 123,145 since the first Coronavirus outbreak in the country reported in March 2020, according to the Ministry of Health.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyal Korovayris Ugutma Tintiribixem 123,145 madde, Caxah Alsay 2020 Baaxoh Caddol qimboh Koronavayris Umbuluye, qafiyat Malaak Elle yescesenal.
data.amh: በኢትዮጵያ ጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስቴር መሰረት በኢትዮጵያ የመጀመሪያው የኮሮና ቫይረስ ኬዝ በመጋቢት 2020 ከተመዘገበ በኋላ በአጠቃላይ በኮሮና ቫይረስ የተያዙ ሰዎች ቁጥር 123,145 ደርሷል።
data.orm: Baayinni namoota vaayiresii Koroonaan qabamanii erga weerara jalqabaa vaayiresii Koroonaa biyyattin Bitootessa 2020 gabaasteen as 123,145 ga'eera, akka Ministeera Fayyaatti.
data.som: Kiisaska Coronavirus ee Itoobiya ayaa gaadhay 123,145 tan iyo markii ugu horreysay ee Coronavirus uu ka dillaacay dalka oo la soo sheegay bishii Maarso 2020, sida ay sheegtay Wasaaradda Caafimaadku.
data.tir: ከም መብርሂ ሚኒስቴር ጥዕና ብመጋቢት 2020ዓ.ም.ፈ ኣብታ ሃገር ፈላማይ ለበዳ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ምእታዉ ካብ ዝፅብፀብ ንነዘ ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ቁፅሪ ብኮሮና ቫይረስ ዝተትሓዙ ሰባት 123,145 በፂሑ።

data.eng: To date some 1,785,132 sample tests have been conducted, 109,846 COVID-19 patients recovered and 231 patients are currently in severe condition.
data.aaf: Ayrok teena 1,785,132 fanak fakaqo tekkeh,109,846 kovix-19 lakima Qafotem kee 231takke Kovix-19 tawakti lakimi gurat Geytimta.
data.amh: እስካሁን 1,785,132 የናሙና ምርመራ ተካሂዶ 109,846 የኮቪድ-19 ታማሚዎች ከበሽታው ያገገሙ ሲሆን 231 ታማሚዎች በከባድ ሁኔታ ላይ ይገኛሉ።
data.orm: Hanga ammaatti naamunaan qorannoo 1,785,132 godhameera, dhukkabsattoonni COVID-19 109,876 dhibee isaanii irraa foyya'aniiru akkasumas dhukkubsattoonni 231 haala yaaddessaa keessa jiru.
data.som: Ilaa hadda ilaa 1,785,132 tijaabooyin muunado ah ayaa la sameeyay, 109,846 bukaan COVID-19 ah ayaa ka caafimaaday 231 bukaanna hadda waxay ku Jiran xaalad aad u daran.
data.tir: ክሳብ ሕዚ 1,785,132 መርኣዪ ምርመራታት ዝተኻየዱ እንትኾን 109,846 ብኮቪድ 19 ዝተትሓዙ ሕሙማት ሓውዮም 231 ሕሙማን ድማ ተመግዲሮም ኣለዉ።

data.eng: Indian Embassy to Ethiopia in collaboration with Indian community in Addis Abeba marked today the 150th birth anniversary of Mahatma Gandhi in the capital at Gandhi Memorial Hospital.
data.aaf: Hindih Imbasi Itiyyobiya fanah Hindiyah Ayyuntay Addiss Ababal Yaniluk Catmak Asta edde hak Atqo 150hytoh Addah Mahteme gandi Ubukya Ayro ta Qasimal Gandi Gasitoh Hosbitalal Yessekkexen.
data.amh: በኢትዮጵያ የህንድ ኤምባሲ በአዲስ አበባ ከሚገኘው የህንድ ማህበረሰብ ጋር በመተባበር የመሃተመ ጋንዲ 150 ኛ ዓመት የልደት በዓልን በዋና ከተማው በጋንዲ መታሰቢያ ሆስፒታል አከበረ።
data.orm: Itoophiyaatti Imbaasiin Hindii walta'iinsa hawaasaa Hindii Finfinnee waliin har'a ayyaana dhaloota 150ffaa Mahatama Gaandii muummee Yaadannoo Gaandiitti kabajan.
data.som: Safaaradda Hindiya ee kutaala dalka Itoobiya oo kaashanaysa bulshada Hindida ee ku dhaqan magaalada Addis Ababa ayaa maanta 150 sanad guuradii kasoo wareegtay dhalashadii Mahatma Gandhi ee caasimadda dalkaas oo lagu qabtay Isbitaalka Gandhi Memorial Hospital.
data.tir: ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ናይ ህንዲ ኤምባሲ ምስ ማሕበረሰብ ህንዲ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ብምትሕብባር ሎሚ መዓልቲ መበል 150 ዓመት ልደት ማህተማ ጋንዲ ኣብ ርእሰ ከተማ እታ ሃገር ኣብ ዝርከብ ናይ ጋንዲ መዘከርታ ሆስፒታል ኣኽቢሩ።

data.eng: On the occasion, Indian Ambassador to Ethiopia, Anurag Srivastava said “we decided to make this year’s celebration at the very special and historic venue of Gandhi memorial Hospital, where Indian communities and Ethiopians contributed to build the hospital.”
data.aaf: Kaxxa Maddal,Hindi Ambasaxer Itiyyobiya Fanah, Anurag srivastava Iyeh"Nanu tasanat Nabaam baxsalena kee Aydaadi Handagal Gandi Kasitoh Hosbitaalal Asakaxeno, Toqwadi Hidi Ayyunta kee Itiyyobiyah Xaylo Doori Digirte ta hosbital Xisssmuh."
data.amh: በበዓሉ ላይ በኢትዮጵያ የህንድ አምባሳደር አኑራግ ስሪቫስታቫ እንዳሉት “የዘንድሮውን በዓል በጋንዲ መታሰቢያ ሆስፒታል ልዩ በሆነው ታሪካዊ ቦታ ላይ ለማድረግ ወስነናል፤ ሆስፒታሉን ለመገንባት የህንድ ማህበረሰቦች እና ኢትዮጵያውያን አስተዋፅዖ አድርገዋል።”
data.orm: Qophicha irratti, Itoophiyaatti Ambaassadarrii Hindii Anuraag Sirivastaavaan "kabaja ayyaanaa bara kanaa bakka addaa fi seena-qabeessa Hospitaala yaadannoo Gaandiitti qopheessun murteessineerra,bakka hawaasni Hindii fi Itoophiyaa hospitaala ijaaruuf gumaachanitti" jedhaniiru.
data.som: Munaasabadda, Safiirka Hindiya u fadhiya Itoobiya, Anurag Srivastava ayaa dhahay "waxaan go'aansannay inaan sannadkan ka dhigno dabbaaldegga goobta gaarka ah iyo goobta taariikhiga ah ee Gandhi Memorial Hospital, halkaas oo bulshooyinka Hindiya iyo Itoobiyaanku ay gacan ka geysteen dhismaha dhakhtarka."
data.tir: ኣብቲ ስነስርዓት ዝተረኸቡ ኣምባሳደር ህንዲ ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ኣኑራግ ሲርቫስታቫ "እዚ ናይ ሎሚ ዓመት በዓል ኣብቲ ማሕበረሰብ ህንዲን ኢትዮጵያዊያንን ንህንጸቱ ኣስተዋጽኦ ዝገበሩሉ ኣዚዩ ፍሉይን ታሪኻዊን ኣብ ዝኾነ ኣዳራሽ ጋንዲ መዘከርታ ሆስፒታል ክካየድ ኢና ወሲንና"ብምባል ገሊጾም።

data.eng: Ethiopia has established a high level national taskforce to prevent Ebola virus that has occurred in the Democratic Republic of Congo.
data.aaf: Xemokratik Reboblik Kongol Uguteh yan Ibola Vayrisih Kalalimuh Itiyyobiya Gatak Fayale Caddoh Taskiforsi Xise.
data.amh: በዲሞክራቲክ ሪፐብሊክ ኮንጎ የተከሰተውን የኢቦላ ቫይረስ ለመከላከል ኢትዮጵያ ከፍተኛ ብሔራዊ ግብረ ኃይል አቋቁማለች።
data.orm: Itoophiyaan koree duulaa sadarkaa olaanaa biyyoolessaa Vaayiresii Iboolaa Rippubilik Dimokirtawaa Koongootti argame ittisuuf hundeesse.
data.som: Itoobiya ayaa samaysay guddi heer sare ah oo heer qaran ah oo ka hortagaya fayraska Ebola ee ka dhacay Jamhuuriyadda Dimuqraadiga ah ee Kongo.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያ ነቲ ኣብ ዴሞክራቲክ ኮንጐ ዝተኸሰተ ቫይረስ ኢቦላ ንምክልኻል ዝዓለመ ሓደ ላዕለዋይ ብሄራዊ ግብረ ሃይል መስሪታ።

data.eng: Briefing journalists, Public Health Institute Director-General Dr. Eba Abate said similar taskforces formed in regions are making preparations to prevent the virus.
data.aaf: Xaagiqawayti Elle baxqisenal, Ayyunti Qafiyatih Institut Saqal Dr.Iba Abate Iyeh Tabisle Taskiforsi Biceeh rakaakayite ta Vayrisih Kalaluh Bicisoonuh.
data.amh: ለጋዜጠኞች ማብራርያ የሰጡት የህብረተሰብ ጤና ኢንስቲትዩት ዋና ዳይሬክተር ዶክተር ኤባ አባተ እንዳሉት በክልሎች የተቋቋሙ ተመሳሳይ ግብረ ሃይሎች ቫይረሱን ለመከላከል ቅድመ ዝግጅት እያደረጉ ነው።
data.orm: Gaazexessitootaaaf ibsa kennaniin, Daayirekterri-Olaanaan Inistitiyuutii Fayyaa Hawaasaa Dr. Eban koreen duulaa walfakkaatoon naannoleetti uumaman qophii vaaayiresicha ittisuuf gochaa jiru jedhan.
data.som: Warbixin lasiiyay Suxufiyiinta, Agaasimaha Guud ee Machadka Caafimaadka Dadweynaha Dr. Eba Abate ayaa sheegtay in guddi hawleedyo la mid ah oo laga sameeyay gobollada ay diyaarinayaan ka hortagga fayraska.
data.tir: ዋና ኣካያዲ ስራሕ ትካል ጥዕና ሕብረተሰብ ዶክተር ኤባ ኣባተ ንጋዜጠኛታት ከምዘብርህዎ ኣብ ክልላት ዝተጣየሹ ተመሳሳልቲ ግብረ ሃይል ነቲ ቫይረስ ንምምካት ምድላዋት እናገበሩ እዮም።

data.eng: WHO Director-General Tedros will attend the 32nd Ordinary Session of the Assembly of Heads of State and Government of the African Union.
data.aaf: Baadak Qafiyat Eglah /BQE/WHO/ saqal General Texros 32hytoh Rakaakayite saqolti kee Afrikah Inkiinoh Doolatih Dafeynat Geytimele.
data.amh: የዓለም ጤና ድርጅት ዋና ዳይሬክተር ቴድሮስ 32 ኛው የአፍሪካ ህብረት የመሪዎች እና የመሪዎች ጉባኤ መደበኛ ስብሰባ ላይ ይሳተፋሉ።
data.orm: Daayirekterri-Olaanaan WHO Tediroos walga'ii idilee bulchitoota biyyoot fi motummootaa gamtaa Afiriikaa 32ffaa ni hirmaatu.
data.som: Agaasimaha guud ee WHO Tedros ayaa ka qeyb galaya shirka caadiga ah ee 32 aad ee golaha madaxda dowladaha iyo golaha Midowga Afrika.
data.tir: ዋና ዳይሬክተር ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ቴድሮስ ኣብ መበል 32 ስሩዕ ኣኼባ ዋዕላ መራሕቲ ሃገራትን መንግስታትን ሕብረት ኣፍሪካ ክሳተፉ እዮም።

data.eng: During his stay in Ethiopia, he will also attend Food Safety Conference organized by the African Union, World Health Organization and World Food Program that will begin next Tuesday.
data.aaf: Itiyobiyal Suguwawak, usuk Angalele Maqiddi Nadafatah Konferenil Bicisem Afrikah Inkiinoy, Baadak Qafiyat Eglah /BQE/WHO/ kee Baadak Maqiddi Taderra/BMD/WFP/ tamate talaatah Qimbisele.
data.amh: በኢትዮጵያ በሚኖራቸው ቆይታም በሚቀጥለው ማክሰኞ በሚጀመረው የአፍሪካ ህብረት፣ የአለም ጤና ድርጅት እና የአለም ምግብ ፕሮግራም ባዘጋጁት የምግብ ደህንነት ኮንፈረንስ ላይም ይሳተፋሉ።
data.orm: Turtii isaa Itoophiyaa keessatti, konfiraansii Fayyummaa Nyaataa Gamtaa Afiriikaa, Dhaabbata Fayyaa Adunyaa fi Sagantaa Nyaataa Adunyaatin qindaa'ee Kibxata dhufu eegalu ni hirmaata,
data.som: Inta uu ku sugan yahay dalka Itoobiya, waxa uu sidoo kale ka qayb geli doonaa shirka Amniga Cunnada oo ay soo qabanqaabiyeen Midowga Afrika, Ururka Caafimaadka Adduunka, iyo Barnaamijka Cunnada Adduunka oo bilaaban doona Talaadada soo socota.
data.tir: ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ዝጸንሑሉ እዋን ኣብቲ ብሕብረት ኣፍሪካ፣ብውድብ ጥዕና ዓለምን ብውድብ ምግቢ ዓለምን ዝተዳለወ ደመር ደሕንነት ምግቢ ክሳተፉ እዮም።

data.eng: Malaria Program Coordinator with the Ministry, Hiwot Solomon, told WIC that various prevention mechanisms are implemented in area vulnerable to the pandemic during peak periods of spread.
data.aaf: Bagigexoh Tadeera koobahise Malaakluk Cattimak, Hiwot solomon. Iyem WIC Vayrish Kalali Cogdaadi Elle Abonowtam Dalkah Udurih Wakti Barimam Taqabiteh Addat Geytimta Arooca.

data.eng: The Ethiopian Federal Ministry of Health and the National tuberclosis (TB) Program in collaboration with WHO and partners conducted a workshop from December 17 to 18, 2018 to launch a new guideline for reaching missed tuberculosis cases.
data.aaf: Itiyyobik Federalak Qafiyat Malaak kee Agatak Tuberklosis/TB/ Tadeera BQE/WHO/ kee Qokol abaluk catimak Aysaxaxag Qusba Eddexinta Raqteh tan Tuberklosis/TB/ Caadigah worshobi Cigilta Kudok 17 illa 18 Fanah 2018 Gexsiisen.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ፌደራል ጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስቴር እና የብሔራዊ ቲዩበርክሎዝ (ቲቢ) መርሃ ግብር ከአለም ጤና ድርጅት እና ከአጋሮች ጋር በመተባበር የጠፉ የሳንባ ነቀርሳ ኬዞችን ለማግኘት ከዲሴምበር 17 እስከ 18 ቀን 2018 አዲስ መመሪያ ለማስጀመር አውደ ጥናት አካሂዷል።
data.orm: Ministeerri Fayyaa Federaala Itoophiyaa fi Sagantaan tiyuubarkilosii biyyoolessaaa walta'iinsa WHO fi waliin hojjettootaaatiin Mudde 17 hanga 18, 2018 qajeelcha haaraa dhukkuba tiyuubarkiloosisii qaqqabbii dhabanii maxxansuuf workishooppii gaggeessaniiru.
data.som: Wasaaradda caafimaadka federaalka ee Itoobiya iyo barnaamijka qaaxada (TB) oo kaashanaysa WHO iyo hay’adaha la hawlgalayaasheeda ayaa qabtay 17 kii ilaa 18 kii December 2018 ka shir lagu daah furay habraac cusub oo lagu gaari karo xaaladaha qaaxada ee seegay.
data.tir: ፌደራል ሚኒስቴር ጥዕና ኢትዮጵያን ሃገራዊ መደብ ሕማም ሳምቡእን ምስ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለምን መዳርግቲ ኣካላትን ብምትሕብባር ኣብ ዘምለጡ ጉዳያት ሕማም ሳምቡእ ተመስሪቱ ኣብ ዝተዳለወ ሓዱሽ መምርሒ ዝዝቲ ዎርክሾፕ ኣካይዶም።

data.eng: In her opening remark, Dr Lia Tadesse, State Minister of Health, noted that TB is one of the priority diseases closely supported in the Ministry of Health and the MoH continues to work very closely with partners, private sectors, civic societies, universities and other important stakeholders in order to identify missed TB cases, abort TB transmission to familiies, and public as well.
data.aaf: Tet Fakentih Yaabal, Dr Liya taxese, Gatak Qafiyat Malaak, Inteemih TB Qimbo kah Yaceenih yanin Lakimay Qafiyat malaakat catimta kinim kee QM Sarimaneluk wagisiisa Daggaralih Taamitak, Canka sekteriy, Ayyunti Eglaaliy. Jaamiqatite kee Kalah tan Dagortitelih Raqteh tan TB caagiday, TBiy Buxameritet Tambtabta kee Ayyunta Baarluk.
data.amh: የጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስትር ዴኤታ ዶ/ር ሊያ ታደሰ በመክፈቻ ንግግራቸው እንደተናገሩት ቲቢ በጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስቴር በቀዳሚነት በቅርበት ከሚደገፉ በሽታዎች አንዱ መሆኑን ጠቁመው የጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስቴር ከአጋር አካላት፣ ከግሉ ዘርፍ፣ ከሲቪክ ማህበራት፣ ዩኒቨርሲቲዎች እና ሌሎችም ባለድርሻ አካላት ጋር ያመለጡ የቲቢ ጉዳዮችን ለመለየት፣ የቲቢ ስርጭትን ወደ ቤተሰብ እና ወደ ህዝብም ጭምር እንዳይዛመት ለማድረግ ተቀራርቦ እየሰራ መሆኑን ገልጸዋል።
data.orm: Haasaa saqiinsaa isheetiin, Dr Liyaa Taadesee, Ministeerri Fayyaa Biyyaa, TB'n dhukkooboota Ministeerri Fayyaa itti dhiyeenyaan hordofuu keessaa tokkoo fi Ministeerri Fayyaa itti dhiyeenyaan waliin hojjetoota, sekteroota dhuunfaa, hawaasaa siivikii, Yuniversitoota fi qooda-fudhattoota murteessoo brioo waliin dhukkuba TB qaqqabbii dhaban aragachuuf, maatii akkasumas hawaasatti TB daddabarsuu ittisuuf ni hojjeta jedhaniiru.
data.som: Dhakhtarada Lia Tadesse, Wasiiru Dowlaha Wasaaradda Caafimaadka oo hadal ka jeedisay furitaankii, ayaa xustay in Qaaxada ay ka mid tahay cudurrada sida dhow looga taageero Wasaaradda Caafimaadka, Wasaaradda Caafimaadkana ay sii wadato wadashaqeyn dhow oo ay la leedahay hay’adaha ay wada shaqeeyaan, kuwa gaarka loo leeyahay, bulshada rayidka ah, jaamacadaha. iyo daneeyayaasha kale ee muhiimka ah si loo ogaado kiisaska TB-da ee seegay, laga soo rido gudbinta TB ee qoysaska, iyo sidoo kale dadweynaha.
data.tir: ሚኒስትር ዴኤታ ጥዕና ዶክተር ሊያ ታደሰ ኣብ ዘስመዐቶ ናይ መኽፈቲ መደረ ሕማም ሳምቡእ ሚኒስቴር ጥዕና ቀዳምነት ሂቡ ሕገዝ ካብ ዝገብረሎም ሕማማት ሓደ ከምዝኾነን ኣብዚ ጉዳይ ምስ መሓዙት፣ዘፈር ውልቀ፣ሲቪክ ማሕበረሰብ፣ዩኒቨርሲቲታትን ካልኦት ኣገደስቲ መዳርግቲ ኣካላትን ብቐጻልነት ብሓባር ብምስራሕ ዘምለጡ ጉዳያት ሕማም ሳምቡእ ንምፍላይ፣ኣብ መንጎ ቤተሰብ ብዝዓበየ ድማ ኣብ ሕብረተሰብ እቲ ሕማም ከይተሓላለፍ ንምግባር ሚኒስቴር ጥዕና ይነጥፍ ከምዘሎ ሓቢራ።

data.eng: USAID’s Health Financing Improvement Program builds upon the successes of earlier investments like USAID’s community-based health insurance initiative, which currently provides medical coverage to nearly 20 million Ethiopians nationwide.
data.aaf: USAIDik Qafiyat Maliya Barisiyi Tadeera Xisele Afal arac kak xagte investimetiteeta tuhuk USAIDik Ayyuntal Rakuh tan Qafiyat Caabih Inishetiv,Tawak 20 milyoonuk dagga takkeh tan Itiyyobiyah Xayloh Qafiyat Alfenta Xayoosak Geytima.
data.amh: የዩኤስኤአይዲ የጤና ፋይናንስ ማሻሻያ መርሃ ግብር በአሁኑ ጊዜ በአገር አቀፍ ደረጃ ወደ 20 ሚሊዮን ለሚጠጉ ኢትዮጵያውያን የህክምና ሽፋን የሚሰጥ እንደ ዩኤስኤአይዲ ማህበረሰብ-ተኮር የጤና መድን ተነሳሽነት ባሉ ቀደምት ኢንቨስትመንቶች ስኬቶች ላይ ይገነባል።
data.orm: Sagantaan Fooyya'iinsa Deeggarsa Maallaqa Fayyaa USAID milkaa'ina investimentoota duraanii kanneen akka inshuraansii fayyaa hawaasa irra xiyyeefatee USAID irratti hundaa'e, yeroo ammatti tajaajila fayyaa lammiiwwan Itoophiyaa miliyoona 20tti siqatuuf ni dhiyeessa.
data.som: Barnaamijka Hagaajinta Maalgelinta Caafimaadka ee USAID ayaa uu ku dhisamay guulihii maalgashi hore sida hindisaha caymiska caafimaadka bulshada ee USAID, kaas oo hadda bixiya caymiska caafimaadka ku dhawaad 20 milyan oo Itoobiyaan ah dalka oo dhan.
data.tir: መደብ ምምሕያሽ ፋይናንስ ጥዕና ዩኤስ ኤይድ ኣብ ከም ኢንቨስትመንት ማሕበረሰብ ተኮር ኢንሹራንስ ጥዕና ዝተመዝገቡ ዓወታት ተወሰኽቲ መደባት ብምዝርጋሕን ኣብ መላእ እታ ሃገር 20 ሚልዮን ዝፅግዑ ኢትዮጵያዊያን ተጠቀምቲ ዝኾኑሉ ሽፋን ሕክምናኣቕሪቡ።

data.eng: Over the next five years, the new program will focus on mobilizing increased domestic resources and streamlining medical insurance schemes to expand coverage to millions more people.

data.eng: The Ethiopian delegation led by the Health Minister, Dr Amir Aman, is attending the 72nd international health forum commenced today in Geneva.
data.aaf: Tiyyobiyah Buttay Qafiyat Malaak, DR Amir Aman Miracisa, 72hytoh addah Baadak Qafiyat Forumut Dafeytan Geneval Angaluk Geytima.
data.amh: ጤና ሚኒስትር እና የኢትዮጵያ ልዑካን ቡድን መሪ የሆኑት ዶ / ር አሚር አማን ዛሬ በጄኔቫ በተጀመረው 72 ኛው ዓለም አቀፍ የጤና መድረክ ላይ እየተሳተፉ ነው።
data.orm: Jilli Itoophiyaa Ministeera Fayyaa Dr Amiir Amaanin durfamu fooramii fayyaa internaashinaalaa har'a Jeenevaatti jalqabe hirmaataa jiru.
data.som: Wafdi ka socda dowladda Itoobiya oo uu hoggaaminayo wasiirka caafimaadka Dr Amir Aman ayaa ka qeyb galaya shirka 72aad ee madasha caafimaadka adduunka oo maanta ka furmay magaalada Geneva.
data.tir: ብሚኒስትር ጥዕና ዶክተር ዓሚር ኣማን ዝምራሕ ልኡኽ ኢትዮጵያ ሎሚ ኣብ ዝተጀመሩ መበል 72 ዓለምለኸ መድረኽ ጥዕና ኣብ ጄኒቫ እናተሳተፈ እዩ።

data.eng: A road run with the aim of promoting the tourism of Bale, in Oromia, has been held in the town of Bale Robe.
data.aaf: Baaleh Wacaysirih Aysaxaxag Madmah Hak Giti Ardi Yekke, Oromiyah Addal, Tah Elle Tekkem Baale Roobeh Magaala.
data.amh: በኦሮሚያ የባሌ ቱሪዝምን የማስተዋወቅ አላማ ያለው መንገድ በባሌ ሮቤ ከተማ ተካሄዷል።
data.orm: Fiigichi daandii irraa kaayyoon isaa tuurizimii Baalee, Oromiyaa keessaa beeksisuu ta'e, magaalaa Baalee Roobeetti gaggeeffame.
data.som: Orad jideed oo ujeedadu tahay in kor loo qaado dalxiiska Bale, ee Oromiya, ayaa lagu qabtay magaalada Bale Robe.
data.tir: ቱሪዝም ባሌ ኦሮሚያ ንምፍላጥ ዝዓለመ ጉያ ጎዳና ኣብ ከተማ ባሌ ሮባ ተኻይዱ።

data.eng: Noting the varied tourist attractions of Bale, Mayor of Bale Robe, Gezahegn Dejene, says, apart from promoting tourism, the event will have a role in enhancing other commercial activities.
data.aaf: Wacaysir Arocak Tumatan Baleey, Bale Robeh Magaalah Xiinisoh Saqal, Gezahegn Xejene, Iyeh, Ta Caagida Wacaysir Yeysexexegenim, Ta Waynabao Kalah yan Tellemo Angagoyih Doori maqarosel.
data.amh: የባሌ ልዩ ልዩ የቱሪስት መስህብ ቦታዎችን በመጥቀስ የባሌ ሮቤ ከተማ ከንቲባ አቶ ገዛኸኝ ደጀኔ ዝግጅቱ ቱሪዝምን ከማስተዋወቅ ባለፈ ሌሎች የንግድ እንቅስቃሴዎችን ከማጎልበት አኳያ ሚና ይኖረዋል ብለዋል።
data.orm: Harkisa tuuristii garagaraa Baalee ibsuun, Kantiibaan Baalee Roobee, Gezzaahiny Dejenee, tuurizimii beeksisuun alatti, qophichi hojiilee daldalaa kan biroo fooyyessuu keessatti gahee qaba jedhe.
data.som: Isagoo xusaya goobaha dalxiiska ee kala duwan ee Bale, Duqa magaalada Bale Robe, Gezahegn Dejene, ayaa yidhi, kor u qaadista dalxiiska ka sakow, xafladani waxay qayb ka qaadan doontaa kor u qaadida dhaqdhaqaaqyada kale ee ganacsiga.
data.tir: ከንቲባ ባሌ ሮባ ገዛሀኝ ደጄኔ ንዝትፈላለዩ መስህባት ቱሪዝም ባሌ ኣመልኪቱ ከምዝበሎ እቲ ኩነት ንቱሪዝም ንምፍላጥ ኣብ ርእሲ ምጥቃሙ ካልኦት ንግዳዊ ንጥፈታት ክዓብዩ እውን ዝሕግዝ እዩ።

data.eng: Ethiopian long distance running legend, Haile Gebrselassie, will be running a different race—he will be running for the presidency of the Ethiopian Athletics Federation (EAF).
data.aaf: Itiyobiyak Xex Arad Abe, Hayle Geresilase, Baxxabxsale caddol Ardele, UsukKah Yrdem Itiyyobiyak Ardi Fexeresionih Berezixanti (IAF/EAF/).
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያዊው የረጅም ርቀት ሯጭ ኃይሌ ገብረስላሴ ለኢትዮጵያ አትሌቲክስ ፌዴሬሽን ፕሬዝዳንትነት ይሮጣል።
data.orm: Gooti fiiigicha fageenya dheera Itoophiyaa, Haayilee Gebiresillaasee, dorgommii kan biraa irratti hirmaata - pirezdaantummaa Federeeshinii Atileetiksii Itoophiyaa (EAF)'f dorgoma.
data.som: “Halyeey Gebrselassie, orodyahanka masaafada dheer ee Itoobiya, ayaa tartan gali doonaa tartan ka duwan kan uu horay u gali jiray - wuxu utartami doona guddoomiye nimada federeeshinii ka Atleetiksii Itiyoophiyaa” jedhan.

data.eng: The election will be held on tomorrow in Addis Ababa. Haile will be representing Addis Ababa competing with other officials from regional states.

data.som: Doorashada ayaa beri ka dhici doonta magaalada Addis Ababa. Haile ayaa matali doona Addis Ababa isagoo la tartami doona madax kale oo ka kala socota dowlad deegaaneedyada.

data.eng: Ethiopia have appointed former Adama City FC coach Ashenafi Bekele as the new man in charge of the men’s national team.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiya Hayteh Dumahih Axamah Maalah KC Aydakaakanise Ashenafi Bekele Qusba Numuy Gatak Labha Buttah Saqal Yekke.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ የቀድሞ የአዳማ ከተማ ክለብ አሰልጣኝ አሸናፊ በቀለን የወንዶች ብሄራዊ ቡድን አሰልጣኝ አድርጎ ሾመች።
data.orm: Itoopiyaan leenjisaa Magaalaa Adaamaa FC duraanii Ashenaafii Baqqalee itti gaafatamaa haaraa garee dhiiraa biyyaalessaa gootee muudde.
data.som: Itoobiya ayaa u magacawday tababarihii hore ee kooxda Adama City Ashenafi Bekele in uu noqdo ninka cusub ee hogaaminaya xulka qaranka ee ragga.

data.eng: The 2018 Total CAF Women’s African Cup of Nations will be held in Ghana from November 17 to December 1, 2018.

data.amh: የ2018 ጠቅላላ የካፍ የሴቶች የአፍሪካ ዋንጫ በጋና ከህዳር 17 እስከ ታህሳስ 1 ቀን 2018 ይካሄዳል።
data.orm: Geeba Dubartootaa Biyyoota Afirikaa Tootaal CAF bara 2018 gaafa Sadaasa 17 hanga Mudde 1, 2018 tti Gaanaa keessatti geggeeffama.

data.eng: The 2017/18 Ethiopian Premier League (EPL) defending champions, Jimma Aba Jiffar, is all set to use online mobile system for its day to day activities which enables fans get relevant information regarding the club.
data.aaf: 2017 Itiyyobiyah Birimer liig( IBL/EPL/) Shambiyoon kalaltuwatam Jimma Aba jifar, Ikih Tan Dafeyna Olayin mobayil Sistem fan Ayrook Ayroh Angagoya Ta Dokla Wagsissam tet qokola faximtam Elle Geyanagida kini.
data.amh: የ2017/18 የኢትዮጵያ ፕሪሚየር ሊግ ቻምፒዮን የሆነው ጅማ አባ ጅፋር ደጋፊዎች ክለቡን በሚመለከት ተገቢውን መረጃ እንዲያገኙ የሚያስችል የኦንላይን ሞባይል ሲስተም ለእለት ተእለት እንቅስቃሴ ሊጠቀም ነው።
data.orm: Pirimiyeer Liigiin Itoopiyaa (EPL) bara 2017/18 kan injifate, Jimmaan Abbaa Jifaar, hojiilee isaa guyyaa guyyaa kan deggertoonni waa'ee kilabichaa odeeffannoo barbaachisu akka argatan godhu sirna mobaayilaa sarara irraa fayyadamuuf qophii hunda xumure.
data.som: Kooxda difaacanaysa horyaalka Itoobiya ee Jimma Aba Jiffar 2017/2018 ayaa dhamaan lagu wadaa inay adeegsato nidaamka mobilada ee onlineka ah hawl maalmeedkeeda taasoo u sahlaysa taageerayaashu inay helaan macluumaadka la xidhiidha kooxda.
data.tir: እቲ ኣብ 2017/2018 ዓ.ም.ፈ ሻምፒዮና ፕሪሚየር ሊግ ኢትዮጵያ ዝኾነ ጂማ ኣባ ጂፋር ንመዓልታዊ ንጥፈቱ ዘቃልሕን ደገፍቱ ብዛዕባ እቲ ጋንታ ኣገዳሲ ሓበሬታ ክረኽቡ ዝገብርን ስርዓት ኦንላይን ሞባይል ንምዝርጋሕ ተሊሙ ኣሎ።

data.eng: The 70th edition of FIFA congress, scheduled to be held in Addis Ababa, has been rescheduled due to coronavirus (COVID-19) fears.
data.aaf: 70htyoh FIFah Kongiress, Tadeera Heenih Addiss Ababal Takkuh, Qagitak Tadeera kah Osisen Korenavayrisik (KOVIX-19) Meysih.
data.amh: በአዲስ አበባ ሊካሄድ የነበረው 70ኛው የፊፋ ኮንግረስ በኮሮና ቫይረስ (ኮቪድ-19) ስጋት ምክንያት ለሌላ ጊዜ ተላልፏል።
data.orm: Kongiresiin FIFA 70ffaan, Addis Ababaa keessatti geggeeffamuuf karoorfame, sababa sodaa vaayirasii koronaa (COVID-19)'f irra deebiin saganteeffame.
data.som: Shirweynaha 70-aad ee FIFA, oo loo qorsheeyay in lagu qabto Addis Ababa, ayaa dib loo qorsheeyay sababo la xiriira coronavirus (COVID-19).
data.tir: እቲ ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ክካየድ ተሓሲቡ ዝነበረ መበል 70 ጉባኤ ፊፋ ብምኽንያት ስግኣት ለበዳ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ንኻሊእ ግዜ ክካየድ ተወሲኑ።

data.eng: FIFA stated that, on account of the spread of COVID-19, numerous international bodies and public bodies have advised against the organization of international events.
data.aaf: FIFA inteemih, KOVIX-19 Loowoh Barimiyah, Mango Baad Caddoh Dagorti kee Ayyunti Dagorti Baad Caddoh Waynabobi Yankateenim Kah Sadan Inah Fayiseenim.
data.amh: ፊፋ በኮቪድ-19 ስርጭት ምክንያት በርካታ አለም አቀፍ አካላት እና የህዝብ አካላት አለም አቀፍ ዝግጅቶችን እንዳይደራጁ መክረዋል።
data.orm: FIFA'n ragaan faffaca'iinsa COVID-19 irratti, qaamonni addunyaalessaa fi qaamonni hawaasaa baayyeen qophiilee addunyaalessaa dhaabbatichaa akka hin geggeffamne gorsan.
data.som: FIFA waxay sheegtay, iyadoo loo eegayo faafitaanka COVID-19, hay'ado badan oo caalami ah iyo hay'ado dowli ah ay ku taliyeen in la joojiyo abaabulka dhacdooyinka caalamiga ah..
data.tir: ብምኽንያት እቲ ዝጋፋሕ ዘሎ ለበዳ ኮቪድ፡19 ብዙሓት ዓለምለኸ ኣካላትን ህዝባዊ ኣካላትን ዓለምለኸ ምድላዋት ከየካይዱ ዝመክር ሓበሬታ ፊፋ ኣውፂኡ።

data.eng: President of the Ethiopian Football Federation, Esayas Jira, has been elected as vice president of the Council for East and Central Africa Football Associations (CECAFA).
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyak Ibi Koqosoh Fexeresionih Berezixanti, Isayas Jira, Ayroculama kee Fantqaxih Afrikah Malabuxak Ibi Koqosoh Eglak Cigiila Berezixanti Akuk Doorime.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ እግር ኳስ ፌዴሬሽን ፕሬዝዳንት ኢሳያስ ጅራ የምስራቅ እና መካከለኛው አፍሪካ እግር ኳስ ማህበራት ምክር ቤት (ሴካፋ) ምክትል ፕሬዝዳንት ሆነው ተመረጡ።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin Federeeshinii Kubbaa Miilaa Itoopiyaa, Isaayyaas Jiraa, akka itti aanaa pirasdaantii kaawunsilii Waldaalee Kubbaa Miilaa Bahaa fi Giddugala (CECAFA) tahuun filatame..
data.som: Madax waynaha fadareeshinka kubada cagta ee Itobiya, Esayas Jira, ayaa loo doortay madaxwayne kuxigeenka golaha xidhiidhka kubada cagta bariga iyo badhtamaha Africa ee CECAFA.
data.tir: ፕሬዚዳንት ፌዴሬሽን ኩዕሶ እግሪ ኢትዮጵያ ኢሳያስ ጂራ ምኽትል ፕሬዚዳንት ቤት ምኽሪ ማሕበር ኩዕሶ እግሪ ምብራቕን ማእኸላይን ኣፍሪካ ኮይኑ ተመሪፁ።

data.eng: Mekelle November 29/2018 A cycling tournament that starts from Mekelle and extends to Asmara and Mitswa in Eritrea will begin tomorrow, according to Tigray Region Youth and Sports Affairs Bureau.
data.aaf: Kekellel Naharsigudok 29/2018 A saykil Qalayliy mekellek Qimbise kee Illa Asmara kee Musuwaq Eretriyah Adda Fan Beera Qimbimele, Tigray Rakaakayak Qunxaneyta kee Dagar Diig Caagidah Biiro Elle Iyenal.
data.amh: መቀሌ ህዳር 19/2011 ከመቀሌ ተጀምሮ እስከ አስመራና ምፅዋ በኤርትራ የሚደርስ የብስክሌት ውድድር ነገ እንደሚጀመር የትግራይ ክልል ወጣቶችና ስፖርት ጉዳይ ቢሮ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Maqalee Sadaasa 29/2018: Akka Biiroo Dhimmoota Dargaggoo fi Ispoortii Naannoo Tigraayitti, dorgommiin biskileettii Maqalee irraa jalqabee gara Asmaraa fi Mitsawaa Eritraa keessatti dheeratu boor eegala.
data.som: sida uu sheegay xafiiska arrimaha dhalinyarada iyo ciyaaraha ee gobolka Tigray. Mekelle Tartanka baaskiillada oo ka bilaabmaya magaalada Mekelle ilaa Asmara iyo Mitswa ee dalka Eritrea ayaa maalinta berri ah bilaaban doona, Nofeembar 29/2018
data.tir: ቢሮ ጉዳይ መናእሰይን ስፖርትን ክልል ትግራይ ብ29 ሕዳር 2018 ዓ.ም.ፈ ኣብ መቐለ ከምዝገለፆ እቲ ካብ መቐለ ተበጊሱ መዕለቢኡ ኣብ ኤርትራ ኣስመራን ምፅዋን ዝገብር ቅድድም ብሽክሌታ ፅባሕ ክጅመር እዩ።

data.eng: The aim of the tournament is to strengthen the people-to-people relations between the peoples of Ethiopia and Eritrea, it said.
data.aaf: Ta Qalylik Hadaf Ayyuntaak Illa Ayyunti Qala Maqarosaanam Itiyyobiya kee Eretriyah Ayyuntih Fanal, Tah Iyeh.

data.eng: Seifu Tura Abdiwak of Ethiopia and Ruth Chepngetich of Kenya won Sunday in the return of the Chicago Marathon, which was scrapped last year amid the coronavirus pandemic.
data.aaf: Seifu Tura Abadiwak Itiyyobiya kee Kiniyak Ruut Chebngetich Gaceh Acadah Chkagoh Marathonuh Uduurewak. Waraye Sanat Casbik Fakimeh Koronavayris Dalkah.
data.amh: ባለፈው አመት በኮሮና ቫይረስ ምክንያት የተሰረዘው የቺካጎ ማራቶን የመልስ ውድድር ኢትዮጵያዊቷ ሰይፉ ቱራ አብዲዋዋ እና ኬንያዊቷ ሩት ቼፕንጌቲች አሸንፈዋል።
data.orm: Seeyifuu Turaa Andiwaaq Itoopiyaa fi Ruut Chepingetich'n Keeniyaa deebii Maraatoonii Chikaagoo, kan waggaa darbe sababa weerara vaayirasii koronaan haqame ture keessatti Dilbata injifatan.
data.som: Seifu Tura Abwadawa oo u dhashay Itoobiya iyo Ruth Chepngetich oo Kenya ah ayaa Axaddii ku guulaystay soo laabashada Marathon ka Chicago, kaas oo la baabi'iyay sannadkii hore iyada oo uu jiro cudurka faafa ee coronavirus.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያዊ ሰይፉ ቱራ ኣብዲዋክን ኬንያዊት ሩት ቼፕንጌችን እቲ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ዓምት ብምኽንያት ለበዳ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ዝተሰረዝን ብለውጡ ብሰንበት ኣብ ቺካጐ ኣብ ዝተኻየደን ማራቶን ተዓዊቶም።

data.eng: Abdiwak, who placed sixth in the Chicago race in 2019, finished in 2 hours, 6 minutes, 12 seconds.
data.aaf: Abdiwak, Chkagol lica Addah Dafeye 2019 Addat, Seleh 2 Saqatay, 6 dagiiy, 12 sekoxih.
data.amh: በ2019 በቺካጎ ዉድድር ስድስተኛ ደረጃን ያስመዘገበዉ አብዲዋክ 2 ሰአት ከ6 ደቂቃ ከ12 ሰከንድ ላይ በመግባት አጠናቋል።
data.orm: Abdiwaaq, kan dorgommii Chikaagoo 2019 keessatti ja'affaa kahame, sa'atii 2, daqiiqqaa 6, sekondii 12'tti xumure.
data.som: Cabiwaaq, oo kaalinta lixaad ka galay tartanka Jikago 2019, ayaa uu ku dhamaystiray 2 saacadood, 6 daqiiqo iyo 12 ilbiriqsi.
data.tir: እቲ ብ2019 ዓ.ም.ፈ ሻድሻይ ወፂኡ ዝነበረ ኣብዲዋክ 2 ስዓትን 6 ደቒቓን 12 ሴኮንድን ብምፍፃም እዩ ስዒሩ።

data.eng: Written and directed by Moges Tafesse, Quragnaye addresses the question: “How far would you take punishment into your own hands or wait for the system to levy the appropriate punishment?”.
data.aaf: Kattabay Kee Saqal Moges Tafesse, Yi kurayna Maadeh Essero: " Anininal Issi isi Gabat Bayaktam kee Bicaleh Meri caagida fanah isi Mabiyakinay Qambal?".
data.amh: በሞገስ ታፈሰ ተፅፎ እና ዳይሬክት የተደረገው ቁራኛዬ በረእጅህጥያቄ መልስ ይሰጣል፦"ቅጣትን በራስህ እጅ ለመውሰድ ምን ያህል ትሄዳለህ ወይስ ስርዓቱ ተገቢውን ቅጣት እስኪጥል ድረስ ትጠብቃለህ?"
data.orm: Mogos Tasfaayeetin barraa'ee kan qindaa'ee, Quraanyaayeen gaaffii:" hangam adaba harka keetti fudhatta yookin sirnichi murtee sirnaawaa kennuuf eegda?" jedhu heera.
data.som: "Qoray oo uu agaasimay Moges Tafesse, Quragnaye wuxuu qeexayaa su'aasha: "Intee in le'eg ayaad ciqaabta gacantaada ku qaadan kartaa ama sugi kartaa nidaamka si uu kuugu soo saaro ciqaabta ku habboon?"."

data.eng: Abraham, a talented artist, holds both an MFA degree in Studio Art and BFA (Cum Laude) majoring in Graphic Design, Painting, and Drawing from the University of Nevada, Las Vegas, as well as an AA degree from Truckee Meadows community college. (Tadias)

data.eng: At least seven Ethiopian films are set to screen in NYC in May 2016 as part of the New York African Film Festival and the 13th Annual Sheba Film Festival.

data.amh: የኒውዮርክ አፍሪካ ፊልም ፌስቲቫል እና የ13ኛው አመታዊ የሼባ ፊልም ፌስቲቫል አካል በመሆን ቢያንስ ሰባት የኢትዮጵያ ፊልሞች በኒውዮርክ በግንቦት 2016 ለይታ ይቀርባሉ።

data.som: Ugu yaraan todobo filim oo Ethiopian ah ayaa lagu wadaa in laga daawado NYC bisha May 2016 taasoo qayb ka ah Bandhiga Filimada Afrika ee New York iyo Bandhiga Filimada Sheba ee Sannadlaha ah ee 13aad.

data.eng: According to Beserat Debebe, creator and writer of the comic, Jember is a character inspired by the life and experiences of young residents in Addis Ababa.
data.aaf: Beserat Xebebe Elle Qadosenal, Gine kee Asale kattabay, Jember Addiss Ababal Geytimta Magaala Xayloh Yan Qunxaneyta Rufa hayta Weelolah mano kee Abakraag kini.

data.eng: “He reflects the story of those that are in the transition period between their college life and adulthood. Cities like Addis typically have a high youth unemployment rate. This often leads to a feeling of disappointment and hopelessness for a lot of ambitious young Ethiopians.”
data.aaf: Usuk edde Tasitak too Tekooka kinimi Tabatabsu Wakti Fanal ken Kollojih mano kee Idoolina. Magaaloli Addiss inah celolak lem fayale Qunxaneyti Taamasinah Caddo. Tah Katasam Sabhalasina kee Buxaalesina mango Radmomi Itiyyobiyak Qunxaneyta.
data.amh: በኮሌጅ ሕይወታቸው እና በአዋቂነት መካከል ባሉ የሽግግር ጊዜ ውስጥ ያሉትን ሰዎች ታሪክ ያንጸባርቃል። በተለይ እንደ አዲስ ያሉ ከተሞች የወጣቶች ሥራ አጥነት ቁጥር ከፍተኛ ነው። ይህ ደግሞ ብዙ ጊዜ ተነሻነት ያላቸውን ኢትዮጵያውያን ወጣቶች የሚያስከፋ እና ተስፋ የመቁረጥ ስሜት ያስከትላል።
data.orm: "Seenaa warra yeroo ce'umsaatti umurii kolleejjii fi ga'eessummaa isaanii gidduu jiranii callaqisa. Magaalonni akka Finfinnee reeshoo hoj-dhabdummaa dargaggoo olaanaa qabu. Kunis yeroo hedduu gara miira mufii fi abdii dhaabuutti dargaggoota abdachiisoo Itoophiyaa baayyee geessa.
data.som: "Wuxuu ka turjumayaa taariikhda kuwa ku jira xilliga kala wareega ee u dhexeeya nwalhtiga ardaynimada iyo qaangaarnimada. Magaalooyinka Addis oo kale sida caadiga ah waxaa ka jira heerka shaqo la'aanta dhalinyarada. Tani waxay inta badan keentaa niyad jab iyo rajo la'aan soo wajahda dhallinyaro badan oo Itoobiyaan ah oo hammi leh."
data.tir: ንሱ ኣብ መንጎ ህይወት ኮሌጅን መንእሰይነትን ንዘሎ ታሪኽ እዋን ስግግር ከንፀባርቕ እዩ ፅዒሩ። ከም ኣዲስኣበባ ዝበላ ከተማታት መብዛሕቲኡ ግዜ ዝላዓለ መጠን ሸቅለት ኣልቦነት ኣለወን። እዚ ድማ ኣዘውቲሩ ንብዙሓት ሰብ ተስፋ መናእሰይ ዘቖጥዕን ተስፋ ዘቕብፅን ስምዒት ይፈጥር።

data.eng: “Supply creates its own demand. People like me have given up on shopping. Even the mannequins outside the stores aren’t representative.”
data.aaf: "Xayos Ginah issi fauxi, Ayyunti Yinah xamiyah yaceenih. Walla Mannekiyunite Iroh Istoor maxayoosa.
data.amh: "አቅርቦት የራሱን ፍላጎት ይፈጥራል። እንደ እኔ ያሉ ሰዎች ግዢ ላይ ተስፋ ቆርጠዋል። ከመደብሮች ውጭ ያሉት አሻንጉሊቶች ራሱ እንኳን አይወክሉንም።"
data.orm: "Dhiyyeessin barbaadama mataa isaa uuma. Nammonni akka koo bittaa irra abdii kutaniiru. Manneen uuffata dukkaana alaa iyyuu bakka bu'oo miti"
data.som: “Adeeg bixintu waxay abuurtaa baahideeda. Dadka aniga oo kale ah ayaa ka quustay wax iibsiga. Xataa mannequin yada ka baxsan bakhaarrada ma aha wakiil."
data.tir: "ኣቕርቦት ናይ ባዕሉ ጠለብ እዩ ዝፈጥር። ከማይ ዝበሉ ሰባት ኣብ ምግዛእ ኣቑሑት ተስፋ ቀቢፆም እዮም። ዋላ እቶም ኣብ ኣፍደገ ሹቓት ክዳን ዝለበሱ ባምቡላታት ንኹሉ ሰብ ዝውክሉ ኣይኮኑን።"

data.amh: የንግድና ኢንዱስትሪ ሚኒስቴር ባለፈው አርብ ረፋድ ላይ ባደረገው ስብሰባ ከትግራይ ክልል የተውጣጡ የንግድ ድርጅት ባለቤቶች እና ስራ አስኪያጆች ጋር ኩባንያዎቹ በስራ ላይ ያጋጠሟቸውን ችግሮች ለመፍታት በሚቻልበት ሁኔታ ላይ ምክክር አድርጓል።

data.tir: ሚንስቴር ንግድን ኢንዱስትሪን ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ዓርቢ ምሸት ኣብዘዳለዎ ኣኼባ ኣብ ትግራይ ዝርከቡ ወነንትን ኣካየድቲ ስራሕን ኩባንያታት ኣብ ከይዲ እቲ ወፍሪ እተን ትካላት ዘጋጥሙወን ፀገማት ንምፍታሕ ኣብዝከኣለሉ መገዲ መኺሩ።

data.eng: Officials of the Ministry noted that 93 giant enterprises and nearly 6700 small and medium enterprises are found in the region, and that a task force has been established to conduct a survey and investigate the cost of damages to reinvigorate factories into normal production.
data.aaf: Ta malaakih miraciini tohuk iyem Osotinah 93 Interbiraiyzwa kee 6700 gabab bahta Qunxah Fanti Caddoh Iterbirayiz ta Rakaakayal geytimtam, kee Taskiforsi Xisenih Servery yakku kee baye Uwaytih Awqenta kee Ta sanaqatoti Abak sugte Amrutiya kah abtanah.
data.amh: በክልሉ 93 ግዙፍ ኢንተርፕራይዞችና 6700 የሚጠጉ አነስተኛና መካከለኛ ኢንተርፕራይዞች መኖራቸውን እንዲሁም ፋብሪካዎችን ወደ መደበኛ ምርት ለማጎልበት የሚያስችል የዳሰሳ ጥናትና የጉዳት ወጪን የሚያጣራ ግብረ ሃይል መቋቋሙን የሚኒስቴሩ የስራ ኃላፊዎች ጠቅሰዋል።
data.orm: Aanga'oonni ministeerichaa interpiraayizoota gurguddoo 93 fi 6700tti kan siqatu interpiraayizoota xixiqqoofi giddu-galleessi naannocha keessatti argamuu heeran, akkasumas tuutni duulaa iyyafannoo fi qorannnoo warshaalee kana omishaa idileetti deebisuuf baasii gaafatu hunda'eera.
data.som: Masuuliyiinta Wasaaradda ayaa sheegay in 93 shirkadood oo waaweyn iyo ku dhawaad 6700 oo ganacsi oo isugu jira kuwa yar yar iyo kuwa dhexe ay ku daqan yihiin gobolka, waxaana la sameeyay guddi loo xil saaray baaritaanka iyo baarista qarashka ku baxaya khasaaraha ka dhashay sidii dib loogu soo celin lahaa wax soo saarka caadiga ah ee warshadaha.
data.tir: ሰበስልጣን እቲ ሚንስቴር ከምዝገለፁዎ ኣብቲ ክልል 93 ገዘፍቲ ከምኡ’ውን 6700 ኣናእሽተይን ማእኸለዎትን ትካላት ዘለው እንትኾን ፋብሪካታት ናብ ስሩዕ ዕዮ ምፍራይ ክኣትዋ ዝሕግዝ ንቲ ዝበፅሐ መጠን ዕንወት ዘፅንዕ ግብረ ሓይሊ ተጣይሹ ኣሎ።

data.tir: ትካል ቀረብ ነዳዲ ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ መስከረም ኣብዘውፀኦ ጨረታ ዓለምለኸ ትካላት ንግዲ ነዳዲ ካብ ጥሪ 2011 ዓ.ም. ጀሚሩ ነዳዲ ከቕርባ ዓዲሙ ነይሩ።

data.eng: It is recalled that Ethio Telecom has recently announced the launching of 4G LTE service in 92 towns nationwide and in the capital, Addis Ababa as phase-I 4G LTE service expansion strategic plan for the 2020/21 budget year.
data.aaf: Ethio Tellokom Qagitak Iyem Xayi saku elle Yiysixigen Baaxo Caddol 92 magaalal 4G LTE Ayfaf Yeysexexeginih, Addiss Ababak fesz-1 4G LTE Ayfaf Barisanamih Istratejih Ikraaro 2020/21 Ligidih Mizaniyatal.
data.amh: ኢትዮ ቴሌኮም የ 2020/21 በጀት አመት የመጀመሪያውን ዙር የ4ጂ ኤል.ቲ.ኢ አገልግሎት ማስፋፊያ ስልታዊ ዕቅዶችን በቅርቡ በሀገር አቀፍ ደረጃ በ 92 ከተሞች እና በመዲናዋ አዲስ አበባ የ4ጂ ኤል.ቲ.ኢ አገልግሎት መጀመሩን ማስታወቁ ይታወሳል።
data.orm: Itiyoo Telekoom dhiyeenya kana tajaajila 4G LTE magaaloota 92 guutuu biyyaa keessatti argamanii fi magaala guddutti keessatti akkasumas karoorri tarsiimawaa tajaajila 4G LTE sadarkaa-I bara bajataa 2020/2021 jalqabuun isaa ni yaadatama.
data.som: Waxa la xusuustaa in Ethio Telecom ay dhawaan ku dhawaaqday in 92 magaalooyin oo dalka siguud ah iyo caasimadda Addis Ababa laga hirgeliyey adeegga 4G LTE oo ah qorshaha istaraatiijiyadeed ee balaadhinta adeegga wejiga 1aad ee 4G LTE ee sannad miisaaniyadeedka 2020/21.
data.tir: ኢትዮ ቴሌኮም ኣብ መላእ ሃገር ኣብዝርከባ 92 ከተማታትን ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባን 4ጂ ኤል ቲ ኢ ኣገልግሎት ከምዘተኣታተወ ኣብዚ ቐረባ ግዜ ከምዘፍለጠ ይዝከር። እዚ ድማ ኣካል ናይቲ ን2020/21 ዓ.ም.ፈ. ዝተለሞ ቀዳማይ ብርኪ ስትራቴጂያዊ ትልሚ ምስፋሕ ኣገልግሎት 4ጂ ኤል ቲ ኢ እዩ።

data.eng: Ethio Telecom also promised to expand the service in the remaining towns of the country as we have been immensely working on to finalize phase -Il network upgrading and expansion to meet the ever-growing data demands of customers.
data.aaf: Ethio Tellekom Xagana cule Baaxol Raqteh Tan Magaalolul Barisuh Nagay Meqe tan Taamitak fez-II Gabakaltuh Maqmilwa Fayxih kuli Daddalta Xatta Fayxi Newoki Osisanam kee Barisanama.
data.amh: ኢትዮ ቴሌኮም ከጊዜ ወደ ጊዜ እያደገ የመጣውን የደንበኞችን የመረጃ ፍላጎት ለማሟላት ሁለተኛውን ዙር የኔትዎርክ ማሻሻያ እና የማስፋፊያ ስራዎችን እየሰራ በመሆኑ በቀሪዎቹ የሀገሪቱ ከተሞች አገልግሎቱን ለማስፋፋት ቃል ገብቷል።
data.orm: Itiyoo Telekoom tajaajilicha magaalota biyyattii hafan irratti babal'isuuf akkuma ciminaan sarara bilbilaa ol-guddisuu fi fedha mamiltoota haala dabalaa dhufe guutuu sadarkaa-II xumurruun waadaa galeera.
data.som: Ethio Telecom ayaa sidookale balan qaaday in ay ku baahin doonto adeega magaalooyinka dalka ka hadhsan anagoo si mug leh uga shaqaynaynay dhamaystirka wejiga Il khad tayeynta iyo balaadhinta si loo daboolo baahida xogeed ee macaamiisha ah ee sii kordheysa.
data.tir: ንቲ ካብ ግዜ እናወሰኸ ዝመፀ ድልየት ኣገልግሎት ዳታ ዓማዊል ንምዕጋብ ካልኣይ ብርኪ ምምሕያሽን ምስፋሕን ኔትወርክ ንምዝዛም ኣበርቲዑ ከምዝሰርሕ ዘሎ ዝገለፀ ኢትዮ ቴሌኮም ንዚ ኣገልግሎት ናብተን ዝተረፋ ከተማታት እውን ንምብፃሕ ቃል ኣቲው።

data.eng: Ethiopia has earned $1.33 billion from exports during the past five months, attaining 94% of the $1.41 billion target.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiya $1.33 Bilyoonih Geyte Iro Baaxo Rubtamak Waraye Koona Alsah, $1.41 Biyoonih Madmak 94 Gabba Madonuh.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ ባለፉት አምስት ወራት 1.33 ቢሊዮን ዶላር ከኤክስፖርት ገቢ ስታገኝ ከታቀደው 1.41 ቢሊዮን ዶላር ውስጥ 94 በመቶውን ማሳካት ችላለች።
data.orm: Itoophiyaan dolaara biliyoona 1.33 biyya alaatti fe'uu irraa ji'oota shanan darban keessatti argatteetti, kaayyoo ishee dolaara biliyoona 1.41 keessa 94% galmaan geesseetti.
data.som: Itoobiya ayaa 1.33 bilyan oo dollar ka heshay alaabaha ay dibadda u dhoofiso shantii bilood ee la soo dhaafay, taas oo gaadhay 94% oo ah $1.41 bilyan oo la rabay.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያ ኣብዝሓለፋ ሓሙሽተ ኣዋርሕ ካብ ሰደድ 1.33 ቢልዮን ዶላር ዘእተወት እንትትኮን እዚ ድማ ናይቲ ክተእትዎ ዝተለመቶ 1.41 ቢልዮን ዶላር 94 ሚኢታዊ እዩ።

data.eng: The revenue increased by $224.5 million or 20% compared to the same period last year, according to the Ministry of Trade and Industry.
data.aaf: Culenti 22.4 Milyoon Aw 20% Osiseh Ta bisle Ligidal qalalisanawak, Kabxa kee Sanaqata Malaak Elle Iyenal.
data.amh: ገቢው ካለፈው ዓመት ተመሳሳይ ወቅት ጋር ሲነፃፀር በ 224.5 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ወይም በ 20 በመቶ ብልጫ እንዳለው የንግድና ኢንዱስትሪ ሚኒስቴር አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Akka ministeera Daldalaa fi Industiriitti galiin dolaara miliyoona 224'n yookin 20%'n bara darbee waliin yeroo wal bira qabamu dabaleera.
data.som: Dakhliga ayaa kordhay $224.5 milyan oo u dhiganta 20% marka loo eego isla muddadaas sannadkii hore, sida ay sheegtay wasaaradda ganacsiga iyo warshadaha.
data.tir: ሚንስቴር ንግድን ኢንዱስትሪን ከምዝበሎ እዚ እቶት ካብቲ ዓሚ ዝነበረ ተመሳሳሊ እዋን ብ224.5 ሚልዮን ወይ ድማ በ20 ሚኢታዊ ይዛይድ።

data.eng: The Saudi Arabian Government and business delegation led by Minister of State for African Affairs Ahmed bin Abdul Aziz Qattan arrived in Addis Ababa on Sunday.
data.aaf: Saqud Qarabiyah Doolat kee Teelemo Buttay Afrikah Caagidah Malaak Acmad Bin Abdul Aziz Kattanm Acadah Addiss Ababa Madde.
data.amh: የአፍሪካ ጉዳዮች ሚኒስትር ዴኤታ አህመድ ቢን አብዱል አዚዝ ቃታን የተመራ የሳዑዲ አረቢያ መንግስት እና የቢዝነስ ልዑካን ቡድን እሁድ አዲስ አበባ ገብቷል።
data.orm: Mootummaa Saawudii Arabiyaa fi jiilli daldalaa ministeera biyya dhimmootaa Afiriikaa Ahimed biin Abdul zii Qaattaaanin durfamu dilbata Addis Ababa seenaniiru.
data.som: Waxaa maanta oo Axad ah magaalada Addis Ababa ee dalka Itoobiya gaaray wafdi ka socda dowladda Sacuudiga iyo wafdi ganacsato ah oo uu hoggaaminayo wasiiru dowlaha arrimaha Afrika Axmed Bin Cabdul Casiis Qattan.
data.tir: ብሚኒስትር ዲኤታ ጉዳያት ኣፍሪካ ኣሕመድ ቢን ዓብዱል ዓዚዝ ቃታን ዝምራሕ ጉጅለ ልኡኽ መንግስትን ማሕበረሰብ ንግድን ስዑዲ ዓረብ ብሰንበት ኣዲስ ኣበባ ኣትዩ።

data.eng: In his opening remarks, Dr Aklilu Hailemichael, Ethiopia’s State Minister of Foreign Affairs, said such kinds of events are necessary to further cement the age-long and historical ties between the peoples of the two countries.
data.aaf: Kay Yabti Fakental, Itiyyobiyak Iroh Caagidah Malaak Dr Aklilu Haylemikeyel, Iyemih Ta weole Gudgud Xex Wakti kee Aydaadule Angaarow Namma Baaxoh Ayynti Fanal Sarah Sibintol Faxiimta.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ የውጭ ጉዳይ ሚኒስትር ዴኤታ ዶ/ር አክሊሉ ኃይለሚካኤል በመክፈቻ ንግግራቸው እንደተናገሩት በሁለቱ ሀገራት ህዝቦች መካከል ያለውን የዘመናት እና ታሪካዊ ግንኙነት የበለጠ ለማጠናከር እንደዚህ ያሉ ዝግጅቶችን አስፈላጊነት ጠቅሰዋል።
data.orm: Dubbii saqiinsaa isaa irratti, Ministeerri dhimma alaa Itoophiyaa Dr Akiliiluu Hayilemikaa'el qophiileen akkasii hidhaa umurii-dheeraa fi seena-qabeessaa ummattoota biyyoota lamaanii gidduu jiru cimsuuf barbaachisaadha jedhaniiru.
data.som: Dr Aklilu Hailemichael oo ah Wasiiru Dowlaha Arrimaha Dibadda ee Itoobiya oo khudbad ka jeediyay furitaanka, ayaa sheegay in dhacdooyinka noocan oo kale ah ay lagama maarmaan u yihiin in la sii xoojiyo xiriirka soo jireenka ah iyo kuwa taariikhiga ah ee ka dhaxeeya shucuubta labada dal.
data.tir: ሚኒስትር ዲኤታ ጉዳያት ወፃኢ ኢትዮጵያ ዶክተር ኣክሊሉ ሃይለሚካኤል ኣብ መኽፈቲ ዘረበኦም ከምዚኦም ዝበሉ ፍፃመታት ንቲ ነዊሕ ዝፀንሐን ታሪኻውን ምትእስሳር ህዝብታት ክልቲአን ሃገራት ዝያዳ ንምድልዳል ረብሓ ኣለዎ።

data.eng: Ethiopian Sugar Corporation which was selected Chair of the International Council for 2018 at the last conference held in London 2017 made the announcement today.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyak Sokar Korborasion Doorimeh Baadak 2018 Malah Buxa Ilacabo Konferensiy 2017 Londanal Tekke Mayssaxxaga Talqo.
data.amh: እ.ኤ.አ በ 2017 ዓ.ም በለንደን በተካሄደው የመጨረሻው ጉባኤ ላይ የ 2018 የአለም አቀፍ ምክር ቤት ሊቀመንበር ሆኖ መመረጡን የኢትዮጵያ ስኳር ኮርፖሬሽን ዛሬ ይፋ አድርጓል።
data.orm: Korpooreshiniin sukkaaraa Itoophiyaa dura ta'aa mana maree adunyaa 2018 ta'uun konfirensii darbee kan 2017tti Landanitti ta'etti filatame ifooma har'a taasiseera.
data.som: Shirkadda Sonkorta ee Itoobiya oo loo doortay Guddoomiyaha Golaha Caalamiga ah ee 2018 shirweynihii ugu dambeeyay ee London 2017 ayaa maanta ku dhawaaqay.
data.tir: ኣብ 2017 ዓ.መ.ፈ. ኣብ ለንደን ኣብዝተኻየደ ጉባኤ ን2018 ንቲ ዓለምለኸ ቤት ምኽሪ ብኣቦመንበርነት ክመርሕ ዝተመረፀ ኮርፖሬሽን ሽኮር ኢትዮጵያ እዩ ንዚ ዘፍለጠ።

data.eng: Ethiopian Sugar Corporation Communication Director Gashaw Aychiluhem told ENA that the nation will benefit from hosting the international conference.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyak Sokar Korborasion Angaaraw Saqal Gashaw Aychiluhem ENAak Iyeh Baaxo Baad Caddoh Konferensi Gexsisamat Tantifiqeh.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ስኳር ኮርፖሬሽን የኮሙዩኒኬሽን ዳይሬክተር አቶ ጋሻው አይችሉህም ለኢዜአ እንደተናገሩት ሀገሪቱ አለም አቀፍ ጉባኤውን በማዘጋጀት ተጠቃሚ ትሆናለች።
data.orm: Dayireekteerri koominikeeshinii korporeeshinii sukkaaraa Itiyoophiyaa Gaashaaw Ayichiluhim biyyattin konfirensii adunyaaawaa kana qopheessuu irra akka fayyadamaa taatu ENAtti himaniiru.
data.som: Agaasimaha Isgaadhsiinta ee Shirkada Sonkorta Itoobiya Gashaw Aychiluhem ayaa u sheegay ENA in qaranku uu ka faa’iidaysan doono marti galinta shirka caalamiga ah.
data.tir: ዳይሬክተር ኮሚዩኒኬሽን ኮርፖሬሽን ሽኮር ኢትዮጵያ ጋሻው ኣይችሉህም ንኣገልግሎት ዜና ኢትዮጵያ ከምዝገለፅዎ እታ ሃገር ንቲ ዓለምለኸ ጉባኤ ብምትእንጋድ ተጠቃሚት ክትከውን እያ።

data.eng: Ethiopia and South Korea have signed an agreement that could enable to jointly work on issues tied with urban land development.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiya kee GabiQaxih Kuriya Fermat Sitingey Aben MagaalaH Ardih Daddosul sitalih Kah tamitan Inah.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ እና ደቡብ ኮሪያ ከከተማ መሬት ልማት ጋር በተያያዙ ጉዳዮች ላይ በጋራ ለመስራት የሚያስችላቸውን ስምምነት ተፈራረሙ።
data.orm: Itoophiyaa fi Koriyaan kibbaa waliigaltee dhimmoota guddina lafa magaalaa waliin walqabatu irratti hojjechuuf dandeessisu mallatteessan.
data.som: Itoobiya iyo Kuuriyada Koonfureed ayaa kala saxiixday heshiis awood u siinaya in si wadajir ah looga wada shaqeeyo arrimaha la xidhiidha horumarinta dhulka magaalooyinka.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያን ደቡብ ኮርያን ምስ ልምዓት መሬት ከተማ ኣብዝተኣሳሰሩ ጉዳያት ብሓባር ንምስራሕ ዘኽእለን ስምምዕ ተፈራሪመን።

data.eng: The agreement was signed between Solomon Kebede, Head of the Federal Urban Land and Land Related Issues Registration Agency, and his Korean counterpart Biki Chaw.
data.aaf: Ta Sitigey fanat Kak Yekkem Solomun Kebexe, Federalak Magaalah Ardi kee Ardit Xakabuh Tan Caagidah Masaqaray Agensi, kee Kay Kuriyak Baaxo Caagidak Biki Chaw.
data.amh: የፌዴራል ከተማ መሬትና መሬት ነክ ጉዳዮች ምዝገባ ኤጀንሲ ኃላፊ የሆኑት አቶ ሰለሞን ከበደ እና የኮሪያ አቻቸው ቢኪ ቻው መካከል ስምምነቱ ተፈርሟል።
data.orm: Waliigaltechi dura-ta'aa Ejensii galmeessa lafa magaalaa fi dhimmoota lafaan walqabatanii federaalaa Solomoon Kabbadaa fi gita isaanii kooriyaa Bikii Chaaw gidduutti mallattaa'e.
data.som: Heshiiska waxaa u saxiixay Solomon Kebede oo ah Madaxa Hay’adda Diiwaangelinta Arrimaha Dhulka iyo Dhulka Federaalka, iyo dhiggiisa Kuuriya Biki Chaw.
data.tir: እቲ ስምምዕ ኣብ ሞንጎ ሓላፊ ፌዴራል ኤጀንሲ መሬት ከተማን መሬት ተንከፍ ጉዳያትን ሶሎሞን ከበደን ኮርያዊ መዘነኦም ቢኪ ቻውን እዩ።

data.eng: Everest Textile Co, which makes fabrics and garments, said two new plants in Ethiopia and the US are scheduled to start operations in the first half of this year.
data.aaf: Eversti Sarite Sara Ko, Saro kee Sariteeta, Iyeh Namma qusba Koxite Itiyyobiya kee Ameerika Dafesen Ligidak Qimbo Rubqil Taama Qimbimele.
data.amh: ጨርቃ ጨርቅና አልባሳትን የሚያመርተው ኤቨረስት ጨርቃ ጨርቅ ኩባንያ በኢትዮጵያ እና በአሜሪካ ሁለት አዳዲስ ፋብሪካዎች በዚህ ዓመት የመጀመሪያ አጋማሽ ላይ ስራን ለማስጀመር ቀጠሮ መያዙን ድርጅቱ አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Korporeshiniin Teekistaayilii Everest kan kafanaa fi huccuuwwan oomishu iddoowwan omishaa haarawaan lama Itoophiyaa fi Ameerikaatti hojii ji'oota jahan jalqabaa bara kana keessatti ni eegalu jedheera.
data.som: Shirkadda Everest Textile Co, oo samaysa maryaha iyo dhar, ayaa sheegtay in laba warshadood oo cusub oo Itoobiya iyo Maraykanka ah loo qorsheeyay inay bilaabaan hawlahooda qaybta hore ee sanadkan.
data.tir: ፈትልታትን ዓለባን ዘፍርይ ኩባንያ ዓለባ ኤቨረስት ኣብ ኢትዮጵያን ዩ ኤስን ዝርከባ ክልተ ሓደሽቲ ፋብሪካታት ኣብ ናይ መጀመርታ መንፈቕ እዚ ዓመት ስራሕ ከምዝጅምራ ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: The plant in Ethiopia is to manufacture garments for the company’s brand name customers from Europe, while the US facility is to supply knitted fabrics and garments to customers in the US, the firm said.
data.aaf: Ta Coxite Itiyyobiyal Sarite Bicsanama Kambani Astal Maqmilwa Migaqal Illa Awrobay, Kalah Kaddu Amerikak Arac bXambaqinta Saro kee Sarite Bicisanama Maqmilway Ameerikal Tanih, Ta Firmi Iye.
data.amh: በኢትዮጵያ የሚገነባው ፋብሪካ በአውሮፓ ላሉ የኩባንያው የብራንድ ምርት ተጠቃሚ ደንበኞች ልብሶችን ማምረት ሲሆን፣ የአሜሪካው ተቋም ደግሞ በአሜሪካ ለሚገኙ ደንበኞች የጥልፍ ጨርቆች እና አልባሳትን ለማቅረብ መሆኑን ድርጅቱ ተናግሯል።
data.orm: Iddoon oomishaa Itoophiyaa huccuuwwan maqaa dhaabbatichaa qaban maamiltoota Awurooppaatif yeroo dhiyeessu, iddoon oomishaa Ameerikaa immoo kafanawwan qophaa'anii fi huccuulee maamiltoota Ameerikaatiif akka dhiyeessu dhaabitichi dubbateera.
data.som: Warshada ku taal Itoobiya ayaa ah in ay soo saarto dharka macaamiisha magaca shirkadda ee ka imanaya Yurub, halka xarunta Maraykankuna ay tahay in ay siiso dhar tolsan iyo dharka macaamiisha jooga Maraykanka, ayay shirkaddu sheegtay.
data.tir: እቲ ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ዘሎ ፋብሪካ ኣብ ኣውሮፓ ንዝርከቡ ዓማዊል ብራንድ እቲ ኩባንያ ዓለባ ዘፍርይ እንትኾን እቲ ኣብ ኣሜሪካ ዘሎ ድማ ኣብ ዩ ኤስ ንዘለው ዓማዊሉ ፈትልታትን ዓለባን ከምዘቕርብ እቲ ትካል ገሊፁ።

data.eng: The Ethiopian Human Rights Council (EHRCo) called for legal and operational amendments for future elections based on its observation outcomes of the elections conducted on September 30, 2021.

data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ሰብአዊ መብቶች ጉባኤ (ኢሰመጉ) በሴፕቴምበር 30 ቀን 2021 በተደረገው ምርጫ ምልከታ ውጤት መሠረት ለወደፊት ምርጫዎች የህግ እና የአሰራር ማሻሻያዎችን ጠይቋል።
data.orm: Manni Maree Mirga Namoomaa Itoopiyaa (EHRCo) bu'aalee taajjabbii isaa filannoo Fulbaana 30, 2021 geggeeffame irratti hundaa'uun filannoowwan fuulduraaf fooyya'iinsi seeraa fi adeemsaa akka godhamu waamicha dhiyeesse.
data.som: "Golaha Xuquuqul Insaanka Itoobiya (EHRco) ayaa ku baaqay in wax laga beddelo dhanka sharciga iyo shaqada ee doorashooyinka mustaqbalka iyadoo lagu salaynayo natiijadii indha indheyneed ee doorashooyinkii la qabtay Sebtembar 30, 2021."
data.tir: ጉባኤ ሰብኣዊ መሰላት ኢትዮጵያ ኣብቲ 30 መስከረም 2014 ዝተሳለጠ መረፃ ዘለዎ ትዕዝብቲ መሰረት ብምግባር ንቐፃሊ መረፃ ዝሕግዙ ሕጋውን ግብራውን ምምሕያሻት ክግበሩ ፀዊዑ።

data.eng: According to a preliminary report issued by the Council on Thursday October 21, 2021 at Saphire Addis Hotel, irregularities were observed both in the elections and the Southwestern Peoples’ Region referendum.

data.amh: ምክር ቤቱ ሐሙስ ኦክቶበር 21 ቀን 2021 በሳፊሬ አዲስ ሆቴል ባወጣው የመጀመሪያ ሪፖርት መሰረት በምርጫውም ሆነ በደቡብ ምዕራብ ህዝቦች ክልል ህዝበ ውሳኔ ላይ ስህተቶች ተስተውለዋል።
data.orm: Akka gabaasa duraa Mana marichaan gaafa Kamisaa Onkoloolessa 21, 2021 Hoteela Saafir Addisitti dhiyaateetti, filannoowwanii fi rifireendamii Naannoo Ummattoota Kibba-Lixaa lamaanuu keessatti wanti seera malee tahe taajjabameera.
data.som: Sida lagu sheegay warbixin horudhac ah oo uu Goluhu soo saaray Khamiistii Oktoobar 21, 2021 Hotel Saphire Addis, ayaa lagu arkay wax isdabamarin ah xaga labada doorasho iyo aftida dadka Koonfur Galbeed.

data.eng: Speaking to The Reporter, the Amhara regional state police commissioner, Abere Adamu reaffirmed the readiness of the regional police force to go into operation in Benishagul region if the federal government is busy handling other matters.
data.aaf: Riborterlih Yaabak, Amcari Rakaakayalk Bolis Kommissioner, Abere Adamu Asmatluk Rakaakayak Bolis Calyi Abnisoh fanah Gexonuh Gulguluh yaninim benishangul Rakaakay Adda federal Doolat Ta Caagidih Gaba gewaytek.
data.amh: የአማራ ክልል ፖሊስ ኮሚሽን ኮሚሽነር አበረ አዳሙ ከሪፖርተር ጋር ባደረጉት ቆይታ የፌደራል መንግስት ሌሎች ጉዳዮችን በማስተናገድ ላይ ከሆነ የክልሉ ፖሊስ በቤንሻጉል ክልል ወደ ስራ ለመግባት ዝግጁነታቸውን እንዳጠናቀቁ ተናግረዋል።
data.orm: Komishinariin poolisii mootummaa naannoo Amaaraa, Abberee Addaamuu, Ze Ripporteritti dubbachuun yoo mootummaan federaalaa dhimmoota biraa keessumeessuutti kan qabamu tahe humni addaa poolisii naannichaa naannoo Benishaangul keessatti opireeshinii geggeesuuf qophaa'aa akka tahe mirkaneesse.
data.som: “Isagoo la hadlaya The Reporter, taliyaha booliska deegaanka Axmaarada Abere Adamu ayaa xaqiijiyay in ay diyaar u yihiin in ciidanka booliska deegaanka in ay ka hawlgalaan deegaanka Benishagul hadii ay dawlada federaalku ku mashquulsan tahay hawulo kale.
data.tir: ኮሚሽነር ፖሊስ ክልላዊ መንግስቲ ኣምሓራ ኣበረ ኣዳሙ ፌዴራላዊ መንግስቲ ብኻልኦት መደባት ተፀሚዱ እንተዳኣ ኾይኑ፣ ሓይሊ ፖሊስ እቲ ክልል ናብ ክልል ቤንሻንጉል ጉምዝ ወፍሪ ንምክያድ ድሉው ምዃኑ ንሪፖርተር ኣብዝሃቦ መግለፂ ደጊሙ ኣረጋጊፁ።

data.eng: “When one regional state fails to protect the safety and security of citizens, the federal government is responsible to act,” said Abere, stressing the need for maintaining rule of law in the area where the killings are taking place.
data.aaf: "Inki Rakaakayih Doolat Baaxo Xalok Amni kee Saay Dacrisam Duudewa Saqat, Federal Doolat Abinoosuh Diki Kini," Abere Iyeh, Aysukuqiyi Fayxi Dariifay Rabi Elle yakkek Madqa Dagaraqiso Sugusoonuh.
data.amh: አንድ ክልል የዜጎችን ደህንነት ማስጠበቅ ካቃተው የፌደራል መንግስት እርምጃ መውሰድ አለበት" ያሉት አቶ አበረ ግድያ በሚፈፀምበት አካባቢ የህግ የበላይነትን ማስከበር እንዳለበት አሳስበዋል።
data.orm: "Yeroo mootummaan naannoo tokkoo eegumsaa fi nageenyaa lammiiwwanii eeguu dadhabu, mootummaan federaalaa hojjechuuf itti gaafatamummaa qaba," jechuun Abbereen, naannoo ajjeechaan keessatti raawwataa jiru keessatti olaantummaa seeraa mirkaneessuun barbaachisaa akka tahe jabeesse hime.
data.som: "Markii hal maamul degaaneed uu ku guuldareysto inuu ilaaliyo nabad galyada iyo amniga muwaadiniinta, dowladda federaalka ayaa mas'uul ka ah inay wax ka qabato," ayuu yiri Abere, isagoo ku nuux nuuxsaday baahida loo qabo ilaalinta sharciga deegaanka ay dilku ka dhacayaan.
data.tir: “ሓደ ክልላዊ መንግስቲ ድሕንነትን ፀጥታን ዜጋታት ክሕሉ እንተዘይክኢሉ ፌዴራላዊ መንግስቲ ስጉምቲ ክወስድ ሓላፍነት ኣለዎ” ይብሉ ኣበረ ኣብቲ ቅትለታት ዝፍፀሙሉ ዘለው ቦታ ሕጊ ናይ ምኽባር ኣድላይነት ብምጥንኻር።

data.eng: The Houses of Peoples' Representatives (HPR) is expected to elect a new Supreme Court president to replace the outgoing Tegene Getaneh, who resigned from his post citing health problems that render him unable to carry out his duties.
data.aaf: Umatah Awlaytiitih Malah buxa (UAMB/HPR/) Cigilisak Qusba Daggaa Raqa Sangarah Berezixant Doorelonu Axcuk Qambalan Cabeh Gexeh yan Tegene Getaneh, Qafiyat Taqabi Qadosak Ka Gacisan Kaa tekkek Issi Qaqak Yawqem Maduuda.
data.amh: የሕዝብ ተወካዮች ምክር ቤት ፕሬዚዳንቱን የሚተካ አዲስ የጠቅላይ ፍርድ ቤት ፕሬዚዳንት ይመርጣል ተብሎ ይጠበቃል ከጤና ጋር ተያይዞ ስራቸውን መፈፀም ባለመቻላቸው ስራቸውን የለቀቁት ተሰናባቹ ተገኔ ጌታነህ ናቸው።
data.orm: Manni Maree Bakka Bu'oota Ummataa (HPR) kan bahaa jiru Tegenee Getaanee, isa rakkoon fayyaa akka hojii isaa hin geggeessine isa dhorkuu himuun bakka isaa irraa gadhiise kan bakka bu'u pirasdaantii Mana Murtii Waliigalaa filachuuf ni eegama.
data.som: “Golaha Shacabka ayaa laga sugayaa inay doortaan Guddoomiyaha Maxkamadda Sare ee cusub oo bedeli doona Tegene Getaneh , kaasoo xilkaas iska casilay sababo la xiriira dhibaatooyin caafimaad oo sababay inuu gudan kari waayo shaqadiisa.
data.tir: ቤት ምኽሪ ወከልቲ ህዝቢ ብምኽንያት ጥዕናዊ ዐገማት ስርሑ ክሰርሕ ከምዘይኽእል ብምግላፅ ንስልጣኑ ብፍቓዱ ንዝተከአ ተገኔ ጌታነህ ንምትካእ ሓድሽ ፕሬዚደንት ጠቕላሊ ቤት ፍርዲ ክመርፅ ትፅቢት ተገይሩሉ ኣሎ።

data.eng: Two weeks ago, House Speaker, Abadulla Gemeda told Members of Parliament that his office has received a letter from the Office of the Prime Minister stating that the Prime Minister Hailemariam has accepted Tegene’s letter of resignation.

data.amh: ከሁለት ሳምንት በፊት የምክር ቤቱ አፈ-ጉባዔ አባዱላ ገመዳ ለፓርላማ አባላት ፅህፈት ቤታቸው ከጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር ፅህፈት ቤት ደብዳቤ እንደደረሳቸው አሳወቀዋል። ይህም ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር ኃይለማርያም የአቶ ተገኔን የስራ መልቀቂያ ደብዳቤ መቀበላቸውን የሚገልጽ ደብዳቤ ነው።
data.orm: Torban lama dura, Dubbi Himaan Mana Marichaa, Abbaan Duulaa Gammadaa waajjirri isaanii Waajjira Muummee Ministeeraa irraa xalayaa Muummeen Ministeeraa Haayilemaariyaam xalayaa hojii gadhiisuu Tegenee fudhachuu isaanii ibsu fudhachuu Miseensota Paarlaamaatti himan.
data.som: Labo todobaad ka hor, afhayeenka aqalka, Abadulla Gemeda ayaa u sheegay xubnaha baarlamaanka in xafiiskiisa ay soo gaadhay warqad ka soo baxday Xafiiska Ra’iisul Wasaaraha oo lagu sheegay in Ra’iisul Wasaare Hailemariam uu aqbalay warqadda iscasilaadda Tegene.
data.tir: ኣፈ ጉባኤ ቤት ምኽሪ ወከልቲ ህዝቢ ኣባዱላ ገመዳ ቤት ፅሕፈቶም ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ሃይለማርያም ደሳለኝ ንሕቶ ምልቃቕ ስራሕ ተገኔ ጌታነህ ከምዝተቐበሉዎ ዝገልፅ ደብዳቤ ካብ ቤት ፅሕፈት ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ከምዝበፅሖ ቅድሚ ክልተ ሰሙን ንኣባላት ፓርላማ ገሊፆም።

data.orm: Kaawunsilichi, lammiilee Itoopiyaa waldaalee siivilii fi guddinaa garagaraa, gareewwan amantii, gareewwan artistii, waldaalee ogummaa, dhaabbilee biizinesii, namoota bebbeekamoo, ogeessota akkaadamiksii, waldaalee dargaggootaa fi dubartootaa fi gareelee walfakkaatan biroo kan of keessaa qabu gaafa Onkoloolessa 8ffaa yeroo maree isaa jalqabaa Imbasii Itoopiyaa London keessaatti eegale.

data.eng: The Addis Ababa Water and Sewerage Autority (AAWSA) has hired a contractor to relocate the pipeline by April 2013, according to ERC’s deputy CEO, Debo.

data.amh: የአዲስ አበባ ውሃና ፍሳሽ አውቶሪቲ (AAWSA) እንደ ኢአርሲ ምክትል ዋና ሥራ አስፈፃሚ ዴቦ ሀሳብ የቧንቧ ዝርጋታውን እስከ ኤፕሪል 2003 ድረስ ለማዛወር ኮንትራክተር ቀጥሯል።

data.som: Madaxa biyaha iyo bulaacada Addis Ababa (AAWSA) ayaa qandaraasl bixisay si ay u rarto tuumbooyinka ugu dambayn Abriil 2013, sida uu sheegay ku xigeenka madaxa ERC, Debo.

data.amh: ታላቁ የኢትዮጵያ ህዳሴ ግድብ የአባይ ወንዝን የውሃ ፍሰት ይቆጣጠራል እናም በታችኛው የተፋሰስ ሀገራት ላይ ሊደርስ የሚችለውን የጎርፍ እድል እና ደለል ይቀንሳል ሲል የአርባ ምንጭ ዩኒቨርሲቲ የውሃ ሃብት ጥናትና ምርምር ማዕከል ዳይሬክተር ሳሙኤል ድጋሎ ተናግረዋል።
data.orm: Hidhi Haaromsaa Guddichi Itoophiyaa(GERD) ya'a bishaanii laga Abbayyaa ni to'ata, akkasumas lolaa fi dhiqama biyyee biyyoota gadii akka hir'isu, Daayiriketeerri giddugala qorannoo Yuuniversitii Arbaa Mincii Saamu'el Digaaloo dubbataniiru.
data.som: Biyo xidheenka Grand Ethiopian Renaissance Dam (GERD) ayaa nidaamin doonaa qulqulka biyaha webiga Niil wuxuuna yareynayaa halista fatahaada iyodaadqaadida wadamada hoose, Agaasimaha Xarunta Cilmi baarista Kheyraadka Biyaha ee Jaamacadda Arba Minch Samuel Dego ayaa sidu sheegay.
data.tir: ዓብዪ ግድብ ህዳሴ ኢትዮጵያ ዋሕዚ ሩባ ናይል ንምቁፅፃር ከምኡ'ውን ኣብ ሃገራት ታሕተዋይ ተፋሰስ ሓደጋ ውሑጅን ምምላእ ደለልን ንምንካይ ከምዝጠቅም ኣብ ዩኒቨርስቲ ኣርባምንጭ ዳይሬክተር ማእኸል ምርምር ሃፍቲ ማይ ሳሙኤል ዴግሎ ገሊፆም።

data.eng: In an exclusive interview with ENA, Commissioner Yinager said the drought and civil unrests in some part of the country has not barred the economy from growing.
data.aaf: ENAluk Tekke Sero kee Gacsal , Kommissionar Yinager Iyeh Qabar kee Xakak Inkim Kini ta Baaxol Maduur Dadda Mawasa.
data.amh: ከኢዜአ ጋር በተደረገው ልዩ ቃለ መጠይቅ ኮሚሽነር ይናገር በሀገሪቱ አንዳንድ ክፍሎች የተከሰተው ድርቅ እና አመፅ ኢኮኖሚውን ከማደግ አላገደውም ብሏል።

data.som: “Wareeysi gaar ah oo uu siiyey ENA, Komishaneer Yinager ayaa sheegay in abaaraha iyo kacdoonada shacabka ee ka jira qeybo ka mid ah dalka aysan u diidin dhaqaalaha inuu kobco.
