data.eng: “When we look at the past two years GTP-II performance, expected and unexpected things have happened such as drought and unrest which were unexpected, but if the prevailing peaceful situation remains unchanged and we do more in the two and half years left, the planned economic growth will be achieved,” the Commissioner said.
data.aaf: " Waraye Ligidih DTI-II (GTP-II) Abniso Waginawak, Qambalimtem kee Qambaalimewatem EddebTekke Toh Qabar kee Xakakway Qambalimak masugina, Takkay Imay tamixe Salaa Caalota Mamilagiminam kee Nanu Abneh Nammah sanat kee Qaxi Raqewak, Ikraarimte Maduur Daddalite Arac xagkteh," Kommiosiioner Iyeh.
data.amh: “የባለፉት ሁለት ዓመታት የጂቲፒ 2 አፈጻጸምን ስንመለከት፣ የተጠበቁና ያልተጠበቁ ነገሮች ተከስተዋል እንደ ድርቅና አለመረጋጋት ያሉ ያልተጠበቁ ነገሮች፤ ነገር ግን ሰፍኖ የነበረው ሰላማዊ ሁኔታ ካልተቀየረና በቀሩት ሁለት ዓመታት ተኩል ጊዜ ውስጥ የበለጠ ከሰራን የታቀደው የኢኮኖሚ ዕድገት ይሳካል” ብሏል ኮሚሽነሩ።
data.orm: "Raawwii GPT-II waggoota lamaan darbanii yeroo ilaallu, wantootni eegamanii fi hin eegamne raawwataniiru kanneen akka hongee fi jeequmsaa kan hin eegamne yeroo ta'an, garuu haalli nagaa duraa ture yoo hin jijjiramu ta'e waggoota lamaa fi walakka hafanitti caalaa ni hojjenna, karoorri guddina diinagdee ni milkaa'a" Komiishinerichi jedhaniiru.
data.som: “Markaan eegno labadii sano ee la soo dhaafay waxqabadkii GTP-II, waxaa dhacay waxyaabo la filanayay sida abaaro iyo qalalaase aan la filayn, laakiin haddii xaaladdii nabadeed ee jirtay aanay waxba iska beddelin oo aynu wax badan ka qabanno labada sannadood iyo badhkii hadhay. kobac dhaqaale oo qorsheysan ayaa la gaari doonaa,” ayuu yiri Guddoomiyaha.
data.tir: ኣፈፃፅማ ጂፒቲ 2 ዝሓለፉ ክልተ ዓመታት ምስንርእይ፣ ዝተገመቱን ዘይተገመቱን ነገራት ተራእዮም እዮም። ንኣብነት ድርቅን ዕግርግርን ዘይተገመቱ ነይሮም። ይኹን እምበር እቲ ሕዚ ዘሎ ሰላም እንተቐፂሉ'ሞ ኣብተን ዝሓለፋ ክልተ ዓመትን ፈረቓን ዝያዳ እንተሰሪሕና እቲ ዝተተለመ ቁጠባዊ ዕብየት ክገሀድ እዩ ኢሎም እቶም ኮሚሽነር።

data.eng: Ethiopia has been taking “very strong engagement” on land restoration, AU Great Green Wall Initiative Coordinator Elvis Paul Tangem said.

data.amh: የካርበን ግብይትን ለማስተዋወቅ በተዘጋጀው መድረክ ላይ የኦሮሚያ ደንና ዱር እንስሳት ልማት ኢንተርኘራይስ ዳይሬክተር አራርሳ ረጋሳ ለኢዜአ ህብረተሰቡን ከተፈጥሮ ሀብት ተጠቃሚ ለማድረግ ሁለንተናዊ ስራ እየተሰራ ነው ሲል ተናግሯል።
data.orm: Waltajjii daldala Kaarbooniif qophaa'e irratti, Daayirekterri Bosonaa fi Bineensota Bosonaa Oromiyaa Araarsaa Raggaasaa ENAtti hojiin hunda hammachiisaa ta'e hawaasni qabeenya umaamaa irra fayyadamaa akka ta'e mirkaneessuf akka hojjetamaa jiru himaniiru.

data.eng: Ethiopia has encountered some 2,800 cyber-attack attempts during the last Ethiopian fiscal year (2020/21), according to the Director-General of Information Network Security Agency (INSA), Dr. Shumete Gizaw.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyat 2,800 Sayber Masattaka Gibati teetit Boode Itiyyobiyak Waraye Ligida (20202/21), Xaagi nitworkik Saay Ajensi Sanaqa jeneral, Dr. Shumete Gizaw.
data.amh: የኢንፎርሜሽን መረብ ደህንነት ኤጀንሲ (ኢንሳ) ዋና ዳይሬክተር ዶ/ር ሹመቴ ግዛው በተናገሩት መሰረት ኢትዮጵያ ባለፈው(2020/21) በጀት ዓመት 2,800 ያህል የሳይበር ጥቃት ሙከራዎች አጋጥሟታል።
data.orm: Akka Daayirekteera Olaanaa Ejensii Nageenya Odeeffannoo (INSA), Dr. Shuumatee Gizawutti, bara Baajataa Itoopiyaa darbe (2020/21), Itoopiyaan yaalii haleellaa saayiberii 2,800 tahantu ishee mudatee ture.
data.som: "Itoobiya waxa ay la kulantay ilaa 2,800 oo isku day weerar xaga khadka ah intii lagu jiray sanad xisaabeedkii u dambeeyay ee Itoobiya (2020/21), sida uu sheegay Mareeyaha Guud ee Hay'adda Amniga Shabakadda Warfaafinta (INSA), Dr. Shumete Gizaw."
data.tir: ዋና ኣካያዲ ስራሕ ኤጄንሲ ድሕንነት መረዳእታ ዶክተር ሹመቴ ግዛው ከምዝገለፆ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ዓመት በጅት (2020/21 ዓ.ም.ፈ) ኢትዮጵያ 2,800 ዝኾኑ መጥቃዕቲታት ሳይበር መኪታ።

data.eng: The Director-General made the remark at a ceremony organized to launch the month-long cyber security program under the title “Cyber Security Shared Responsibility, Let’s Know & Be Cautious”.
data.aaf: Ta Saqal Jeneral Gaboyna Fakentol Abeh Biciseh Yaysexexeguh Alsi Giddeh Alsi Gideh Sayber Saayih Tadeera "Sayber Saayak Dirki Tabsa, Naxagay Inam kee Nambiday" Iya taytilil.
data.amh: ዋና ዳይሬክተሩ ይህን ያሉት "የሳይበር ደህንነት የጋራ ኃላፊነት፣ እንወቅ እና እንጠንቀቅ" በሚል ርዕስ ለአንድ ወር የሚቆየውን የሳይበር ደህንነት ፕሮግራም ለመጀመር በተዘጋጀ ስነ ስርዓት ላይ ነው።
data.orm: Daayirekteerri Olaanaan sun sagantaa nageenya saayiberii ji'a guutuu mata duree "Nageenyi Saayiberii Itti gaafatamummaa Qooddatamuudha, Ha Hubannu & Eeggannoo Ha Goonu" jedhu jalqabsiisuuf qophii qophaa'e irratti yaadicha kenne.
data.som: Agaasimaha guud ayaa hadalkan ka sheegay xaflad loo soo diyaariyay oo lagu daahfurayay barnaamijka amniga khadka oo socon doona muddo bil ah, kaasoo cinwaan looga dhigay “Aminiga khadku waa Mas’uuliyadda guud , aan ogaano oo ka digtoonaado”.
data.tir: እቲ ዋና ኣካያዲ ስራሕ ነዚ ዝገለፀ ''ሓበራዊ ሓላፍነት ድሕንነት ሳይበር ፥ ንፍለlጥን ንጥጠንቀቕን'' ኣብ ትሕቲ ዝብል ኣርእስቲ ንሓደ ወርሒ ዝፀንሕ መደብ ድሕንነት ሳይበር ዕላዊ ንምግባር ኣብ ዝተዳለወ ስነስርዓት እዩ።

data.eng: Nokia signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Addis Ababa Science and Technology University and Addis Ababa Institute of Technology in order to collaborate and provide high-level technical skills to students in line with rapidly changing market needs.
data.aaf: Nokiya Fermat MOUl hayte Addiss Ababak Saynis kee teknolojih Jaamiqat kee Addiss Ababak teknolojih Istitutilih sitaluk catimoonu kee Fayale caddoh Metibani Dudditeh Barttenitih Xayoosak Sisikuk Qadaga Fayxi milagaanama.
data.amh: ኖኪያ በፍጥነት እየተለዋወጠ ካለው የገበያ ፍላጎት ጋር ለመተባበር እና ለተማሪዎች ከፍተኛ የቴክኒክ ችሎታዎችን ለማቅረብ ከአዲስ አበባ ሳይንስና ቴክኖሎጂ ዩኒቨርሲቲ እና ከአዲስ አበባ የቴክኖሎጂ ኢንስቲትዩት ጋር የመግባቢያ ስምምነት ተፈራረመ።
data.orm: Nookiyaan tumsuu fi dandeetti teekinikaa sadarkaa olaanaa barattoota haala fedhii gabaa ariitiin jijjiiramaa deemuu wajjin walsimaniif kennuuf Waligaltee Walhubannoo (MoU) Yuunivarsitii Saayinsii fi Teekinooloojii Addis Ababaa fi Institiyuutii Teekinooloojii Addis Ababaa wajjin mallatteesse.
data.som: “Nokia ayaa heshiis Is afgarad ah (MoU) la saxeexatay Jaamacadda Sayniska iyo Tignoolajiyada ee Addis Ababa iyo Machadka Tignoolajiyada ee Addis Ababa si ay isaga kaashadaan oo ay ardayda u siiyaan xirfado farsamo oo heer sare ah oo la jaan qaadaya baahida suuqa ee sida degdega isku badalaya”.
data.tir: ኖኪያ ምስ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ሳይንስን ቴክኖሎጂን ዩኒቨርስቲን ምስ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ቴክኖሎጂ ኢንስቲትዩትን ምስቲ ብቕልጡፍ ዝልወጥ ዘሎ ጠለብ ዕዳጋ ዝመጣጠን ዝላዓለ ብርኪ ክእለት ቴክኒክ ንተምሃሮ ንምቕራብን ብሓባር ንምስራሕን ዘኽእል መባእታዊ ስምምዕነት (ኤም.ኦ.ዩ) ተፈራሪሙ።

data.eng: As part of the agreement, Nokia will work with the two universities to provide tailored training and coaching programs and share the latest technical and business practices in the ICT sector in line with global developments and market demands.
data.aaf: Tasitingeyik , nokiya taamitele Namma jaamiqatlih masowte Aydakaakan kee Aydakaaknise Tadeera Xayosanam kee Xaagi Angaarawih teknolojih sekteril (XAT/ICT/) Mtibanu kee Tellemoh Abnisoh Tabaatabisanamy Baad Daddosite kee Qadaaga Fayxitelih Gacak.
data.amh: በስምምነቱ መሰረት ኖኪያ ከሁለቱ ዩኒቨርስቲዎች ጋር በመተባበር ብጁ የስልጠና እና የአሰልጣኝነት መርሃ ግብሮችን በመስጠት እና በአይሲቲ ዘርፍ አዳዲስ ቴክኒካል እና የንግድ ልምዶችን ከአለም አቀፍ ልማት እና የገበያ ፍላጎቶች ጋር በማካፈል ይሰራል።
data.orm: Akka waliigaltichaatti, Nookiyaan Yuunivarsiitii lamaan wajjin leenjii mijataa fi sagantaalee leenjisuu ni kenna akkasumas sektera ICT keessatti barteewwan teekinikaa fi biizinisee dhiyeenyaa kan guddina addunyaa fi fedhii gabaa wajjin walsimatu nii qooda.
data.som: Iyadoo qayb ka ah heshiiska, Nokia ayaa la shaqayn doontaa labada jaamacadood si ay u bixiyaan tababaro iyo barnaamijyo tababarnimo oo ku habboon oo ay wadaagaan farsamooyinkii ugu dambeeyay ee farsamada iyo ganacsiga ee qaybta ICT ga si waafaqsan horumarka caalamiga ah iyo baahida suuqa.
data.tir: ብመሰረት ኣካል እቲ ስምምዕነት ኖኪያ ንዓለማዊ ምዕባለን ጠለብ ዕዳጋን ዝምጥን እዋናዊ ቴክኒካዊን ንግዳዊን ተሞክሮ ንምቕራብ ዝጠመተ ዕላማ ተኮር ትምህርቲን ስልጠናን ንምሃብ ምስ ክልቲኦም ዩኒቨርስቲታት ክሰርሕ እዩ።

data.eng: Sophia is quite a celebratory, attracting much attention as she travels the world But Getahun Mekuria, Ethiopia’s science and technology Minister, told BBC Amharic that Sophia would still appear at Saturday’s MCIT International Expo.
data.aaf: Sofiya Dago Massakaxy, Nagay Hangi hirigtemi Is Baad Gexewak takay imay Getehun Mekuria, Itiyyobiyak Saysin kee Teknilojih Malaak, Warse, BBC Amcari Afah Ta Sofya Taham fanah Buka inte sabtih, MCIT Baad Caddoh Exbol.
data.amh: ሶፊያ በጣም ታዋቂ ነች፣ አለምን ስትዞር የብዙዎችን ትኩረት ስባለች። የኢትዮጵያ ሳይንስ እና ቴክኖሎጂ ሚኒስትር ጌታሁን መኩሪያ እንደተናገሩት ሶፊያ አሁንም ቅዳሜ በሚካሄደው MCIT ኢንተርናሽናል ኤክስፖ ላይ ትገኛለች።
data.orm: Soofiyaan baayyee beekamtuudha, akkuma addunyaa irra imalteen xiyyeeffannoo guddaa argatte, garuu, Ministeerri Saayiinsii fi Teekinoolojii, Geetahun Makuriyaa, Soofiyaan Eksipoo Addunyaalessaa MCIT irratti gaafa Sanbataa akka argamtu BBC Amhaariffaatti dubbate.
data.som: "Sophia waa caan, taas oo soo jiidanaysa dareenka inta ay u ku wareegayso adduunka, Laakiin Getahun Mekuria, Wasiirka Sayniska iyo Tignoolajiyada ee Itoobiya, ayaa BBC da Axmariga u sheegay in Sophia ay wali ka soo muuqan doonto Bandhigga Caalamiga ah ee MCIT ee Sabtida."
data.tir: ሚኒስቴር ሳይንስን ቴክኖሎጂን ኢትዮጵያ ንቢቢሲ ኣምሓርኛ ከምዝሓበሮ ኣብ'ቲ ብቀዳም ዝካየድ ናይ ኤም.ሲ.ኣይ.ቲ (ሚኒስቴር ኮሚኒኬሽንን ቴክኖሎጂን) ዓለምለኸ ምርኢት እታ ብሶፊያ ዝተሰየመት ሮቦት ክትቐርብ እያ።

data.eng: Getnet Asefa, the manager of Icog Labs – the engineering firm behind her Amharic programming, explained that Sophia was fixable and they would find alternative parts for her.
data.aaf: Genet Asefa, Icog Labs Saqal, Injineringih firmi kay Amcarih Afih Tadeerak Daret, baxaqisak Sofiya Aracal tanim kee Oson geelon Faximtah Tan Arooca.
data.amh: የ Icog Labs ስራ አስኪያጅ ጌትነት አሰፋ ከአማርኛ ፕሮግራሚግዋ ጀርባ ያለው የምህንድስና ተቋም ሶፊያን ማስተካከል እንደሚቻል እና አማራጭ ክፍሎችን እንደሚያገኙላት አስረድታለች።
data.orm: Geetineet Aseffa, hoogganaan Icog Laabs - dhaabbata injiinaringii pirograamiingii Amaariffa ishee duuba jiru, Soofiyaan kan suphamu dandeessu akka turtee fi isaan qaamota kan biroo isheef barbaadaa akka jiran ibse.
data.som: Getnet Asefa, maareeyaha Icog Labs shirkadda injineernimada ee ka dambeysa barnaamijkeeda Amxaariga, ayaa sharraxday in Sophia ay ahayd mid la hagaajin karo oo ay u heli doonaan qaybo kale.
data.tir: ናይ'ቲ ናይ ኣምሓርኛ ፕሮግራሚንግ ኩባንያ ኣኮግ ላብስ ኣካያዲ ስራሕ ዝኾነ ኣይተ ጌትነት ከምዝገለፆ፡ ሶፊያ ተዓፃፃፊት ስለዝኾነት ንዓኣ ዝኸውን ኣማራፂ ግደ ኣይሳኣንን።

data.eng: An Ethiopian-American Plant Breeder, Geneticist and Professor at Purdue University, Gebisa Ejeta (PhD) has received 5 million dollars from Purdue University, West Lafayette, Indiana State, USA to promote his contributions and achievements in sorghum breeding research.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiy kee Amerikah Baxxi Coox Xayoose, Genetik Tuyaxiyi kee Brofeseri Purder Jaamiqatl,Gebisa Ejeta(PHD) purdueh jaamiqatak 5 milyoonih Xolaar Hirige, Ayrokormah Lafayette, Inxiyanah Rakaakayay, Ameerikal Yeysexexegeh Isi Doori kee Arac Xagiyal Dookari Asdorih Kusaaqal.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያዊው አሜሪካዊ የዕፅዋት አርቢ፣ የጄኔቲክስ ባለሙያ እና የፑርዱ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ፕሮፌሰር ገቢሳ ኤጄታ (ዶክትሬት) በማሽላ መራቢያ ምርምር ያበረከተውን አስተዋጾ እና ያስገኘውን ውጤት ለማስተዋወቅ 5 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ከፑርዱ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ዌስት ላፋይቴ፣ ኢንዲያና ግዛት ዩኤስኤ አግኝቷል።
data.orm: Sanyii Biqilaa kan horsiisu Lammiin Itoopiyaa-Ameerikaa, Jeenestiin Profeeserri Yuuiversitii Parduu, Gabbisaa Ejjetaa (PhD) galchii isaa fi milkaa'insa isaa qorannoo sanyii bisingaa irratti godhe beeksisuuf Yuuivarsitii Parduu, Weest Lafayette, Isteetii Indiyaanaa, USA irraa doolaara miliyoona 5 irraa fudhate
data.som: Itobiyan-Maraykanka ah ee ku takhasusay iskudarka dhirta, hidde yaqaanka iyo borofisar ka tirsan Jaamacadda Purdue, Gebisa Ejeta (PhD) ayaa 5 milyan oo doolar ka helay Jaamacadda Purdue, West Lafayette, Gobolka Indiana, USA si uu ugu dhiirrigeliyo wax qabadkiisa iyo guulaha uu ka gaadhay cilmi baadhista taranka haruurka.
data.tir: እቲ ትውልደ ኢትዮጵያዊ ኣሜሪካዊ ኣራባሒ ተኽሊታት፣ክኢላ ጄኔቲክስን ኣብ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ፐርዱ ፕሮፌሰር ዝኾነን ገቢሳ ኢጄታ (ፒ.ኤች.ዲ) ኣብ መፅናዕቲ ምርባሕ ምሸላ ዘበርከቶ ኣስተዋጽኦን ዘመዝገቦ ውፂኢትን ንምስላጥ ምእንታን ክሕግዝ ኣብ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ክልል ኢንዲያና ኣብ ዌስት ላፍያቴ ካብ ዝርከብ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ፐርዱ 5 ሚልዮን ዶላር ተሸሊሙ።

data.eng: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation has handed over the award to Gebisa.
data.aaf: Bill kee Melinda Getis Fawunxesion Gebisah Acwa Gabal Kak Tabise.
data.amh: የቢል ኤንድ ሜሊንዳ ጌትስ ፋውንዴሽን ሽልማቱን ለገቢሳ አስረክቧል።
data.orm: Faawundeeshiniin Biilii & Melindaa Geets badhaasicha Gabbisaaf kenneera.
data.som: Hay’adda Bill & Melinda Gates ayaa abaal marintanta gudoonsiiyay Gebisa.
data.tir: ፋውንዴሽን ቢልን ሜሊንዳን ድማ ነቲ ሽልማት ንገቢሳ ኣረኪቡ።

data.eng: The research of the Ethiopian award-winning researcher, Dr. Martha Zewdie was on regulatory T cells in pulmonary tuberculosis patients.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyak Acwah Beya Kusaqabe Kusaqise,Dr. Martha Zewxe Gabuulol Geytimta Lakimiteh Sugte.

data.amh: በሚኒስቴሩ የኢንፎርሜሽን ኮሙኒኬሽን ቴክኖሎጂ ዘርፍ ዋና ዳይሬክተር አቶ አብዮት ሲናሞ ለኢዜአ እንደተናገሩት ቁልፍ የህዝብ አገልግሎቶችን ወደ ዲጂታላይዝ ለማድረግ የተነደፈው ሀገራዊ ስትራቴጂ በጥሩ ሁኔታ እየተካሄደ ሲሆን በእቅዱ መሰረትም ተግባራዊ እየተደረገ ነው።

data.tir: ኣብ ሚኒስቴር ኢኖቤሽንን ቴክኖሎጂን ዋና ኣካያዲ ስራሕ መደብ ስግግር ዲጂታል ዶክተር ኣብዮት ባዩ ''እቲ ዝትውሃብ ሓገዝ ሚኒስቴር ኣብ ትሕቲ መደብ ኢ.ኦ.ዲ.ቢ ንዘካይዶ ዲጂታል ተሃድሶ ኣብ ምምራሕን ምዕዋትን ንዝገብሮ ፃዕሪ ዝድግፍ እዩ'' ብምባል ገሊፁ።

data.eng: AIC Deputy Director-General Taye Girma told ENA that the center which aims to become a national center of excellence by establishing AI policy and creating conducive ecosystem for the private and public sector is facing two major challenges in general.
data.aaf: AIC Cigiila Saqal- jeneral Taye Girma ENAh Warse Ta Fanteena Hadafahlem Agatak Massakaxxale Fanteenah Yamaatenimi Al Bolisi bicisanam kee Meqeh Tan Ekosistem Canka kee Ayyunti Sekterway Amobeyak Mangom Ambuluyuk Geytimta Namma Taqabite.
data.amh: የመኢአድ ምክትል ዋና ዳይሬክተር አቶ ታዬ ግርማ ለኢዜአ እንደገለፁት የኤአይ ፖሊሲን በመቅረፅ ለግሉ እና ለመንግስት ሴክተር ምቹ የሆነ ስነ-ምህዳር በመፍጠር ሀገራዊ የልህቀት ማዕከል ለመሆን ያለመው ማዕከል ባጠቃላይ ሁለት ዋና ዋና ተግዳሮቶች ተጋርጠውበታል።
data.orm: Itti aanaan Daayirekteera Olaanaa AIC Taayyee Girmaa giddugalichi dambiilee AI hundeessuunii fi sekteroota dhuunfaa fi hawaasaaf haala mijataa uumuun giddugala kabajamaa biyyaalessaa tahuufi kan kaayyeefate akka waliigalaatti rakkoolee gurguddaa lamatu isa mudachaa jira jedhe.
data.som: Ku xigeenka agaasimaha guud ee AIC Taye Girma ayaa u sheegay ENA in xaruntan oo ujeedadeedu tahay in ay noqoto xarun heer qaran ah oo lagu dajiyo sharciyada AI iyo abuurista nidaamka deegaanka ku habboon ganacsiga gaarka loo leeyahay iyo kuwa dawliga ah ay wajahayaan laba caqabadood oo waaweyn guud ahaan.
data.tir: ምኽትል ዋና ኣካያዲ ስራሕ ማእኸል ስራሕ ሰብ ኢንቴሌጄንስ ንግልጋሎት ዜና ኢትዮጵያ ከምዝሓበሮ ነቲ ማእኸል ሃገራዊ ንምግባር ተተሊሙ ኣሎ።

data.eng: According to him, almost all government institutions and private entities require AI applications to deliver effective services with the support of AI technology.
data.aaf: Usuk Elle Yiysixigenal, Inkih Tan Doolat institution kee Canka Arocal Al Abbilikasion Meqeh ayn Ayfafih Wadbisiya Al Teknolojih Catol.
data.amh: እንደ እርሳቸው ገለጻ፣ ሁሉም ማለት ይቻላል የመንግስት ተቋማት እና የግል ተቋማት በ AI ቴክኖሎጂ ድጋፍ ውጤታማ አገልግሎት ለመስጠት AI መተግበሪያዎችን ይፈልጋሉ።
data.orm: Akka inni jedhetti, dhaabbileen mootummaan hunda jechuun bifa danda'amuu fi qaamoleen dhuunfaa tajaajiloota bu'a qabeessa deggersa teekinoolojii AI'n dhiyeessuuf hojiirra oolmaa AI barbaadu.
data.som: Sida laga soo xigtay isaga, ku dhawaad dhammaan hay'adaha dawladda iyo hay'adaha gaarka ah waxay u baahan yihiin ablikashino AI si ay u bixiyaan adeegyo wax ku ool ah iyada oo la kaashanayo tiknoolajiyada AI.
data.tir: ንሱ ከምዝበሎ ዳርጋ ኩሎም መንግስታዊ ትካላትን ናይ ውልቀ ኩባንያታትን ውፂኢታዊ ግልጋሎት ንምሃብ ንስራሕ ሰብ ቴክኖሎጂ ኢንቴሌጄንስ ዝሕግዝ መሳለጢያ ስራሕ ሰብ ኢንቴሌጄንስ ክህልዎም ከምዝግባእ እዩ።

data.eng: President of the Association, Meaza Kitaw, said the association is now providing integrated sexual and reproductive health services including maternal and child health, family planning, screening and treatment.
data.aaf: Ta Eglah Berezixanti, Maqazakitaw, Iyeh ta Egla TawakTengele Angariwiya kee qafiyat murtusa Ayfafite Misinkaca kee Alaaqaqafiyatay, Buxamarih Ikraaroy, Fokaqo kee Dacayri Xayosam Abta.
data.amh: የማህበሩ ፕሬዝዳንት ወይዘሮ መዓዛ ቅታው ማህበሩ አሁን ላይ የተቀናጀ የወሲብ እና የስነ ተዋልዶ ጤና በተጨማሪም የእናቶች እና ህፃናት ጤና፣ የቤተሰብ ምጣኔ፣ የማጣሪያ እና ህክምና አገልግሎቶችን እየሰጠ ነው አሉ።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin Waldichaa, Me'aazaa Qitawu, waldichi yeroo ammaa fayyaa haadhaa fi daa'imaa, karoora maatii, calallii fi yaala dabalatee tajaajiloota fayyaa walquunnamtii saalaa fi walhormaataa walqabataa kennaa jira jedhan.
data.som: "Madaxwaynaha Ururka, Meaza Kitaw, ayaa sheegtay in ururku uu hadda bixinayo adeegyo caafimaad oo isuugu jira galmada iyo taranka oo ay ku jiraan caafimaadka hooyooyinka iyo caruurta, qorsheynta reerka, baadhista iyo daaweynta."
data.tir: ፕሬዝደንት እቲ ማሕበር መዓዛ ቅጣው ከምዝገለፀቶ እቲ ማሕበር ሕዚ ጥሙር ግልጋሎት ጥዕና ዖታን ስነ-ተዋልዶን እንኮላይ ጥዕና ኣዴታትን ቆልዑን፣ ትልሚ ቤተሰብ ከምኡ እውን ምርመራን ሕክምናን እናሃበ እዩ።

data.eng: Close to six million people have received reproductive health service only in 2015 alone, it was noted.
data.aaf: 2015 Addat Dibuuk Illa lica Miyoonuh Gaba Bahtam Qafiyat Amrutiyih Ayfaf Hirigte, Tah Qadoosenih.
data.amh: በ2015 ብቻ ወደ ስድስት ሚሊዮን የሚጠጉ ሰዎች የስነ ተዋልዶ ጤና አገልግሎት አግኝተዋል ተብሎ ተወስኗል።
data.orm: Bara 2015 qofa keessa, namoonni miliyoona ja'atti dhiyaatan tajaajila fayyaa walhormaataa akka argatan hubatame.
data.som: lix milyan oo qof in kudhaw ayaa heshay adeegga cafimadka taranka 2015 kaliya, Wana ladiwaan galiyay.
data.tir: ኣብ 2015 ዓ.ም.ፈ ጥራሕ ናብ ሽዱሽተ ሚልዮን ዝፅግዑ ሰባት ግልጋሎት ጥዕና ስነ-ተዋልዶ ከምዝረኸቡ ተፈሊጡ ኣሎ።

data.eng: The Ministry of Health has announced that it is spraying anti-malaria chemicals in 160 Woredas in order to wipe out mosquito following the rainy season the country has been experiencing.
data.aaf: Qafiyat Malaak Elle Qadosenal Bagi Gexo Daylih kemikalih Rifiya 160 Daqqortih Addal Kayniqe kah Bayisana/Duktana/ Katayak Raqta waktite baaxo Abak Raak Kak Beyak Geytiman.
data.amh: የጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስቴር በሀገሪቱ የዝናብ ወቅትን ተከትሎ የወባ ትንኝን ለማጥፋት በ160 ወረዳዎች የፀረ ወባ ኬሚካሎችን እየረጨ መሆኑን አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Ministeerri Eegumsa Fayyaa waqtii roobaa biyyattii keessa jirtu hordofuun bookee balleessuuf keemikaalota farra malaariyaa Aanaalee 160 keessatti biifaa akka jiru beeksise.
data.som: “Wasaaradda caafimaadka ayaa ku dhawaaqday in 160 ka degmoyin ay ku buufinayso kiimikooyinka ka hortagga duumada si loo baabiiyo kaneecada ka dib wakhti roobaadka uu dalku soo maray."
data.tir: እታ ሃገር ሕዚ ዘላትሉ ወቅቲ ዝናብ ስዒቡ ጣንጡታት ንምጥፋእ ኣብ 160 ወረዳታት ፀረ ዓሶ ኬሚካል እናተነፀገ ከምዝኾነ ሚኒስቴር ጥዕና ዕላዊ ገይሩ።

data.eng: Ministry’s Malaria Programs Officer, Dereje Dilu, told Walta Information Center that over 916,000 kilograms of anti malaria chemicals and spraying materials have been distributed in 160 malaria prone Woredas of the country.
data.aaf: Malaakak Bagi Gexo Tadeerah Ofiser, Xereje Xilu, Walta xaagi Fanteenak Iyemih 916,000 kilogramiteh Bagi Gexo solo Kemikal kee Uwaytite Rifiyi Bagi gexole 160 Daqqorti Kureenih ta Baaxok.
data.amh: የወባ ፕሮግራም ሚኒስቴር አለቃ አቶ ደረጀ ዲሉ ለዋልታ ኢንፎርሜሽን ማዕከል እንደገለጹት በ160 የሀገሪቱ ወረዳዎች ከ916 ሺህ ኪሎ ግራም በላይ የፀረ ወባ ኬሚካልና የርጭት እቃዎች ተሰራጭተዋል።
data.orm: Ogeessi Sagantaa Malaariyaa Ministeerichaa, Darajjee Diluu, keemikaalotnni farra malaariyaa kiilogiraama 916,000 ol tahuu fi meeshaaleen ittin biifan Aaanaalee 160 biyyattii kanneen malaariyaan hubamuu malaniif akka raabsame Giddugala Odeeffannoo Waaltaatti hime.
data.som: Madaxa Barnaamijyada Duumada ee Wasaaradda, Dereje Dilu, ayaa u sheegay Xarunta isgaadhsiinta Walta in ka badan 916,000 kiilogaraam oo kiimikooyinka ka hortagga duumada iyo aaladaha buufinta laga qaybiyay 160 degmoyin oo u nugul duumada.
data.tir: ኣብ’ቲ ሚኒስቴር መኮነን መደባት ዓሶ ዝኾነ ደረጀ ቱሉ ንማእኸል ኢንፎርሜሽን ዋልታ ከምዝገለፆ 916,000 ኪሎ ግራም ፀረ-ዓሶ ኬሚካላትን መሳርሒታት መንፀጊን ናብ 160 ንዓሶ ዝተቓልዑ ወረዳታት እታ ሃገር ተባፂሑ እዩ።

data.eng: Out of the three hospitals, the referral hospital under construction in Gnignag has been completed only 75 percent of its construction phase so far according to the head of the regional health bureau, Oman Amelu (MDr.)
data.aaf: Sidiicah Hosbitaalak Iroh, kaxxa/Referral/ Hosbital Xisnet Geytima Jnignag 75 gaba kaleeh kat xisneh Caddo Kaxxam Xeera ta Rakaakayak Qafiyat Birro Saqal, Oman Amelu (MDr.)
data.amh: የክልሉ ጤና ቢሮ ኃላፊ ኦማን አመሉ (MDr) እንዳሉት በግንጋግ ውስጥ ካሉት ሶስት ሆስፒታሎች እየተገነባ ያለው ሪፈራል ሆስፒታል 75 በመቶው ብቻ ተጠናቋል።
data.orm: Akka hogganaa biiroo eegumsa fayyaa naannichaa, Omaan Amelu (MDr.)'tti, hospitaalota sadan keessaa, hospitaalli rifeeraalaa Giniginaag keessatti ijaarsa irra jiru haga ammaatti sadarkaa ijaarsa isaa dhibeentaan 75 qofa xumurame.
data.som: "Saddexda dhakhtar, dhakhtarka gudbinta ee laga dhisayo Gnignag ayaa la dhamaystiray 75 boqolkiiba oo keliya qaybtiisa dhismihiisa ilaa hadda sida uu sheegay madaxa xafiiska caafimaadka ee deegaanka, Oman Amelu (MDr.)."
data.tir: ካብቶም ሰለስተ ሆስፒታላት ሓደ ዝኾነን ኣብ ትሕቲ ህንፀት ዝርከብን ግኒግናግ ሪፈራል ሆስፒታል ዛጊድ 75 ሚእታዊ ህንፀቱ ከምዝተወደአ ሓላፊ ቢሮ ጥዕና እቲ ክልል ኦማን ኣመሉ (ኤም.ዲ.ኣር) ገሊፁ።

data.eng: Red Crescent Society of the United Arab Emirates (UAE) has provided the Ethiopian Health Ministry with 50 ambulances.
data.aaf: Qarab Inkinoh imaratak (QII/UAE/) Qasa Alsa Ayyunti Itiyyobiyak qafiyat Malaakah 50 Ambolance xayoose.
data.amh: የተባበሩት አረብ ኤመረትስ የቀይ ጨረቃ ማህበር ለኢትየፐፒያ ጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስቴር የ 50 አምቡላንሶች ድጋፍ አደረገ።
data.orm: Hawaasni Addeessaa Diimaa Tokkummaa Emireetota Arabaa (UAE) Ministeera Eegumsa Fayyaa Itiyoopiyaaf ambulaansota 50 dhiyeesse.
data.som: Hay’adda Bisha Cas ee dalka Imaaraadka Carabta ayaa wasaaradda caafimaadka Itoobiya uugu deeqday 50 baabuur oo nooca gurmadka ah.
data.tir: ማሕበር ቀይሕ ወርሒ ኢሜሬት ሕቡራት ዓረብ (ዩ.ኤ.ኢ) ንሚኒስቴር ጥዕና ኢትዮጵያ 50 ኣምቡላንሳት ኣውፊዩ።

data.eng: Some 200,000 residents of Addis Ababa living in extreme poverty are going to be provided with support in the second phase of the food security program which will start tomorrow.
data.aaf: 200,000 Addiss Ababah Magaalah Ayyuntak tu Nabbam Baaac Addat Tn Nameyhaytoh caddoh Maqqidi Kobalisoh Tadeerah Xawoyteeh Beerak Xabahanam Cato Qimbimele.
data.amh: በነገው እለት በሚጀመረው ሁለተኛው የምግብ ዋስትና ፕሮግራም 200,000 ለሚሆኑ በአዲስ አበባ ውስጥ በአስከፊ ድህነት ውስጥ ለሚገኙ ነዋሪዎች ድጋፍ ሊደረግላቸው ነው።
data.orm: Jiraattota Addis Ababaa 200,000 ta'an kanneen hiyyummaa garmalee keessa jiraachaa jiraniif marsaa lammaffaa sagantaa nageenya nyaataa kan boor eegalu keessatti deggersi godhamuufi.
data.som: Ilaa 200,000 oo qof oo ku nool magaalada Addis Ababa ee ku nool faqriga daran ayaa lagu wadaa in lagu taageero qaybta labaad ee barnaamijka sugitaanka cuntada kaas oo berri bilaaban doona.
data.tir: ካብ’ቲ ፅባሕ ዝጅምር ካልኣይ ዙሪያ መደብ ውሕስነት ምግቢ 200,000 ዝኾኑ ኣብ ሕሱም ድኽነት ዝነብሩ ነበርቲ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ሓገዝ ክርኽቡ እዮም።

data.eng: In his media briefing today, Mayor Diriba Kuma said 200,000 citizens in 55 woredas of Addis Ababa will benefit from the program.
data.aaf: Usuk Mangafah Elle Qadosenal Talqo, Magaala Xinnsoh Saqal (Mayor)xeriba Luma Iyeh 200,000 Ayyuntak Addiss Ababal 55 Daqqorti Ta Tadeerat Catimelon.
data.amh: ከንቲባ ድሪባ ኩማ ዛሬ በሰጡት የመገናኛ ብዙሃን መግለጫ በአዲስ አበባ 55 ወረዳዎች 200,000 ዜጎች የፕሮግራሙ ተጠቃሚ ይሆናሉ ብለዋል።
data.orm: Ibsa miidiyaaf har'a kenne keessatti, Kantiibaa Dirribaa Kumaa lammiiwwan 200,000 tahan aanaalee 55 Addis Ababaa keessa jiraatan sagantichaa irraa fayyadaman dubbate.
data.som: Duqa magaalada Diriba Kuma oo maanta warfaafinta la hadlay ayaa sheegay in 200,000 oo muwaadiniin ah oo ku nool 55 degmoyin oo Addis Ababa ah ay ka faa’iidaysan doonaan barnaamijkan.
data.tir: ከንቲባ ድሪባ ኩማ ሎሚ ንመራኸቢ ሓፋሽ ኣብ ዝሃቦ መብርሂ ኣብ 55 ወረዳታት ዝነብሩ 200,000 ዜጋታት ካብ’ቲ መደብ ተጠቀምቲ እዮም።

data.eng: Following the outbreak of the fatal Novel Coronavirus – now renamed COVID-19 by the World Health Organization (WHO) – Ethiopian Airlines announced that it has stepped up passenger screening and aircraft disinfection process at the Addis Ababa Bole International Airport.
data.aaf: Katayak Raba Katasa Novel Koronavayris Dalka - Baadak Qafiyat Egla (BQE/WHO/) Kovix-19 Aki migaq Hayte- Itiyyobiyak Qaran Merati Elle Qaddosenal Safara Fokaqak Meysitakay awrobilan Fayanamih Gexsisna Addiss Ababak Baad Tayarah Booxal.
data.amh: በአለም ጤና ድርጅት ኮቪድ-19 ተብሎ የተሰየመው ገዳይ የኮሮና ቫይረስ ወረርሽኝ መከሰቱን ተከትሎ የኢትዮጵያ አየር መንገድ በአዲስ አበባ ቦሌ አለም አቀፍ አውሮፕላን ማረፊያ የመንገደኞችን የማጣሪያ እና የአውሮፕላን ብክለትን የመከላከል ስራ መጀመሩን አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Weerara hamaa Koronaa Vaayirasii Haaraa - yeroo amma COVID-19 jedhamuun Dhaabbata Fayyaa Addunyaan (WHO) irra deebiin mogga'e - hordofuun Daandiin Qilleensaa Itoopiyaa calallii imaltootaa fi adeemsa xiyyaara irra jarmii dhabamsiisuu Buufata Xiyyaaraa Addunyaalessaa Addis Ababaa Booleetti akka olguddise beeksise.
data.som: Ka dib markii uu dillaacay cudurka dilaaga ah ee Novel Coronavirus oo hadda loo beddelay COVID-19 Hay'adda Caafimaadka Adduunka (WHO) Ethiopian Airlines ayaa ku dhawaaqday inay kordhisay baaritaanka rakaabka iyo habka jeermiska dila ee diyaaradaha ee Gegida Caalamiga ah ee Addis Ababa Bole.
data.tir: ንምግፋሕ እቲ ቀታሊ ዝኾነ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ማለት እቲ ብውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ኮቪድ፡19 ተባሂሉ ሕዚ ዝተሰየመ ምኽንያት ብምግባር መንገዲ ኣየር ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ መንገደኛታት ናይ ምፅራይ ኣብ ውሽጢ ኣውሮፕላን ድማ ፀረ ረኽሲ ናይ ምንፃግ ስራሕቲ ከምዝጀመረ ዕላዊ ገይሩ።

data.eng: Officials of Ethiopian Airlines and Ethiopian Airports organized a tour for the local media on Thursday.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyak Qaran Meraytu kee Itiyyobiyak Tayaraboxakamesih Wacaysir Bicise Adda mangafiteh.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ አየር መንገድ እና የኢትዮጵያ ኤርፖርት የስራ ኃላፊዎች የሀገር ውስጥ መገናኛ ብዙሃንን አስጎብኝተዋል።
data.orm: Aangawonni Daandii Qilleensaa Itoopiyaa fi Buufata Xiyaaraa Itoopiyaa gaafa Kamisaatti daawwii miidiyaa naannoo qindeessan.
data.som: Masuuliyiinta Shirkadda Diyaaradaha ee Ethiopian Airlines iyo Garoomada Diyaaradaha ee Itoobiya ayaa maanta oo Khamiis ah soo qaban qaabiyay socdaal ay ku soo mareen warfaafinta dalka.
data.tir: ሰበ ስልጣን መንገዲ ኣየር ኢትዮጵያን መዕረፎ ነፈርቲ ኢትዮጵያን ብሓሙስ ንጋዜጠኛታት ዉሽጢ ዓዲ መደብ ዑደት ኣዳሊዎም።

data.eng: According to a letter issued by Tsigereda Kifle, deputy director of EPHI, HIV Kits including First Response HIV 1-2.0, Uni-Gold HIV, VIKIA HIV-1/2, Beijing Wanta HIV-1/2 are said to be under evaluation.
data.aaf: SigerexaKifle Bicise Ayuftal, EBHI(EPHI), HIV nammayhayto Saqal Kits edde Anuk Qimbo Raddi Gacsa HIV 1-2.o, Uni Dahab HIV, VIKIR HIV-1/2, Bejingi Wantah HIV-1/2 Agaradisit tan Iye.
data.amh: የኢ.ፒ.አይ. ምክትል ዳይሬክተር ወ/ሮ ፅጌረዳ ክፍሌ በጻፉት ደብዳቤ መሰረት የኤችአይቪ ኪትስ የመጀመሪያ ምላሽ ኤችአይቪ 1-2.0፣ ዩኒ-ጎልድ ኤችአይቪ፣ ቪኪኤ ኤችአይቪ-1/2፣ ቤጂንግ ዋንታ ኤችአይቪ-1/2 በግምገማ ላይ ናቸው ተብሏል።
data.orm: Akka xalayaa Tsigeredaa Kifilee, itti aantuu daarikteeraa EPHI tiin qophaa'eetti, Deebii Jalqabaa HIV 1-2.0, Yuuni-Goold HIV, VIKIA HIV-1/2, Beejing Waantaa HIV-1/2 dabalatee Meeshaaleen HIV qorannoo jala akka jiran hiamame.
data.som: Sida lagu cadeeyey warqada aay soo saarray Tsigereda Kifle, agaasime ku xigeenka EPHI, Qalabka HIV oo ay ku jiraan Jawaabta Koowaad ee HIV 1-2.0, Uni-Gold HIV, VIKIA HIV-1/2, Beijing Wanta HIV-1/2 ayaa la sheegay in lagu qiimaynayo.
data.tir: ምኽትል ኣካያዲ ስራሕ ኢንስቲትዩት ጥዕና ማሕበረሰብ ኢትዮጵያ ፅጌሬዳ ክፍሌ ዝፃሓፈቶ ደብዳቤ ከምዘመልከቶ ናይ ኤች ኣይ ቪ ኪታት (መመርመሪታትን) ቀዳማይ ምላሽ ኤች ኣይ ቪ 1-2.0፣ ዩኒ ጎልድ ኤች ኣይቪ-1/2፣ ቤጂንግ፡ ዋንታ፡ ኤች ኣይ -1/2 ፅሬቶም እናተገምገመ እዩ።

data.eng: Beijing Wanti was registered by the Food, Medicine, Healthcare Administration and Control Authority on July 5, 2016 representing by a local company called GeZ Chemicals and Pharmaceutical PLC.
data.aaf: BejingiWanti elle Tonkutubem Maqqiday, Diway Qafiyat Dacayrih Xinnisoy Kee Lowsis Miraac Ditelik 5, 2016 Adda Kambaniteh Xayosa GeZ kemikalite kee Farmatikal NAC(PLC)
data.amh: ቤጂንግ ዋንታይ በምግብ፣ መድኃኒት፣ የጤና እንክብካቤ አስተዳደር ግዝ ኬሚካል እና መድሃኒትበተባለ አገር በቀል ኩባንያን በመወከል በጁላይ 5, 2016 ሥልጣንን ተቆጣጠሮአል።
data.orm: Beejing Wanti'n Abbaa Taayitaa Bulchiinsaa fi To'annoo Nyaataa, Qorichaa, Eegumsa Fayyaan gaafa Adoolessa 5, 2016 kampaanii naannoo PLC Keemikaalotaa fi Pharmasitikaalii GeZ jedhamuun bakka buufamee galmaa'e.
data.som: Beijing Wanti ayaa ka diiwaan gashan Maamulka Cuntada, Daawada, Maamulka Daryeelka Caafimaadka iyo Maamulka Xakamaynta July 5, 2016 oo ay matasho shirkad maxalli ah oo lagu magacaabo GeZ Chemicals and Pharmaceutical PLC.
data.tir: ቤጂንግ ዋንቲ ኩባንያ ገዝ ኬሚካላትን ፋርማቲካልን ብዝተብሃለ ናይ ዓዲ ውሽጢ ውልቀ ትካል ተወኪሉ ብሓምለ 5/2016 ዓ.ም.ፈ ብብዓል መዚ ምግቢ፣ መድሓኒት፣ ምምሕዳር ሓለዋ ጥዕናን ቁፅፅርን ተመዝጊቡ እዩ።

data.eng: The United States Agency for International Development (USAID), the development arm of America’s Department of State has completed its seven-year-long strengthening of Human Resources for Healthcare projects in Ethiopia.
data.aaf: Amerikak Baad Daddosih Ajenci (ABDA/USAID/) Amerikah Exak Qaskar Daddos Itiyyobiyal malcina Sanatih gidde Sahdayti Gaddak Qafiyat Dacayrih Maqarossanamih Cugayso Kabakalteh.
data.amh: የአሜሪካ የውጭ ጉዳይ ሚኒስቴር የልማት ክፍል የሆነው የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ዓለም አቀፍ ልማት ኤጀንሲ (ዩኤስኤአይዲ) በኢትዮጵያ ለሰባት ዓመታት የፈጀውን የሰው ኃይል ለጤና አጠባበቅ ፕሮጄክቶችን አጠናቋል።
data.orm: Ejensiin Guddina Addunyaa Yunaayitid Isteetis (USAID), dameen guddinaa Ministeera Haajaa Alaa Ameerikaa pirojektoota isaa Qabeenya Humna Namaa Eegumsa Fayyaa Itoopiyaa keessaa jabeessuu waggaa torba dheeratu xumure.
data.som: Hay’adda Maraykanka ee Horumarinta Caalamiga ah (USAID), oo ah garabka horumarinta ee Waaxda Arrimaha Dibedda ee Maraykanka ayaa soo gebagebaysay 7sano oo ay ku xoojinaysay mashaariicda daryeelka caafimaadka ee Itoobiya.
data.tir: ኤጄንሲ ዓለምለኸ ልምዓት ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ (ዩ.ኤስ.ኤይድ) ማለት ልምዓታዊ ክንፊ ዝምድናታት ወፃኢ ኣሜሪካ፣ ሰብኣዊ ሃብቲ ሓለዋ ጥዕና ኢትዮጵያ ንምጥንኻር ክካይዶ ዝፀንሐ ናይ ሸውዓተ ዓመት ፕሮጄክት ዛዚሙ።

data.eng: The Tewodros Ashenafi Foundation was established by founder and CEO of SouthWest Holdings Ltd.
data.aaf: Texros Ashenafih Fawunxeshion Xiseh bicisem CEO Gabiy Ayrocuma Mabaxenti Ltd.
data.amh: የቴዎድሮስ አሸናፊ ፋውንዴሽን የተመሰረተው በሳውዝ ዌስት ሆልዲንግስ ሊሚትድ መስራች እና ዋና ስራ አስፈፃሚ ነው።
data.orm: Faawundeeshiniin Tewodiros Ashennaafii hundeessaa fi CEO SawuthWeest Hooldingis Ltd dhaan hundeeffame.
data.som: Tewodros Ashenafi Foundation waxaa aasaasay aasaasaha iyo maareeyaha guud ee SouthWest Holdings Ltd.
data.tir: ፋውንዴሽን ቴድሮስ አሸናፊ ብመስራቲን ዋና ኣፈፃሚ ስራሕን ውልቀ ኩባንያ ሳውዝ ዌስት ሆልዲንግስ ዝተጣየሸ እዩ።

data.eng: The Reproductive Health Innovative Fund (RIF) project founded and being implemented by the Ethiopian Public Health Institute, is attaining encouraging fruits in various ways.
data.aaf: Asdoriyyi Qafiyatih Asqasabeh Fenxi (AAF/ RIF/) Cugayso Geytimtem kee Itiyyobiyak Qafiyat Istitut Abinosa, Mango katite kah Madisanah Aydukumusam Kini.
data.amh: በኢትዮጵያ የህብረተሰብ ጤና ኢንስቲትዩት የተመሰረተውና እየተገበረ ያለው የስነ ተዋልዶ ጤና ፈጠራ ፈንድ (RIF) ፕሮጀክት በተለያዩ መንገዶች አበረታች ፍሬዎችን እያገኘ ነው።
data.orm: Pirojektiin Fandii Kalaqa Fayyaa Walhormaataa (RIF) kan Inititiyuutii Fayyaa Hawaasaa Itoopiyaan hundeeffameef ittiin geggeeffamu, karaalee adda addaan bu'aalee nama jajjabeessuu argataa jira.
data.som: Mashruuca maalgalinta Hal abuurka Caafimaadka Taranka (RIF) oo uu aasaasay oo uu fulinayo Machadka Caafimaadka Dadweynaha ee Itoobiya, ayaa siyaabo kala duwan u helay midho dhiirigelinaya.
data.tir: እቲ ብኢኖቨቲቭ ፈንድ ጥዕና ስነተዋልዶ (ኣር፡ኣይ፡ኤፍ) ዝሕገዝን ብኣካያዲ ስራሕ እቲ ፕሮጄክት ብኣጥሌ ባህሩ እዩ ተመስሪቱ።

data.eng: The Ethiopian Women’s U-20 national team is set take part in the CECAFA Senior Challenge Cup hosted by Uganda.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyah Sayyo G-20 Agat Dokon Abeh yan CECAFAh Naharsi Gexekaliteh kub Uganxlih Gexsiise.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ሴቶች ከ20 አመት በታች ብሄራዊ ቡድን በኡጋንዳ አስተናጋጅነት በሚካሄደው የሴካፋ ከፍተኛ ውድድር ላይ ሊሳተፍ ነው።
data.orm: Gareen biyyoolessaa dhalaa umurii 20 gadii Itoophiyaa dorgommii waancaa buleeyyii CECAFA Yugaandaadhaan qophaa'e irratti ni hirmaata.
data.som: "Xulka qaranka haweenka Itoobiya ee 20 jirada ayaa lagu wadaa inay ka qaybg qaataan koobka CECAFA Koobka Tartanka Sare oo lagu qabanayo Uganda."
data.tir: ዕድመአን ትሕቲ 20 ናይ ዝኾና ደቂ ኣንስትዮ ሃገራዊት ጋንታ ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ዩጋንዳ ንፅዋዕ መን ወሰደ ኣብ ዝካየድ ግጥም ኩዕሶ እግሪ ሴካፋ ክትሳተፍ እያ።

data.eng: Ethiopia, Burundi, Eritrea, Djibouti, Tanzania and Uganda have been preparing for the tournament, which will take place from October 30 to November 9, 2021.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyay, Burunxiy, Ertriyay, Gabutiy, Tanzaniya kee Uganxa Qalaylih Biceenih yanin, qunxagarabluk 30 illa naharsikudok 9, 2021 fanah Gexsituwal.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ፣ ብሩንዲ፣ ኤርትራ፣ ጅቡቲ፣ ታንዛኒያ እና ዩጋንዳ ከጥቅምት 30 እስከ ህዳር 9 ቀን 2021 ለሚካሄደው ውድድር ዝግጅት ሲያደርጉ ቆይተዋል።
data.orm: Itoophiyaa, Burundii, Ertiraa, Jibuutii,Taanzaaniya fi Yugaandaan dorgaa dorgee Onkoloolessa 30 hanga Sadaasa 9,2021tti raawwatuuf qophii gochaa turaniiru.
data.som: Dalalka Ethiopia, Burundi, Eritrea, Djibouti, Tanzania iyo Uganda ayaa si weyn isugu diyaarinayay tartankan oo socon doona inta u dhaxaysa 30 ka bisha October ilaa 9 ka November 2021 ka.

data.eng: The well experienced Yalemzerf is the first woman in history to run a half marathon in under 65 minutes.
data.aaf: Yayseh yan Abak Raag Yalemzerf Qaxi Marathonih Ardal 65 minitih Addal culte Qimboh Aydaadul Saynum kini.

data.orm: Muxannoo ga'aa kan qabdu Yaalemzarf dubartii jalqabaa seenaa keessatti ywalakkaa maaraatoonii daqiiqaa 65 gaditti fiigdeedha.
data.som: Yalemzerf oo khibrad fiican leh waa haweeneydii ugu horreysay taariikhda ee ku orda maaratoon nuskii wax ka yar 65 daqiiqo.
data.tir: እታ ኣዝያ ምኩርቲ ዝኾነት ያለም ዘርፍ ኣብ ታሪኽ ንፍርቂ ማራቶን ኣብ ትሕቲ 65 ደቒቓ ዝወደአት ፈላመይቲ ጓል ኣንስተይቲ ኮይና ኣላ።

data.eng: She ran the Northern Ireland’s Antrim Coast Half Marathon in 63: 43 at the end of August, and has been representing Ethiopia in various continental races particularly, half marathon races.

data.amh: የሰሜን አየርላንድ አንትሪም ኮስት የግማሽ ማራቶንን በነሀሴ መጨረሻ በ63፡43 የሮጠች ሲሆን በተለያዩ አህጉራዊ ውድድሮች በተለይም በግማሽ ማራቶን ውድድር ኢትዮጵያን ወክላለች።

data.som: Waxay ku orday Waqooyiga Ireland ee Antrim Coast nus Marathon 63: 43 dhamaadkii Ogosto, waxayna Itoobiya u tartantay tartano qaaradeed oo kala duwan gaar ahaan, orodka marathon nus ka.

data.amh: ይህ በእንዲህ እንዳለ ባለሥልጣናቱ የህክምና እና የአካል ፈተናዎች በተጨማሪ የቲዎሪ እና የተግባር ስልጠናዎችን ልምድ ባላቸው በካፍ መምህራን ቁጥጥር ስር ያደርጋሉ።
data.orm: Osoo kanaan jiru, aanga'oonni qoorannoo fayyaa fi qaamaa yeroo barnootaa yaadaa fi hojiin deeggarame kan lenjistoota CAF muxannoo qabaniin qajeelfamutti dabalee ni geggeessu.
data.som: Dhanka kale, mas'uuliyiinta ayaa mari doona baaritaanno caafimaad iyo kuwo jidheed ka sokow fadhiyada aragtiyeed iyo kuwa la taaban karo iyadoo ay kormeerayaan macalimiin khibrad leh oo CAF ah.
data.tir: እቶም ሓለፍቲ ምኩራት ኣሰልጠንቲ ካፍ ኣብ ዝመርሕዎ ክልሰ ሓሳባዊን ተግባራዊን ስልጠና ዝሳተፉ ኣብ ርእሲ ምኳኖም ጥዕናዊን ኣካላዊን ምርመራ ብቕዓት ክግበረሎም እዩ።

data.eng: According to CAF’s statement, to be discussed are the amendments to the law of the game, which takes effect starting from June 1, 2019 and will be implemented during the tournament.
data.aaf: CAF Elle Baxaqisenal, Addah Yan Digiril Misos Abaanamal walaleenih, illa Waysuk 1,2019 fanak kah Qimbimana kee Qalayli Udur Abinowetele.
data.amh: እንደ ካፍ መግለጫ ለውይይት የሚቀርበው የጨዋታው ህግ ማሻሻያዎች ናቸው፣ ይህም ተግባራዊ የሚሆነው ከጁን 1 ቀን 2019 ጀምሮ ሲሆን በውድድሩ ወቅትም ተግባራዊ ይሆናሉ።
data.orm: Akka hima CAF'tti, wantootni irratti mari'ataman foyya'iinsa seera taphaa kan Waxabajjii 1, 2019 irraa ka'ee dhiibbaa uumuu eegaluu fi yeroo dorgaa dorgeetti hojirra ooluuti.
data.som: Sida laga soo xigteeyeye war bixin kasoo baxay CAF, ayaa lagaga hadli doonaa wax ka bedelka sharciga ciyaarta, kaasoo dhaqan galaya laga bilaabo June 1, 2019, waxaana la dhaqan gelin doonaa inta uu socdo tartanku.
data.tir: ከም መግለፂ ካፍ ኣብቲ ስልጠና ምይይጥ ዝግበረሎም ዛዕባ እቲ ካብ ባሕቲ ሰነ 2019 ዓ.ም.ፈ ኣትሒዙ ተግባራዊ ዝኸውንን ኣብቲ ግጥም ኣብ ስራሕ ዝውዕልን ዝተመሓ የሸ ሕጊ ፀዋታ ብዝምልከት እዩ።

data.eng: Elsewhere, Ethiopian cup winner Defense is set to face the Nigerian side Enugu Rangers in the preliminary return leg fixture on Wednesday in Addis Ababa stadium.
data.aaf: Aki aracal,Itiyyobiya Kubal yeyse Kalale dafeseh Focal Niyjeriyale kattuk Enugu Rangers Qimbo Mandabah Liigil Ugutma Arbaqah Addiss Ababa koqosoh Booxal Akkele.
data.amh: በሌላ መዳረሻ የኢትዮጵያ ዋንጫ አሸናፊ መከላከያ ከናይጄሪያው ኢኑጉ ሬንጀርስ ጋር በደርሶ መልስ ጨዋታ የፊታችን እሮብ በአዲስ አበባ ስታዲየም ይገጥማል።
data.orm: Gama biraatin tapha deebiitiin mo'aan geepha Itoophiyaa Ittisni garee Inuuguu Reenjers Naayijeeriyaa Roobii istaadiyoomii Finfinneetti ni quunnama.
data.som: dhanka kale, kooxda difaacanaysa koobka itobiya ayaa lagu wadaa inay wajahdo kooxda Nigeria ee Enugu Rangers kulanka lugta labaad ee horudhaca ah Arbacada garoonka Addis Ababa.
data.tir: እቲ ተዓዋቲ ፅዋዕ ኢትዮጵያ ዝኾነ ጋንታ ምክልኻል ሃገር ብሮቡዕ ኣብ ስታድዮም ኣዲስ ኣበባ ኣብ ዝካየድ ቀዳማይ ዙሪያ ካልኣይ እግሪ ግጥም ምስ ናይ ናይጄሪያ ጋንታ ኢኑጉ ሬንጄርስ ክፃወት እዩ።

data.eng: After the appointment of a new coach, Seyoum Kebede, the army side seems to be in a good run of form.
data.aaf: Qusba Saqal heniik sara, Seyoum kebexe, Qaskarle katuk fomitek meqenal Yerde.
data.amh: አዲስ አሰልጣኝ ስዩም ከበደ ከተሾሙ በኋላ የሰራዊቱ ቡድን በጥሩ ሁኔታ ላይ ያለ ይመስላል።
data.orm: Muudama leenjisaa Siyyum Kabbadee booda gamni ittisaa haala gaarii waan jiru fakkaata.
data.som: Kadib markii la magacaabay tababaraha cusub ee Seyoum Kebede, dhanka ciidamada ayaa u muuqda mid ku jira qaab ciyaareed wanaagsan.
data.tir: ድሕሪ እቲ ስዩም ከበደ ሓዱሽ ኣሰልጣኒ ኮይኑ ዝተሸመሉ ኩነታት ጋንታ ምክልኻል ኣብ ፅቡቕ ቁመና ከምዘሎ ተገሊፁ።

data.eng: Defense has won its ninth cup in the Ethiopian cup competition. However, the army side were beaten 2-0 in first round via two penalty goals.
data.aaf: Kalali yeyseh Nagla addah kub Itiyyobiyah Kabite Qalylitel, Faxenal, Qaskarle katuk Yasenih 2-0 Qimbo Caddoh Namma Bilantil goolitel.
data.amh: መከላከያ በኢትዮጵያ ዋንጫ ውድድር ዘጠነኛ ዋንጫውን አሸንፏል። ሆኖም ሰራዊቱ በ2-0 በመጀመሪያው ዙር በሁለት የፍፁም ቅጣት ምቶች ተሸንፏል።
data.orm: Gareen Ittisaa geepha salgaffaa dorgommii geepha Itoophiyaa mo'eera. Haa ta'u malee marsaa jalqabaatti gamni Ittisaa goolii dikooree lamaan 2-0 dhaan injifatamee ture.
data.som: Difaaca ayaa ku guuleystay koobkii sagaalaad ee tartanka koobka Itoobiya. Si kastaba ha ahaatee, kooxda ciidanka ayaa lagaga guulaystay 2-0 wareegii koowaad ee ciyaarta iyadoo labo gool ku laad loo dhigay.
data.tir: ኣብ ውድድር ፅዋዕ ኢትዮጵያ ንታሽዓይ ግዜ ፅዋዕ ዝወሰደ ጋንታ ምክልኻል ኣብዚ ግጥም ብኽልተ ፍፁም ቅላዕ 2ን 0 ተሳዒሩ እዩ።

data.eng: The Ethiopian Athletics Federation (EAF) is scheduled to celebrate the ‘global running day’ with a one-mile race on Wednesday, June 6, 2018.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyak Ardi Fexeresion (IAF/EAF/) Tadeera Yibixeh 'Qaran Gubak Ardi Ayroh Massakaxxa' Inki mayilih Caddol Arbaqah, wasuk 6, 2018.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ አትሌቲክስ ፌዴሬሽን ‘ዓለም አቀፋዊ የሩጫ ቀን’ን በአንድ ማይል ውድድር ሊያከብረው ረቡዕ ሰኔ 6 ቀን 2018 ቀጠሮ ይዟል።
data.orm: Federeeshiniin Atileetiksii Itoophiyaa (EAF) 'guyyaa figicha adunyaa' dorgommii maayila tokkootin kabajuuf Roobii, Waxabajjii 6, 2018 beellameera.
data.som: Xidhiidhka Ciyaaraha Fudud ee Itoobiya oo u dabaaldagaya maalinta Orodka Caalamiga ah ee orodka hal mayl maalinta Arbacada, June 6, 2010.
data.tir: ፌዴሬሽን ኣትሌቲክስ ኢትዮጵያ ንመዓልቲ ጉያ ዓለም ብሮቡዕ 6 ሰነ 2018ዓ.ም.ፈ ብዝካየድ ናይ ሓደ ማይል ውድድር ጉያ ከኽብሮ ተሊሙ ኣሎ።

data.eng: Elite athletes will take part in the race which covers a distance of 1.6kms.
data.aaf: Tuyaxigi Arda Abe Abele Caddoh Addal 1.6mk Takkem xexarah.
data.amh: ታዋቂ አትሌቶች 1.6 ኪሎ ሜትር ርቀት በሚሸፍነው ውድድር ይሳተፋሉ።
data.orm: Atileetonni beekamoon dorgommii fageenya 1.6km haammatu irratti ni hirmaatu.
data.som: Ciyaartoyda caanka ah ayaa ka qayb qaadan doona tartankan oo gaaraya masaafo dhan 1.6km.
data.tir: ምስዚ ሓቢሩ 1.6 ኪሎ ሜትሮ ርሕቐት ዝሽፍን ውድድር ጉያ ምሩፃት ኣትሌታት ክካየድ እዩ።

data.eng: Partnering with sport ministers, city governments, race organizers and member federations around the world, the IAAF’s initiative incorporates the race to be held in a dozen cities across 15-time zones.
data.aaf: Dagar Diig Malaakitey, Magaala Miraciinuy, Qalaysi Bicisa kee Baadal Fexeresion Adotitiluk Catimak, IAAF Ugugusa sitalik gacak ta digir 15 waqlah Rasitek Xozen Magaalah Gambil Akkele.
data.amh: በዓለም ዙሪያ ካሉ የስፖርት ሚኒስትሮች፣ የከተማ መስተዳድሮች፣ የውድድር አዘጋጆች እና አባል ፌዴሬሽኖች ጋር በመተባበር የአይኤኤኤፍ ኢኒሼቲቭ ሚያካትተው ውድድር በ15 ጊዜ ዞኖች ውስጥ በደርዘን ከተሞች ይካሄዳል።
data.orm: Ministeera ispoortii, bulchiinsota magaalaa, qindeessitoota dorgommii fi minseensota federeshinii guutuu adunyaa waliin michoomuun, dhaabbatni IAAF dorgommichi magaalota kudha lama zoonii yeroo 15 keessatti akka geggeffamu qindeesseera.
data.som: Iyadoo lala shaqaynayo wasaradaha ciyaaraha, dawladaha hoose, qabanqaabiyayaasha tartanada iyo xidhiidhada xubnaha ka ah aduunka oo dhan, hindisaha IAAF waxa ka mid ah tartanka lagu qabanayo dhawr iyo toban magaalo oo ku yaala 15 wakhti.
data.tir: ሚኒስቴራት ስፖርት፣ ኣመሓደርቲ ከተማታት፣ ኣሰናዳእቲ ውድድራትን ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ዝርከቡ ኣባላት ፌዴሬሽናትን ብዝገብርዎ ምትሕብባር እቲ ተበግሶ ማሕበር ዓለምለኸ ፌዴሬሽን ኣትሌቲክስ ዝኾነ ውድድር ጉያ ኣብ ኩለን 15 ክፋላት ሰዓት ኣብ ዝርከባ ደርዘን ከተማታት ክካየድ እዩ።

data.eng: Officials of the Ethiopian Football Federation (EFF) announced that Ethiopia has not made any formal bid to host the 2018 African Nations Championships (CHAN) after the Confederation of African Football (CAF) made a decision to strip the hosting duties from Kenya.
data.aaf: Itiyyoboyak Ibi koqsoh Fexeresion (IIF/EFF/ Elle Yiysixigenal Itiyyobiya Waliqaynatih gital Anakar Mabina 2018 Afrikah Agtiteh Shambiyonshibite Gexsisuh (AAS/CHAN/) Ibi Koqosoh Konfexeresion (IKK/CAF/) Lakal Abenih Magaqa Kah Obanah Bicisiyi Dirki Kiniyak.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ እግር ኳስ ፌዴሬሽን ባለስልጣናት የአፍሪካ እግር ኳስ ኮንፌዴሬሽን (ካፍ) የአስተናጋጅነት እድል ከኬንያ እንዲነጠቅ ከተወሰነ በኋላ ኢትዮጵያ የ2018ቱን የአፍሪካ ሀገራት ሻምፒዮና (ቻን) ለማዘጋጀት ምንም አይነት መደበኛ ጥያቄ እንዳላቀረበች አስታወቁ።
data.orm: Aanga'oonni Federeeshinii Kubbaa Miilaa Itoophiyaa(FKI) akka Itoophiyaan erga Konfedireeshiniin Kubbaa Miilaa Afiriikaa(KKA) ga'ee qopheessuu Keeniyaa irra fuudheen booda gaaffii seera qabeessa Shaampiyoonshippi Biyyoota Afirikaa(SBA) 2018 qopheessuuf hin goone beeksisaniiru.
data.som: Masuuliyiinta xidhiidhka kubbada cagta Itoobiya ayaa shaaca ka qaaday in aanay Itoobiya wax dalab ah oo rasmi ah ka keenin marti gelinta tartanka qaramada Afrika ee CHAN 2018 ka dib markii xidhiidhka kubbada cagta Afrika ee CAF ay go’aan ku gaadheen in ay Kenya ka xayuubiyaan martigelinta ciyaaraha.
data.tir: ሓለፍቲ ፌዴሬሽን ኩዕሶ እግሪ ኢትዮጵያ ነቲ ኣብ 2018 ዓ .ም.ፈ ዝካየድ ሻምፕዮን ሃገራት ኣፍሪካ (ቻን) ንምትእንጋድ ዘኽእል ስሩዕ ሕቶ ብወገን ኢትዮጵያ ከምዘይቐረበ ዝገለፁ እንትኾን ኮንፌዴሬሽን ኩዕሶ እግሪ ኣፍሪካ ነቲ ናይ ምትእንጋድ ሓላፍነት ካብ ኬንያ ከምዝወሰዶ እውን ዝፍለጥ እዩ።

data.eng: CAF announced that three countries – Ethiopia, Equatorial Guinea and Morocco – have requested to replace Kenya as host countries.
data.aaf: CAF Elle Baxaqisenal, Sidiica Baxooxa-Itiyyobiyay, Ikuatoriyal guinea kee Moroco Esserenih Kiniyah Arac kah Cigilan inah Bicisa Baxooxak.
data.amh: ካፍ ሶስት ሀገራት ማለትም ኢትዮጵያ፣ ኢኳቶሪያል ጊኒ እና ሞሮኮ - ኬንያን በአስተናጋጅነት ለመተካት ጥያቄ ማቅረባቸውን አስታውቋል።
data.orm: CAF biyyoonni sadii - Itoophiyaa, Ekuwaatoriyaal Giinii fi Moorookoon - keeniyaa akka biyya qopheesitootti bakka bu'uuf gaafachuu isaani beeksise.
data.som: CAF ayaa ku dhawaaqday in saddex waddan oo kala ah Ethiopia, Equatorial Guinea iyo Morocco – ay codsadeen in lagu badalo Kenya si ay unoqdaan wadamada marti galinaya.
data.tir: ካፍ ሰለስተ ሃገራት ማለት እውን ኢትዮጵያ፣ ኢኳቴሪያል ጊኒን ሞሮኮን ንኣታኣናጋዲት ኬንያ ክትክኣ ሕቶ ከምዘቕረባ ዕላዊ ገይሩ እዩ።

data.eng: Kenenissa, who is double Olympic gold medalist, will return to the championship by competing in the marathon after two years of injury.
data.aaf: Kenenissa, Sitalakleh Olombik Dahab Laqo beye kini. Tohuk Adaruk Shambiyoshibih Marathonuh Qalalak Namma Sanatih Biyakaakwadiril.

data.eng: ano Band — a pioneering Ethio-Rock Fusion Band famed for blending melodic Ethiopian styles with powerful metal grooves, heavy guitars, and electronic sounds since 2011, has inaugurated its new recording studio.
data.aaf: Noh Dokla- 2011 L.L. Qimbisak Itiyyobiyah Lacniteta Caylale Birital, Naba Kitarwa kee elektronikis Xongolola qokolsimak Yamixige yan Itiyyo-Rok agleh tan Dolali Xiqsita Qusba quliya istaxiyol Dooqaysen.
data.amh: አኖ ባንድ — ከ2011 ጀምሮ የኢትዮጵያ ዜማ ስልቶችን ከሜታል ግሩቭ፣ ሄቪ ጊታሮችና ኤሌክትሮኒክ ድምጾች ጋር በማጣመር መሪ የሆነው ኢትዮ-ሮክ ውህድ ባንድ አዲሱን የመቅረጫ ስቱዲዮውን አስመርቋል።
data.orm: Baandiin Jaanoo - Itiyoo-Rook Fiyuujin Baandii'n bara 2011 irraa kaasee gosoota muuziqaa Itoopiyaa sagalee sibiliilaa, gitaara jabaa, fi sagaleewwan elektiroonawaa wajjin walitti makuun kan jajamu, istuudiyoo waraabbii isaa haaraa eebbisisiise.
data.som: ano Band — hormuud u ah kooxda Ethio-Rock Fusion Band oo caan ku ah isu dabaridka qaababka Itobiya ee leh biro xoog badan, kaman culus, iyo dhawaqa elektarooniga ah ilaa 2011, ayaa furtay istuudiyaha cusub ee duubista.

data.eng: According to Tenagne Tadesse, Program Assistant at the Institute, the films were selected on the basis of having been released less than 3 years ago, their coverage of social issues and documenting African realities, as well as the awards they had won and acclaim they had gained thus far.

data.amh: እንደ ኢንስቲትዩቱ ፕሮግራም ረዳት ተናኜ ታደሰ ከሆነ ፊልሞቹ የተመረጡት ከ3 ዓመት ባልበለጠ ጊዜ ውስጥ በመወጣታቸው፣ በማህበራዊ ጉዳዮች ላይ ያላቸውን ሽፋን እና የአፍሪካን እውነታዎች በመመዝገብ እንዲሁም እስካሁን ያገኙትን ሽልማትና አድናቆት መሰረት በማድረግ ነው።

data.eng: Oje Ken Ollivierre, the Jamaican reggae star widely known as Protoje is set to rock Addis on July 29th at Laphto Mall.

data.som: Bandhig sawireed cinwaankiisu yahay: "Peregrinate" ayaa lagu soo bandhigi doonaa May 19 Maxfadka Farshaxanka Casriga ah ee xarunta Gebrekirstos Desta .

data.som: Wasaaradda ganacsiga iyo warshadaha ayaa shaaca ka qaaday in 42.75 milyan oo doolar laga helay dhoofinta alaabaha la warshadeeyay rubuc sanad maaliyadeedka Itoobiya.

data.eng: As the leading air cargo service provider in Africa, Ethiopian Airlines, coupled with the competitive geo-strategic advantage Djibouti has, this project, when fully operational, will double the cargo operation of the Airlines and make Djibouti a hub for sea-Air cargo logistics.

data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ አየር መንገድ በአፍሪካ ቀዳሚ የአየር ጭነት አገልግሎት አቅራቢ እንደመሆኑ መጠን ጅቡቲ ካላት ተወዳዳሪ የጂኦ-ስትራቴጂክ ጠቀሜታ ጋር ተዳምሮ ይህ ፕሮጀክት ሙሉ በሙሉ ወደ ስራ ሲገባ የአየር መንገዱን የጭነት አገልግሎት በእጥፍ ያሳድገዋል እና ጅቡቲን የባህር አየር ጭነት ሎጂስቲክስ ማዕከል ያደርገዋል።
data.orm: Akka dursaa dhiyyeessa daandii qilleensaa fee'umsaa Afiriikaatti, Daandiin Qilleensaa Itoophiyaa, faayidaa dorgamaa tarsiimoo-teessumaa Jibuutiin qabdu waliin michoomeera, pirojektiin kun yeroo dhumutti, hojii fee'umsaa daandii qilleensichaa dachaan ni dabala akkasumas giddugala fee'umsaa galaanaa-qilleensaa Jibuutii ni godha.
data.som: Shirkadda Ethiopian Airlines oo ah hormuudka bixisa adeegga xamuulka hawada ee Afrika, oo ay weheliso faa'iidada xeelada qaab dhuleed ee ay Djibouti leedahay, mashruucani, marka uu si buuxa u shaqeeyo, waxa uu laba jibaari doonaa hawlaha xamuulka ee diyaaradda, waxaanu Djibouti ka dhigi doonaa xudunta saadka hawada ee badda.

data.amh: የባህር እና የአየር ካርጎ ጭነት ፕሮጀክት ከባህር ጭነት በሁለት እጥፍ ፈጣን እና ከአ ጭነት በእጥፍ ርካሽ የሆነው የሁለቱን ሀገራት እና የሁለቱን አህጉራት የንግድ ግንኙነቶችን በከፍተኛ ሁኔታ ይጨምራል ። አፍሪካ እና እስያ; በተለይም ቻይና።
data.orm: Pirojektiin fe'umsaa galaanaa-qilleensaa kan galaana qofaa irra dachaan saffisu fi kan qilleensa qofaa irra dachaan bushaa'u hanga olaanaa ta'en walitti dhufeenya daldalaa biyyoota lamaan gidduu akkasumas ardiilee lamaan Afirikaa fi Eshiyaa keessumaa Chaayinaa gidduu ol guddisa.
data.som: Mashruuca xamuulka badda-Air oo laban laab ka dheereeya badda oo keliya, laba jibaarna ka jaban kan Hawada oo keliya gaadiidka ayaa si weyn kor ugu qaadi doona xiriirka ganacsi ee labada dal iyo sidoo kale labada qaaradood; Afrika iyo Aasiya; gaar ahaan Shiinaha.
data.tir: ፕሮጀክት ካርጎ ባሕርን ኣየርን ካብቲ ብባሕሪ ጥራሕ ዝግበር ምንቅስቓስ ክልተ ዕፅፊ ዝሰልጥን ካብ ናይ ኣየር ጥራሕ ድማ ክልተ ዕፅፊ ዝሓስርን ስለዝዀነ ርክብ ንግዲ ክልቲአን ሃገራት አዕርዩ ክዓብይን ኣብ ሞንጎ ክልቲአን ክፍላተ ዓለም ብፍላይ ድማ ምስ ቻይና ዘሎ ዝምድና ክጠናኸር ዝገብር እዩ።

data.eng: The U.S. Agency for International Development (USAID) and Awash Bank have announced a new partnership that will make up to $6.4 million in financing available to microfinance institutions and small- and medium-sized agricultural businesses in Ethiopia.
data.aaf: Amerikak Baad Caddoh Daddosih Ejensi (USAID) kee Awash Banki Elle Tiysixigenal Qusubih Sitaluk Catimak $6.4 Miyoonih Xolaar Maliya Miykirofinansih Institutionwa kee Qunxah Fanti-Caddoh Buqreaba Tellemoh Itiyyobiyal kah takkenah Aben.
data.amh: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ዓለም አቀፍ ልማት ኤጀንሲ (ዩኤስኤአይዲ) እና አዋሽ ባንክ አዲስ አጋርነታቸውን አስታውቀዋል በኢትዮጵያ ላሉ የማይክሮ ፋይናንስ ተቋማት እና አነስተኛ እና መካከለኛ የግብርና ቢዝነሶች እስከ 6.4 ሚሊዮን ዶላር የሚደርስ ፋይናንስ ድጋፍም አዘጋጅቷል።
data.orm: Ejeensiin Ameerikaa Guddinaa Adunyaatiif(USAID) fi Baankiin Awaash michummaa haaraa hanga dolaara miliyoona 6.4 ga'u dhiyeessu kan dhaabbilee maayikiroofaayinaansii fi daldaloota qonnaa xiqqaa fi giddu galleessaa Itoophiyaa keessatti argamaniif oolu beeksisan.
data.som: Hay’adda Maraykanka ee Horumarinta Caalamiga ah (USAID) iyo Bangiga Awash ayaa ku dhawaaqay iskaashi cusub oo samayn doona ilaa $6.4 milyan oo maalgelin ah oo loo diyaariyay hay'adaha maaliyadda yar yar iyo ganacsiyada yaryar iyo kuwa dhexdhexaadka ah ee beeraha ee Itoobiya.
data.tir: ትካል ዓለምለኸ ልምዓት ኣሜሪካን ባንኪ ኣዋሽን ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ንዝርከቡ ትካላት ማይክሮ ፋይናንስን ኣናእሽተይን ማእኸለዎትን ዓውድታት ሕርሻን ናይ 6.4 ሚልዮን ልቓሕ ከቕርቡ ዘኽእሎም ሓድሽ ምትሕብባር ዕላዊ ገይሮም።

data.eng: Under a USAID Development Credit Authority (DCA) agreement, this program will expand commercial bank lending into underserved areas and provide the private capital needed to help farmers and businesses intensify production, and support Ethiopia’s efforts to modernize its agricultural sector.
data.aaf: USAIDik Doddos Abuudih Miraacih (DCA) Gubat Sitingey, Ta Tadeera Qambalintam Kabxxa Banki Dafete Duyeyah Arooca Miracisiya kee Canka Gadda Kah Xayosana faxahyan cato Zarqen kee Tellemoma Maqarleh yan Murtil, kee Itiyyobiya Qasri Buqreh sekterih Qokolanama.
data.amh: በዩኤስኤአይዲ ልማት ብድር ባለስልጣን (ዲሲኤ) ስምምነት መሰረት ይህ ፕሮግራም የንግድ ባንኮችን ብድር ወደ ላልተዳረሰባቸው አካባቢዎች በማስፋፋት አርሶ አደሩና ቢዝነሶች ምርቱን እንዲያጠናክሩ ለመርዳት የሚያስፈልገው የግል ካፒታል ያቀርባል እንዲሁም ኢትዮጵያ የግብርናውን ዘርፍ ለማዘመን የምታደርገውን ጥረት ይደግፋል።
data.orm: Walii galtee Abbaa Taayitaa Liqii Misoomaa USAID(DCA) jalatti, sagantaan kun baankiiwwan daldalaa iddoowwan hin qaqabneef liqeessuu fi kaappitaalaa dhuunfaa barbaachisa ta'e qonnaan-bultoota fi daldaloota oomisha guddisuuf gargaaruu fi dhiibbaa Itoophiyaan sektara qonnaa ammayyeessuuf gootu ni gargaara.
data.som: Sida uu dhigayo heshiiska Hay’adda Horumarinta ee USAID (DCA), barnaamijkani waxa uu balaadhin doonaa daymimnta bangiyada ganacsiga ee meelaha isticmaalka yar iyo bixinta raasumaalka gaarka ah ee loo baahan yahay si looga caawiyo beeralayda iyo ganacsiyada xoojinta wax soo saarka, iyo taageerada dadaalka Itoobiya ee lagu casriyeynayo qaybteeda beeraha.
data.tir: ኣብ ትሕቲ ትካል ዓለምለኸ ልምዓት ኣሜሪካ ምስ ዝተጣየሸ ብዓል ስልጣን ልምዓት ልቓሕ ዝተገበረ አዚ ውዕል እዚ መደብ ልቓሕ ባንኪ ንግዲ ኣገልግሎት ናብ ዘይበፅሖም ከባብታት ብምብፃሕ ገባራትን ኣናእሽተይ ኣፍረይትን ኣድላዪ ደገፍ ገንዘብ ረኺቦም ፍርያቶም ከዕብዩ ብኡ ኣቢልካ ድማ ኢትዮጵያ ሕርሻኣ ዘበናዊ ንምግባር እተካይዶ ፃዕሪ ንምድጋፍ ዝዓለመ እዩ።

data.eng: Wang Jun for his part said The Chinese Government would provide the necessary support to Ethiopia’s move towards digitized tax collection and tax administration services.
data.aaf: Wang Jun Issi Aracal iyem Chaynah Doolat Faximtah Tan Qokolite Itiyyobiyah Xayosele Xijitalayzik yan Qisoh Askota kee Qiso Xannisiyih Ayfafal.
data.amh: ዋንግ ጁን በበኩላቸው ኢትዮጵያ ወደ ዲጂታል የታክስ አሰባሰብ እና የታክስ አስተዳደር አገልግሎት ለምታደርገው እንቅስቃሴ የቻይና መንግስት አስፈላጊውን ድጋፍ ያደርጋል ብለዋል።
data.orm: Waan Juun gama isaatiin mootummaan Chaayinaa Itoophiyaa gara gibira sassaabuu fi itti fayyadamaa gibiraa dijitaalaatti deemsisuuf deggarsa barbaachisa ta'e ni godha jedheera.
data.som: Wang Jun ayaa dhankiisa sheegay in dawladda Shiinuhu ay siin doonto taageerada muhiimka ah ee ku aaddan tallaabada Itoobiya ee ku wajahan adeegyada canshuur ururinta digitizedka iyo maamulka canshuuraha.
data.tir: ዋንግ ጁን ብወገኑ ኢትዮጵያ ናብ ዲጂታል ስርዓት ምእካብን ምምሕዳርን እቶት ንምእታው ኣብትገብሮ ፃዕሪ መንግስቲ ቻይና ኣድላዪ ደገፍ ከምዝገብር ገሊፁ።

data.eng: The Ethiopian delegation is on an official visit to China since December, 16.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyah Awlaytinoh Miraacli Cigiltakudok 6, Chaynat Gufne Abe.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ልዑካን ከታህሳስ 16 ጀምሮ በቻይና ይፋዊ የስራ ጉብኝት እያደረገ ነው።
data.orm: Jilli Itoophiyaa Mudde 16 as daawwannaa Chaayinaa ifaa ta'ee irra jira.
data.som: Wafdiga Itoobiya ayaa booqasho rasmi ah ku jooga Shiinaha tan iyo bishii 16kii December.
data.tir: እቲ ጉጅለ ልኡኽ ኢትዮጵያ ካብ 7 ታሕሳስ ጀሚሩ ኣብ ቻይና ወግዓዊ ዑደት እናገበረ እዩ።

data.eng: Shangtex Holding Co. Ltd has signed a lease agreement with the Ethiopian Industrial Parks Development Corporation to invest at Bole Lemmi II Industrial Park.
data.aaf: Shangtex tabixi Co. Ltd Sitingey Firmat Itiyyobiyak Sanaqata Barkih Daddosih Korboresionlih Bole Lemmih Sanaqatah Barkih investimenti takkuwaytamah.
data.amh: ሻንግቴክስ ሆልዲንግ ሊሚትድ በቦሌ ለሚ II ኢንዱስትሪያል ፓርክ ኢንቨስት ለማድረግ ከኢትዮጵያ የኢንዱስትሪ ፓርኮች ልማት ኮርፖሬሽን ጋር የሊዝ ስምምነት ተፈራርሟል።
data.orm: Dhaabbatni Shaangiteks Itti gaafatamumman isaa murtaa'e Korporeeshinii Ijaarsa Paarkiiwwan Industirii Itoophiyaa waliin Paarkii Industirii Boolee Lammii II tti ijaaruuf walii galtee liizii mallatteesse.
data.som: Shangtex Holding Co.Ltd ayaa la saxeexday heshiis kiro ah oo uu la saxeexday Koorboreeshinka Industriiga Itobiya si uu u maal galiyo xerada warshadaha bole lemmi II.
data.tir: ሻንግቴክስ ሆልዲንግ ኩባንያ ኣብ ቦሌ ለሚ 2 ኢንዱስትሪ ፓርክ ኢንቨስት ንምግባር ምስ ኮርፖሬሽን ልምዓት ኢንዱስትሪ ፓርክ ኢትዮጵያ ውዕል ክራይ ተፈራሪሙ።

data.eng: Shangtex is the second largest textile company in China.
data.aaf: Shangtex Kaxxam Nabbah Tan Sariteta Kambani kini Chaynah Addal.
data.amh: ሻንግቴክስ በቻይና ውስጥ ሁለተኛው ትልቁ የጨርቃ ጨርቅ ኩባንያ ነው።
data.orm: Shaangiteks Chaayinaa keessatti dhaabbata huccuu guddinaan lammaffaa dha.
data.som: Shangtex waa shirkadda labaad ee ugu weyn dhinaca dharka ee Shiinaha.
data.tir: ሻንግቴክስ ኣብ ቻይና ብግዝፈቱ ካልኣይ ኩባንያ ዓለባ እዩ።

data.eng: The agreement was signed here by Lelise Neme, CEO of the Corporation and representative of the Chinese company.
data.aaf: Ta sitingey Fermat Takkel Abtem Lelise Neme, CEO Korborrsion saqalay Chaynah Kambaniteh Awlaytuk sugte.
data.amh: ስምምነቱን የፈረሙት የኮርፖሬሽኑ ዋና ስራ አስፈፃሚ እና የቻይና ኩባንያ ተወካይ ሌሊሴ ነሜ ናቸው።
data.orm: Walii galtichi Lalisaa Namee, hoji-geggeessaa Dhaabbatichaa fi bakka dhaabbata Chaayinaa kanaan asitti mallatteefame.
data.som: Heshiiska waxaa halkan u saxiixay Lelise Neme, oo ah madaxa shirkadda iyo wakiilka shirkadda Shiinaha.
data.tir: ንቲ ውዕል ዝፈረሙ ዋና ፈፃሚ ስራሕ እቲ ኮርፖሬሽን ሌሊሴ ነሚን ወካሊ እቲ ኩባንያ ቻይናን እዮም።

data.eng: Ethiopian and Kuwait held discussion on the draft memorandum of understanding (MoU) on the employment of domestic workers.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiya kee Kuwet walal Abte Sitaluk Elle Tamitonuwanamal (MoU) Baaxoh Addah Taaama Abeenitil takuwaytamal.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ አየር መንገድና ኩዌት በቤት ሰራተኞች ቅጥር ላይ የመግባቢያ ሰነድ ረቂቅ ላይ ተወያይተዋል።
data.orm: Itoophiyaa fi Kuweet gumee yaadachiistuu wal hubannaa (MoU) sirna qacarrii hojjeettoota biyya keessaa irratti marii taasisan.
data.som: Dowladaha Itoobiya iyo Kuwait ayaa yeeshay wada hadal ku saabsan qabyo qoraalka heshiiska (MoU) ee ku saabsan shaqaalaysiinta shaqaalaha guryaha.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያን ኩዌይትን ኣቆፃፅራ ከደምቲ ብዝምልከት ኣብዝተዳለወ መረዳድኢ ሰነድ ዘትየን።

data.eng: In the discussion held from 21-22 January 2020 at Sheraton Hotel in Kuwait city, the two sides concluded the negotiations with promising progress.
data.aaf: Ta Walal yekkem 21-22 caxah Alsak 2020 Shareton kalqat Kuwet Magaalak, Mamqal Daddalal Elle faxintanal Tamitelonum Namma katuk Xagana Culen.
data.amh: ከጥር 21 እስከ 22 ቀን 2020 በኩዌት ከተማ ሸራተን ሆቴል በተደረገው ውይይት ሁለቱ ወገኖች ተስፋ ሰጪ እንቅስቃሴ በማድረግ ድርድሩን አጠናቀዋል።
data.orm: Marii Ammajji 21-22 2021 magaalaa Kuweet Hoteela Sharaatanitti ta'etti, gam-lameenu wal galteecha haala abdachiisa ta'en xumuraniiru.
data.som: Wadahadalkii 21-22 Janaayo 2020 ka dhacay Hotel Sheraton ee magaalada Kuwait, labada dhinac waxay ku soo gabagabeeyeen wada xaajoodka horumar rajo leh.
data.tir: ኣብ ኩዌይት ሲቲ ኣብ ሆቴል ሸራተን ካብ 12-13 ጥሪ ኣብዝተኻየደ ዘተ ክልቲኦም ወገናት ሽምግልናኦም ተስፋ ብዝህብ ኣገባብ ዛዚሞም።

data.eng: They also agreed to finalise the remaining issues soon, according to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ethiopia (MFA).
data.aaf: Raqtah Tan Cagiidal Xayi Waktit gaba Kalelonum sitagen, Itiyyobiyak Iroh Caagidah Malaak (IICM/FAE/) Elle Yiysixegenal.
data.amh: ቀሪዎቹን ጉዳዮችም በቅርቡ ለማጠናቀቅ ተስማምተዋል ሲል የኢትዮጵያ ውጭ ጉዳይ ሚኒስቴር (ኤምኤፍኤ) አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Akkasumas dhimmoota hafan dhiyootti akka xumuran walii galaniiru, akka Ministeera Dhimma Alaa Itoophiyaatti (MDA)
data.som: Sidoo kale waxaa la isku afgartay in dhawaan la dhameystiro arrimaha hadhsan sida ay sheegtay Wasaaradda Arrimaha Dibadda Itoobiya (MFA).
data.tir: ሚኒስቴር ዝምድናታት ወፃኢ ኢትዮጵያ ከምዝበሎ ንቶም ዝተረፉ ጉዳያት እውን ብቕልጡፍ ንምፍታሕ ተሰማሚዖም።

data.eng: “Ethiopian is responding to COVID-19 outbreak effectively with extra cargo flights and is shouldering its continental responsibility by shipping masks and testing kits where those supplies are being used in the fight against COVID-19 in Africa,” Tewolde noted.
data.aaf: " Itiyobiyya Osotina Kargo beyak KOVIX-19 Baxcimamak Nagayan Raddi Acayuk Geytimtam kee Sunku Gaysesa Dirki kini Maskite Qaranah Beytam kee Fokaqtah Tanimi Ta Xayoosanah yanin Uwatite Edde yintifiqenim kee Afrikal Bayisak Gexama KOVIX-19," Tewolde yiysixige.
data.amh: "የኢትዮጵያ አየር መንገድ ለኮቪድ-19 ወረርሽኝ ተጨማሪ የጭነት በረራዎች ውጤታማ በሆነ መንገድ ምላሽ እየሰጠ ሲሆን ጭንብል እና የፍተሻ መሳሪያዎች በአፍሪካ ኮቪድ-19ን ለመዋጋት ጥቅም ላይ የሚውሉበትን አህጉራዊ ኃላፊነቱን እየተወጣ ነው" ብለዋል አቶ ተወልደ።
data.orm: "Itophiyaan haguggiiwwan fuulaa fi meeshaalee qorannoo bakkeen Afiriikaa keessatti dhiyeessin kunneen COVID-19 waraanuuf barbaadamanitti geejjibuun haala gaarii ta'een weerara COVID-19tiif balalii fe'umsaa dabalataa fi dirqama ardii irraa eegamu baachuun deebii kennaa jira," Tewoldeen jedhaniiru.
data.som: "Ethiopian ayaa si wax ku ool ah uga jawaabeysaa faafitaanka COVID-19 duulimaadyo xamuul ah oo dheeri ah waxayna garab siisay mas'uuliyadeeda qaaradaha iyadoo soo rarysa maaskaro iyo xirmooyinka baaritaanka halkaasoo sahaydaas loogu isticmaalo dagaalka ka dhanka ah COVID-19 ee Afrika," Tewolde ayaa xusay.
data.tir: መገዲ ኣየር ኢትዮጵያ ተወሰኽቲ በረራታት ካርጎ ብምምዳብ ኣብ ምክልኻል ኮቪድ-19 ውፅኢታዊ ግብረ መልሲ ይህብ ኣሎ ዝበሉ ኣይተ ተወልደ መሸፈኒ ኣፍን ኣፍንጫን መመርመሪ ናውትን ናብ ዝተፈላለያ ሃገራት ኣፍሪካ ብምጉዕዓዝ ክፍለ ዓለማዊ ሓላፍነቱ ተዋፂኡ እዩ ኢሎም።

data.eng: In March alone, the carrier transported donations made to Africa by the Chinese business mogul Jack Ma in six days for all 54 African countries, the CEO stated, adding that “many African countries were surprised how the airlines distributed the medical equipment in a very short period of time.”
data.aaf: Qadodirih Dibuk, Merayti Cato Illa Afrika fanah Chaynak Tellemoh Mogul Jack Ma Lica Ayrot inkih tan 54 Baxooxah yece, CEOh saqal yesceseh, tahat osotinah " Mango Afrika Duwalite Kaxxam rufate Qaran merayti Xayi wakti Addat Diwata Uwaytiteh Kurabiyal."
data.amh: በመጋቢት ወር ብቻ በ6 ቀናት ውስጥ በቻይናው የቢዝነስ ባለቤት ጃክ ማ ለ54 የአፍሪካ ሀገራት ወደ አፍሪካ ያቀረበውን ልገሳ ሲያሳልጡ የነበሩት ዋና ስራ አስፈፃሚው አክለውም “አየር መንገዱ በአጭር ጊዜ የህክምና መሳሪያዎቹን እንዴት እንዳከፋፈሉ ለብዙ የአፍሪካ ሀገራት አስገራሚ ነው ።
data.orm: Bitootessa qofaatti, baataan kun kennaa daldalaa gameessa Chaayinaa Jach Ma'dhaan Afirikaaf guyyaa jaha keessatti biyyoota Afiriikaa 54'n hundaaf godhame geejjibeera, hoji-geggeessaan kun tuquun, "biyyoonni Afiriikaa hedduun akka itti daandiin xiyyaaraa kun yeroo baayye gabaabadu kana gidduutti meeshaalaa fayyaa rabseen dinqamaniiru" jechuun dabalaniiru.
data.som: Bishii Maarso oo keliya, shirkadda xamuulka qaada ayaa ku daabushay deeqo uu Afrika ugu deeqay maalqabeenka ganacsiga Shiinaha ee Jack Ma lix maalmood gudahooda dhammaan 54 ta waddan ee Afrika, maamulaha ayaa yiri, isagoo raaciyay "wadamo badan oo Afrikaan ah ayaa la yaabay sida shirkaduhu u qaybisay qalabka caafimaadka muddo gaaban.”
data.tir: ኣብ መጋቢት ጥራሕ እቲ መገዲ ኣየር ቻይናዊ ብዓል ሃፍቲ ጃክ ማ ንኣፍሪካ ዝሃብዎ ሓገዝ ኣብ ሽድሽተ መዓልታት ናብ ኩለን 54 ሃገራት ኣፍሪካ ከምዘጎዓዓዘ ዝገለፁ እቶም ዋና ፈፃሚ ስራሕ ብዙሓት ሃገራት ኣፍሪካ እቲ መገዲ ኣየር ንቶም ናውቲ ሕክምና ኣብ ሓፂር ግዜ ምብፅሑ ከምዝተደነቓ ሓቢሮም።

data.eng: US Acting Assistant Secretary for African Affairs Donald Yamamoto said US needs to have a significant contribution for the industrial park development of Ethiopia.
data.aaf: Amerikah taama koobahise Afrikah Caagida Sekretari Xonald Yamamoto Iyeh Amerik itiyyobiya Sanaqata Barkih Daddositel Nagay yan Doori Digirele.
data.amh: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ የአፍሪካ ጉዳዮች ተጠባባቂ ረዳት ሚኒስትር ዶናልድ ያማሞቶ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ለኢትዮጵያ የኢንዱስትሪ ፓርክ ልማት ከፍተኛ አስተዋፅኦ ማበርከት አለባት ብለዋል።
data.orm: Gargaara barreessaan raawwii dhimmoota Afirikaa Amerikaa Donaald Yamamootoon Ameerikaan gumaachaa guddaa babal'ina paarkii industirii Itoophiyaatiif gochuu qabdi jedhaniiru.
data.som: Ku simaha Xoghayaha Arrimaha Dibedda ee Maraykanka u qaabilsan Arrimaha Afrika, Donald Yamamoto, ayaa sheegay in Maraykanka looga baahan yahay inuu gacan weyn ka geysto horumarinta goobaha warshadaha ee Ethiopia.
data.tir: ተጠባባቒ ምኽትል ሚኒስትር ዝምድናታት ወፃኢ ኣሜሪካ ኣብ ጉዳያት ኣፍሪካ ዶናልድ ያማሞቶ ሃገሮም ኣብ ልምዓት ኢንዱስትሪ ፓርክ ኢትዮጵያ ርኡይ ኣስተዋፅኦ ክህልዋ ይግባእ ኢሎም።

data.eng: Secretary Yamamoto made the remark following the discussion with Ethiopia’s Foreign Minister Workneh Gebeyehu in Addis Ababa on Friday.
data.aaf: Sekretari Xonald Yamamoto Abeh yan Mablal Kataytah tan walalilte Itiyyobiyak Iroh Caagidah Malaak Workineh Gebeyuh Jumqatah Addiss Ababah Addal.
data.amh: ፀሃፊ ያማማቶ ይህን ያሉት ከኢትዮጵያ ውጭ ጉዳይ ሚኒስትር ወርቅነህ ገበየሁ ጋር በአዲስ አበባ ያደረጉትን ውይይት ተከትሎ ነው።
data.orm: Barreessaa Yamamootoon dubbii kana maree Ministeera Dhimma Alaa Itoophiyaa Warqina Gabayyoo waliin Jimaata godhan booda taasisan.
data.som: Xoghaye Yamamoto ayaa hadalkan jeediyay ka dib wadahadal uu Jimcihii kula yeeshay Addis Ababa Wasiirka Arrimaha Dibadda Itoobiya Workneh Gebeyehu.
data.tir: ያማሞቶ ንዚ ዝገለፁ ምስ ሚኒስትር ዝምድናታት ወፃኢ ኢትዮጵያ ወርቅነህ ገበየሁ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ዓርቢ ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ድሕሪ ምዝርራቦም እዩ።

data.eng: She mentioned the increasing Moroccan investment in Ethiopia since the past two years including investments by Anwar Invest Group and Holmarcom Group, the country’s top investors.
data.aaf: Is Qadoseh Namma Ligidih Addat Morokoh Xayloh Investmenti itiyyobiyal Osimak Geytimata Anwar Investih Butta Edde Tanim kee Holmarcom Butta, ta Baaxol Dagga Raqta Invsterwa kinon.
data.amh: በኢትዮጵያ ካለፉት ሁለት ዓመታት ወዲህ እየጨመረ የመጣውን የሞሮኮ ኢንቨስትመንት አንዋር ኢንቨስት ግሩፕ እና የሀገሪቱ ከፍተኛ ባለሀብቶች የሆኑት ሆማርኮም ግሩፕ ኢንቨስትመንቶችን ጠቅሳለች።
data.orm: Dabaliinsa investimentii Itoophiyaa keessatti lammiilee Morookootiin waggaa lamaan darbanii as investimentoota investaroota dursoo biyyatti Garee Investiimentii Anuwaar fi Garee Holmaarkoomii dabalatee jiru kaasteetti.
data.som: Waxa ay xustay maalgashiga sii kordhaya ee Morokko ee Itoobiya ilaa labadii sano ee la soo dhaafay oo ay ku jiraan maalgashiga Anwar Invest Group iyo Holmarcom Group, maalgashadayaasha ugu sarreeya dalka.
data.tir: ንኣንዋር ኢንቨስት ግሩፕን ሃልማርኮም ግሩፕን ሓዊሱ ኣብ ዝሓለፋ ክልተ ዓመታት ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ እናወሰኸ ዝመፅእ ዘሎ በዝሒ ኢንቨስተራት ሞሮኮ ጠቒሰን።

data.eng: According to her, the agreement signed between the two countries has helped to improve the tie in the economic sector.
data.aaf: Iss Elle Baxaqisenal, Sitigeyfermat Fanal kak Yekkem Namma Baaxoxa Maduur Sekter Barimuh Cato takkem kini.
data.amh: በሁለቱ ሀገራት መካከል የተፈረመው ስምምነት በኢኮኖሚው ዘርፍ ያለውን ግንኙነት ለማሻሻል አስችሏል ነው ያሉት ወይዘሮዋ።
data.orm: Akka isheetti, waliigalteen biyyoota lamaan gidduutti mallattaa'e hidhaa sektara diinagdeetin jiru fooyyessuuf gargaareera.
data.som: Sida ay sheegtay, heshiiska ay kala saxiixdeen labada wadan ayaa gacan ka qaatay wanaajinta xidhiidhka dhanka dhaqaalaha.
data.tir: ንሰን ከምዝበለኦ ኣብ ሞንጎ ክልቲአን ሃገራት ዝተፈረመ ስምምዕ ቁጠባዊ ምትእስሳር ንምምሕያሽ ሓጊዙ እዩ።

data.eng: According to the Hub, apparel continues to dominate East African exports across countries, accounting for 84.4 percent of all AGOA exports during the reported period.
data.aaf: Ta Hub Elle Baxaqisenal, Sartan bison inte Mangom Ayromawqah Afrikak Iro Gexa Murtite Baaxoh Addal, Loowok 84.4 Gabba Ikih tan AGOAk Iro Gexa Murtite Gabbaqu Xayose wakti.
data.amh: እንደ ሀብ ዘገባ ከሆነ አልባሳት በምስራቅ አፍሪካ ወደ ውጭ የሚላኩ ምርቶች በሪፖርቱ ወቅት 84.4 በመቶውን ይሸፍናሉ ።
data.orm: Akka giddugalichaatti, uffanichi ekispoortii Baha Afiriikaa byyoota keessatti akka ni to'ata, yeroo gabaasaatti dhibbentaa ekispoorti AGOA keessaa 84.4 kan qabatuudha.
data.som: Sida uu dhigay the Hub, dharka ayaa sii qabsanaya dhoofinta Bariga Afrika ee guud ahaan dalalka, taasoo ka dhigan 84.4 boqolkiiba dhammaan dhoofinta AGOA muddada warbixinta ah.
data.tir: እቲ ማእኸል ከምዝገለፆ ኣብቲ ዝተጠቐሰ ግዜ ኣልባሳት ካብ ጠቕላላ ሰደድ ኣጎዋ 84.4 ሚኢታዊ ብምሓዝ ኣብ ቀዳማይ ደረጃ ዝተሰርዐ ሰደድ ምፍራቕ ኣፍሪካ ኮይኑ ኣሎ።

data.eng: East African countries have made sustained efforts to take advantage of their AGOA eligibility in recent years.
data.aaf: Ayromawaqah Afrika Baxooxa Sarimanele Giclo abte AGOA fanah Cultuh Xayi Ligida Tayse gaba geytuh.
data.amh: የምስራቅ አፍሪካ ሀገራት ባለፉት አመታት የአጎዋ ብቁነታቸውን ለመጠቀም ያልተቋረጠ ጥረት አድርገዋል።
data.orm: Biyyoonni baha Afiriikaa waggoota dhiyoo keessatti itti fayadamummaa AGOA fayyadamuuf carraaqaniiru.
data.som: Waddamada Bariga Afrika ayaa sameeyey dadaallo joogto ah si ay uga faa'iideystaan u qalmitaanka AGOA sannadihii u dambeeyay.
data.tir: ሃገራት ምፍራቕ ኣፍሪካ ብኣጎዋ ንዘለወን ተቐባልነት ብዝያዳ ንምምዝማዝ ኣብዚ ቐረባ እዋን ዘይተሓለለ ፃዕሪ ኣካይደን እየን።

data.eng: The Ethiopian Petroleum Supply Enterprise (EPSE) is the sole government body for the importation of petroleum products while the Ministry of Trade sets retail petroleum prices upon the recommendations of the enterprise.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyak Naxaj Sukatih Xayoosih Interbirayiz (INSXI/EPSE/) Doolat Dagar Xaamel/Liomoseh/ Naxaj Sukati Murtiteta Culanamih kalah Kabxxah Malaak Dafeeseh Tiya tiya Naxaj Sukatih limo ta Interbirayiz Aydukumusam Abem Kini.

data.eng: In an unprecedented move, Members of Parliaments (MPs), the 100 percent Ethiopian Peoples’ Revolutionary Democratic Front (EPRDF) and affiliates controlled Ethiopian Parliament, demanded to ascertain the country's external debt repayment capacity, before ratifying new concessional loan agreements recently entered into with the Government of China.

data.amh: ባልተጠበቀ ሁኔታ የፓርላማ አባላት (ኤም ፒስ)፣ 100 በመቶ የኢትዮጵያ ሕዝቦች አብዮታዊ ዴሞክራሲያዊ ግንባር (ኢህአዴግ) እና በኢትዮጵያ ፓርላማ ቁጥጥር ሥር ያሉ ድርጅቶች በቅርቡ ከቻይና መንግሥት ጋር የገቡትን አዲስ የውል ብድር ስምምነቶች ከመፅደቁ በፊት የአገሪቱን የውጭ ዕዳ የመክፈል አቅም እንዲረጋገጥ ጠይቀዋል።
data.orm: Deemsa hin talmaamneen, Miseensonni Paarlaamaa (MP), Addi Diimokiraatawaa Warraaqsa Ummata Itoopiyaa (EPRDF) dhibbantaa 100 fi kan isatti hidhata qabu Paarlaamaa Itoopiyaa qabatanii jiran, waliigaltee liqa haaraa dhiyeenya Mootummaa Chaayinaa wajjin seename mirkaneessuun dura mirkan dandeettii liqa alaa deebisanii kanfaluu biyyattii mirkaneessuu gaafatan,
data.som: “Tallaabadan aan lafilaynun, Xubnaha Baarlamaanka (MPs), 100% Jabhadda Dimuqraadiga Dimuqraadiga Shacabka Itoobiya (EPRDF) iyo xulafadooda gacanta ku haysa Baarlamaanka Itoobiya, ayaa dalbaday in la hubiyo awoodda dib u bixinta deynta dibadda ee dalka, ka hor intaanay ansixin heshiisyo deyn cusub oo dhawaan la galay. iyo dowladda Shiinaha."
data.tir: ኣባላት ባይቶ እቲ 100 ካብ ሚኢቲ ብወያናይ ዴሞክራሲያዊ ግንባር ህዝብታት ኢትዮጵያን (ኢህወዴግ) ኣጋራቱን ዝተትሓዘ ፓርላማ ኢትዮጵያ ተገይሩ ብዘይፈልጥ ኣገባብ ኣብዚ ቀረባ እዋን ምስ መንግስቲ ቻይና ዝተበፅሐ ውዕል ልቓሕ ቅድሚ ምፅዳቑ እታ ሃገር ዕዳ ወፃኢ ናይምኽፋል ዓቕማ ክጣለል ሓቲቱ።

data.eng: The loan agreements in question are signed recently with the Chinese Export-Import (EXIM) Bank, which agreed to avail an aggregate outlay of USD 332.7 million for a highway road construction and power transmission projects envisaged to relieve the traffic congestions as well the fluctuating electric power supply in parts of Addis Ababa.
data.aaf: tasitigeyih esseroh addat firawaga xayiwak chaynak iro kee Addah Uwaytiteh xayosah (EXIM) banki, sitageenih sitat 332.7 milyoonih dolaar qiytababur gitih xisne kee cayli tabatabsih cugayso, Manosanama tarafik kaddu kee tahalih Addiss Ababak koran caylih xayoosih gadisiya.
data.amh: ጥያቄ ውስጥ ያሉት የብድር ስምምነቶች የአዲስ አበባን የትራፊክ መጨናነቅ እንዲሁም በአዲስ አበባ አንዳንድ አካባቢዎች የሚቆራረጠውን የኤሌክትሪክ ሃይል አቅርቦት ለመቅረፍ ለታሰበው የአውራ ጎዳና መንገድ ግንባታና የኃይል ማስተላለፊያ ፕሮጀክቶች 332.7 ሚልዮን ዶላር ለመስጠት ከተስማማው የቻይና ኤክስፖርት-ኢምፖርት (ኤክስ አይ ኤም) ባንክ ጋር በቅርቡ ተፈርሟል።
data.orm: Waliigalteen liqaa gaaffii keessa jiru dhiyeenya Baankii Eksipoort- Impoort (EXIM) Chaayinaa wajjin kan mallatteeffame, kan hamma maallaqaa waliigalaa miliyoona USD 332.7 ijaarsa daansii saffisaa fi pirojektoota daddabarsa humna ibsaa kan walitti heddumachuu tiraafikaa akkasumas ciccituu dhiyeessii humna ibsaa kutaalee Addis Ababaa keessaa furuuf yaadame dhiyeessuuf.
data.som: Heshiisyada daymaha ah ee su'aasha keenay ayaa dhowaan la saxeexay Bangiga Dhoofinta iyo soo dajinta Shiinaha (EXIM), kaas oo ku heshiiyey inuu ka faa'iidaysto wadar ahaan USD 332.7 milyan oo doolar oo loogu talagalay dhismaha waddooyinka iyo mashaariicda gudbinta korontada Korontada qaybo ka mid ah Addis Ababa.
data.tir: እቲ ውዕል ልቓሕ ኣብዚ ቀረባ እዋን ምስ ባንኪ ሰደድን ኣታውን ቻይና ዝተገበረን ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ንዝረአይ ምጭንናቕ ትራፊክን ምቁርራፅ ቀረብ ሓይሊ ኤሌትሪክን ንምቅላል ንዝስራሕ ጎደናን ፕሮጀክታት ዝርገሐ ሓይሊ ኤሌትሪክን ዝውዕል 332.7 ሚልዮን ዶላር እቲ ባንኪ ከለቅሕ ዝተሰማመዐሉን እዩ።

data.eng: “The people of the two regions recently sat down and agreed to resolve their problems peacefully. The rent seekers have also been identified by the two regions, and were relieved of their position,” he added.
data.aaf: " namma Rakaakayih Ayyunti xayiwak dafeyeenim kee issini taqabi saaylegural yafdigenimil sitsgeenih. Tufaxa uguugusa tumbuluyeh ta namma rakaakayal, kee oson issini Arooca Cabeenih," usuk osisak.
data.amh: "የሁለቱ ክልል ህዝቦች በቅርቡ ቁጭ ብለው ችግራቸዉን በሰላማዊ መንገድ ለመፍታት ተስማምተዋል። የቤት ኪራይ ጠያቂዎቹም በሁለቱ ክልሎች ተለይተው ከቦታቸው ተነስተዋል።" ሲል አክሏል።
data.orm: "Ummati naannolee lamaanii dhiyeenya kana taa'anii rakkoolee isaanii karaa nagaan furuuf waliigalan. Kiraa sassaabdonni naannolee lamaaniin adda baafaman aangoo isaanii irraa kaafamaniiru," jedhe itti dabalee.
data.som: “Shacabka labada deegaan way wada fadhiisteen dhawaan, waxayna ku heshiiyeen in si nabad ah lagu xaliyo dhibaatooyinkooda. Dadka kiro doonka na in iyagana labada deegaan ayaa la aqoonsaday, waana laga xayuubiyay booskoodii,” ayuu raaciyay.
data.tir: “ህዝብታት ክልቲአን ክልላት ፀገማቶም ብሰላማዊ መገዲ ንምፍታሕ ኣብዚ ቀረባ እዋን ተሰማሚዖም። እቶም ኣከብቲ ክራይ ብኽልቲአን ክልላት ዝተነፀሩ እንትንዀን ካብ ሓላፍነቶም ክለዓሉ እውን ተገይሮም ። ኢሎም።

data.eng: The PM told the house that the federal government has also identified the ringleaders, and vowed to bring them to justice.

data.eng: Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed (PhD) met and discussed with members and leaders of opposition political parties who have returned home and those who are conducting their political activities in the country following the call by the PM during his inaugural speech back in April.

data.amh: ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር አብይ አህመድ (ፒ ኤች ዲ) ወደ አገራቸው ከተመለሱ የተቃዋሚ ፖለቲካ ፓርቲ አባላትና አመራሮች እና ጠ/ሚ ባለፈው ሚያዝያ በምርቃት ንግግሩ ያደረጉትን ጥሪ ተከትሎ በሀገሪቱ የፖለቲካ እንቅስቃሴያቸውን እያካሄዱ ካሉ ጋር ተገናኝተው ተወያይተዋል።
data.orm: Muummeen Ministeeraa Itoopiyaa (PhD) miseensota fi hoogganoota jaarmiyaa siyaasaa mormitootaa kanneen waamicha MM'chaa haasaa yeroo eebbaa Ebla keessa hordofuun biyyatti deebi'anii fi sochiilee siyaasaa isaanii biyyattii keessatti geggeessaa jiran wajjjin walargee mari'ate.
data.som: Ra’iisul Wasaare Abiy Ahmed (PhD) ayaa la kulmay oo uu kala hadlay xubnaha iyo madaxda xisbiyada mucaaradka ah ee dalka dib ugu soo laabtay iyo kuwa howlahooda siyaasadeed ka wada dalka ka dib baaqii Ra’iisul Wasaaraha uu jeediyay khudbadiisii ugu horeysay ee bishii April.
data.tir: ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ኣቢይ ኣሕመድ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ማዝያ ስልጣን እንትሕዙ ኣብ ዘስምዑዎ ዘረባ ብመሰረት ዝገበሩዎ መፀዋዕታ ናብ ሃገሮም ናይ ዝተመለሱን ኣብታ ሃገር ፖለቲካዊ ምንቅስቓስ የካይዱ ናይ ዘለውን ተቓወምቲ ፖለቲካዊ ውድባት ኣባላትን መራሕትን ብምርኻብ ዘትዮም።

data.eng: The discussion between the PM and the leaders of different political parties was held on Tuesday at the PM’s office; the two sides discussing various issues with the PM presenting a three-stage plan.

data.amh: በጠ/ሚ እና በተለያዩ የፖለቲካ ፓርቲ መሪዎች መካከል የተደረገው ውይይት ማክሰኞ በጠ/ሚ ጽሕፈት ቤት ሲካሄድ ሁለቱ ወገኖች ከጠ/ሚ ጋር በተለያዩ ጉዳዮች ላይ የሦስት ደረጃ ዕቅድ አቅርበዋል።

data.tir: ኣብ ሞንጎ እቶም ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትርን መራሕቲ ዝተፈላለዩ ፖለቲካዊ ውድባትን ዝተኻየደ ዘተ ብሰሉስ ኣብ ቤት ፅሕፈት ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ዝተሳለጠ ኰይኑ ክልቲኦም ወገናት ኣብ ዝተፈላለዩ ዛዕባታት ተመያይጦም፤ እቶም ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ድማ ብዓል ሰለስተ ብርኪ ትልሚ ኣቕሪቦም።

data.eng: The historic deal was signed by Mohamed HamdanDaglo, deputy chief of the military council, and opposition leader, Ahmed al-Rabie, in Khartoum, Sudan.

data.eng: Soleyana Shemeles, the Communications Advisor to the NEBE, told The Reporter that “the NEBE designed all materials to be printed in five languages including Amharic, Amharic/Oromiffa, Amharic/Tigrigna, Amharic/Afar, and Amharic/Somali.”
data.aaf: Solyana Shimelis, Angaraw Fayu Aba NEBEk, riborterik intem " NEBEh Biciseh ikih tan Uwaytiteh matbaqa koona Afitet Amcari Afay, amcari/Oromiyah Afay, amcari/Tigreh Afay, amcari/Qafar Afa kee amcari/Somalih Af."
data.amh: የኤን ኢ ቢ ኢ ኮሙኒኬሽን አማካሪ ሶሊያና ሽመልስ ለሪፖርተር እንደገለፀችው " ኤን ኢ ቢ ኢ ሁሉንም ቁሳቁሶች በአማርኛ፣ አማርኛ/ኦሮሚፋ፣ አማርኛ/ትግረኛ፣ አማርኛ /አፋር እና አማርኛ/ ሶማሊን ጨምሮ በአምስት ቋንቋዎች እንዲታተሙ ነው የነደፈው።"
data.orm: Soliyaanaa Shimallis, Gorsituun Koomunikeeshinii NEBE, "NEBE barruulee Amaariffa, Amaariffa/Afaan Oromoo, Amaariffa/Tigirffa, Amaariffa/Afaan Affaar, fi Amaariffa/Afaan Somaalee dabalachuun afaanota shananiin maxxansamuuf akka tahe Ze Ripporteratti himte.
data.som: Soleyana Shemeles, oo ah La-taliyaha Isgaadhsiinta ee NEBE, ayaa u sheegtay The Reporter in “NEBE ay u qorsheeyeen in dhammaan agabka lagu daabaco shan luqadood oo ay ku jiraan Amxaari, Amxaari/Af Oromo, Amxaari/Tigree, Amxaari/Canfar, iyo Amxaari/Soomaali.”
data.tir: ኣማኻሪት ኮሚዩኒኬሽን ሃገራዊ ቦርድ መረፃ ኢትዮጵያ ሶልያና ሽመልስ ንሪፖርተር ከምዝበለኦ እቲ ቦርድ ብሓሙሽቲኦም ቋንቋታት ማለት’ውን ኣምሓርኛ፣ ኣምሓርኛ/ኦሮሚፋ፣ ኣምሓርኛ/ትግርኛ፣ ኣምሓርኛ/ዓፋርን ኣምሓርኛ/ሶማልን ኩሎም ናውቲ ዲዛይን ገይሩ እዩ።

data.eng: The main materials being procured internationally, according to Soleyana, are voter registration book (voter list books), voter cards book, and plastic boxes with seals, to be used in the transport of materials to a secured storage facility at polling stations for overnight stays, voter registration forms, and voter registration stationary kits.

data.amh: ሶሊያና እንደምትለው ከሆነ በዓለም አቀፍ ደረጃ እየተሰጣቸው ያሉት ዋና ዋና ቁሳቁሶች በምርጫ ጣቢያዎች ለአዳር ቆይታ፣ የመራጮች ምዝገባ ቅጾች እና የመራጮች ምዝገባ ዕቃዎች ወደ አስተማማኝ ማከማቻ ቦታ ለማጓጓዝ የሚያገለግሉ የድምፅ ሰጪ መዝገብ መፅሀፍ (የድምፅ ዝርዝር መፅሕፍት)፣ የድምፅ መስጫ ካርድ መፅሀፍና ማህተሞች ያሏቸው የፕላስቲክ ሳጥኖች ናቸው።
data.orm: Akka Sooliyaanaan jettetti barruuleen ijoon akka addunyaatti bitamaa jiru, barruu galmee filattootaa (barrruuwan tarree filattootaa), barruu kaardiiwwan filattootaa, fi saanduqota pilaastikaa cufaawwan isaanii wajjin, kan geejiba barruulee sana gara buufata filannoo turtii halkaniif iddoo nageenya qabuutti ittiin geessan, gucawwan galmee filattootaa, fi wantoota barreeffamaa galmee filattootaf fayyadu dha.
data.som: Agaabka ugu muhiimsan ee si caalami ah loo soo iibinayo, sida ay sheegtay Soleyana, waa buugta diiwaan gelinta codbixiyayaasha (buuga liiska codbixiyayaasha), buugta kaadhadhka codbixiyayaasha, iyo sanaadiiqda caaga ah ee shaabadu ku xidhan tahay, si loogu qaado agabka kaydka sugan ee goobaha codbixinta si ay habeen u hoydaan , foomamka diwaan galinta codbixiyayaasha, iyo xidhmooyinka joogtada ah ee diiwaangelinta codbixiyayaasha.
data.tir: ሶልያና ከምዝበለኦ ኣብ ወፃኢ ዝዕደጉ ናውቲ መዝገብ መረፅቲ፣ ኣብ ጣብያታት መረፃ ናውቲ ናብ ግዚያዊ መሕደሪኦም ብውሑስ ኣገባብ ንምጉዕዓዝ ዘገልግሉ መዐሸጊ ዘለዎም ሳናዱቕ ፕላስቲክ፣ ቅጥዕታት ምዝገባ መረፅትን፣ ናውቲ ፅሕፈት ምዝገባ መረፅትን ይርከብዎም።

data.eng: The MP further stated that Parliamentarians put in a request to the executive branch of government to have OLF Shene, Tigray People’s Liberation Front (TPLF) and Benishangul-Gumuz Liberation Front designated as terrorist groups and for the government to notify the house of its decision.
data.aaf: NM Osotonah Iyem Barlamah tenkketemarite Dafeseh esserak Doolat Luditek Abinosa OLF shene, Tigray Ayyutih Amobaxaqah Foca (TPLF) kee Benishangul gumuzuk Amobaxaqah foca Doorimenih Qakakisa Butta kee Doolatah isi Margaqa Qarih Tiysixigeh.
data.amh: የፓርላማ አባላት ኦነግ ሸኔ፣ የትግራይ ሕዝብ ወያኔ ሀርነት ግንባር (ህወሓት ) እና የቤኒሻንጉል-ጉሙዝ ነፃ አውጪ ግንባር አሸባሪ ቡድኖች ተብለው እንዲመደቡና መንግሥት ውሳኔውን ለፖርላማ እንዲያሳውቅላቸው ለመንግስት አስፈፃሚ ቅርንጫፍ ጥያቄ ማቅረባቸዉንም ጠ/ሚ ገልፀዋል።
data.orm: MP'chaa caalmaatti miseensotni Paarlaamaa qaamni raawachiiftuu mootummaa OLF shanee, Addi Bilisummaa Ummata Tigraay (TPLF) fi Addi Bilisummaa Beenishaangul-Gumuz garee shororkeessitootaa jedhamuun akka farraju akka gaafatanii fi mootummaan murtii isaa mana marichaa akka beeksisu jedhe.
data.som: Xildhibaanka oo hadalkiisa sii wata ayaa sheegay in Baarlamaanku ay ka codsadeen laanta fulinta ee dowladda in OLF Shene, Jabhadda Xoraynta Shacabka Tigray (TPLF) iyo Jabhadda Xoraynta Benishangul-Gumuz ay u aqoonsan yihiin kooxo argagixiso ah, dowladduna ay la socodsiiso golaha go’aankeeda.
data.tir: ኦ ኤል ኤፍ ሸኔ፣ ህዝባዊ ወያነ ሓርነት ትግራይ (ህወሓት) ከምኡ’ውን ግንባር ሓርነት ቤንሻንጉል ጉሙዝ ኣሸበርቲ ተባሂሎም ክፍረጁ ኣባላት ባይቶ ንቲ ፈፃሚ ኣካል ከምዝጠየቑን መንግስቲ ውሳንኡ ንባይቶ ፌዴሬሽን ከፍልጥ ከምዝሓተቱን እቶም ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ወሲኾም ገሊፆም።

data.eng: It is to be recalled that the Council of Ministers declared the State of Emergency 5/14 in a bid to protect the community and the nation at large from a security threat posed by the terrorist group.

data.amh: የሚኒስትሮች ምክር ቤት ህብረተሰቡንእና በአጠቃላይ ሀገሪቱን በአሸባሪው ቡድን ከሚፈጠረው የፀጥታ ስጋት ለመጠበቅ ሲል የአስቸኳይ ጊዜ አዋጅ 5/14ን ማወጁ ሊታወስ ይገባል።

data.som: Waxaa xusid mudan in Golaha Wasiiradu ay ku dhawaaqeen marxalad deg deg ah 5/14 si bulshada iyo guud ahaan dalka looga difaaco khatarta amni ga oo ay maleegayaan kooxaha argagixisada ah.

data.eng: Ethiopia has done much in protecting biodiversity after the signing of the Rio Agreement in 1992, according to Ethiopian Biodiversity Institute.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiya Mango monotota dacrisanamal Taysem Abte Sitingey Abtek Lakal Rio Sitigey 1992 Addal, Itiyyobiyak Mango Monotiyih Institut Elle Qadosenal.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ በ1992 የሪዮ ስምምነት ከተፈራረመች በኋላ በብዝሀ ህይወት ጥበቃ ላይ ብዙ ሰርታለች ሲል የኢትዮጵያ ብዝሃ ህይወት ኢንስቲትዩት አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Itoophiyaan baayoodaayiversitii kunuunsuuf erga walii galtee Riyoo 1992tti mallatteesiteen booda hojiilee hedduu hojjetteetti, akka Giddugala Baayoodaayiversitii Itoophiyaatti.
data.som: Itoobiya ayaa wax badan ka qabatay dhawrida kala duwanaanshaha noolaha ka dib markii la saxeexay heshiiskii Rio 1992, sida uu sheegay macadka noolaha kala gadisan ee Itoobiya.
data.tir: ትካል ብዝሃ ህይወት ኢትዮጵያ ከምዝገለፆ፤ ድሕሪ ምፍራም ስምምዕ ርዮ 1992፤ ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ምዕቃብ ብዝሃ ህይወት ብዙሕ ሰሪሓ እያ።

data.eng: The institute has been diversifying efforts to improve the ecological system and conserving biodiversity during the period.

data.eng: UNDP Country director Louise Chamberlain said on her part that the goal of the plan can only be achieved with strong involvement of the people of Ethiopia and government leaders at all levels and across the country through strong partnerships.
